story:
UPDATE Jan. 8: We've been featured on StartUp CatchUp

"With their app you can tap into innovative thought hacking techniques, putting you back in the driver seat."

What is HeadLamp?

HeadLamp was founded by people who have lived with anxiety for decades, but finally found relief through proven therapies and breakthrough techniques.

The HeadLamp idea is pretty simple and simple is good.

Your thoughts determine your behaviors, which determine your quality of life. If you can understand and shape our thoughts, you can improve your life for the better.

It's as simple as this: if you are stuck in an endless cycle of negative and destructive thinking, your life will definitely be impacted. HeadLamp helps you rewire your brain and change your life.

HeadLamp  for anyone who wants less stress, worry, and anxiety in their lives. 

It’s for anyone who wants to shape their lives in a more positive way.

By contributing to HeadLamp, you can help millions of people (including yourself) by creating access to the best therapies and techniques out there in one simple app.

What We Need & What You Get

HeadLamp has been reviewed by graduate students, anxiety suffers, and some of the best app developers in the country. We were recently 

Your contribution moves us to the next stage of building an app that can be BETA tested by … you!

By investing in HeadLamp, you get to be the first to test the app before it goes to market!

What if We Don’t Reach Our Goal?

We will reach our goal, but if we don’t, we will keep fundraising in any and everyway possible until we can get our first version of the app produced and ready for you to test. Your money will keep going towards making HeadLamp a reality for all users.

The Impact

You’re contribution could have a huge impact on the millions of people around the world who suffer from anxiety, stress, and worry. “Relief” apps are popping up all over the place, but HeadLamp is the first of it’s kind because it combines multiple forms of therapy and self-care in one seamless package.

Risks & Challenges

Building a great app is expensive and this is just the beginning, but raising this money is the first and most important step in making HeadLamp a reality.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can’t contribute? That’s ok, but please share this with your online community of friends, family, and co-workers. This is for a really good cause!

story:
Hello,

My name is Dephillia McClenon, inventor of the Pro-Protector Toothbrush Holder. I am the mother of three girls. I worked for the US Postal Service close to twenty -five years before trying my hand at business.

We were attending a conference, staying in a major hotel with our only toothbrush storage options were, place toothbrush in bathroom cup or place toothbrush in drawer. So, we purchased economy holders at one of the major drug chains. The next morning our toothbrushes were still damp from not being able to dry.
The Pro-Protector was created out of a need for a toothbrush holder that protects the entire toothbrush from airborne germs and bacteria floating in the air from flushing the toilet. 

Through years of hard work, enduring very difficult times and making family sacrifices  for the last ten years, I finally have a product that serves a need, one of which most of us encounter, protecting of toothbrush from airborne germs and bacteria. Your contribution to my campaign will be highly appreciated.  I asking for your help is supporting my campaign and making it a success.

Thank you,

Dephillia McClenon


Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
It was that puddle of mud. That glass of red wine, perhaps? Or maybe it was your children happily playing outside in the rain? It should have been your first cup of coffee that morning, but it wasn’t, was it? Whatever it was, one thing is certain; that textile is never going to be the same. It doesn’t matter how many times you run it through the wash. You could bleach it, perhaps, but we both know bleach almost never works the way you want it to. You might as well throw the textile out right now. It’s ruined, and unless you can think of a way to build a time machine, that’s the way it’s going to stay.

For a long time, this has been the situation as far as liquid stains go. Unless the liquid you spill is clean spring water, you’ve created a long-term, often unsolvable problem for yourself. All of this, however, is about to change! With this new product from repellX , you never have to worry about messy spills or dirty textiles again. Simply spray repellX on your clothing, accessories, shoes, linens, or other textile products, and you’re protected from liquids that would otherwise be a guaranteed stain hazard. 

How does this works, I hear you ask? It’s quite simple really; repellX makes items repellent, without changing the product’s original appearance or quality. It allows them to repel liquids before they ever get the chance to make a stain. This negates any need for bleach or even any need for cleaning at all. With repellX, you could in theory get into a whole shower of soda and wine and come out clean on the other side – or your clothing at least!




This product is water-based, which means that it’s non-irritating for your skin. As we have put in great effort to ensure that it’s 100% safe, you don’t have to worry about it messing with your health. On top of that, we are an environmentally conscious trio and have made a concerted effort to see to it that repellX is eco-friendly. It’s good for you, good for the planet and of course, good for your clothes.

Nanotechnology, in general, is still in its infancy and we will see many new breakthroughs in the years to come, meaning that more products will go from a research level to a more commercial scale. The repellX team think that during the next 5-10 years the supply and demand of products based on nanotechnology will explode.

There will also be an increased amount of competitors offering similar products. However, our goal is that by then, repellX would be the obvious choice for the consumer as our product is the only one that is extremely effective as well as ecofriendly.

We will always be at the cutting edge when it comes to research and advancements in technology and therefore we think we will always be able to offer the best products to our customers, before any competitors do.

repellX textile is the first product in our series and we are currently developing environmentally friendly alternatives for coating every conceivable surface, such as steel, plastics, wood and glass.

Thank you for reading all the way to the end. We hope that you’re just as excited about repellX as we are, and that you’ll join us in helping people all around the world to stay fresh and clean and supporting environmental technology.

We are excited and proud of what we’re developing! With your support we can focus on new cool and sustainable products, and make more and more people aware of this amazing and potentially life-changing technology.

                          We’re honored to share it with you on Indiegogo.

                                                             THANK YOU!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Terry Cox and I'm the Inventor of the Save our Swimmers alert system. When I was a child, I lost TWO of my closest friends to drowning. I never got over it. Later in life, I discovered that drowning  is the NUMBER ONE CAUSE OF DEATH in children under 4, and second only to car accidents in killing children and adults under 25. A majority of those who drown are in the company or care of responsible adults.
I also learned that DROWNING IS ALMOST ALWAYS PREVENTABLE. The main reason people are so vulnerable is that most of us are unaware of what drowning really looks like. 

*   Drowning doesn’t make a splash.  People who are drowning look very much like they’re just treading water. They don’t stand out among other swimmers. 

*   Drowning is silent.  Because the throat closes up to prevent water from entering the windpipe, those drowning are unable to call out for help. Most people don't know this, and it is exactly why so many swimmers drown within feet of other swimmers!

*   Drowning is fast. It takes as little as 60 seconds in adults and as little as 20 seconds in children.  

* NOTHING CAN OR SHOULD REPLACE PARENTAL VIGILANCE. 

Just like seatbelts help save lives in cars and helmets help save lives on bikes, the SOS device can help save lives in the water.

Please help us to bring this product to market, so we can make the water the fun and the safe place we all know it can be!

How it Works

The SOS Alert System can be worn on a headband by an experienced swimmer and set to go off after a dangerous period of submersion or worn on a wristband by a non-swimmer, going off immediately upon contact with water. The product also features a “panic button,” which a swimmer can push at any sign of danger to themselves or others in the water.

Currently in prototype form, the device electronically communicates with a pager-like receiver. We're now working with developers to create a smartphone application for the SOS – a goal we anticipate achieving in the coming weeks. 

Our unique product has a patent pending.

What We Need & What You Get

We need 100,000.00 to evolve our current rough prototype into a more streamlined & designed prototype that works with an external receiver and is also compatible with iPhone and Android technology. This amount will also allow us a significant opportunity to test-market the product and raise awareness, making it possible to then mass produce. 

If we go beyond our current goal, the additional funds will allow us to make any changes the new prototype proves necessary or advantageous. 

Should we significantly surpass our goal, we will move to the manufacturing phase. 

The Impact

1.2 MILLION people die worldwide annually from drowning. THAT'S 2 PEOPLE PER SECOND! Most of these deaths are entirely preventable.

Our product and even the campaign itself will raise awareness about recognizing the signs of drowning. This knowledge and the release of the product can realistically prevent unnecessary deaths in children and adults.

We've spent all of our own money to get where we are -- with a rough working prototype and a PATENT PENDING. Now we need you on the team to get the SOS Device out to the world!

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge at this point is getting the funds to get the product to market -- an undertaking that costs literally hundreds of thousands of dollars. This is why we need your help. We see a very dire need here with nothing less at stake than the lives of children. Hundreds of thousands of dollars MUST NOT stand in the way of saving hundreds of thousands of lives!

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that financial contributions are not possible for everyone. You can still help. Please spread the word about our campaign through social media and good old-fashioned word of mouth. Indiegogo has some great share tools (just a click away). While the SOS device is a powerful tool, AWARENESS is the most important tool and you can build that with your choice to get involved!

story:
Hello!

We are Michael Farraj and Alejandra Picazo founders and inventors of Tidy Nails, the first and only swab for cleaning underneath finger and toenails.  Our campaign is important to us for a couple of reasons, we believe this unique product will improve the world by introducing a specialized device to clean and protect under nails.  There are many statistics of germs that collect underneath the fingernails such as fungus, bacteria, viruses and just plain unsightly dirt and oil.  The only thing we have to date which supposedly cleans underneath the fingernail is either a piece of wood, metal, or plastic that scrapes dirt while stripping the protective coating allowing dirt and oil to collect underneath the nail faster than before.  Our product cleans and disinfects with a natural solution, plus helps rebuild the nail with amino acids.  How many times have you looked down at your nails and said to yourself "There has got to be a better way"?

By helping fund this project, you can be a part of history in the making!  We believe this device will pioneer and change how the world beautifies and disinfects their finger/toenails.  We tried to fund this project ourselves, but the way the USPTO is set up, one must continuously submit applications (paying fees every time) while waiting months to years for a response.  Most of the time this leads to another submission and delaying the process of having your patent properly apply to your invention.  This alone has hindered our ability to bring this extremely useful invention to You!  Needless to say, after 5 years of going back and forth with the patent office, we now have a patent!  The downside to our battle with the patent office is we have used up all of our investment money and we do not have what we need to move forward with a prototype, manufacturing, packaging, marketing, consulting etc...

What we need:

Currently, we need contributions in upwards of $500,000.00 to launch this product correctly.  The funds will go to properly launching the company.

Here's the breakdown of where the funds will go:  

PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT & ENGINEERING

  • Industrial Design
  • 3 D modeling through Computer Aided Design (CAD)
  • Animation 
  • Physical proof-of-concept prototype
  • Marketing
  • Licensing
  • Negotiations

The Impact:

Imagine this - seeing Tidy Nails in nail salons, hospitals, hotels, gymnasiums, near your toilet in a special dispenser, in women's purses, in cars, using them as often as a  Q-Tip™ and more!  Imagine the wall we can put up on diseases transmitted by contact with finger/toenails!  Nails are a multi-billion dollar industry! 

Risks:

With any new start-up, there are always challenges that need to be overcome.  As you know, this first time device will change the way people clean and disinfect underneath their finger and toenails - there will be things that will need to be learned along the way, but like our other ventures we do not believe there are any challenges within this arena that we will not be able to overcome with your help.  With your contributions, we will be able to properly create the perfect device, prototype it and have it ready for marketing.  We will also be able to get proper consultation from people and companies that have brought similar items to market successfully - this is the key to success, we’re not here to reinvent the wheel.

Your Participation:

Your participation is not only needed, but greatly appreciated!  Help us help the world, help us help you, help us help people in need.  When the company is fully operational we will set aside a portion of our proceeds and fund a non-profit organization the will help those in need of food, shelter, medicine and care.  We firmly believe in giving back, we will not go forward without helping others move forward as well.  

We thank you in advance for your kind support- whether it be in the form of a donation and/or by sharing our campaign with your friends, family, business associates, and social media.  Please help us get the word out there!

help the world, help us help you, help us help people in need.  When the
company is fully operational we will set aside a portion of our proceeds and fund a non-profit
organization the will help those in need of food, shelter, medicine and
care.  We firmly believe in giving back, we will not go forward without
helping others move forward as well.  We thank you in advance for your kind support- whether it be in the form of a donation and/or by sharing our campaign with your friends, family, business associates, and social media.  Please help us get the word out there!

story:
Hello I'm Allan...

I am a product designer and inventor that has spent my life working for others rather working for myself. I am at a point in my life that I feel the need to go out on my own and launch some of the products that I have designed and have left on the workbench because of time, money and family commitments.

The Snomate represents the first brush that is actually prepared for snow. If you are life me and like all I know, when you need your snow brush it is trapped somewhere in your car, truck or whatever your driving. By the time you get to it you and the inside of your vehicle is covered in snow. The Snomate can easily fit in a purse, a knapsack, briefcase or even a larger cost pocket.



With YOUR Support...

With your help I would be able to actually build this product. I would press forward with the actual CAD drawings and technical reviews. Then using these files to develop the actual molds.  There are designs needed for the aluminum in order for it to be properly extruded, The bristle elements would need to be molded and prepared and the scraper molds manufactured. With your help this project will happen and it will change the way we deal with snow. With the Snomate you have the brush with you ready for action. So that means ...No more snow in the car when you open the door to find the brush, no more using your hands before you get to the snow brush which you think must be in the trunk and no more swearing and cussing when you just can't find the brush.


What will I do with the money...

As for funding to produce the necessary moulds in order to manufacture the Snomate I have estimated the cost to be about $30,000. The majority of the funds will go to the mould production facility to generate the files and cut the molds. This would then permit me to employ the services of plastic injection facility to output the PolyCarbonate pieces. The aluminum requires 3 moulds for extrusion. However, these are far less expensive. It is my belief that I can purchase the bristle and hire a third party facility to actually doing the bristling aspect of the brush. We plan to look at using the services of a third party service for the physically and mentally challenged to perform the assembly. This will be a step by step process and I believe would be well suited as a project to assist those with that are challenged.


What will your support get you...

It would be our plan to offer a Snomate as a reward for supporting the project. With a contribution of $20 (as best guess so far) we would be able to ship you the world’s First Collapsible POCKET Snow Brush for yourself or to offer as a gift. Until we really get the numbers worked out, I think we are very safe with $20 and am hopeful to get that number down.


My Chance to really do what I do best...

I have been involved in the development and design of other projects in the past. There were many successful automotive clean and care products, lawn and garden products, hunting and fishing products and general merchandise products. Although they do not bear my name, I have been a direct influence in their design and distribution. Many distributed on a global basis by very recognizable corporations.

I feel this is now my chance to do something I believe in and do it on my own. Well not really on my but with the help of supporters like you that can help me achieve the funding necessary to bring this to fruition.

I guess the concern is that I will have enough funding to have all the molds made and then run out of money to actually produce the goods. I believe that I have been very careful in determining the costs. I have a strong background and understanding of the production process and have many sources that I can turn to for support in order to ensure success.

Battled past the real risks...

I believe that I am able to define the key components and have already overcome the technical issues. The ability to have the unit extend in 3 sections and proper lock for each was something I was able to overcome. The locking mechanism is operable at all 3 levels and ensure for a solid engagement. These we technical challenges that I have already been fortunate to overcome. As a result, I do not foresee these items preventing me from being able to produce acceptable volumes. At least I would be able to sustain the needs of the supporters.

Please shout it out!



While I know not everyone out can be a supporter, I would certainly appreciate your well wishes and positive comments. You could even show your friends and relatives about this product. Spreading the word would certainly be appreciated.

story:
Welcome to RED DOG RECOVERY RANCH!

I opened the Ranch in the summer of 2014 to address the growing need for land-based treatment options for rural folks suffering from addiction and mental health problems. My years in the federal health sector as an addiction counsellor, program developer and residential treatment director (and my driving passion for this work) allowed me to honestly look at our programs and see how we were failing many of our most vulnerable people. 
For many years the grass roots and front-lines  have advocated to develop land-based, culturally grounded treatment programs, family treatment programs, and facilities that did not, by design, discriminate based on sexual orientation or identity. I and passionate others worked diligently to move these recommendations forward within the system to no avail.
I began to bring my residential clients out to my home ranch for day trips - just a chance to get out of the institutional setting, stop watching the clock and be in a space big enough to contain their pain and grief. I watched the masks they wore to protect themselves fall away in this environment - they connected deeply with the land, the wildlife and especially with the horses. These were healing days, my favorite days...and I knew if I ever had the chance, I'd make every day look and feel like that.
I left the federal health sector in 2013 and pursued my vision of developing a truly integrated land-based program. With my background in addictions and psychology, newly aquired EAPD training and lots of support from Higher Trails and it's alumni, a solid business plan, 160 acres and all the courage I could muster, I launched the program and haven't looked back since!

Every extra dollar that we've made has gone toward developing and expanding the programs and infrastructure ('WE' being me and my ever loving partner - the maintenance man). A little at a time rooms have been renovated for client use, fencing has been put in, tack has been purchased, horses have been trained, outbuildings have been constructed, promo has been developed. I can qualify for a bank loan - but I am determined to keep the company debt-free in order to keep my fees for service at a level that my clients can afford. I charge between $60 to $175 per day for addiction/trauma treatment and $30 a day for each child that accompanies their parent(s). Just enough to keep the lights on and the fridge full. 

Your contribution to this program will allow us to expand from 4 to 14 beds and build the space we need to accommodate short programs, wellness retreats and cultural camps!


What We Need 

$90 000.00 to purchase the materials and engage the contractors needed to build a 50'x90' barn/bunkhouse 

We already have the utilities in place (power, water, sewer and natural gas) and the land cleared. We have all the tools and volunteer manpower we will need to do the rough work and finished carpentry, and contractors lined up to to the excavation, foundation, electrical and gas-fitting.

ALL FUNDS RAISED WILL GO TOWARDS THE COMPLETION OF THIS PROJECT

If by some happy miracle we raise more funds than we need, we will begin constructing the next stage - FAMILY CABINS!

What You Get

We are sooooo excited to have the moral and financial support of folks who just want to do some good and make their money count, that we have set aside a wall in the barn to honor all of our contributors! These dedications will be a testament to your generosity for as long as the barn is standing, and will serve to inspire our clients to contribute to meaningful projects of their own. See the PERKS section for details.

The Impact

Our waiting list for addiction treatment is now 3 months long and growing. This expansion will allow us to provide this life-saving service to more families, couples and individuals and reduce the length of time that they need to wait for help.

Our clients are among the most challenging  - often presenting with long-term chemical dependence (addiction), serious mental and physical health issues and an array of social problems. Most have had unsuccessful cycles of treatment at other facilities.

  • 100% of our clients have completed their treatment program.
  • 75% of our clients are still clean & sober 3 months after treatment.
  • Many of our clients continue to connect with the Ranch long after their treatment program is done.

Meeting the Challenges

Our team brings practical experience, flexibility a wide range of skills and immeasurable tenacity to this project. We have solid insurance in place, a healthy credit score and a few bucks in the bank, and have decided that one way or another, this is going to get done. We have a contingency plan for funding if this campaign falls short of our goal - though it will mean incurring some debt.
In northern Alberta - the weather is always a challenge, and we have safety plans in place to ensure that both the materials and our helping hands are safe and secure during construction.
We have built strong relationships with local contractors over the years, and have assurances that they will help bring the project in on-time and on-budget.

Other Ways You Can Help

Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out to your friends, family and co-workers!

  • Like us on facebook
  • Check out our website 
  • Send us an encouraging email
  • Pray for our success and the success of our clients or just send us good vibes!

story:
Our Story

Introducing Amni-Nik®, a medical device which safely and easily ruptures the amniotic sac during childbirth! We at BirthTec have developed a technology to make amniotomy easier, safer and more comfortable. Currently, other devices used for amniotomy (the procedure of artificially rupturing the amniotic sac) all have an exposed sharp which can injure mother and/or baby. Thanks to Amni-Nik®'s unique design features, it works quickly and easily with no risk of injury to mother or baby. The specially engineered sharp is curved and hollow, designed to overcome the surface tension and the double layer of the amniotic sac. The sharp is surrounded by prongs that both protect the fetal head and depress the wall of the sac towards the sharp. It is easy and intuitive to use - just gentle forward pressure, you'll get it on your first try! A few dedicated investors and practitioners have funded the initial R & D for the Amni-Nik® - the first generation (in stainless steel) is currently in use and providers love its efficacy and ease of use. We are raising money to fund Amni-Nik®'s first mass-production run so that a single-use plastic version can be sold sterile-packed and ready to use.

What We Need and What You Get

We need you to buy it! Pre-sales will help fund the making of a mold for plastic-injection manufacturing and a first run of Amni-Nik®, the safer, easier to use device that will become the standard of care for the common procedure of rupturing the amniotic sac.

For MDs, midwives, hospitals and birth centers this is your chance to be early adopters! This way you and your patients know you use the most up-to-date technology for safe, reliable care. Amni-Nik® is appropriate for use in any setting where amniotomy is performed, by any provider who would typically perform the procedure. 

For everyone else, you get one of our great branded give aways that show the world you care about making maternity care as good as it can be. In our journey to develop and market this device, we've heard countless stories from women who experienced a painful or harmful amniotomy and understand the value of this gentle technology. Add your voice to the message that women and babies deserve better! Choose from postcard, tote bag, or cap. You can also GIVE Amni-Nik® to a low-resource clinic. 

We at BirthTec care deeply about making birth safer, about improving the patient experience, and about improved health outcomes. Support our campaign and show that you too care about the large and small details of making birth better.  Every contributor makes a difference!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Make some noise about this!
  • Post to your Facebook, blog about it, share with your peers!
  • It's easy - use the Indiegogo share tools!

BirthTec founder and Amni-Nik® inventor: Kate Prendergast 

BirthTec administrative lead: Jill Allatta

Both midwives, design enthusiasts and committed to innovation in maternity care

Reach us at birthtec@gmail.com

See our website www.amni-nik.com

Amni-Nik® has been evaluated and cleared for use by the FDA's office of medical device review.

story:
___________________________________________________


The World's First Illuminated Sports Jersey! 

Fans will soon be wearing these Jerseys to sports events the world over!

   

You have an opportunity to make history with us!

_____________________________________________________________________________


Hello Fans!
My name is Gerald and I am here to tell you about FanOne Sports.  We have a brand new product that is going to make history! It’s a unique, patent pending Jersey/Shirt that is NEW to the sports apparel market worldwide!   We have tried to get it into the hands of Nike, Adidas, Under Armor and VF so you could have it faster, but they didn’t give us the opportunity to partner with them so, now we are going straight to the people who are going to love this jersey the most! YOU!

                                                            

The goal of this campaign is to reach like-minded people for collaboration, raise money in exchange for early access and rewards, and we also want to spread the word.  The more people we can get pre-ordering the FanOne Sports exclusive jersey, the more functional and successful this campaign will be.  So this campaign will give you the basics on our efforts and progress.  Beyond that we encourage you to ask us questions, donate and get involved.  We developed FanOne Sports for your benefit, so enjoy!  We believe we are really onto an easier way to get straight to our consumer with our AWESOME product! 
     

  • Do you ever think about getting a jersey that is unique as you are?
  • Do you want to get something exclusive that no one else has but don’t know how?
  • Are you interested in working with a company that cares about you?

If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading…

We have successfully created a jersey that solves a simple problem: originality and exclusivity.  This is the classic example of the mother of invention being necessity. With our flawlessly designed jersey and Tees, we have made a product that is at unique as the fan that wears it.  We design every new fan product with an undying commitment to excellence and we strive to make every fan memorabilia better than the last.  We believe in our dedication to quality will differentiate ourselves and make us something you are proud to have in your home.

With the contribution of $75 or $150 you will receive a really cool Tee or Jersey along with perks; cash contributions of all sums are accepted. This is just the beginning of an awesome journey of being on board with a little company that is about to go big, and you are welcomed to come on board. But wait, why not let your friends in on this, share this with them through word of mouth, emails and social media and have them do the same ...if you are going to be a world changer why not start now?

      


   Pre-Order Your Jersey or Tee Today!


So who is FanOne Sports?

FanOne Sports is a new, young, innovative sports apparel company that creates incredible proprietary sports apparel specifically for FANS of all ages!

No one is more dedicated than a sports fan and no one knows that better than we do!  We are the FANS that will be making products for the FANS that we know you will love.  Nothing beats the feeling of waking up, putting on a fresh jersey or Tee and supporting the team that you care so much about.  So we want to create jerseys and Tees that EXCEEDS everyone’s expectations!  The anticipation for our new FAN apparel is very high amongst our selected retailers!  They are expecting very high sales volume due to our product being the "First of its Kind" in sports apparel, EVER!

Sports play a massive role in the entertainment of millions in the United States and around the world. Our team wanted to reach the fans with products that innovate and change the way they will support their team FOREVER!

      


We feel that the FanOne Sports jersey and line of clothing is an opportunity to share the brand with an international audience and show the world what we have to offer, but we cannot do it without your help. 

We have a type of professionalism that is backing our company in an unprecedented way for a startup company! This is why we are confident in our ability to negotiate favorable licensing deals with major licensors. We will also seek to sign an exclusive retail distribution with an undetermined company.


FOR THE $25 REWARD YOU'LL RECEIVE AN OFFICIAL 

Non Flashing FanOne Sports Tee!

Colors available: Blue, Red, Green, Purple, Orange, Black, White, Pink & Yellow


_____________________________________________________________________________



Actual Working Prototype!

     



Gerald currently works for a Fortune 500 Private Investment company in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. He’s been an entrepreneur since 2000 and have owned two notable local businesses, “Disc Doctors” and “Doctor Fish Magnifique.” FanOne Sports is his latest business creation that he has been putting together since 2011. He feels this business has the creative juices it needs to succeed on a global scale!


Our Team

We have a network of Professionals that are very important to the launch and success of FanOne Sports! FanOne has a sports agent coming from one of the world’s biggest Sports Agencies! Our agent is ready to deliver us several mega sports players to promote our product! JJ Watts is one example of the type of star players we have access to! Also, our business advisor works on Wall Street and has made guest appearances on Fox Business News, CNBC, Wall Street Journal, Lou Dobbs & more! His expertise will be priceless when it comes to the direction of our company.

COMING SOON TO THE TEAM: YOU!




For us to bring FanOne Sports to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, design and production of the exclusive, backers only jerseys and Tees. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first to wear the FanOne Sports Jersey! 

FanOne Sports needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started! Who can spread the word about FanOne Sports better than YOU?

Others ways to help:

For me to bring my vision to life for us all to enjoy, I need your support!

If you aren't able to make a monetary donation, but would like to contribute to the campaign mission, there are plenty of other ways to help!

Join our Email list

This way we can keep you up to date on our future deals. Sign up on www.FanOneSports.com

Teach someone else about the company

At its core, this campaign is about helping people who love sports like we do. If you're in a position to teach someone else how to support this team - do it! You are contributing to this campaign by passing on the awareness of this company’s mission. FanOne Sports is your team!

Spread the word

You can contribute your popularity by telling your friends and family about this campaign. The success of this campaign is directly correlated with the number of people who view this page. If you can increase that number, you are making a tangible contribution to the mission!

How We'll Use the Funds

Approximately $100,000 will be needed to break FanOne Sports into the sports apparel market. That will include licensing, marketing, manufacturing, distribution and business related expenses. This initial investment will allow us to enter into the Collegiate market first. If our campaign raises more capital than our initial goal amount, we will use those funds to obtain licenses from each of the professional licensing organizations located within the United States & Canada: NBA, NFL, MLB, NHL, UFC, MLS, CFL, WWE and Walt Disney. Each of these companies have their own unique price structures for licensing. Some of these can go well into 6 figures or more.


Risks & Challenges

The most notable risk is production delays. Any delay in production will lead to delivery delays to our customers. We actually believe our orders will be delivered to our supporters much earlier.


     


We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our FanOne Sports family.

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

Old school?  No Problem!

For those of us who don't like making donations over the Internet, please feel free to contact me via email: (CorpHQ@FanOneSports.com) and I will provide you with a mailing address to send check or money order to.  I will post your contribution on the campaign with your name and I will deliver whatever perk you would like.

Also...

You do not have to have a PayPal account.  They accept credit cards and debit cards.

Please help spread the word!

This has proven to be one of the hardest things I have ever done.  I don't have a million friends to share this with.  But, I have the Internet and wonderful people who want to see me succeed. Whether or not you contribute financially, please use the share tools on this page. Tweeting, sharing on Facebook or any other venues you have at your disposal will greatly enhance our exposure and increase our chances to succeed.  I'm asking for 5 minutes of your time, a $5 contribution, and 5 personal emails.

Here's the link to the Facebook page:  www.Facebook.com/FanOneSports

Please like and share it.  Feel free to leave a message also.

If you wish to contact us:

Website: www.FanOneSports.com

Our Social Media Connections:

  •  Instagram:
  •  Twitter:
  •   Facebook:
  •   YouTube:

Contact Information

Name: Gerald Williamson, Sr.

Phone Number: 646-470-7856

E Mail: CorpHQ@FanOneSports.com

If would like to discuss a licensing, collaboration, sponsorship or wholesale we would love to hear from you, please feel free to contact me at CorpHQ@FanOneSports.com

_____________________________________________________________________________


Questions & Answers


What about my size, color and quantity preference?

When the campaign ends, you will receive an e-mail to register at our website asking for specific information like colors, sizes and quantity.

When can I expect my Jersey/Tee?

We have estimated that all supporters will receive their Jerseys/Tees by August 2016. You could receive them earlier if the licensing process goes smoothly. If not, we will contact you immediately with updates.
How do I get more than one Jersey/Tee?
We are offering several rewards that should cover any quantity that you want, If not, please send us an email and we will humbly accommodate you.
Can I wash the Jersey/Tee?
Currently, the technology used in the Jerseys/shirts is not washable. However, we are working with a notable National Dry Cleaning company to give you a discount of up to 50% to have your Jersey/Shirt cleaned professionally!
Is there a warranty for my Jersey/Tee?
Because our Jerseys/Tees incorporate electronic technologies, we can only offer warranties for manufacturer defects. We will offer Indiegogo supports 50% discounts on replacement power packs. Retail price will be $20 for the power packs. Indiegogo supporters will only be charged $10 for power packs!
How long will my Jersey/Tee Flash light up?
Your new Jersey/Tee will be able to flash brightly for up to 6 hours straight if you're using high quality batteries! We are planning to reach out to notable battery manufacturers to offer our Indiegogo supporters deep discounts on premium batteries for their power packs!
Will my Jersey/Tee Flash be visible in daylight?
The flash effects works extremely well in dim light settings. In daylight, your Jersey/Tee will look like a regular Jersey/Tee! People won't recognize that you're wearing a FanOne light up until you're in the Stadium or Arena! Night games will be AWESOME! ;)
Will my new FanOne Jersey/Tee make me cool?
HECK YEA!!!!! YOU'RE THE COOLEST!



If you have any questions or concerns regarding our campaign, please send us an email. We will answer any questions that you may have about our product.


You can each me directly @ gerald.williamson@fanonesports.com

Thank you!
story_txt:
___________________________________________________



The World's First Illuminated Sports Jersey! 

Fans will soon be wearing these Jerseys to sports events the world over!
   



You have an opportunity to make history with us!

_____________________________________________________________________________


Hello Fans!
My name is Gerald and I am here to tell you about FanOne Sports.  We have a brand new product that is going to make history! It’s a unique, patent pending Jersey/Shirt that is NEW to the sports apparel market worldwide!   We have tried to get it into the hands of Nike, Adidas, Under Armor and VF so you could have it faster, but they didn’t give us the opportunity to partner with them so, now we are going straight to the people who are going to love this jersey the most! YOU!


                                                            


The goal of this campaign is to reach
like-minded people for collaboration, raise money in exchange for early access
and rewards, and we also want to spread the word.  The more people we can get pre-ordering the FanOne
Sports exclusive jersey, the more functional and successful this campaign will
be.  So this campaign will give you the
basics on our efforts and progress. 
Beyond that we encourage you to ask us questions, donate and get
involved.  We developed FanOne Sports for
your benefit, so enjoy!  We believe we
are really onto an easier way to get straight to our consumer with our AWESOME
product! 
     





Do you ever think about getting a jersey that is unique as you are?



Do you want to get something exclusive that no one else has but don’t know how?



Are you interested in working with a company that cares about you?


If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading…
We have successfully created a jersey that solves a simple problem: originality and exclusivity.  This is the classic example of the mother of invention being necessity. With our flawlessly designed jersey and Tees, we have made a product that is at unique as the fan that wears it.  We design every new fan product with an undying commitment to excellence and we strive to make every fan memorabilia better than the last.  We believe in our dedication to quality will differentiate ourselves and make us something you are proud to have in your home.
With the contribution of $75 or $150 you will receive a really cool Tee or Jersey along with perks; cash contributions of all sums are accepted. This is just the beginning of an awesome journey of being on board with a little company that is about to go big, and you are welcomed to come on board. But wait, why not let your friends in on this, share this with them through word of mouth, emails and social media and have them do the same ...if you are going to be a world changer why not start now?
      
   Pre-Order
Your Jersey or Tee Today!



So who is FanOne Sports?
FanOne Sports is a new, young,
innovative sports apparel company that creates incredible proprietary sports
apparel specifically for FANS of all ages!
No one is more dedicated than a sports
fan and no one knows that better than we do! 
We are the FANS that will be making products for the FANS that we know
you will love.  Nothing beats the feeling
of waking up, putting on a fresh jersey or Tee and supporting the team that you
care so much about.  So we want to create
jerseys and Tees that EXCEEDS everyone’s expectations!  The anticipation for our new FAN apparel is
very high amongst our selected retailers! 
They are expecting very high sales volume due to our product being the "First
of its Kind" in sports apparel, EVER!
Sports play a massive role
in the entertainment of millions in the United States and around the world. Our
team wanted to reach the fans with products that innovate and change the way
they will support their team FOREVER!
      
We feel that the FanOne Sports jersey
and line of clothing is an opportunity to share the brand with an international
audience and show the world what we have to offer, but we cannot do it without
your help.  
We have a type of professionalism that is
backing our company in an unprecedented way for a startup company! This is why
we are confident in our ability to negotiate favorable licensing deals with
major licensors. We will also seek to sign an exclusive retail distribution
with an undetermined company.

FOR THE $25 REWARD YOU'LL RECEIVE AN OFFICIAL 
Non Flashing FanOne Sports Tee!
Colors available: Blue, Red, Green, Purple, Orange, Black, White, Pink & Yellow




_____________________________________________________________________________


Actual Working Prototype!
     



Gerald currently works for a Fortune 500 Private Investment company in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. He’s been
an entrepreneur since 2000 and have owned two notable local businesses, “Disc
Doctors” and “Doctor Fish Magnifique.” FanOne Sports is his latest business
creation that he has been putting together since 2011. He feels this business
has the creative juices it needs to succeed on a global scale!

Our Team
We have a network of Professionals that are
very important to the launch and success of FanOne Sports! FanOne has a sports
agent coming from one of the world’s biggest Sports Agencies! Our agent is
ready to deliver us several mega sports players to promote our product! JJ
Watts is one example of the type of star players we have access to! Also, our
business advisor works on Wall Street and has made guest appearances on Fox
Business News, CNBC, Wall Street Journal, Lou Dobbs & more! His expertise
will be priceless when it comes to the direction of our company.
COMING SOON
TO THE TEAM: YOU!





For us to bring FanOne Sports to life,
we need your support!
Your generous funding will help us get
things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost
of further development, design and production of the exclusive, backers only
jerseys and Tees. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first to
wear the FanOne Sports Jersey!  
FanOne Sports needs pledging but above
all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as
we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons
(Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the
word and get things started! Who can
spread the word about FanOne Sports better than YOU?
Others
ways to help:
For
me to bring my vision to life for us all to enjoy, I need your support!
If
you aren't able to make a monetary donation, but would like to contribute to
the campaign mission, there are plenty of other ways to help!
Join our Email list 
This
way we can keep you up to date on our future deals. Sign up on www.FanOneSports.com


Teach someone else about the company
At
its core, this campaign is about helping people who love sports like we do. If
you're in a position to teach someone else how to support this team - do it!
You are contributing to this campaign by passing on the awareness of this company’s
mission. FanOne Sports is your team!
Spread the word
You
can contribute your popularity by telling your friends and family about this campaign.
The success of this campaign is directly correlated with the number of people
who view this page. If you can increase that number, you are making a tangible
contribution to the mission!

story:
Do it yourself acupuncture?

Yes! — It Is Possible!

We all experience different types of ailments and pains in our lives, perhaps now more than ever before.  With our increasingly busy lifestyles, we don't have the time to be going to the hospital or drugstore to remedy our illnesses.

We are here to introduce a new approach to self-healing in an Acupuncture kit that uses no needles, and that you can use yourself without need for a professional.  The kit makes use of ceramic disks made of semi-prescious tourmaline stone that has bee treated with nanotechnology.  The resulting disks are then placed on the acupuncture points (on the body) and have the same effect as acupuncture needles without piercing the skin.

We want to bring the benefits acupuncture to you in this easy to use kit. In our Do-It-Yourself Acupuncture Kit you'll find 10 tourmaline disks which you can use in the comfort of your home. For sport injuries, as an example, you can apply the disks on painful areas along with other specified points, and expect to be back on the field in no time!

Tourmaline Disks:

  • Simple to Use
  • Trigger Point Accuracy
  • Non Invasive
  • Durable
  • No Side Effects
  • Economical
  • Proven Effectiveness
The Healing Disks are made of Tourmaline stone and treated with Nanotechnology, which can affect materials on an exceedingly small scale. This technology is used in medicine to provide better healing effects than were previously possible. Our disks are one example.

So how do the Healing Disks Work?

Placed on the chosen body points, the 1.3" wide disks interact with the body's energy (Chi) channels creating a resonance that gently dissolves existing energy blocks. Open pathways enable the fluid intelligence of the Source Energy (WuChi), present in all creation, to act on and harmonize the brain, nerves, blood, muscles, organs, even bone marrow.  Use of the disks restores order on the body's cellular physiology, and consequently rebalances the whole body bringing well-being. 

Some Background on Acupuncture

Acupuncture means “needle-piercing”, but with our Acupuncture kit there is no needle piercing necessary!  The Holistic Healing system is based on acupuncture principles and techniques.  The disks are placed on the skin corresponding to the specific Energy (Chi) channels and trigger points in order to achieve the same healing effect as in traditional acupuncture.  That is, releasing the clogged energy streams.

Think of the acupuncture channels as a road system along the pathways of nerves and blood vessels within the body.  Along the spine runs the super highway, and off of it go the smaller roads, eventually reaching every part of the the body.  When ramps to the highway, or the intersections of smaller roads, get blocked, the highways and roads get congested, and the vehicles are not able to move.  

Stress and anxiety caused by disturbing experiences as well as previous and existing illnesses and traumas are all contributors to energy blockages in the body.  By using the selected acupuncture points, this congestion is cleared, enabling the healing information and energy to flow freely throughout the body.

The guidebook included in the kit outlines everything you need to know about using the disks and includes 83 diagrams that show where to place the disks depending on what you want to treat or improve within your body.  And if you have questions, I'm only an email away!

Use the disks to help

  • Relieve pain
  • Build resistance to disease
  • Harmonize metabolism
  • Lose weight
  • Balance energy and blood circulation
  • Strengthen the organs of the body
  • Improve the immune system
  • Lessen water retention and fat deposits
  • Protect the body against infection
  • Expel toxins and waste
And on the emotional side of life...
  • Overcome anxiety and depression
  • Transform anger into kindness
  • Hastiness to calm action
  • Worry into trust
  • Sadness into joy
  • And fear into gentleness and peace

Prior to public release, the use of disks in place of needles was tested for 8 years to see whether it was an effective alternative within the acupuncture world.  Since then, the use of healing disks has become more common in Chinese hospitals, and is spreading to other parts of the world as well.

From our Users:

“I suffered from tennis elbow (my right and left arms) for over a year. Visits to the doctor and to the specialist brought no relief. I tried painkillers and anti-inflammatory medications, to no avail. I could not lift grocery bags or my knapsack without pain. After using the disks in one treatment only, I had immediate relief. After eight treatments, the pain was permanently gone. I can lift heavy bags and objects with no problems. I recommend the disks unequivocally. I continue to use them about once a week to maintain a pain-free existence.” Bill B.

“For most of my adult life I have suffered from migraines and headaches. Chiropractic adjustments helped, but I continued to experience mild headaches and stiffness. Using the disks on the suggested areas (back of the neck and top of the wrists) has effectively removed any tension-related headaches and symptoms. I also sleep better, and am generally more relaxed.” Becky S.

“I experienced painful sciatica caused by a herniated disk. The healing disks eased the pain before and after the operation – with no need for pain medication. Now I use the disks to overcome stress, to improve my immune system and for rejuvenation. I am so thankful!” Elizabeth L. 


Why We Need You

Our initial funding is to cover our costs so far; guidebooks, packaging, material and expertise, and in the production of 40 kits for the new year.  

At this point, 60 guidebooks have been printed and are ready to go, and we have enough disks to make 40 kits.  The next stage is to expand our business, and we will of course need to purchase more supplies.  We also need to finance our packaging in order to sell the kit in a safe and presentable way.  Then, in order to reach out to potential customers, we need funds for local and online promotion, including brochures, and website design, building, and hosting. 

We need your help to make our plan a market reality!

Further Funding

With your help, we can achieve and pass our initial goal of $30,000, and then expand our reach to businesses such as health food and supply stores as well as to health care professionals, who can use the disks to improve the health of their clients. This way more and more people can benefit from our simple yet reliable Health Preservation and Healing system.

Our further, and most important outreach is to third world countries, which have the greatest needs for reasonable alternatives such as our simple-to-use Healing Disks. They could become part of a realizable health solution for all human beings.


Our Vision

To expand and reach a global market with a goal of helping as many people as possible Be-In-Charge of their own health by using Holistic Healing Disks regularly. Through this we can achieve balance and well-being in every aspect of life. This clarifies and nurtures us physically, emotionally and spiritually.  We can regain our innate vitality while radiating harmony and joy to those around us.

Timeline

FAQ’s

So what are the disks made of again?

The disks are made of tourmaline stone. The stones are seen in many colours and when transparent, are considered as semi-precious gemstones. They have been used by many cultures for their healing qualities for centuries. The tourmaline used to make the disks has an added quality of having been treated with nanotechnology.  Certain beneficial qualities not available before have been brought out through the treatment process, and our disks carry these beneficial qualities. 

Is there a best time to apply the disks?

No!  The disks can be applied any time of day, and in almost any situation, depending what you are wanting to treat.  For instance, if you are experiencing greater than usual stress levels, it may be the perfect time to use the disks with the stress-relief prescription.

How long do I leave them on my body for?

You can leave the disks on your body for up to 40 minutes, depending on how sensitive you are.  Even if you start with only a few minutes and continue using them while increasing the time with each application, you'll learn to know when their job is done and they can be removed.

Do I need to rest afterwards?

This is really up to you.  It is recommended that you take a moment after removing the disks to experience the gentle changes that are happening within you. The healing continues on subtle levels as more and more harmony and peace spreads throughout your being. However, if you have no time for reflection, just carry on your day with the awareness of how the disks are helping you.

How long do the disks last?

There really is no life limit on the disks.  With proper use and care, they should last you indefinitely.  Their healing powers do not run out!

Can I order more disks if I want?

Yes!  We would be happy to ship more disks, as there are a few prescriptions, such as the Anti-Ageing Treatment that can use up to 20 disks.

Can I use the same disks for multiple people?

Of course.  Just wipe the disks with a damp tissue after each use, as per the instructional guide, and they are ready to use again for anyone.  Ee like to think of the kit as a family investment, as well as an individual one.

Is this the same as Hot Stone Therapy?

No.  Our therapy are not hot stone therapy. When the healing disks are on, some of the points may feel hot, but this is your body's reaction as the energy and neural blocks begin to dissolve. 

A last word

If you share our dream of bringing healing to as many people as possible, or would just like to own your own Needle-less Acupuncture kit, then please help us by donating. 
Please help us bring healing far and wide, even if it is just spreading the word about our idea. . .  We appreciate anything you can do to help us, because we can only do so much!  
    Be well!  Anna & Carl


The Team

Anna Carling

Anna is the pioneer behind our business’s idea.  Having been a professional acupuncturist for over 25 years, Anna has seen how the Nanotech Disks have changed acupuncture in her practice since they came into the field about ten years ago.  Her dream has always been to bring healing to as many people as possible, and now, with these disks, she feels that that is more possible than ever.



Carl Natiuk

Carl is the other half of the team.  He is in charge of the technical and social-media aspects of our campaign, and much of the other ‘behind-the-scenes’ work.  Having recently graduated rom High School, Carl is fresh with new ideas, while at the same time is able to offer insight into the deeper levels of the business.  With a natural talent for layout and design, he is learning how to best reach our customers in the fast-changing culture of business/customer relationships.

 

Medicine Tao

Medicine Tao is the name of our business.  Currently, we sell only the Acupuncture kit, but in the future, we hope to expand and carry other products of a similar nature to the kit, perhaps complimenting it, or offering another approach, but always looking along the idea of healing oneself.

See the signs and know the times, 
Let the long night end,
Let the new day dawn.
May the heart be quiet and calm,
The New Day is coming on.

After using the disks in one treatment only, I had
immediate relief. After eight treatments, the pain was
permanently gone. I can lift heavy bags and objects
with no problems. I recommend the disks
unequivocally. I continue to use them about once a
week to maintain a pain-free existence.” Bill B.

“For most of my adult life I have suffered from
migraines and headaches. Chiropractic adjustments
helped, but I continued to experience mild headaches
and stiffness. Using the disks on the suggested areas
(back of the neck and top of the wrists) has
effectively removed any tension-related headaches
and symptoms. I also sleep better, and am generally
more relaxed.” Becky S.

“I experienced painful sciatica caused by a
herniated disk. The healing disks eased the pain
before and after the operation – with no need for pain
medication. Now I use the disks to overcome stress,
to improve my immune system and for rejuvenation.
I am so thankful!” Elizabeth L. 



Why We Need YouOur initial funding is to cover our costs so far; guidebooks, packaging, material and expertise, and in the production of 40 kits for the new year.  At this point, 60 guidebooks have been printed and are ready to go, and we have enough disks to make 40 kits.  The next stage is to expand our business, and we will of course need to purchase more supplies.  We also need to finance our packaging in order to sell the kit in a safe and presentable way.  Then, in order to reach out to potential customers, we need funds for local and online promotion, including brochures, and website design, building, and hosting. We need your help to make our plan a market reality!
Further Funding
With your help, we can achieve and pass our initial goal of $30,000, and then expand our reach to businesses such as health food and supply stores as well as to health care professionals, who can use the disks to improve the health of their clients. This way more and more people can benefit from our simple yet reliable Health Preservation and Healing system.
Our further, and most important outreach is to third world countries, which have the greatest needs for reasonable alternatives such as our simple-to-use Healing Disks. They could become part of a realizable health solution for all human beings.
Our Vision
To expand and reach a global market with a goal of helping as many people as possible Be-In-Charge of their own health by using Holistic Healing Disks regularly. Through this we can achieve balance and well-being in every aspect of life. This clarifies and nurtures us physically, emotionally and spiritually.  We can regain our innate vitality while radiating harmony and joy to those around us.
Timeline



FAQ’s
So what are the disks made of again?
The disks are made of tourmaline stone. The stones are seen in many colours and when transparent, are considered as semi-precious gemstones. They have been used by many cultures for their healing qualities for centuries. The tourmaline used to make the disks has an added quality of having been treated with nanotechnology.  Certain beneficial qualities not available before have been brought out through the treatment process, and our disks carry these beneficial qualities. 
Is there a best time to apply the disks?
No!  The disks can be applied any time of day, and in almost any situation, depending what you are wanting to treat.  For instance, if you are experiencing greater than usual stress levels, it may be the perfect time to use the disks with the stress-relief prescription.
How long do I leave them on my body for?
You can leave the disks on your body for up to 40 minutes, depending on how sensitive you are.  Even if you start with only a few minutes and continue using them while increasing the time with each application, you'll learn to know when their job is done and they can be removed.
Do I need to rest afterwards?
This is really up to you.  It is recommended that you take a moment after removing the disks to experience the gentle changes that are happening within you. The healing continues on subtle levels as more and more harmony and peace spreads throughout your being. However, if you have no time for reflection, just carry on your day with the awareness of how the disks are helping you.
How long do the disks last?
There really is no life limit on the disks.  With proper use and care, they should last you indefinitely.  Their healing powers do not run out!


Can I order more disks if I want?
Yes!  We would be happy to ship more disks, as there are a few prescriptions, such as the Anti-Ageing Treatment that can use up to 20 disks.
Can I use the same disks for multiple people?
Of course.  Just wipe the disks with a damp tissue after each use, as per the instructional guide, and they are ready to use again for anyone.  Ee like to think of the kit as a family investment, as well as an individual one.
Is this the same as Hot Stone Therapy?
No.  Our therapy are not hot stone therapy. When the healing disks are on, some of the points may feel hot, but this is your body's reaction as the energy and neural blocks begin to dissolve. 

A last wordIf you share our dream of bringing healing to as many people as possible, or would just like to own your own Needle-less Acupuncture kit, then please help us by donating. Please help us bring healing far and wide, even if it is just spreading the word about our idea. . .  We appreciate anything you can do to help us, because we can only do so much!  
    Be well!  Anna & Carl

The Team

Anna Carling
Anna is the pioneer behind our business’s idea.  Having been a professional acupuncturist for over 25 years, Anna has seen how the Nanotech Disks have changed acupuncture in her practice since they came into the field about ten years ago.  Her dream has always been to bring healing to as many people as possible, and now, with these disks, she feels that that is more possible than ever.



Carl Natiuk
Carl is the other half of the team.  He is in charge of the technical and social-media aspects of our campaign, and much of the other ‘behind-the-scenes’ work.  Having recently graduated rom High School, Carl is fresh with new ideas, while at the same time is able to offer insight into the deeper levels of the business.  With a natural talent for layout and design, he is learning how to best reach our customers in the fast-changing culture of business/customer relationships. 


Medicine Tao
Medicine Tao is the name of our business.  Currently, we sell only the Acupuncture kit, but in the future, we hope to expand and carry other products of a similar nature to the kit, perhaps complimenting it, or offering another approach, but always looking along the idea of healing oneself.




See the signs and know the times, 
Let the long night end,
Let the new day dawn.
May the heart be quiet and calm,
The New Day is coming on.

story:
This is a real life and we could make a difference! I have already collected half of the 1500 dollars needed to change Nazias life with the help of family and friends, now I need your help!

Nazias husband Javed, 45 years old now, used to be addicted to drugs. He demanded money to buy drugs and when Nazia refused he threw acid in her face. 

Nazia can't breath through her nose and have terrible pains.

The scar between her eyes makes it difficult for her to see straight. She can not work because people get chocked when they see her. Now when that they have had 47 degrees in Pakistan, it is very difficult for her. 

She is in a very bad condition and her children are crying for her. This is a big trauma for the whole family and it must come to an end! 

------------

My name is Susann Hedman Niemi, I live in Stockholm with my many kids and work in my local community with issues regarding children, education and much more. I already help a lot of people in my free time and just got back from Zambia where I participated in different charity activities. My family is helping me with making sure people hear about Nazias life and terrible need for help. 


My friend on Facebook, pastor Saleem Shahid Pastor from Faisalabad Pakistan sent me pictures from his work with the poor. He and his wife were giving away food packages and are supporting them with advises. They are giving them strength and hope for their future. He is doing an amazing work. 
When I was looking through their photos my eyes caught a terrible picture. I asked about the woman on the photo who had a destroyed face. 

Her name is Nazia, she is 40 years old and she is married. She has three children, her oldest son Parvaiz is 15 years old, her daughter Saiqa is 14 years old and Jamshid, her youngest son, is 11 years old. 

Nazias eyes are not so damaged but she can't breath through her nose and have terrible pains. The scar between her eyes makes it difficult for her to see straight. She can not work because people get chocked when they see her. Now when that they have had 47 degrees in Pakistan, it is very difficult for her. 
Pastor Saleem told me that she is in a very bad condition and her children are crying for her. This is a big trauma for the whole family and it must come to an end! 

Please help me to raise 1500 dollar for Nazias surgery and treatment. Pastor Saleem took her to a clinic when I asked him to, and they gave him this price. 
He will make sure that the money will go to her recovery. I hope it will come a lot of money so they can buy some land and so they can help their three children to go to school so that they can have a future. We will see...
Wouldn't it be wonderful to help this woman and her family? This is a real life and we could make a difference! 
I know that everyone is struggling with their own life and you are probably already helping other people but a small sum from everyone will fix this! 

I am begging you from the bottom of my heart!

Kisses and hugs from me Susann!

story:
Stop Alzheimer's Disease Campaign

The scientific community has looked long and hard for the "trigger" that initiates the events leading to Alzheimer's Disease (AD), and agrees that it lies somewhere in the amyloid beta protein that accumulates in the brains of AD patients. Septa Therapeutics Inc. has identified the likely trigger, using a new approach, based on the platform technology developed earlier by CEO Diane Van Alstyne, Ph.D.

Dr. Van Alstyne did her Ph.D. at UCSD, La Jolla, in molecular biology, was a post-doctoral fellow at McGill in virology, and was an Assistant Professor in Neurology (Multiple Sclerosis (MS) Research Group) at UBC. Her work on persistent rubella virus infection in the Central Nervous System (CNS) contributed directly to the development of beta interferon as the first drug for MS.  She was then invited to Neuroimmunology at the NIH, Bethesda, where she made the first monoclonal antibodies to rubella virus.  Upon her return to Vancouver,  Dr. Van Alstyne  founded Insight Biotek and used the new anti-rubella antibodies to focus on diagnostics and vaccines for bacterial and viral meningitis. This work culminated in a new diagnostic device and a ground-breaking, universal, one-shot-does-all, vaccine for bacterial meningitis, and is summarized in 3 issued US patents. See the company web site (http://SeptaTherapeutics.com) for details.  

How does technology for meningitis provide a new approach in AD research?  The meningitis-related products are all based on the presence of a small peptide (a septapeptide) common to all meningitis-causing bacteria.  A closely-related septapeptide is present in the  amyloid beta protein.  Furthermore, the activity of this septapeptide in the brain is known to turn immature stem cells into astrocytes.  An overabundance of astrocytes is thought to contribute to the pathology associated with AD.

The US$50,000 raised here will be used to provide proof of the biological activity of the septapeptide sequence in the amyloid beta, and to test the efficacy of a series of proposed blockers.  The blocker which is most effective in shutting down septapeptide activity will be our new drug.    

Septa Therapeutics intends to bring a new anti-AD therapeutic to market.  And with Dr. Van Alstyne's exceptional track record in getting results in MS and meningitis, this current work in AD holds great promise.

story:
The Genesis of Infinity Apothecary at Balance Acupuncture
      After obtaining a bachelor's in Chemistry and a Master's in Acupuncture and Oriental medicine, I decided to combine my passion for both disciplines to create holistic topical medicinals made from natural, biodegradable materials.  
   Included among the items set for production are a traditional burn cream - useful for standard burns but safe for patients undergoing radiation therapy; a scar cream to help soften and reduce recent scar tissue from injury and/or surgery; two topical liniments, which help with sore, tight muscles, strained tendons and broken bones; an anti-itching extract for bug bites; a biodegradable non-comedogenic make up remover; and essential oil room and body sprays free from aerosols and synthetic fragrance. 

   These products are designed to reduce pain, maximize healing time, improve functionality, and gently nourish the skin and body while being environmentally safe.  All ingredients are cruelty free, and all products are hand made in Providence, RI.

Thank you for your time, consideration, and contribution.
Warm regards -
Elizabeth

Perks and Goals

  • The goal of this campaign is $3500, but any amount helps!  All proceeds will fund the purchase of raw materials, which include herbs, botanical and essential oils, botanical butters and waxes, distilled water, natural ECOCERT approved preservatives and packaging - bottles, tins and labels. 

  • As a thank you for your contribution, Infinity is offering the following perks:
              -$15-$20: 1/2 oz tin of Purple Cloud burn cream
              -$25, $30, $40: 1/2 oz tin of Purple Cloud burn cream and 1 Elemental Body
                      and Room Mist of your choice
               -$50, $75: 1 oz tin of Purple Cloud burn cream and 2 Elemental Body
                      and Room Mists of your choice
               -$100+: 1 oz tin of Purple Cloud burn cream and a full set of all
                      5 Elemental Body and Room Mists
     Infinity will package a suprise mist, or  you can custom order them by e-mailing the store at info@balanceacu.com.  Please be sure to reference the name and contact information that you use with your contribution.  
            Choices of Elemental Mists:
             -Bamboo: a warm, woody aroma balanced by lavender
             -Ember: a fiery, cinnamon based scent
             -Terra: soft floral notes balanced by bright citrus tones
             -Bronze: A bright peppermint aroma
             -Rain: a eucalyptus base guaranteed to awaken the senses

  • In the event that the goal is not met, all funds will still be used strictly for the purchase of materials, and all perk orders will still be filled as soon as possible. 

Risks & Challenges

     As with any venture, there are always risks.  Thankfully in this case they are quite low. 

    There are three distribution companies already interested in carrying Infinity products.  This means that once production is under way, distribution will immediately follow.

     In addition, the raw materials are obtained from sustainable sources, which which allows a greater production volume - to - cost ratio.  Virtually all products will be ready for sale as soon as production is completed.  In some cases, specifically the extracts and liniments, they are best produced over time - extracts take a minimum of 6 weeks and liniments can extract indefinitely, getting better with age.  However, these are the only two products that would be considered longer term production.

Other Ways You Can Help

     There are several ways you can contribute to the campaign if you are unable to do so financially.  Please feel free to share this information with friends and family to get the word out.  Exposure is just as helpful as funding!
