story:
Rapid Recovery from Muscle Injury, Fatigue, and Pain while Sleeping 
 

WearTech Tights™ Overview

WearTech Tights are the world's first wireless, therapeutic, conductive tights. Providing a significant "Athlete's Edge" for users, they offer a highly effective, non-drug therapy that will enhance performance in athletes and should become part of their regular training and exercise regimens.

The tights are proven to accelerate muscle recovery and the healing of cellular function and blood vessels, and to promote overall soft tissue recovery from strenuous athletic training and competition.

FDA/GMP and ISO13483/2003 Certified, the WearTech Tights are tested, proven and ready to go into large scale production with a boost from our Indiegogo supporters. That's why, for a limited time only and for a limited quantity, we are offering rewards representing deep discounts on the tights, our proprietary DC stimulators and more, most at 40-50% off as presented on the right.

GET YOURS NOW!

While designed and tested with the professional and other serious athletes in mind, the unique WearTech Tights will benefit anyone with an active lifestyle, anyone with sore muscles or circulation issues. 

The tights provide a convenient, comfortable, easy but highly effective therapy, pain relief and muscle recovery without the need for any large equipment, wires or a therapist. Just put them on and turn them on, then relax. There is nothing else on the market today that compares.


The fundamental dynamic of WearTech Therapeutics' products is continuous, variable, DC electrotherapeutic energy that is applied to the exterior surface of the body, such as the legs, but which penetrates deep into the muscle tissue promoting rapid soft tissue healing.

Sport-Z DC Stimulator

The continuous energy application is achieved through WearTech's proprietary electrical stimulator, the Sport-Z™.  It generates the DC energy that is conducted through WearTech's proprietary "Intelligent Textiles For Medicine®" silver mesh fabric.

The result is increased microcirculation to the designated body regions for better pain management, relief of muscle spasms, and  reduction of disuse atrophy (muscle wasting), edema (swelling) and inflammation, all of which contribute to more rapid soft tissue recovery
and enhanced endurance.


Unlike the TENS units whose AC current only stays near the surface of the skin, the WearTech Tights' small Sport-Z stimulator applies pulsed direct current (DC) deep into the soft tissue, stimulating micro-circulation and reducing inflammation down where the TENS units cannot reach, thereby speeding up the muscle recovery process throughout the legs and providing real pain relief. 

WearTech has already developed, clinically proven and holds two copyrights for its proprietary software for the Sport-Z's DC electrotherapeutic energy technology and its delivery through the tights while sleeping with optional, pre-programmed, eight cycles of deep, pulsed therapy.

The Conductive Fabric

The tights are made of WearTech's highly conductive Electro-Mesh Silver Yards (EMSY) which conducts the deep-penetrating DC current throughout the legs. This fabric can be made into numerous configurations including various panels and wraps. 

EMSY is time-tested with a sixteen-year safety database and laboratory studies proving its biocompatibility and lack of cytotoxicity. The fabric's high effectiveness is proven with 20 published clinical studies and treatment of more than 300,000 patients. EMSY is in compliance with the FDA/GMP as well as CE-Certification under The Medical Device Directive of the EU ISO13485/2003.

 

Therapy While Sleeping

One of the WearTech Tights' unique features is the simple wireless therapy delivery at home or on the road while at rest.


Therapy while sleeping is highly effective because: 

  1. The human body’s biological healing cycle is more regenerative and pronounced at night, where 70% of growth hormones are produced along with Venous Endothelia Growth Factor, VEGF.
  2. Pain, which is often more pronounced at night, is relieved, allowing for better sleep.
  3. There's no better ease-of-use than getting 8 treatments while asleep. 

 

World-First WearTech Tights™ Work

WearTech Tights are unique in the world. WearTech is the first company that has researched, innovated, and proven the clinical efficacy of nocturnal therapy while protecting its IP with copyrighted software. There are numerous companies chasing the diagnostic application of wearable textiles, but we are the first company to offer a therapeutics textile to address injury and recovery with the WearTech Tights.

The tights work. Studies were performed by the United States Air Force through a research grant from the United Stated Government on the function and durability of our WearTech Tights and Shirts. The research proved the full functionality of our tights held up under the strenuous conditions of the Brook Army Centrifuge in San Antonio, Texas, making them ideal for intense pilot training. These studies were approved by the IRB of the USAF under the direction of the USAF's Director of Medical of Research, ULF Balldin, M.D., Ph.D. 

Six published studies on the WearTech Tights and many more on its components contributed to WearTech Therapeutics and its parent company, Prizm Medical's success in breaking a 34-year-old FDA regulatory glass ceiling. WearTech Tights and other WearTech/Prizm products are proven medical therapy devices which can now be offered over-the-counter without a prescription!

Design and Construction

The WearTech Tights have two 6-inch-wide EMSY Electrodes wrapped around the calf muscle and quadriceps in both legs of the tights, which are connected to our Sport-Z DC Stimulator using flat lead wires in-bedded in the fabric. WearTech Tights have a molded bracket / holster to house the Sport-Z and connect to the EMSY wraps. 

The tights need are made of a spandex and lycra combination to form a tight skin contact, but they are also breathable and comfortable while sleeping.
 


Our Market – Sports Medicine and Athletic Performance

The target market segments for WearTech's products are professional athletes, non-professional athletes and other sports participants.

The concept of the tights will be easy for the market to grasp. Electro-therapy with hand-held devices (EMS or NMES) has been used for many years in sports for treating injury to muscles as well as muscle conditioning through gel pad electrodes producing a contraction or muscle pumping. Therefore, the adoption of the breakthrough, wireless WearTech Tights as a non-drug treatment should be easily understood and accepted.

Our products fall within the realm of sports medicine, a field which involves the treatment and prevention of injuries related to sports and exercise and which comprises a very large market.

Growth in the sports medicine market is both strong and worldwide. Conferences, symposiums, expositions and sports advertising continue to raise more and more awareness, contributing to the growth in alternative sports medicine products, the influx of international players, and expansions in both participants and product offerings. 

The global sports medicine market is forecast to reach $8.3 Billion USD by 2020, up from $5.6 Billion USD in 2015, at a CAGR of 8.0% for the forecast period. We are poised to penetrate this market by addressing soft tissue repair, expedited recovery and performance enhancement with a non-drug, comfortable, easy-to-use, highly effective solution. We have received all necessary governmental approvals in the U.S.A., E.U. and some key countries in the Asia-Pacific region.

The global sports medicine market is segmented on the basis of product, application, and region. Based on product, the sports medicine market is broken down further into the subcategories of body reconstruction & repair products, body support & recovery products, and accessories.

Body reconstruction & repair products were estimated to account for the major share of the sports medicine market in 2015. North America was estimated to account for the largest share of the sports medicine market, followed by Europe and Asia-Pacific. However, the Asia-Pacific market is slated to grow at the highest CAGR during the forecast period 2015-2020 and serve as a revenue pocket for companies offering sports medicine equipment.


Other Market Applications 

The WearTech Tights can be used for long-flight pilots and other flight crew, military ground troops, venous stasis disease, restless leg syndrome, spinal cord paraplegics and post-surgical recovery.

Once we go into production, we plan to market worldwide to professional and amateur athletes and then move into the medical market.

The Company Behind The Product

WearTech Therapeutics, Inc. of Gainesville, Georgia (WearTechIT.com) is the developer of the world's first garment electrodes in the new "Wearable and Wireless" market.  The company is the first to research and apply below-sensory DC stimulation while sleeping with proven clinical efficacy. It is now uniquely positioned as the only company applying wearable DC stimulation technology for cellular, vascular, muscular and soft tissue injury recovery and enhanced athletic performance while resting and sleeping.


WearTech was formed by Prizm Medical, Inc., a twenty-year-old medical device manufacturer, to apply its leading-edge Intelligent Textiles for Medicine™ technology in the non-prescription retail space for sport injury recovery and enhanced endurance.

Prizm Medical has been involved in leading electrotherapy research since 1996 with over 20 published studies and products treating over 250,000 patients with outstanding results. Prizm's gloves, stockings, sleeves and orthopedic soft bracing are powered by the world's smallest HVPG stimulators offering a unique, copyrighted, nocturnal therapy while sleeping for pain relief, diabetic foot disease, sports medicine, stroke rehab and wound healing.

FDA approval has been obtained for all Prizm devices, including those of its subsidiary WearTech, to be sold over-the counter with two 510ks for the U.S. market. Now all Prizm products are FDA, European MDD and Medicare approved devices, plus have the stamp of official approval in Japan, Europe, Canada, Hong Kong and Taiwan. Prizm Medical is FDA/GMP and ISO 13483/2003 Certified.


Leadership Strength

The Founder and CEO of WearTech Therapeutics and Prizm Medical is James P. Johnson, a 35-year veteran of the medical devices industry in the U.S.A., Asian and European markets. His background substantiates the management strength of WearTech and this product launch. He has been involved in six successful startup companies with over 30 new medical device launches from St. Jude heart valves to the first insulin pump, co-founded Medfusion, Inc., and managed a $48 million Infusion Systems Division with 108 employees prior to founding Prizm.

A world-recognized leader in "Wearable and Wireless" therapeutic technology for cellular, vascular, muscular and soft tissue injury recovery, Johnson was one of the panel experts at the world's largest Wearable Technologies Show in London earlier in2017. In November 2017 he will be a featured speaker in Dusseldorf at the Medicine+Sports Conference within Medica, the largest medical device meeting in the world. 

Johnson unveiled the WearTech Tights for the public at the Interbike International Bicycle Exposition in Las Vegas on September 20, 2017, followed by Sponsorship of the Super League Triathlon on the Isle of Jersey, Channel Islands, September 23-24, 2017. 

Product Delivery

Johnson knows the channels that are required for a successful WearTech business and delivery of your product. WearTech has a contract with a $1.5 billion manufacturer, supplier for some of the largest names in the sports apparel business, to provide the WearTech Tights timely, in volume, with highest quality assured. The company can deliver!
story_txt:
Rapid Recovery from Muscle Injury, Fatigue, and Pain while Sleeping  WearTech Tights™ OverviewWearTech Tights are the world's first wireless, therapeutic, conductive tights. Providing a significant "Athlete's Edge" for users, they offer a highly effective, non-drug therapy that will enhance performance in athletes and should become part of their regular training and exercise regimens.The tights are proven to accelerate muscle recovery and the healing of cellular function and blood vessels, and to promote overall soft tissue recovery from strenuous athletic training and competition.FDA/GMP and ISO13483/2003 Certified, the WearTech Tights are tested, proven and ready to go into large scale production with a boost from our Indiegogo supporters. That's why, for a limited time only and for a limited quantity, we are offering rewards representing deep discounts on the tights, our proprietary DC stimulators and more, most at 40-50% off as presented on the right.GET YOURS NOW!While designed and tested with the professional and other serious athletes in mind, the unique WearTech Tights will benefit anyone with an active lifestyle, anyone with sore muscles or circulation issues. The tights provide a convenient, comfortable, easy but highly effective therapy, pain relief and muscle recovery without the need for any large equipment, wires or a therapist. Just put them on and turn them on, then relax. There is nothing else on the market today that compares.The fundamental dynamic of WearTech Therapeutics' products is continuous, variable, DC electrotherapeutic energy that is applied to the exterior surface of the body, such as the legs, but which penetrates deep into the muscle tissue promoting rapid soft tissue healing.Sport-Z DC StimulatorThe continuous energy application is achieved through WearTech's proprietary electrical stimulator, the Sport-Z™.  It generates the DC energy that is conducted through WearTech's proprietary "Intelligent Textiles For Medicine®" silver mesh fabric.The result is increased microcirculation to the designated body regions for better pain management, relief of muscle spasms, and  reduction of disuse atrophy (muscle wasting), edema (swelling) and inflammation, all of which contribute to more rapid soft tissue recoveryand enhanced endurance.Unlike the TENS units whose AC current only stays near the surface of the skin, the WearTech Tights' small Sport-Z stimulator applies pulsed direct current (DC) deep into the soft tissue, stimulating micro-circulation and reducing inflammation down where the TENS units cannot reach, thereby speeding up the muscle recovery process throughout the legs and providing real pain relief. WearTech has already developed, clinically proven and holds two copyrights for its proprietary software for the Sport-Z's DC electrotherapeutic energy technology and its delivery through the tights while sleeping with optional, pre-programmed, eight cycles of deep, pulsed therapy.The Conductive FabricThe tights are made of WearTech's highly conductive Electro-Mesh Silver Yards (EMSY) which conducts the deep-penetrating DC current throughout the legs. This fabric can be made into numerous configurations including various panels and wraps. EMSY is time-tested with a sixteen-year safety database and laboratory studies proving its biocompatibility and lack of cytotoxicity. The fabric's high effectiveness is proven with 20 published clinical studies and treatment of more than 300,000 patients. EMSY is in compliance with the FDA/GMP as well as CE-Certification under The Medical Device Directive of the EU ISO13485/2003. Therapy While SleepingOne of the WearTech Tights' unique features is the simple wireless therapy delivery at home or on the road while at rest.Therapy while sleeping is highly effective because: 
The human body’s biological healing cycle is more regenerative and pronounced at night, where 70% of growth hormones are produced along with Venous Endothelia Growth Factor, VEGF.
Pain, which is often more pronounced at night, is relieved, allowing for better sleep.
There's no better ease-of-use than getting 8 treatments while asleep. 
 World-First WearTech Tights™ WorkWearTech Tights are unique in the world. WearTech is the first company that has researched, innovated, and proven the clinical efficacy of nocturnal therapy while protecting its IP with copyrighted software. There are numerous companies chasing the diagnostic application of wearable textiles, but we are the first company to offer a therapeutics textile to address injury and recovery with the WearTech Tights.The tights work. Studies were performed by the United States Air Force through a research grant from the United Stated Government on the function and durability of our WearTech Tights and Shirts. The research proved the full functionality of our tights held up under the strenuous conditions of the Brook Army Centrifuge in San Antonio, Texas, making them ideal for intense pilot training. These studies were approved by the IRB of the USAF under the direction of the USAF's Director of Medical of Research, ULF Balldin, M.D., Ph.D. Six published studies on the WearTech Tights and many more on its components contributed to WearTech Therapeutics and its parent company, Prizm Medical's success in breaking a 34-year-old FDA regulatory glass ceiling. WearTech Tights and other WearTech/Prizm products are proven medical therapy devices which can now be offered over-the-counter without a prescription!Design and ConstructionThe WearTech Tights have two 6-inch-wide EMSY Electrodes wrapped around the calf muscle and quadriceps in both legs of the tights, which are connected to our Sport-Z DC Stimulator using flat lead wires in-bedded in the fabric. WearTech Tights have a molded bracket / holster to house the Sport-Z and connect to the EMSY wraps. The tights need are made of a spandex and lycra combination to form a tight skin contact, but they are also breathable and comfortable while sleeping. 
Our Market – Sports Medicine and Athletic PerformanceThe target market segments for WearTech's products are professional athletes, non-professional athletes and other sports participants.The concept of the tights will be easy for the market to grasp. Electro-therapy with hand-held devices (EMS or NMES) has been used for many years in sports for treating injury to muscles as well as muscle conditioning through gel pad electrodes producing a contraction or muscle pumping. Therefore, the adoption of the breakthrough, wireless WearTech Tights as a non-drug treatment should be easily understood and accepted.Our products fall within the realm of sports medicine, a field which involves the treatment and prevention of injuries related to sports and exercise and which comprises a very large market.Growth in the sports medicine market is both strong and worldwide. Conferences, symposiums, expositions and sports advertising continue to raise more and more awareness, contributing to the growth in alternative sports medicine products, the influx of international players, and expansions in both participants and product offerings. The global sports medicine market is forecast to reach $8.3 Billion USD by 2020, up from $5.6 Billion USD in 2015, at a CAGR of 8.0% for the forecast period. We are poised to penetrate this market by addressing soft tissue repair, expedited recovery and performance enhancement with a non-drug, comfortable, easy-to-use, highly effective solution. We have received all necessary governmental approvals in the U.S.A., E.U. and some key countries in the Asia-Pacific region.The global sports medicine market is segmented on the basis of product, application, and region. Based on product, the sports medicine market is broken down further into the subcategories of body reconstruction & repair products, body support & recovery products, and accessories.Body reconstruction & repair products were estimated to account for the major share of the sports medicine market in 2015. North America was estimated to account for the largest share of the sports medicine market, followed by Europe and Asia-Pacific. However, the Asia-Pacific market is slated to grow at the highest CAGR during the forecast period 2015-2020 and serve as a revenue pocket for companies offering sports medicine equipment.
Other Market Applications The WearTech Tights can be used for long-flight pilots and other flight crew, military ground troops, venous stasis disease, restless leg syndrome, spinal cord paraplegics and post-surgical recovery.Once we go into production, we plan to market worldwide to professional and amateur athletes and then move into the medical market.The Company Behind The ProductWearTech Therapeutics, Inc. of Gainesville, Georgia (WearTechIT.com) is the developer of the world's first garment electrodes in the new "Wearable and Wireless" market.  The company is the first to research and apply below-sensory DC stimulation while sleeping with proven clinical efficacy. It is now uniquely positioned as the only company applying wearable DC stimulation technology for cellular, vascular, muscular and soft tissue injury recovery and enhanced athletic performance while resting and sleeping.WearTech was formed by Prizm Medical, Inc., a twenty-year-old medical device manufacturer, to apply its leading-edge Intelligent Textiles for Medicine™ technology in the non-prescription retail space for sport injury recovery and enhanced endurance.Prizm Medical has been involved in leading electrotherapy research since 1996 with over 20 published studies and products treating over 250,000 patients with outstanding results. Prizm's gloves, stockings, sleeves and orthopedic soft bracing are powered by the world's smallest HVPG stimulators offering a unique, copyrighted, nocturnal therapy while sleeping for pain relief, diabetic foot disease, sports medicine, stroke rehab and wound healing.FDA approval has been obtained for all Prizm devices, including those of its subsidiary WearTech, to be sold over-the counter with two 510ks for the U.S. market. Now all Prizm products are FDA, European MDD and Medicare approved devices, plus have the stamp of official approval in Japan, Europe, Canada, Hong Kong and Taiwan. Prizm Medical is FDA/GMP and ISO 13483/2003 Certified.
Leadership StrengthThe Founder and CEO of WearTech Therapeutics and Prizm Medical is James P. Johnson, a 35-year veteran of the medical devices industry in the U.S.A., Asian and European markets. His background substantiates the management strength of WearTech and this product launch. He has been involved in six successful startup companies with over 30 new medical device launches from St. Jude heart valves to the first insulin pump, co-founded Medfusion, Inc., and managed a $48 million Infusion Systems Division with 108 employees prior to founding Prizm.A world-recognized leader in "Wearable and Wireless" therapeutic technology for cellular, vascular, muscular and soft tissue injury recovery, Johnson was one of the panel experts at the world's largest Wearable Technologies Show in London earlier in2017. In November 2017 he will be a featured speaker in Dusseldorf at the Medicine+Sports Conference within Medica, the largest medical device meeting in the world. Johnson unveiled the WearTech Tights for the public at the Interbike International Bicycle Exposition in Las Vegas on September 20, 2017, followed by Sponsorship of the Super League Triathlon on the Isle of Jersey, Channel Islands, September 23-24, 2017. Product DeliveryJohnson knows the channels that are required for a successful WearTech business and delivery of your product. WearTech has a contract with a $1.5 billion manufacturer, supplier for some of the largest names in the sports apparel business, to provide the WearTech Tights timely, in volume, with highest quality assured. The company can deliver!

story:
As a licensed Inspector for the New Jersey State Athletic Control Board (NJSACB), Master of Martial Arts, competitor and boxing enthusiast, after studying and researching, I found that many coaches and trainers use chairs that are tapped together and covered with towels in order to create seating to wrap their fighters hands. This method has been used for ages, so I decided that there should be a more effective, efficient way to do so. The Hand Wrap Stand is comfortable, lightweight and durable, making it the perfect tool fighters. It's the first and only hand wrap stand, it is one of a kind!

 

The Hand Wrap Stand

 

The Impact

Your contribution to our campaign will allow us to continue with research and development and travel, while also getting a working prototype manufactured of The Hand Wrap Stand. Our ultimate goal is to have The Hand Wrap Stand used by both amateur and professional athletes worldwide. We want The Hand Wrap Stand to become synonymous with combative sports.

The Hand Wrap Stand will forever change the world of combative sports with its simplistic design and functionality. Not only will you personally be apart of bringing our product to life, but you will also be responsible for impacting the lives of athletes who have their hands wrapped for daily training and competitions. The Hand Wrap Stand will no doubt take the combative sports world by storm!

 

Timeline of Events

 

- January 2016                    Idea for "The Hand Wrap Stand"

- February 2016                  Initial Design

- February 2017                  Provisional Patent

- March 2017                       Final Concept Design

- June 2017                          Indiegogo Launch

- January 2018                   Rewards Ship!

 

Endorsed by:

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

- When developing a new product, there are always inherent risks and challenges. This project may not become fully funded.
- Manufacturing and other miscellaneous costs may slow down production of The Hand Wrap Stand.
- With the Drawings and Digital Prototypes already developed, we are looking forward to manufacturing The Hand Wrap Stand– with your help. In saying that, we’re confident in our ability to deliver on schedule and with the highest level of quality. All of our backers and interested supporters will be kept in the loop on progress both during and following our campaign.

 

Spread the Word!

Thank you for backing our campaign! We hope that you spread the word about The Hand Wrap Stand to family and friends on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter!

story:
Stevia del Condado was founded in the year 2013 as a research project in the town of Navas de San Juan, Jaén. Jaen is located in the autonomous community of Andalusia, Spain. After various market research and other empirical studies on analysis of soil, the results threw a positive propensity to production and profitability.

We are a company dedicated to the commercialization of derivatives, such as herbs and teas with Stevia. Natural, organic and wild sometimes products are used for all.

In addition, the main product, the Stevia cultivation itself and produced in eco-friendly regime, has medicinal properties hardly comparable to any other Stevia, not only as natural sweetener.

Manuel Justiniano is an engineer in charge of Stevia production. The more complex labour resides in the selection of seeds that will integrate crops of this plant. This selection is obtained from parameters between experience, studies and lastly, relying on natural techniques such as bee pollination.



We need at least 35,000 euros to improve the production chain. We want to be more efficient and develop actions to be kinder to the environment.

We develop specific machinery that is clean, innovative and useful. Until today we have received many awards for our management, and we want to continue to rise.

Failure to achieve the goal, we will use the money for the same thing, although we can not develop the full, complete development and begin as soon as possible.

Achievements 2015

  • In the year 2015, as freshman at marketing firm it has assisted as official exhibitor at the international fair of Seville, Andalucía Sabor. Being one of the revelations in the outstanding event companies. (http://www.andaluciasabor.com/uploads/expositor...abor_03.09.2015.pdf)
  • Awarded by the Council of Jaen as one of eight outstanding projects of the year during the Forum of entrepreneurs LINCE 2015. (http://www.ifeja.org/lince/)
  • Achievement (processing) of two stamps of quality granted by the Council of Jaén and the Association of rural development, ASODECO. These seals have recognition national and international:
  1. - Jaén Taste (http://www.degustajaen.com/)
  2. - Rural quality (http://www.calidadrural.es/)
  • Great attention in the media as a result of the activities innovative.
  • Development and preparation of the first crushing of Stevia worldwide. Patented and current functioning in a very satisfactory manner.
  • Winners of different business scholarships from delivery of real estate assets for the development of the activity, to advertising campaigns in various media of Spanish communication (Cadena COPE y Cadena Ser).
  • Candidates for the provincial prize of Jaén on entrepreneurship and innovation: Jaén undertakes and improves on sustainable development.


Our company is directed to customers interested in eating healthy food without glucose, sucrose, aspartame or erythritol.

The products offered do not include gluten, which are perfectly suitable not only for gluten intolerant, but their properties can also be, and must be consumed by diabetics.

Moreover, such people can find the range of products offered in the web and authorized dealers supply products to retailer ecological, herbalists, dietetics, nutrition, gourmet, deli, pharmacy and restaurants, cafes, and hotels, among others.

The non-inclusion of erythritol in our product range meets natural criteria. In our opinion, it is possible to build healthy products, without chemical additives that can degrade the body.

Some products of this company have been authorized as plantations with seal of Natural Park of Andalusia.

Our Packaging

Our Packaging Kraft paper bag of craft production, with interior in food grade plastic. One-dose Pyramidal pods of nylon which conserve maintain and balance properties of each plant or tea. Manual Close non-metallic plus tamper-evident adhesive, circular-shaped with the the company's logo. Adhesives, packaging and sealing of the bag kraft made up by hand, without

the use of any industrial machinery. Nylon pyramidal pods are Sealed Ultrasonically, avoiding any alteration of the product as it might occur for other thermal methods.

It is coming with two labels, one at the front and one at rear:

  • Front: Identification of product and company, variety, net weight and a window to see inside.
  • Rear: The Company ID, barcode, QR code, quality seals and number of registration. 2 years preferred consumption date. Product non-perishable.

Photo Session (65MB)
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B04LlJhgqs1tN0pGSGVaQ1VxdFU/view
All information in PDF format
http://www.steviadelcondado.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/RECOMPENSAS.pdf


We know it is a difficult and demanding market. Our challenge is to get people to make more healthy and beneficial to the body natural products.

Our desire is to bring our philosophy to every corner of the world, showing that it is possible to live better.

 Future:
  • Achievement of the seal of ecological agriculture (in process)
  • Achievement of different standardized rules of management of the quality of the product and environmental management (ISO 9001, ISO 14001, etc.)
  • Improves in packaging
  • Investment in equipment and production processes to achieve an efficient system.
  • I+D+I
  • Markets extension
  • Platform creation of coordination with different producers under advice and own technical monitoring, which can preserve high quality.
  • Creation of a vertical integration, from the production process, up to the stage of marketing and after sales service.
  • Increase in our budget for sports sponsorships and creation of events and own competitions, always from a social point of view and by promoting healthy lifestyle habits.
  • Creation of sustainable employment
  • Consolidation of our relations with public bodies, media and social solidarity.
  • Investment in systems of storage and forwarding of orders

 


You can help us by sharing our ideas on Facebook, Twitter, etc. Disseminate the project among friends, colleagues and family. Thank you..





  • Publication about Stevia del Condado in the book "Casos del Exito"http://www.steviadelcondado.com/wp-content/uplo...

  • Interview to Stevia del Condado https://vimeo.com/137746492
  • Village fair 2015- Santo Tomé (23-9-15) de Diez TV https://vimeo.com/142448915
  • News about Stevia del Condado on Diez TV (07-10-15) https://vimeo.com/142448916
  • News about II Forum of entrepreneurs LINCE 2015. http://www.steviadelcondado.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/IMG-20151203-WA0004.jpeg
  • Entrepreneurs of 5 rural areas presented to experts their innovative projects http://www.20minutos.es/noticia/2515723/0/emprendedores-5-municipios-ambito-rural-presentan-ante-expertos-sus-proyectos-innovadores/#xtor=AD-15&xts=467263
  • Interview to Stevia del Condado in the II Forum of entrepreneurs LINCE 2015 https://vimeo.com/148736687
  • Several radio interviews: Cadena Ser, Onda Cero, Canal Sur Radio, Radio Nacional de España…



Team of Stevia del Condado

  • Juan Antonio Requena Rentero – Degree in market research. Markets and in the Area of Marketing analyst.
  • José Antonio Madrid Santos – Degree in market research. Markets and in the Area of Marketing analyst.
  • Manuel Luis Justiniano García de Zúñiga – Technical agricultural engineer. Agricultural analyst and head of the Area of production. 
  • Diego Requena Rentero – Technician in logistics and transport. Responsible for the logistics Area.
  • Javier Pérez López – Technician in logistics and transport. Responsible for the logistics Area. 
  • Francisco Marín Torralba – Graduated in ESO. Operator and responsible for the Area of administration.
  • Jesús Güido Serrano – Graduated in ESO. Operator and responsible for the Area of administration.



-------- En castellano / In spanish -----------------------------------------------------------------


Stevia del Condado nace en el año 2013 como un proyecto de investigación en la localidad de Navas de San Juan, Jaén. Jaén está situada en la Comunidad Autónoma de Andalucía, España.

Tras distintos estudios de mercado y otros estudios empíricos sobre analítica de suelo, los resultados arrojaban una propensión positiva a producción y rentabilidad. Somos una empresa dedicada a la comercialización de Stevia y derivados, como plantas aromáticas y tés con Stevia. Para todo ello se utilizan productos naturales, ecológicos y en algunos casos silvestres. Asimismo, el principal producto, la Stevia de cultivo propio y producido en régimen ecológico, tiene unas propiedades medicinales difícilmente comparables a cualquier otra Stevia, no solo como edulcorante natural.

Manuel Justiniano es el ingeniero encargado de la producción de Stevia. La labor más compleja reside en la selección de las semillas que van a integrar los cultivos de esta planta. Dicha selección se obtiene de parámetros comprendidos entre la experiencia, los estudios realizados con anteriores y por último, apoyándose en técnicas naturales como la polinización con abejas.


Necesitamos, al menos, 35000 euros para poder mejorar la cadena de producción. Queremos ser más eficientes y desarrollar acciones para ser mas respetuosos con el medio ambiente.

Desarrollaremos maquinaria específica que sea limpia, innovadora y útil. Hasta hoy hemos recibido muchos premios por nuestra gestión, y queremos seguir al alza.

En caso de no conseguir la meta, usaremos el dinero para el mismo asunto, aunque no podamos desarrollar al completo, iniciaremos su desarrollo y completarlo lo antes posible.

Logros 2015

  • En el año 2015, como primer año en comercialización en firme se ha asistido como expositor oficial a la Feria Internacional de Sevilla, Andalucía Sabor. Siendo una de las empresas revelación en la destacada cita.(http://www.andaluciasabor.com/uploads/expositor...abor_03.09.2015.pdf)
  • Galardonados por la Diputación de Jaén como uno de los ocho proyectos destacados del año durante el Foro de Emprendedores LINCE 2015.(http://www.ifeja.org/lince/)
  • Consecución (en tramitación) de dos sellos de calidad otorgados por la Diputación de Jaén y la asociación de desarrollo rural, ASODECO. Dichos sellos tienen reconocimiento nacional e internacional
  1. Degusta Jaén (http://www.degustajaen.com/)
  2. Calidad Rural (http://www.calidadrural.es/)
  • Gran atención en los medios de comunicación como resultado de las actividades innovadoras.
  • Desarrollo y elaboración de la primera despalilladora de Stevia a nivel mundial. Patentada y en actual funcionamiento de forma muy satisfactoria.
  • Premiados con distintas becas empresariales desde entrega de activos inmobiliarios para el desarrollo de la actividad, hasta campañas publicitarias en distintos medios de comunicación españoles (Cadena COPE y Cadena Ser).
  • Candidatos al premio provincial de Jaén sobre emprendimiento e innovación: Jaén emprende e innova desarrollo sostenible.


Nuestra compañía se dirige a los clientes interesados en consumir productos saludables sin glucosa, sacarosa, aspartamo y/o eritritol. Los productos ofertados no incluyen gluten, con lo que son perfectamente aptos no solo para celiacos, sino que por sus propiedades también pueden y deben ser consumidos por diabéticos. Además este tipo de personas podrán encontrar toda la gama de productos que se ofrece en el portal web y distribuidores autorizados

Suministramos productos a tiendas especializadas ecológicas, herbolarios, dietética, nutrición, gourmet, delicatesen, farmacia, parafarmacia y a restaurantes, cafeterías, y hoteles, entre otros.

La no inclusión de eritritol en nuestra gama de productos responde a criterios naturales. En nuestra opinión es posible construir productos saludables, sin aditivos químicos que puedan degradar el organismo.

Algunos productos de esta empresa han sido acreditados como plantaciones con sello de Parque Natural de Andalucía.

Nuestro Packaging

Bolsa de papel kraft de producción artesanal, con interior en plástico de calidad alimentaria. Monodosis piramidales de nylon las cuales conservan, mantienen y equilibran las propiedades de cada planta y/o té.

Cierre manual no metálico más precinto de seguridad con adhesivo, en forma circular, con el logotipo de la compañía. Adhesivos, envasado y sellado de la bolsa kraft a mano, sin el uso de maquinaria industrial, salvo para la elaboración de cada monodosis de nylon.

Monodosis piramidales de nylon sellada por ultrasonidos, evitando la alteración del producto como puede ocurrir por otros métodos térmicos.

Se acompaña con dos etiquetas, una delantera y otra trasera:

  • Delantera: Identificación del producto y empresa, variedad, peso neto y ventana para poder ver el interior de la bolsa mencionada
  • Trasera: Identificación de la empresa, código de barras, código QR, sellos de calidad y número de registro sanitario. Fecha de consumo preferente, 2 años. Producto no perecedero.

Sesión de Fotos (65MB)
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B04LlJhgqs1tN0pGSGVaQ1VxdFU/view
Toda la información en formato PDF
http://www.steviadelcondado.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/RECOMPENSAS.pdf


Sabemos que es un mercado dificil y exigente. Nuestro reto es conseguir que las personas puedan tomar productos naturales, más saludables y beneficiosos para el organismo.

Nuestro deseo es poder llevar nuestra filosofia a cualquier rincón del mundo, demostrando que es posible vivir mejor

Futuro de Stevia del Condado

  • Consecución del sello de agricultura ecológica (en tramitación)
  • Consecución de distintas normas estandarizadas de gestión de la calidad del producto y gestión medio ambiental (ISO 9001, ISO 14001, etc.)
  • Mejora integral en el packaging.
  • Inversión en maquinaria y procesos productivos para conseguir un sistema más eficiente.
  • I+D+I
  • Expansión de mercados.
  • Creación de una plataforma de coordinación con distintos productores bajo asesoramiento y seguimiento técnico propio, que pueda preservar un alto nivel de calidad final.
  • Creación de una integración vertical, desde el proceso productivo, hasta la fase de comercialización y servicio post venta.
  • Aumento de nuestro presupuesto para patrocinios deportivos y creación de eventos y competiciones propias, siempre desde un punto de vista social y fomentando unos hábitos de vida saludable.
  • Creación de empleo sostenible.
  • Consolidación de nuestras relaciones con entes públicos, medios de comunicación y solidaridad social.
  • Inversión en sistemas de almacenaje y expedición de pedidos.

Pueden ayudarnos compartiendo nuestras ideas en Facebook, Twitter, etc. Divulgar este proyecto entre sus amigos, compañeros de trabajo y familiares. Gracias.


Medios de comunicación

  • Publicación sobre Stevia del Condado en el Libro “Casos de Éxito”. http://www.steviadelcondado.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/Stevia-150720.pdf

  • Noticia sobre Stevia del Condado en Diez TV (07-10-15) https://vimeo.com/142448916

  • Entrevista de Canal Sur a Stevia del Condado en el II Foro de Emprendedores LINCE 2015  https://vimeo.com/148736687
  • Diversas entrevistas en radio, como por ejemplo: Cadena Ser, Onda Cero, Canal Sur Radio, Radio Nacional de España, etc.


Equipo de Stevia del Condado

  • Juan Antonio Requena Rentero – Licenciado en Investigación de Mercados. Analista de Mercados y Responsable del Área de Marketing.
  • José Antonio Madrid Santos – Licenciado en Investigación de Mercados. Analista de Mercados y Responsable del Área de Marketing.
  • Manuel Luis Justiniano García de Zúñiga – Ingeniero Técnico Agrónomo. Analista Agrónomo y Responsable del Área de Producción.
  • Diego Requena Rentero – Técnico Superior en Logística y Transporte. Responsable del Área Logística.
  • Javier Pérez López – Técnico Superior en Logística y Transporte. Responsable del Área Logística.
  • Francisco Marín Torralba – Graduado en ESO. Operario y Responsable del Área de Administración.
  • Jesús Güido Serrano – Graduado en ESO. Operario y Responsable del Área de Administración.
story_txt:
Stevia del Condado was founded in the year 2013 as a research project in the town of Navas de San Juan, Jaén. Jaen is located in the autonomous community of Andalusia, Spain. After various market research and other empirical studies on analysis of soil, the results threw a positive propensity to production and profitability.
We are a company dedicated to the commercialization of derivatives, such as herbs and teas with Stevia. Natural, organic and wild sometimes products are used for all.
In addition, the main product, the Stevia cultivation itself and produced in eco-friendly regime, has medicinal properties hardly comparable to any other Stevia, not only as natural sweetener.
Manuel Justiniano is an engineer in charge of Stevia production. The more complex labour resides in the selection of seeds that will integrate crops of this plant. This selection is obtained from parameters between experience, studies and lastly, relying on natural techniques such as bee pollination.

   
We need at
least 35,000 euros to improve the production chain. We want to be more
efficient and develop actions to be kinder to the environment.
We develop
specific machinery that is clean, innovative and useful. Until today we have
received many awards for our management, and we want to continue to rise.
Failure to
achieve the goal, we will use the money for the same thing, although we can not
develop the full, complete development and begin as soon as possible.
Achievements 2015

In the year 2015, as freshman at marketing firm it has assisted as official exhibitor at the international fair of Seville, Andalucía Sabor. Being one of the revelations in the outstanding event companies. (http://www.andaluciasabor.com/uploads/expositor...abor_03.09.2015.pdf)
Awarded by the Council of Jaen as one of eight outstanding projects of the year during the Forum of entrepreneurs LINCE 2015. (http://www.ifeja.org/lince/)
Achievement (processing) of two stamps of quality granted by the Council of Jaén and the Association of rural development, ASODECO. These seals have recognition national and international:

- Jaén Taste (http://www.degustajaen.com/)
- Rural quality (http://www.calidadrural.es/)

Great attention in the media as a result of the activities innovative.
Development and preparation of the first crushing of Stevia worldwide. Patented and current functioning in a very satisfactory manner.
Winners of different business scholarships from delivery of real estate assets for the development of the activity, to advertising campaigns in various media of Spanish communication (Cadena COPE y Cadena Ser).
Candidates for the provincial prize of Jaén on entrepreneurship and innovation: Jaén undertakes and improves on sustainable development.







Our company is directed to customers interested in eating healthy food without glucose, sucrose, aspartame or erythritol.



The products offered do not include gluten, which are perfectly suitable not only for gluten intolerant, but their properties can also be, and must be consumed by diabetics.
Moreover, such people can find the range of products offered in the web and authorized dealers supply products to retailer ecological, herbalists, dietetics, nutrition, gourmet, deli, pharmacy and restaurants, cafes, and hotels, among others.
The non-inclusion of erythritol in our product range meets natural criteria. In our opinion, it is possible to build healthy products, without chemical additives that can degrade the body.
Some products of this company have been authorized as plantations with seal of Natural Park of Andalusia.

Our Packaging
Our Packaging Kraft paper bag of craft production, with interior in food grade plastic. One-dose Pyramidal pods of nylon which conserve maintain and balance properties of each plant or tea. Manual Close non-metallic plus tamper-evident adhesive, circular-shaped with the the company's logo. Adhesives, packaging and sealing of the bag kraft made up by hand, without
the use of any industrial machinery. Nylon pyramidal pods are Sealed Ultrasonically, avoiding any alteration of the product as it might occur for other thermal methods.
It is coming with two labels, one at the front and one at rear:



Front: Identification of product and company, variety, net weight and a window to see inside.


Rear: The Company ID, barcode, QR code, quality seals and number of registration. 2 years preferred consumption date. Product non-perishable.



Photo Session (65MB)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B04LlJhgqs1tN0pGSGVaQ1VxdFU/view


All information in PDF format

http://www.steviadelcondado.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/RECOMPENSAS.pdf

We know it is a difficult and demanding market. Our challenge is to get people to make more healthy and beneficial to the body natural products.Our desire is to bring our philosophy to every corner of the world, showing that it is possible to live better. Future:

Achievement of the seal of ecological agriculture (in process)
Achievement of different standardized rules of management of the quality of the product and environmental management (ISO 9001, ISO 14001, etc.)
Improves in packaging
Investment in equipment and production processes to achieve an efficient system.
I+D+I
Markets extension
Platform creation of coordination with different producers under advice and own technical monitoring, which can preserve high quality.
Creation of a vertical integration, from the production process, up to the stage of marketing and after sales service.
Increase in our budget for sports sponsorships and creation of events and own competitions, always from a social point of view and by promoting healthy lifestyle habits.
Creation of sustainable employment
Consolidation of our relations with public bodies, media and social solidarity.
Investment in systems of storage and forwarding of orders

     



You can help us by sharing our ideas on Facebook, Twitter, etc. Disseminate the project among friends, colleagues and family. Thank you..

Team of Stevia del Condado



Juan Antonio Requena Rentero – Degree in market research. Markets and in the Area of Marketing analyst.


José Antonio Madrid Santos – Degree in market research. Markets and in the Area of Marketing analyst.


Manuel Luis Justiniano García de Zúñiga – Technical agricultural engineer. Agricultural analyst and head of the Area of production. 


Diego Requena Rentero – Technician in logistics and transport. Responsible for the logistics Area.

Javier Pérez López – Technician in logistics and transport. Responsible for the logistics Area. 

Francisco Marín Torralba – Graduated in ESO. Operator and responsible for the Area of administration.


Jesús Güido Serrano – Graduated in ESO. Operator and responsible for the Area of administration.










-------- En castellano / In spanish -----------------------------------------------------------------



Stevia del Condado nace en el año 2013 como un proyecto de investigación en la localidad de Navas de San Juan, Jaén. Jaén está situada en la Comunidad Autónoma de Andalucía, España.
Tras distintos estudios de mercado y otros estudios empíricos sobre analítica de suelo, los resultados arrojaban una propensión positiva a producción y rentabilidad. Somos una empresa dedicada a la comercialización de Stevia y derivados, como plantas aromáticas y tés con Stevia. Para todo ello se utilizan productos naturales, ecológicos y en algunos casos silvestres. Asimismo, el principal producto, la Stevia de cultivo propio y producido en régimen ecológico, tiene unas propiedades medicinales difícilmente comparables a cualquier otra Stevia, no solo como edulcorante natural.
Manuel Justiniano es el ingeniero encargado de la producción de Stevia. La labor más compleja reside en la selección de las semillas que van a integrar los cultivos de esta planta. Dicha selección se obtiene de parámetros comprendidos entre la experiencia, los estudios realizados con anteriores y por último, apoyándose en técnicas naturales como la polinización con abejas.




Necesitamos, al menos, 35000 euros para poder mejorar la
cadena de producción. Queremos ser más eficientes y desarrollar acciones para
ser mas respetuosos con el medio ambiente.
Desarrollaremos maquinaria específica que sea limpia,
innovadora y útil. Hasta hoy hemos recibido muchos premios por nuestra gestión,
y queremos seguir al alza.
En caso de no conseguir la meta, usaremos el dinero para el
mismo asunto, aunque no podamos desarrollar al completo, iniciaremos su
desarrollo y completarlo lo antes posible.

Logros 2015


En el año 2015, como primer año en comercialización en firme se ha asistido como expositor oficial a la Feria Internacional de Sevilla, Andalucía Sabor. Siendo una de las empresas revelación en la destacada cita.(http://www.andaluciasabor.com/uploads/expositor...abor_03.09.2015.pdf)
Galardonados por la Diputación de Jaén como uno de los ocho proyectos destacados del año durante el Foro de Emprendedores LINCE 2015.(http://www.ifeja.org/lince/)
Consecución (en tramitación) de dos sellos de calidad otorgados por la Diputación de Jaén y la asociación de desarrollo rural, ASODECO. Dichos sellos tienen reconocimiento nacional e internacional


Degusta Jaén (http://www.degustajaen.com/)


Calidad Rural (http://www.calidadrural.es/)

Gran atención en los medios de comunicación como resultado de las actividades innovadoras.
Desarrollo y elaboración de la primera despalilladora de Stevia a nivel mundial. Patentada y en actual funcionamiento de forma muy satisfactoria.
Premiados con distintas becas empresariales desde entrega de activos inmobiliarios para el desarrollo de la actividad, hasta campañas publicitarias en distintos medios de comunicación españoles (Cadena COPE y Cadena Ser).

Candidatos al premio provincial de Jaén sobre emprendimiento e innovación: Jaén emprende e innova desarrollo sostenible.






Nuestra compañía se dirige a los clientes interesados en consumir productos saludables sin glucosa, sacarosa, aspartamo y/o eritritol. Los productos ofertados no incluyen gluten, con lo que son perfectamente aptos no solo para celiacos, sino que por sus propiedades también pueden y deben ser consumidos por diabéticos. Además este tipo de personas podrán encontrar toda la gama de productos que se ofrece en el portal web y distribuidores autorizados
Suministramos productos a tiendas especializadas ecológicas, herbolarios, dietética, nutrición, gourmet, delicatesen, farmacia, parafarmacia y a restaurantes, cafeterías, y hoteles, entre otros.
La no inclusión de eritritol en nuestra gama de productos responde a criterios naturales. En nuestra opinión es posible construir productos saludables, sin aditivos químicos que puedan degradar el organismo.
Algunos productos de esta empresa han sido acreditados como plantaciones con sello de Parque Natural de Andalucía.

Nuestro Packaging
Bolsa de papel kraft de producción artesanal, con interior en plástico de calidad alimentaria. Monodosis piramidales de nylon las cuales conservan, mantienen y equilibran las propiedades de cada planta y/o té.
Cierre manual no metálico más precinto de seguridad con adhesivo, en forma circular, con el logotipo de la compañía. Adhesivos, envasado y sellado de la bolsa kraft a mano, sin el uso de maquinaria industrial, salvo para la elaboración de cada monodosis de nylon.
Monodosis piramidales de nylon sellada por ultrasonidos, evitando la alteración del producto como puede ocurrir por otros métodos térmicos.
Se acompaña con dos etiquetas, una delantera y otra trasera:



Delantera: Identificación del producto y empresa, variedad, peso neto y ventana para poder ver el interior de la bolsa mencionada


Trasera: Identificación de la empresa, código de barras, código QR, sellos de calidad y número de registro sanitario. Fecha de consumo preferente, 2 años. Producto no perecedero.


Sesión de Fotos (65MB)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B04LlJhgqs1tN0pGSGVaQ1VxdFU/view


Toda la información en formato PDF

http://www.steviadelcondado.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/RECOMPENSAS.pdf





Sabemos que es un mercado dificil y exigente. Nuestro reto es conseguir que las personas puedan tomar productos naturales, más saludables y beneficiosos para el organismo.
Nuestro deseo es poder llevar nuestra filosofia a cualquier rincón del mundo, demostrando que es posible vivir mejor
Futuro de Stevia del Condado



Consecución del sello de agricultura ecológica (en tramitación)


Consecución de distintas normas estandarizadas de gestión de la calidad del producto y gestión medio ambiental (ISO 9001, ISO 14001, etc.)

I+D+I


Expansión de mercados.


Creación de una plataforma de coordinación con distintos productores bajo asesoramiento y seguimiento técnico propio, que pueda preservar un alto nivel de calidad final.


Creación de una integración vertical, desde el proceso productivo, hasta la fase de comercialización y servicio post venta.


Aumento de nuestro presupuesto para patrocinios deportivos y creación de eventos y competiciones propias, siempre desde un punto de vista social y fomentando unos hábitos de vida saludable.


Creación de empleo sostenible.

Inversión en sistemas de almacenaje y expedición de pedidos.




Pueden ayudarnos compartiendo nuestras ideas en Facebook, Twitter, etc. Divulgar este proyecto entre sus amigos, compañeros de trabajo y familiares. Gracias.

story:
Who was the first person to see the real YOU?

Was it a teacher, coach or college professor? 

For Tedi Serge, it was her 5th grade teacher. She shared personal pictures and stories of her exhilarating travels, that inspired Tedi to live an adventure filled life.

She saw Tedi.

For Sonya Serge, it was Miss. M who sent her encouraging letters through the school post office, years after she left her classroom. Sonya still holds on to those letters today.

She saw Sonya.

4 years ago, Tedi and Sonya created Sand Sisters Los Angeles, a youth empowerment nonprofit, taught in after school programs and summer beach camp, designed to give children the tools to love themselves. The program has been offered as extended education in over 15 independent schools and is a part of the CREST Enrichment Program, enrolling over 500 students in the Los Angeles area to date. 

Now we need your help. We want to reach more children across the country who may not have an after school program or the means to enroll into one, but will most likely have access to the internet.

The Sand Sisters Toolbox Project takes our character building lessons online, creating SAFE, INSPIRING and ENGAGING content for children to access on YouTube. Parents will feel comfortable letting their children watch our videos and gain take-away tools to use at home, on the playground and in the classroom.

Our campaign goal will allow us to make an abundance of content pushed out weekly in 2017 and create a fun and safe channel for children to engage online while learning Sand Sister core values. 

Donate today to help create online content that is safe, engaging and lets children know, WE see them and THEY matter. Be sure to use the share features to share our mission with your community!

story:
Save Lives By Helping to Fight Childhood Obesity!

You've heard the stats about childhood obesity and it isn't pretty. What we do and have done for the last 20+ years by offering a variety of services and programs to help NYC families get fit and stay fit.

As a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit organization, we are committed to fighting childhood obesity. One of our cornerstone programs is the Children’s Sports & Fitness Expo. By donating to this campaign, you will help us continue to provide a fun-filled day that will show families healthy eating alternatives, expose children to different sports and activities and provide information about health and wellness resources in their community.

The Expo is an annual FREE event where thousands of children have the opportunity to participate in over 25 sports activities, health screenings and nutrition clinics. Through this event, families gain exposure to activities and services that will help them become physically fit thereby reducing the risk of obesity in their lives. Some of these activities include: fencing, tennis, soccer, golf, archery, volleyball, capoeira, gymnastics, basketball, baseball and much more. The sports clinics are conducted by over 35 Certified, Semi-Pro collegiate athletes.

As President of Body Sculpt of New York and a personal trainer, my mission has always been to help people attain their fitness goals so they can live healthier lives. The Expo has been the culmination of a dream for me. We are changing lives, one family at a time and I hope you will see this as an opportunity to help make a difference in a child’s life.

How You Can Help

Every dollar you donate, goes right back into the program. 

As you can imagine, putting on an event this size is a HUGE undertaking. The $15,000 we hope to raise will help us provide 25 sports activities and trainers to more than 5,000 children. It will also help us to purchase t-shirts and provide breakfast and lunch for the 200 volunteers who are graciously donating their time from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m.

Any funds raised above and beyond our goal of $15,000 will go towards offering a Six Weeks to Fitness program for parents and children immediately following the Expo. You can find out more about our Six Weeks to Fitness program by going to www.sixweeks.com.

Can I count on you to help us meet or surpass our goal and make this the best Expo ever?

As a not-for-profit, this means any donations you make are tax deductible and it also means that you are a wonderful person for caring enough to help. 

To show our gratitude for your generous donation, we have a few rewards.  Check out the list to right which includes  (1) being listed on our website; (2) being listed in a souvenir program book; (3) t-shirts, (4) consultations with our fitness trainers, (5) consultations with our nutritionists (6) a customized meal plan. 

By donating as little as $25 you're not only helping others, but you’re also helping yourself to stay fit and healthy. Sounds like a win-win situation doesn’t it? Even if you don’t need the fitness or nutrition services, you may wish to donate and pass on the perks to one of your family members or friends.

The Impact

We know you’ve all seen the alarming headlines about the childhood obesity epidemic. The CDC reports that 18% of adolescents in America are obese and according to the New England Journal of Medicine children today will not live as long as their parents because of obesity. To me, this is a call to action!

The Expo has a proven track record of being able to serve as an effective intervention that can contribute to behavior modification and increased awareness about the importance of proper nutrition and regular physical activity. I hope you will help us continue this work. Visit http://www.bodysculpt.org for more information.

Other Ways You Can Help

We totally get it if you can’t make a donation at this time, but there are other ways in which you can help. You can start by spreading the word! Please tell your friends, co-workers, family, frenemies – anyone you can think of about our campaign. Put it on blast through your social media networks.

Don't forget to save this date:  Saturday, June 27, 2015, come and join us in Brooklyn from 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., come out and visit us at the 12th Annual Children's Sports and Fitness Expo at Boys & Girls H.S., 1700 Fulton Street, Brooklyn, N.Y. 11213. 

With your help and support, we can continue to keep this wonderful event FREE for the community.

Thank you for your help, it’s greatly appreciated!

We are changing lives, one family at a time and I hope you will see this as an opportunity to help make a difference in a child’s life.How You Can HelpEvery dollar you donate, goes right back into the program. As you can imagine, putting on an event this size is a HUGE undertaking. The $15,000 we hope to raise will help us provide 25 sports activities and trainers to more than 5,000 children. It will also help us to purchase t-shirts and provide breakfast and lunch for the 200 volunteers who are graciously donating their time from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m.Any funds raised above and beyond our goal of $15,000 will go towards offering a Six Weeks to Fitness program for parents and children immediately following the Expo. You can find out more about our Six Weeks to Fitness program by going to www.sixweeks.com.Can I count on you to help us meet or surpass our goal and make this the best Expo ever?As a not-for-profit, this means any donations you make are tax deductible and it also means that you are a wonderful person for caring enough to help. To show our gratitude for your generous donation, we have a few rewards.  Check out the list to right which includes  (1) being listed on our website; (2) being listed in a souvenir program book; (3) t-shirts, (4) consultations with our fitness trainers, (5) consultations with our nutritionists (6) a customized meal plan. By donating as little as $25 you're not only helping others, but you’re also helping yourself to stay fit and healthy. Sounds like a win-win situation doesn’t it? Even if you don’t need the fitness or nutrition services, you may wish to donate and pass on the perks to one of your family members or friends.The ImpactWe know you’ve all seen the alarming headlines about the childhood obesity epidemic. The CDC reports that 18% of adolescents in America are obese and according to the New England Journal of Medicine children today will not live as long as their parents because of obesity. To me, this is a call to action!The Expo has a proven track record of being able to serve as an effective intervention that can contribute to behavior modification and increased awareness about the importance of proper nutrition and regular physical activity. I hope you will help us continue this work. Visit http://www.bodysculpt.org for more information.Other Ways You Can HelpWe totally get it if you can’t make a donation at this time, but there are other ways in which you can help. You can start by spreading the word! Please tell your friends, co-workers, family, frenemies – anyone you can think of about our campaign. Put it on blast through your social media networks.Don't forget to save this date:  Saturday, June 27, 2015, come and join us in Brooklyn from 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., come out and visit us at the 12th Annual Children's Sports and Fitness Expo at Boys & Girls H.S., 1700 Fulton Street, Brooklyn, N.Y. 11213. With your help and support, we can continue to keep this wonderful event FREE for the community.Thank you for your help, it’s greatly appreciated!

story:
Who We Are: Experts You Can Trust

We are a team of friendly, dedicated doctors spearheading a free and cutting-edge platform to share the wisdom of practitioners from many healing disciplines.  Our core team consists of a traditional medical doctor (Christopher Smith, M.D.), two osteopathic doctors (Maryclaire O'Neill, D.O., and Jonathan Terry, D.O., ABIHM) and a chiropractic physician (Kristin Gulliver, D.C).  Each of us has a deep interest in health and being able to promote education in free, collaborative, and innovative ways.  Each of our founding members is a recognized expert in integrative health by fellowship or board-certification.  


Why Desta?

Our company is called “Desta Health.”  The word "Desta" means "joy" in two languages (Amharic and Tigrinya) that originate from Eastern Africa.  We believe the quest toward optimal health is one best guided by joy.  

Our goal is to empower everyone’s path toward optimal health by providing meaningful information and promoting legitimate integrative health modalities using multimedia content.  


What's On The Site?

We have created a free and easily navigable internet database that delivers reliable information on a variety of health and wellness topics. As physician authors, we review the best literature and practices and make this challenging content accessible for a high school reading level.  

All content on our site is viewable in desktop, mobile, and tablet versions, so viewers can access us at home, in the grocery store, or at their doctor's office. We host video and text resources with high-quality links to outside research and content.  

Desta Health is a new endeavor, with an official launch scheduled for March 2015. We invite you to visit our website.  Please keep in mind, the website is still being constructed, so you will be viewing a nearly finished product.   The official domain name is www.destahealth.com


       


Screenshots of Desta search capability by 'Healing Therapy'  and 'Body System' 


Our High-Definition Videos

Recognizing that people learn in different ways, many of our topics have accompanying high definition videos. And keeping in mind the fast pace of our technology-driven world, the average length of our videos is one to three minutes.


Our "Everything-You-Need-to-Know Monographs"

When shopping for a nutritional product, who has time to comb through the inconsistent and conflicting information on the web? Let our doctors do the research for you.  Our articles range from simple "monographs" offering key information on dosing, side effects, cautions, and conditions to in-depth articles summarizing the best research to date.  Our articles cover non-nutritional topics as well, including breathing exercises for stress reduction, strategies for low back pain, and many other timely topics from the integrative health field. 


We Have Already Amassed 40+ (and counting) Topics

Easily organized by Healing Therapy or by Body System and complete with a powerful and integrated search, readers can find the topic they want fast.  Fast as in check-out-lane fast.   Best yet: all of our written and studio video content is completely free.

Some of our launch day topics include:

  • Turmeric
  • Fish Oil 
  • Echinacea
  • Behavioral Activation Treatment for Depression
  • Cancer Prevention
  • Super Foods
  • Osteopathic Manipulation
  • Chiropractic Techniques
  • Inflammation and Depression
  • Dementia
  • Ginger
  • CoQ10 (Ubiquinone)
  • Probiotics
  • Headaches
  • Low Back Pain
  • ....and many more!


Desta At Home: Personalized Video Consults With Our Leading Experts

Want to put it all together with a personal health consult?  The planned Video Consultation service will put our practitioners' expert advice directly in the hands of our viewers for a reasonable fee.  Our consults will range from personalized education about how to ameliorate chronic disease to how to prevent it.

Just imagine...this will be the most innovative integrative health video service, allowing people to consult with at diverse array of highly-qualified and carefully-screened practitioners: traditional medical doctors (MDs), osteopathic physicians (DOs), chiropractors (DCs), acupuncturists, herbalists, nutritionists, and other integrative health practitioners. Our practitioners are held to the highest standards, are board-certified and/or fellowship trained in their consulting area, understand the medical literature, and share a common perspective on health and wellness.

Video Consultations with Integrative Medicine Practitioners
(Photo credit:  totallyPic.com / Shutterstock Inc.)

An App?  You bet.

For on-the-go readers, it just makes sense to develop a mobile application for iPhone and Android.  Our website is the first step in this direction, as it is reactive and looks beautiful on a mobile device.  We are in the process of starting the development of a dedicated mobile application.

Some features of this app may include:

  • Quick access to our easy-to-read articles and videos.  Imagine being able to have all of Desta's expert resources at your fingertips. 
  • A map of high-quality practitioners tailored to location and search criteria.  
  • Real-time appointment scheduling for our video consultation service.  
  • Among other useful features!

Screenshot of our current web-based mobile interface

Moving Forward

Our company is at work daily on what is quickly becoming a comprehensive database; and we are actively recruiting expert practitioners from a variety of disciplines to add their writing and video narratives, and join our consultation team.  Imagine being able to easily connect with respected experts to guide your journey toward optimal health. 

At Desta, we aim to become the most trusted world-wide resource for reliable, accurate information on optimal health and wellness.  We have begun with four integrative experts from across the United States. Stay tuned: our team is about to become not just the best panel of experts, but also the most accessible consumer health resource to date.  We believe this sort of resource has the ability to change health care in a necessary and profound direction.


Your Donation

We can't build this vision of optimal health without you!  If we want to establish a global database, we need to build this with global support.  

Your donation will help with:

  • Server and Site Efficiency: Desta will be busy, and the site will need to support high volumes of traffic.
  • The Most In-Demand Content: Our authors are combing the best medical and health literature every day, seeking out unbiased, high-quality research as well as expert opinion and clinical insight from thought leaders in integrative health. They are paid a nominal fee for their contributions.

  • Our High Definition Videos:  Take a look at our videos; they are gorgeous on your mobile device or in your home theater.  Having a professional product reflects the high-quality behind our work.  

  • Video Consultation: To bring this innovative service into fruition, our expert consultants will need to cover legal fees, pursue liability and/or malpractice insurance, and programming to support the consultation process.  

  • Mobile Application:  The right app has to be seamless, beautiful, efficient, and fast.  Our standards at Desta will not allow for any less.   

  • Professional Presentations: In order to bring on board the best practitioners, we have to network with them.  Desta's founding authors have scheduled several professional conferences to share news of this site and invite the best and most accomplished experts to be a part of this valuable effort.  

  • Promotion: As a start-up company, we need to actively promote our services through several media outlets. Your donation will also help us pay for ads online, in magazines, and other media.


Closing Thoughts

If you are not in a position to provide a donation, please help spread the word about our company to your friends and family.  We hope to reach everyone who is on the journey to health.

We are excited and humbled for this opportunity to raise money to help cover the start-up costs for our company.  

Your generous gift will help us bring quality integrative medicine knowledge to everyone!  

From all of us at Desta: Thank You!

story:
Pain comes from doing TOO LITTLE or TOO MUCH

Smart phone users Stop the pain!

MuscleCare brings the "smarts" to smart device users. Ease pain caused by our hi tech lifestyle:

Do you?

Sit too much
Move too little
Slouch in front of a computer

If so...here's the result:

Stiffness
Accelerated aging
Joint osteoarthritis
Thumb osteoarthritis 85% over Age 25
Headaches affect 60%
Lower back pain 80%

Pain is on the rise.

Even Younger people are more SORE than ever!

Help MuscleCare relieve this global epidemic.

#takemusclecareglobal


MuscleCare Extra Strength Roll-On

MuscleCare Extra Strength Roll-On is the strongest all natural, scientifically based, topical analgesic, anti-inflammatory, and anti-spasmodic for over the counter sales. Professional TherapyMuscle Care Roll-On combines menthol and camphor for immediate pain relief with magnesium, glucosamine, MSM and chondroitin to relax muscle tension, improve circulation, promote healing and reset the muscle in its normal resting length. The roll-on offers the convenience of applying MuscleCare in those hard to reach areas of the back without using your hands. MuscleCare Roll-On is great for quick application in the workplace or in an athletic arena. The Extra Strength Roll-On is effective in as little as 30 seconds.




Triathlete to Ironman to ultimate fighter ... pain is pain

Shoulder pain and stiffness
Neck pain and stiffness
Elbow pain
Wrist pain
Knee pain and arthritis
Ankle strain, sprain and arthritis
Whiplash
Muscle tension and migraine headache
Bursitis - knee-region focused
Morton's neuroma
Facet Syndrome
Sacroiliac Syndrome
Disc herniation






Our mission is to help people live more productive lives by offering scientifically proven all natural products that provide safe, effective relief to muscle and joint pain, inflammation and spasm.



  1. SCIENTIFICALLY PROVEN - MuscleCare all natural topical outperforms leading national brands by 44% to 1700% in the first ever OTC topical comparative independent double-blind randomized scientific study. These are brands that until now, have monopolized the topical product category for nearly 100 years.
  2. ALL NATURAL - MuscleCare products contain no colouring or dyes and are free from parabens and cancer causing preservatives. Parabens (synthetic estrogen mimickers commonly used as preservatives in creams and lotions) have been found in many types of cancers, are bioaccumulative and are potential endocrine disrupters.
  3. FULLY LICENSED NATURAL PRODUCTION - MuscleCare was developed by Doctor Chris Oswald, with 25 years of clinical real-life experience treating muscle, joint and back pain. MuscleCare is an extension of the care that Dr. Chris has given to over one million adjustments and 10,000 new patients in the last 25 years.
  4. FULLY LICENSED NATURAL PRODUCTION - There are approximately 2500 labs in North America that manufacture natural products, but ironically only about 65 actually have appropriate licenses to do so. MuscleCare uses a premier lab in California that officially has all licenses to ensure a quality product.
  5. SAFE ALTERNATIVE TO PAIN PILLS - Why go through your stomach to target a sore neck or back? Pain medications can have negative side effects on your body including ulcers, heart attack, strokes and even death. MuscleCare is so safe that it has even been given the green light for use in pregnancy related aches and pains.



TESTED AND THOROUGHLY RESEARCHED

An independent randomized, clinically controlled double blind comparison study was conducted with 120 participants and four major national brand pain relievers.

HIGHLIGHTS OF THE STUDY:

  • MuscleCare Roll-On outperformed national brands tested in reduction of pain.
  • MuscleCare Roll-On statistically significantly outperformed the placebo in the same study.
  • With respect to the inter-group comparisons, Professional Therapy MuscleCare Roll-On showed significant increases in pressure threshold compared with Placebo and IcyHot.
  • MuscleCare Roll-On is all natural, safe, fast-acting, and carcinogen-free.
  • MuscleCare Roll-On reduces pain, inflammation and muscle spasm.
  • MuscleCare Roll-On is effective in treating a wide variety of muscle and joint conditions.


Help us end everybody's pain - Support MuscleCare to Aid Pain Relief

Body pain affects the lives of most people, everyday. Supporting our campaign, with whatever means you can whether monetary or just by sharing us, would help us continue to provide a solution for those people in need everyday.

Support us and live a pain-free, active life.
