story:
Short Summary

We are passionate about this project because it reaches persons who are in extreme situations of suffering and need. up! international has partnered with a local Cambodian organisation TPO and is impressed with the impact they are having. We want to ensure that this project which has been running for 3 years can continue! 

With your support we can ensure that:

1) Fewer prisoners suffer from mental illness and psychological problems and those with mental health issues can better manage their illnesses, the symptoms and associated behavioural problems.

2) Prisoners have improved social and relational skills to be able to live harmoniously with other prisoners, communicate to officials, manage anger and violent tendencies, relate better to family and increase empathy and understanding of others.

3) Prisoners have better ability to cope with the effects of incarceration and are better prepared to re-enter society, with greater skills and capabilities and clearer plans for the future.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need USD 6000.- to ensure that the team of two therapists can regularly visit 4 prisons in and around Phnom Penh.

We will:
- establish psycho-social support groups, including group therapy and psycho-education in 4 prisons.

- strengthen relationships and information-sharing with other organisations working in prisons and relevant government agencies and offices.

- Provide mental health services including psychiatric treatment and counselling, medications, and crisis interventions to approximately 50 prisoners in 4 prisons.

If the goal of USD 6000.- isn't reached we will visit just 2 and not 4 prisons. 

up! international supports the local team with expertise, project management oversight and helps evaluate and monitor the progress. 

By supporting this project you are being a hero for showing care and enabling support for a "un-sexy" project. We can't and won't show you pictures of kids looking sad but you can be sure that your money makes a big difference for persons desperately in need of help!

TPO has solid relations with the prison authorities. However the risk is given that access to prisons may be restricted or limited for a period of time. TPO has the necessary permission from prison authorities to work in 4 prisons for 2016  and this is why we want to act now.  

About up! international 
We care for all persons affected by violence - including boys and men!

up! is an NGO focused on exposing and eliminating all forms of violence. We aim to empower individuals and groups who are victims of violence, whilst tackling the many injustices associated with violence. We care, we speak out and we take action.

up! was founded in 2012 in Bern, Switzerland. up! has no religious or political affiliation.We started up as three committed and passionate individuals. Not backed by big money or institutions but with the deep conviction that there is too much violence against boys and men, and not enough people doing something about it.

For more information please visit  www.up-international.org

TPO has solid relations with the prison authorities. However the risk is given that access to prisons may be restricted or limited for a period of time. TPO has the necessary permission from prison authorities to work in 4 prisons for 2016  and this is why we want to act now.  
About up! international We care for all persons affected by violence - including boys and men!

up! is an NGO focused on exposing and eliminating all forms of violence. We aim to empower individuals and groups who are victims of violence, whilst tackling the many injustices associated with violence. We care, we speak out and we take action.
up! was founded in 2012 in Bern, Switzerland. up! has no religious or political affiliation.We started up as three committed and passionate individuals. Not backed by big money or institutions but with the deep conviction that there is too much violence against boys and men, and not enough people doing something about it.
For more information please visit  www.up-international.org

story:
Vorty is the world's first complete solution for using your smartphone to unlock all your home's entrances without using your home's automation hub or Wi-Fi.

If your garage or gate opens electronically, Vorty is for you! Vorty works for all types of door as well! All you need is your smartphone, and the Vorty Intro and Vorty Doors packages.

Vorty Intro is an access controller. It can be easily installed as an external connection for automatic garage or gate controllers.

The Vorty Doors package comes with an electromagnetic lock and all the accessories needed for all your doors. 

Get both and go keyless!


No carrying your keys, remote, no bulky items in your pockets or in your hands anymore.

Vorty has undergone three years of development and rigorous testing to guarantee its fail-safe, secure and easy-to-use electronic locks. 

How does Vorty differ from the others smartlocks?

ANY ENTRANCE. Vorty does not retrofit deadbolts. Vorty uses your existing smartphone as a key for any doorway, garage door or automatic gate. Vorty is a complete solution to all your entrance needs!


ANY PHONE. There are no restrictions on which smartphone brands it works with. It is not restricted to Bluetooth 4.0. Vorty apps are available for Android and iOS devices.

VANDAL-PROOF. In most cases, you can install the system indoors, where it cannot be damaged from the outside.


ONLY LISTENS. Although the system implements Bluetooth, the device is never paired with a phone. It only listens. So it is impossible to get any information from the device.


NO WIFI. The system is not dependent on Wi-Fi or internet coverage.


GO KEYLESS. No carrying your keys, remote, no bulky items in your pockets or in your hands anymore. 

OPENS EVERYTHING. You can upgrade or install a device as a new feature to work with automatic garage doors, automatic gate openers, doors.

TWO OS. Vorty apps are available for Android and iOS.

EASY TO INSTALL. A Vorty controller is an electric trigger. There are only four leads to connect: two of them are for power and the other two act as switches.  

OLD KEYS STILL IN USE. Your existing key, prox card, and keypad can still be used.Vorty Intro are designed to be an additional option.




Vorty Intro is an access controller. It can be easily installed as an external connection for automatic garage or gate controllers or any other electronic lock. The controller has an external Bluetooth antenna to give an increased range up to 15 or 20 meters.


How to install Vorty for automatic garage door or gates

  • Connect the Vorty controller leads to a 12 V supply.

  • The automation for a garage door or gates has an external connection for wall buttons, etc. Find those contacts marked on the automation controller or read the controller manual.



  • Connect the Vorty controller relay terminals to the garage door or gates as control elements.

  • Download the Master (administrator) Key app
  • Download the Key app
  • Launch the Master app and set up a device with the first key
  • Tap the Key app on the phone screen to trigger a garage door or automated gate


Vorty garage door and gates package includes

  • 1 pcs Vorty Intro controller unit for gates / garage (with extended range antenna)

  • 1 pcs manual

We offer a package called Vorty Doors, which comes with an electromagnetic lock and all accessories needed.

Magnetic locks have a number of advantages over conventional locks:

EASY TO INSTALL   Magnetic locks are generally easier to install than other locks since there are no interconnecting parts.

RELIABLE In an electromagnetic lock, there are no moving parts that might break. The expected mean time between failures for an electromagnetic lock is more than 500 000 open and close events.


Vorty Doors Package includes

1 Vorty Intro controller unit for doors (with small range antenna)

1 electromagnetic lock set (electromagnet and plate)

1 power supply ­– Input: AC 100–240V, 50/60Hz; Output: DC 12V, 2A

1 bolts

1 door release button

1 set of brackets for inswing or outswing doors

1 Vorty Doors package manual

We've spent a lot of time making sure the apps are very easy to use with an enjoyable user experience.

The app is very intuitive and there is a lot of help   available by touching a question mark.

It is available on the Google Play market now [Download it HERE]

We use a unique, user friendly way to set up the Bluetooth devices without actual pairing the smartphone and the device. A Vorty Intro never transmits, so it is impossible to get any information out from device.

Setting up the interface requires only a few simple tasks.

Registering a new key takes only a minute.


Vorty Intro controller and app was designed wholly in Riga, Latvia, EU. We have been working with our trusted partner, also in Riga, for OEM production. The slick case is made in Japan by a quality molding factory. The set of electromagnetic locks in a Vorty Doors package comes from Locktronix USA, who manufacture highly reliable EM locks. Vorty Intro have undergone rigorous testing on different applications. The free mobile apps are available for Android and will be available for iOS.

Our engineers have experience of designing hardware and software for brands like Nokia and Paroc, and also another Latvian Kickstarter startup – Airdog which received Best Drone award at the CES 2015. 



Vorty have undergone three years of development and rigorous testing. We've been working really hard on completing all the tasks necessary to get the Vorty Intro ready for launch, including R&D, product design, Android app design, initial testing and compliance. 

We now have a fully functional Vorty  prototypes and unlike previous iterations made in house they have been built by our manufacturing partners. This gives us certainty about the manufacturing process to come.

The final thing we need to do is fund the iOS app design and the mass production run to get units out of the factory. If we receive funding, we also will be able launch the next generations of Vorty.


ONLY INDIEGOGO


RETAIL

Where can I install a Vorty?

A Vorty controller is an electronic trigger, therefore it can trigger electromagnetic locks on doors, doors' electric strikes, automatic garage doors, automatic gates, automatic barriers or any other device that uses an electrical connection to operate.

What is the biggest advantage of the system?

The best experience is when you upgrade all of your entrances, home's doors, also your garage and gates. Then you no longer need to worry about your keys and you just carry your phone. 

What I need to make complete home's keyless system?

To do this you need Vorty Intro package to control your automated gates and garage and Vorty Doors package to control any doors.

Does it need batteries?

No, it does not. It uses a low voltage supply provided by the user.

Which smartphones are compatible with a Vorty?

There no technology limits. It works with Android and iOS devices. It has been fully tested for Android and iOS is in development. Windows phone are planned also for the future.

Can I install a Vorty by myself?

If you know what is meant by “normally open” or “normally closed”, then most probably yes. There are only four leads that have to be connected: two of them are for the low voltage power and the other two are from a relay. There is a detailed installation guide. If you are not certain how to connect with an existing entrance device, please ask an electrician to help you.

Do you use Bluetooth?

We use a Bluetooth signal to identify the user.

Is it Bluetooth 4.0?

No. We do not retrofit deadbolts, therefore we are not forced to limit users only to Bluetooth4.0, which is a low energy system. Our access controller is powered from the mains, so there no problems with the Bluetooth standard and type of OS.

Why Bluetooth instead of NFC?

First, despite the growing availability of NFC on smartphones, all phones have Bluetooth. Second, NFC works only over very short ranges, at most a few centimeters, and cannot be used for applications over any distance. A Vorty controller can be placed conveniently inside a door, making it a perfect vandal-proof solution for all smartphones, which would not be possible with NFC.

How near do I have to be and how far away can I go to unlock my door, gate or garage?

Vorty controller comes in two versions. In the Vorty doors package, we use a low-range antenna, which typically works up to 7 to 8 meters (about 22 ft). A lock installed inside and near to a door works over a range of 0.5 meters (1 ft 7 11⁄16 in) to 5 meters (16 ft) outside the door. Construction materials affect the range.

The Vorty controller for the gates / garage package comes with a better antenna, which increases the distance to 15 or 20 meters (50 or 65 feet) in direct sight.

Is it secure?

The Bluetooth pairing between the lock and the phone is potentially at risk. A Vorty is only a smartphone controlled system, which is always only in listening mode. It does not interfere with your phone and is virtually tamperproof. We use a unique approach to set up devices and issues keys without Bluetooth pairing.

How do you trigger a Vorty? What exactly is a key?

A key is unique BlueTooth signal of your phone. This signal becomes visible for the short time when you tap an app or widget. This triggers device.

How do I know that no one else can use my app key?

The app itself is not unique; it is just a shortcut for accessing your phone’s hardware-based unique Bluetooth signal for a short time. It is impossible to give your virtual key to anybody else without physically giving them your phone.

Can I give keys to my house guests for 1 or 2 days only?

You can give access rights to your guests and then revoke them at the end of their stay.

How much of my phone’s battery charge will it use?

Each time you trigger a Vorty Intro, you turn Bluetooth on just for 5 seconds. This has a tiny influence on your phone’s battery charge.

What if my smartphone battery has no charge?

Since Vorty is designed to be an additional option, in most cases your existing key, proximity card, keypad, etc. can still be used.

How do you set up keys?

To set up a new key, you use an app called Vorty Master, which can be downloaded from Google Play or our web page www.vorty.eu. It is free to use. It has a simple, intuitive wizard style.

What is a master key?

The first registered user is given master key or administrator rights. Only a master can subsequent issue keys.

What if I lose the master phone or it’s broken? How do I reinstall it?

When you set up a new key, at the same time you can also grant master rights to another family member or employee. In the worst case, the hardware has a factory reset function.

Are upgrades included?

Yes, future upgrades of the Vorty Key app and Master app are included.

Is there a limit to how many keys I can have for one lock?

Yes, the maximum is 124

How fast does it react when I tap the widget?

This depends on how fast your phone is and how well Bluetooth operates in your area, but normally it takes about 0.1 to 2 seconds from tapping a key widget to the device being triggered.

To use Vorty, what kind of a lock do my doors need to have?

A door has to have an electromagnetic lock or electric strike first and then you add a Vorty controller as a trigger. Vorty Door package includes electromagnetic lock which makes possible to upgrade any door.

Can you use a Vorty to open garage doors or gates as well?

Yes, it is primarly designed and you can easily adapt automatic garage or motorized gates by adding a Vorty Intro controller as a trigger.

Do you use Wi-Fi?

No, we do not. We use Bluetooth for setup and control. Therefore, the system is not dependent on Wi-Fi coverage.

Does connecting Vorty Intro to the garage door, gates controller disable your existing remotes?

No. You can keep using your original remotes as usual.

How do you differ from the others? What makes you better?

We are quite different.

Our concept requires some wiring to integrate the system. This can be considered as disadvantage.

On the other hand, you get reliable, affordable system that can be used with the vast majority of smartphones, not just the latest ones. Vorty you use for a wide range of applications including garages and gates, Vorty Doors package allow upgrade any doors which is great advantage comparing with deadbolts smart locks. 

You also never need care about battery life, because Vorty uses mains power.

We use Bluetooth in a secure silent mode, which makes our system completely different from others.

Finally, Vorty can make you truly keyless. And there are no restrictions on the type of smartphone or entranceway. 

Does the Perks price include VAT or other taxes?

No, contributors must pay any taxes and duties related to the selected destination country. Tax, customs fees and other applicable customs charges are not included in the price of the Vorty Intro or Vorty Doors packages. Once we get close to the delivery date, we will ask you to confirm your shipping address and we will provide further instructions on handling VAT or any other applicable taxes.

First of all we have not been in a rush. For three years, our product development has looked at countless ideas. We have tested the system and avoided potentially buggy solutions, and tried numerous prototypes. Well, it has been a bit of a hobby and primarily we used Vorty for our own homes and we found ourselves excited how it's works. Now we have a rugged, fully tested version, which we ready to share with you!

There may be a small risk when upgrading your electronic entrance system if you are confused about how it works. Please read the documentation for your existing automation controller and ask an electrician for help if you have any doubts about installing a Vorty Intro or Vorty Doors. We also provide ample documentation on our device. From an installer’s point of view, it is only a trigger, similar to a light switch, and there is always a simple way to integrate it with any other electric device.

At the moment, the campaign has been launched, and the iOS app is still under development. This is a clone of the Android app, therefore we do not consider this to be a difficult task.

On the day we launched the campaign, we already had the first 50 PCB boards, so we can send assembled units to early adopters, our most valuable beta customers, for an unbeatable price right now!

story:
"PICUAL" EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OILS FROM JAEN, SPAIN



HOW HEALTHY IS THE OLIVE OIL YOU BUY?
IS IT AUTHENTIC AND ORIGINAL?
WHICH ONE IS THE BEST?

American consumption of Extra Virgin Olive Oil has been rising steadily for decades, especially since consumers have become informed about the benefits of Mediterranean-inspired diets.

Swapping extra virgin olive oil for butter is widely recognized as a way to make various snacks and meals healthier:                    


 "PICUAL" EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL BENEFITS            

IT REDUCES THE RISK OF DISEASES FROM BREAST CANCER
IT HAS NO CHOLESTEROL AND IT IS HIGH IN MONOUNSATURATED FAT
IT CONTAINS ANTIOXIDANTS
IT IMPROVES THE SMOOTHNESSAND THE ELASTICITY OF THE SKIN
AND SOME OTHERS..

ORIGIN OF OUR "PICUAL" EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OILS 

Our farms are privileged located in the Sierra de Magina, province of Jaen, Spain.  This geographical location and the type of our olives "Picual variety" enjoys a perfect climate conditions suitable for obtaining the highest quality oils and unique organoleptic qualities.



Olivar de Jaen produce today the result of years of intensive labour and acknowledge shared by the enthusiasm of our farmers and doing simply what’s right by compromising a deep commitment to quality, protecting the environment and engaging support for the local and rural economy.



Our farms' production is a portion of the majority of the World's olive oil, being since centuries the first and the most quality olive oil manufacturer worldwide.


HOW DO WE GET THE HIGHEST QUALITY?

  • We grow our "PICUAL" olives naturally avoiding the use of any harm products. 
  • Our Extra Virgin Olive Oils are handcrafted and manufactured following the traditional and most selective mechanical and centenary procedures to ensure the highest quality.



  • In the harvest season, we pick our olives by hand avoiding any mechanical intervention, and within two hours our olives are transported quickly to our "Almazara" (factory) to keep all their healthy benefits.
  • Once in our "Almazara", we use a cold-milled and slow pressing system to extract the oil.
  • Then, we storage it in stainless tanks to preserve it from the light and humidity.
  • Finally we bottle it in our traditional dark glasses or tins to continue keeping all the "extra virgin" attributes and we pack it to be shipped to the United States.



Olivar de Jaen is proud to produce the finest certified 

"PICUAL" Extra Virgin Olive Oils 

being awarded in the most  prestigious international festivals like

New York and Los Angeles in 2014.


They exceed the maximum quality requirements of the United States, containing a

consistence a average acidity between 0-0,2 and delivering a

100% authentic and original product from Spain.

"I'm glad we can get finally the best Extra Virgin Olive Oil of Spain. Olivar de Jaen is importing it and selling it directly from Jaen. Juan Manuel Gomez has given me to try of their olive oil and I'm really impressed with the quality. The "Picual variety olive" is definitely the best." 

Wilfredo Ríos - Casa Monica Restaurant's 2nd Chef


OUR PHILOSOPHY

We are not only bringing to you the best Extra Virgin Olive Oils from Jaen and sell it in our specialized online store based in St. Augustine, FL, we also share our  centenary heritage, we teach to our costumers how to identify the best olive oil,  and we advice how to use it properly to keep the 100% of its healthy benefits.


WE manufacture it in Spain, 

 

WE import it to the U.S.,

WE sell it directly to you!


NO more mixed olives, NO more blended oils from different countries!✔️

"I love the idea of Olivar de Jaen. They only sell the finest extra virgin olive oils. No intermediate agents or companies between Spain and me at all." 

Mike Sullivan - La Concha Restaurant's Chef


OUR REWARDS CHART


WHERE WE ARE NOW

  • We have all our Extra Virgin Olive Oils bottled, certified and ready to import to the United States.
  • We have registered a US-based in Florida company (wholesaler & online store) OLIVAR DE JAEN, LLC with all the certifications required.
  • We have already hundred of clients waiting to buy our olive oils.
  • We are 95% ready to go!


NEXT STEPS TO FULFILLMENT

  • We are setting up our online store website and business management software. Dead line: April'15
  • We are selecting our new warehouse to store the olive oil. Dead line: April'15
  • We are getting ready a spring promotional campaign. Dead line: May'15


THE TEAM BEHIND OLIVAR DE JAEN 

We are a Team very experienced and specialized in the Extra Virgin Olive Oil since decades. Our goals are to be the first company specialized in the finest EVOO's of Spain and to help to improve the health, and to advice how to select the best Extra Virgin Olive Oil to our customers.

Juan Manuel Gomez del Peral (Founder). I'm the sixth generation of olive oil manufacturer and farmer family from the province of Jaen, Spain. I have  15 years of business management experience in different companies in Spain and England, mainly in the olive oil manufacturing, business consultant services and cycling events and coaching areas.

Gustavo Ramos (Partner) is a local well known chef and he has 20 years of business management experience in different companies in the U.S., mainly in the restaurants and logistic areas. Plus, he has a deep U.S. market knowledge and a successful business trayectory.

Victoria Diez (Marketing & Community Manager) has a extense experience in Marketing and Social Media. She is also a professional photographer and she has achieved national and international photography awards.


OUR STORY

First of all, we would like to tell you what "Olivar de Jaen" means: it comes from Jaen's olive tree farms and this name has been chosen to identify exactly where our olive oils come from.

The last year I've decided to fly to Florida being part of a historical project of Spain (El Galeón de Florida) as a volunteer.

Since the first day I've had a charming welcome of all the people I've met all these last months in Florida, and actually I can say I have a great friends, including my actual partner Gustavo Ramos.

Having some interesting conversations with him about gastronomy and the extra virgin olive oil, we started a good friendship relation and I've had the idea to start a business together taking advantage of putting together our skills and knowledge about the industry.

... and after eight months of a deep research and a hard promotional work, we have got the conclusion that the Jaen's Extra Virgin Olive Oil (Picual olive variety) is very difficult to find in the U.S., and the quality of the few ones I've found , is very low comparing to our oil.

We have been working very hard since the first day and we are very excited and happy to share this project with you. Our enthusiasm, the results of our research and the successful future customers' feedback after giving them to try our oils, were reasons enough to go ahead. 


RISKS

We feel very comfortable about our timeline. We’ve already finalized all major start up steps (95%) and we have all the product ready to ship from Spain to our warehouse in St. Augustine.


WHY INDIEGOGO

We have very good references of Indiegogo with other campaigns and how they could get their targets. 

Absolutely amazing. Connecting to new customers, fans and friends. This is a very good oportunity for us to meet in advance our future customers and start a loyal relation. 


HOW MUCH WE NEED TO LAUNCH OLIVAR DE JAEN?

We need $ 38.000 to start up and here you can see the areas where the money will be designated:

  • We will buy the first stock of the finest brands of Jaen's Extra Virgin Olive Oil internationally awarded (Soler Romero, Oro de Canavas, Alba Urgavo, Melgarejo, Oleocampo Supremo, Trujal de Magina, etc).
  • We will open our Head Quarters in St. Augustine, FL renting the warehouse and adapting to our operations.
  • We will buy a local delivery van.
  • We will launch a special Spring promotional campaign which will include: tasting events in the best restaurants of the area, farmer markets stands and our online store promotion.

THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT!
We are very appreciate for your financial support and we are wishing you try the finest and the most exclusive olive oils from Jaen.
Anyway, if you can't support us financially, 
we appreciate also your help letting your friends to know about us :)
story_txt:
"PICUAL" EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OILS FROM JAEN, SPAIN





HOW HEALTHY IS THE OLIVE OIL YOU BUY?
IS IT AUTHENTIC AND ORIGINAL?
WHICH ONE IS THE BEST?

American consumption of Extra Virgin Olive Oil has been rising steadily for decades, especially since consumers have become informed about the benefits of Mediterranean-inspired diets.
Swapping extra virgin olive oil for butter is widely recognized as a way to make various snacks and meals healthier:                    

 "PICUAL" EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL BENEFITS            

IT REDUCES THE RISK OF DISEASES FROM BREAST CANCER

IT HAS NO CHOLESTEROL AND IT IS HIGH IN MONOUNSATURATED FAT

IT CONTAINS ANTIOXIDANTS

IT IMPROVES THE SMOOTHNESSAND THE ELASTICITY OF THE SKIN
AND SOME OTHERS..
ORIGIN OF OUR "PICUAL" EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OILS 

Our farms are privileged located in the Sierra de Magina, province of Jaen, Spain.  This geographical location and the type of our olives "Picual variety" enjoys a perfect climate conditions suitable for obtaining the highest quality oils and unique organoleptic qualities.







Olivar de Jaen produce today the result of years of intensive labour and acknowledge shared by the enthusiasm of our farmers and doing simply what’s right by compromising a deep commitment to quality, protecting the environment and engaging support for the local and rural economy.





Our farms' production is a portion of the majority of the World's olive oil, being since centuries the first and the most quality olive oil manufacturer worldwide.



HOW DO WE GET THE HIGHEST QUALITY?


We grow our "PICUAL" olives naturally avoiding the use of any harm products. 

Our Extra Virgin Olive Oils are handcrafted and manufactured following the traditional and most selective mechanical and centenary procedures to ensure the highest quality.









In the harvest season, we pick our olives by hand avoiding any mechanical intervention, and within two hours our olives are transported quickly to our "Almazara" (factory) to keep all their healthy benefits.

Once in our "Almazara", we use a cold-milled and slow pressing system to extract the oil.


Then, we storage it in stainless tanks to preserve it from the light and humidity.


Finally we bottle it in our traditional dark glasses or tins to continue keeping all the "extra virgin" attributes and we pack it to be shipped to the United States.







Olivar de Jaen is proud to produce the finest certified 
"PICUAL" Extra Virgin Olive Oils 
being awarded in the most  prestigious international festivals like
New York and Los Angeles in 2014.




They exceed the maximum quality requirements of the United States, containing a
consistence a average acidity between 0-0,2 and delivering a
100% authentic and original product from Spain.

"I love the idea of Olivar de Jaen. They only sell the finest extra virgin olive oils. No intermediate agents or companies between Spain and me at all." 
Mike Sullivan - La Concha Restaurant's Chef

story:
My name is Doug Draper.  I am a medically retired veteran from the US Air Force.  I turned to teaching high school and teach Air Force Junior ROTC.  I felt I still could give to the students, and to my community even if I wasn't able to continue serving on active duty in the Air Force.

I decided that I needed to focus on getting healthy.  I wasn't able to be active for about 2.5 years, after 4 surgeries to fix my arms.  I was not in a good state physically.  I started to run and do races, which is great rehabilitation.  My brother-in-law built me a competitive road bike, I trained hard and entered some biking races.  The spark was lit, I found it was a great way to get back into a healthy routine.  I decided to train and race at the National Duathlon Championship in St. Paul Minnesota.  If I qualified at this race it would allow me to compete at the World Championships.  I worked and trained hard and qualified.  It was a huge goal reached!  I made TEAM USA!  To attend the World Championship race would be a huge capstone to something I have worked hard to acheive.

The funds are for help with airfare, accommodations and fees.  

Thank you for reading a little about me, the event and goal I'm trying to complete.  

Doug

story:
I am Dr Metin Yavuz of the University of North Texas Health Science Center (UNTHSC) at Fort Worth. I am a professor within the Physical Therapy program. I have a Doctor of Engineering degree in Biomedical Engineering. I have been conducting research in rehabilitation sciences since 2005 with a focus in preventive medical devices.

One of our research priorities is to prevent pressure ulcers in permanently seated individuals. Every year 1-3 million people develop a pressure ulcer in the United States. 

https://familydoctor.org/condition/pressure-sor...

These wounds are not only costly but also painful and quiet difficult to treat. Here are some images of these wounds (viewer discretion is advised).

Since prevention is the best care, we have been working on more effective preventive devices. Standard preventive care is to accommodate wheelchairs with thick seat cushions that reduces peak pressures on the buttocks. However, these cushions also result in higher temperatures since they trap the body heat between the skin and cushion. An analogy is how we can keep our coffee hot in Styrofoam cups. Wheelchair cushions act as heat insulators and increase the temperature of the tissue. High temperatures lead to high metabolic rates which increase the demand of the tissue for Oxygen and nutrients. However, the tissue is also under mechanical pressure while sitting, which limits or stops blood circulation at the high pressure sites. Since the cells' need for Oxygen and nutrients cannot be met under these circumstances, cells start dying and the outcome is a pressure ulcer.

A number of animal studies and patient studies demonstrated the damaging effect of high temperatures in wound formation. There are also some other studies that indicate that if we can keep the tissue at lower temperatures we can preserve it against breaking down.

That is why we decided to tackle the challenge of developing a cooling wheelchair cushion. We obtained two small grants for this purpose about 7 months ago.

Using these funds, we have developed two partially functional prototypes; a cushion for a manual wheelchair and motorized wheelchair. So far, we have accomplished our two success criteria;

  • Maintain tissue temperature at 28 C (82 F) or below
  • Reduce peak pressure values to 100mmHg or below

Both of these measures have been shown to be effective in preventing ulcers.

Unfortunately, we have used all the funds allocated for this project and had to stop all activities. There are still many things that we need to accomplish before the product can be offered to patients such as;

  • improving efficiency of power consumption
  • integration of thermostats
  • improvement in pressure reduction
  • demonstrating that cooling does not impair blood circulation
  • conducting a safety trial

We would like to conduct a clinical trial with the technology in order to provide evidence that the product is effective in preventing ulcers. This is crucial since Medicare and/or insurance companies will require this information before they start covering the expense.

The cost associated with adding the technology to a standard wheelchair should only be a few hundred dollars so even if insurance companies do not cover the expense many individuals should be able to afford the product.

I should also mention that UNTHSC is a non-profit organization and there is currently no private company involved in this research. All the funds raised with this campaign will be utilized at UNTHSC towards further developing the technology and testing it.

More information about the project can be found here;

https://www.unthsc.edu/newsroom/story/wheelchai...

story:
Introducing Agkura™ Personal Score:

Blood test to monitor breast health

A revolutionary approach for your peace of mind

 

MAKING THINGS EASIER

What is the Agkura™ Personal Score?

OncoTAb’s cutting edge, patented technology was discovered by a leading breast cancer scientist and Mayo Clinic alumna. Agkura™ technology specifically detects a tumor protein that is overexpressed in more than 90% of breast cancer patients.

 

 

OncoTAb’s Agkura™ Personal Score is a revolutionary supplement to the standard mammogram. We all know or have heard of women whose mammograms have missed a cancerous tumor, sometimes too late.  The Agkura™ Personal Score provides peace of mind to women by offering a much-needed early warning system that supplements the standard mammogram.

This simple, non-invasive blood test is especially important for women with high-risk factors, including those with dense breast tissue, providing early warning signs when malignant cells in the breast start growing. 

 

 

How the Agkura™ Personal Score

Benefits Women

Mammography misses 50% of cancers in women with dense breast tissue often resulting in late stage diagnosis and mortality.

But, the Agkura™ Personal Score provides targeted, personalized information about a specific protein in your blood, giving you and your doctor crucial information about the state of your breast health. If your Personal Score is increasing, this triggers the need for additional imaging – perhaps an Ultrasound or an MRI – to allow for earlier diagnosis of breast cancer. Including this test in annual preventive care routines can result in diagnosing breast cancer years earlier. A detailed review of this test can be found in Genes & Cancer, May 21, 2017.

 

For Those Impacted by Hard-To-Treat

Triple Negative Breast Cancer

According to BreastCancer.org, “About 10-20% of breast cancers — more than 1 out of every 10 — are found to be triple-negative. For doctors and researchers, there is intense interest in finding new medications that can treat this kind of breast cancer.” For women who need to monitor for this cancer sub-type, there is the Agkura™ Personal Score, which can be used to screen for all breast cancer sub-types, including triple negative breast cancer.

The Agkura™ Personal Score sample collection kit can automatically be sent to you once or twice a year based on your risk, right on schedule, to make it convenient and easy to keep up to date on the status of your breast health. It’s as easy as 1-2-3. Sign up is available on our site www.OncoTAb.com.

 

 

Dr. Pinku Mukherjee

Mayo Clinic alumna Dr. Pinku Mukherjee, pictured above, co-founded OncoTAb, Inc. to improve the quality of cancer care by addressing unmet diagnostic and treatment needs. She has been awarded the prestigious O. Max Gardner Award for her revolutionary discovery of an antigen that can detect when malignant cells in the body start growing – and it is her dream that people everywhere are routinely given this test. She has been involved in cancer research, starting at the Mayo Clinic, since 1998 and is now an Irwin Belk Distinguished Professor of Cancer Research at the University of North Carolina in Charlotte.

 

 

Rahul Puri, Ph.D.

Rahul Puri, Ph.D., co-founder of OncoTAb, shares the type of scenario that we all want to eliminate. In 2015, Dr. Puri picked up a newspaper and saw the picture of a woman holding up her mammography report. The look in her eyes haunted him, the look of someone who had been cheated. It ends up that this woman was at high risk for breast cancer, yet her past five mammograms were all deemed normal. So, she was shocked when her gynecologist discovered a lump that was already the size of a tennis ball. 

 

This is your chance to help make a difference for all of humanity. Because breast cancer affects us all.

According to the American Cancer Society, there will be more than 1.6 million new cancer cases diagnosed in the United States annually. Each of us has lost someone precious due to breast cancer. So, it’s crucial to further cancer research and to bring Agkura™ Personal Score to the attention of doctors and women everywhere.

OncoTAb has received awards from the National Cancer Institute to initiate development of treatments for triple negative breast cancer and pancreatic cancer. The OncoTAb team believes that their technology may also lead to a test for early-stage pancreatic cancer and plan to devote research to this in the future.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign on social media (link to page)

Like and share our Facebook page

Follow up on Twitter.

 

FAQs

1. What is Agkura™ Personal Score?

The Agkura™ Personal Score is a simple blood test that measures the levels of tumor-associated MUC1, a protein that increases with cancer progression.

 

2. How does the Agkura™ Personal Score aid in diagnosing breast cancer?

The Agkura™ Personal Score can be used to monitor the levels of the tumor-associated MUC1 protein (or tMUC1) in each individual. A personal baseline value or score will be established for each person allowing us to detect changes from this baseline over time. A score above the normal range or a significant departure from your baseline value would trigger a recommendation for additional diagnostic imaging like ultrasounds and MRI. If you have dense breast tissue which can obscure breast cancer detection with mammography, using the Agkura™ Personal Score as a supplemental test gives you an additional independent measure to monitor your breast health.  In a blinded study, the Agkura™ Personal Score triggered the need for an ultrasound up to two years before diagnosis by mammography. Given the risks associated with high breast tissue density, we recommend that women with the dense tissue risk factor monitor their Agkura™ Personal Score every 6 to 12 months.

 

3. Are there any guidelines for the blood draw for this test?

A small amount of blood, ~ 3 mL, is needed to perform this non-invasive test. Consume normal levels of water prior to the blood draw.

 

4. Where can I go to receive this test and how much will it cost?

The Agkura™ Personal Score is performed in OncoTAb’s CLIA registered laboratory and has a retail cost of $199 per test, which includes all shipping and handling of sample collection kit to the customer and back to OncoTAb.  You can order the test through our website. A completed requisition form signed by you and your physician is required to perform the test.  Get your blood drawn at your physician’s office or a local laboratory (you may be charged a separate fee). More details on the process of getting your test can be found by clicking on the “ORDER NOW” button on our website.

 

5. Does this test need to be done in conjunction with a mammogram or can it be performed independently of other diagnostic tests?

Your Agkura™ Personal Score can be performed independently of other diagnostic tests. However, we do recommend that you continue using the breast cancer screening tests that are deemed appropriate for you by your physician.

 

6. Can the Agkura™ Personal Score screen for triple negative breast cancer?

The Agkura™ Personal Score can be used to screen for all breast cancer sub-types including triple negative breast cancer.

 

7. Can the Agkura™ Personal Score be used to monitor for breast cancer recurrence?

Our studies have been focused on women at the first time diagnosis of breast cancer. Our data has shown that the Agkura™ Personal Score increases with each stage at diagnosis or the extent of disease progression. Given these results, we believe this test would be useful to monitor for recurrence in conjunction with current clinical practices. The best course of action is to talk to your physician to determine if this test should be part of your recurrence-monitoring plan. We will gladly speak to your physician and answer any questions he or she may have.

 

8. Do I need to complete a requisition form each time I test?

No. A completed requisition form signed by both you and your physician is required the first time you order the Agkura™ Personal Score blood test.  This form allows for ongoing monitoring.

 

9. Is the test covered by insurance?

Currently the Agkura™ Personal Score is not covered by insurance. Our goal is to have it included in private insurance coverage as soon as possible.

 

10. How will I get my results?

You can access your results by logging in to the Patient Portal that can be accessed from the navigation bar of our website. Your results will be posted within 7 business days of receiving your sample at the OncoTAb laboratory. Your test report will also be faxed to the ordering physician’s office.

 

Media Coverage

News of our revolutionary test has been appearing in news publications, such as these:

  • National Public Radio (NPR)

  • Charlotte Observer

  • Carolina Impact

  • UNC TV

Journalists, Bloggers, Media: Contact Us!

We would love the opportunity to talk about Agkura™ Personal Score and what it can do for early diagnosis of breast cancer – and of our ongoing, groundbreaking cancer research. Please contact us at https://www.oncotab.com/contact/

Learn More At

Use these social media links, along with Facebook like code, linking and embedding code:

  • https://www.facebook.com/oncotab/

  • https://twitter.com/OncoTAb

Benefits Women
Mammography misses 50% of cancers in women with dense breast tissue often resulting in late stage diagnosis and mortality.
But, the Agkura™ Personal Score provides targeted, personalized information about a specific protein in your blood, giving you and your doctor crucial information about the state of your breast health. If your Personal Score is increasing, this triggers the need for additional imaging – perhaps an Ultrasound or an MRI – to allow for earlier diagnosis of breast cancer. Including this test in annual preventive care routines can result in diagnosing breast cancer years earlier. A detailed review of this test can be found in Genes & Cancer, May 21, 2017.
 
For Those Impacted by Hard-To-Treat
Triple Negative Breast Cancer
According to BreastCancer.org, “About 10-20% of breast cancers — more than 1 out of every 10 — are found to be triple-negative. For doctors and researchers, there is intense interest in finding new medications that can treat this kind of breast cancer.” For women who need to monitor for this cancer sub-type, there is the Agkura™ Personal Score, which can be used to screen for all breast cancer sub-types, including triple negative breast cancer.
The Agkura™ Personal Score sample collection kit can automatically be sent to you once or twice a year based on your risk, right on schedule, to make it convenient and easy to keep up to date on the status of your breast health. It’s as easy as 1-2-3. Sign up is available on our site www.OncoTAb.com.
 


 
Dr. Pinku Mukherjee
Mayo Clinic alumna Dr. Pinku Mukherjee, pictured above, co-founded OncoTAb, Inc. to improve the quality of cancer care by addressing unmet diagnostic and treatment needs. She has been awarded the prestigious O. Max Gardner Award for her revolutionary discovery of an antigen that can detect when malignant cells in the body start growing – and it is her dream that people everywhere are routinely given this test. She has been involved in cancer research, starting at the Mayo Clinic, since 1998 and is now an Irwin Belk Distinguished Professor of Cancer Research at the University of North Carolina in Charlotte.
 

 
Rahul Puri, Ph.D.
Rahul Puri, Ph.D., co-founder of OncoTAb, shares the type of scenario that we all want to eliminate. In 2015, Dr. Puri picked up a newspaper and saw the picture of a woman holding up her mammography report. The look in her eyes haunted him, the look of someone who had been cheated. It ends up that this woman was at high risk for breast cancer, yet her past five mammograms were all deemed normal. So, she was shocked when her gynecologist discovered a lump that was already the size of a tennis ball. 
 
This is your chance to help make a difference for all of humanity. Because breast cancer affects us all.
According to the American Cancer Society, there will be more than 1.6 million new cancer cases diagnosed in the United States annually. Each of us has lost someone precious due to breast cancer. So, it’s crucial to further cancer research and to bring Agkura™ Personal Score to the attention of doctors and women everywhere.
OncoTAb has received awards from the National Cancer Institute to initiate development of treatments for triple negative breast cancer and pancreatic cancer. The OncoTAb team believes that their technology may also lead to a test for early-stage pancreatic cancer and plan to devote research to this in the future.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Please share this campaign on social media (link to page)
Like and share our Facebook page
Follow up on Twitter.

 
FAQs
1. What is Agkura™ Personal Score?
The Agkura™ Personal Score is a simple blood test that measures the levels of tumor-associated MUC1, a protein that increases with cancer progression.
 
2. How does the Agkura™ Personal Score aid in diagnosing breast cancer?
The Agkura™ Personal Score can be used to monitor the levels of the tumor-associated MUC1 protein (or tMUC1) in each individual. A personal baseline value or score will be established for each person allowing us to detect changes from this baseline over time. A score above the normal range or a significant departure from your baseline value would trigger a recommendation for additional diagnostic imaging like ultrasounds and MRI. If you have dense breast tissue which can obscure breast cancer detection with mammography, using the Agkura™ Personal Score as a supplemental test gives you an additional independent measure to monitor your breast health.  In a blinded study, the Agkura™ Personal Score triggered the need for an ultrasound up to two years before diagnosis by mammography. Given the risks associated with high breast tissue density, we recommend that women with the dense tissue risk factor monitor their Agkura™ Personal Score every 6 to 12 months.
 
3. Are there any guidelines for the blood draw for this test?
A small amount of blood, ~ 3 mL, is needed to perform this non-invasive test. Consume normal levels of water prior to the blood draw.
 
4. Where can I go to receive this test and how much will it cost?
The Agkura™ Personal Score is performed in OncoTAb’s CLIA registered laboratory and has a retail cost of $199 per test, which includes all shipping and handling of sample collection kit to the customer and back to OncoTAb.  You can order the test through our website. A completed requisition form signed by you and your physician is required to perform the test.  Get your blood drawn at your physician’s office or a local laboratory (you may be charged a separate fee). More details on the process of getting your test can be found by clicking on the “ORDER NOW” button on our website.
 
5. Does this test need to be done in conjunction with a mammogram or can it be performed independently of other diagnostic tests?
Your Agkura™ Personal Score can be performed independently of other diagnostic tests. However, we do recommend that you continue using the breast cancer screening tests that are deemed appropriate for you by your physician.
 
6. Can the Agkura™ Personal Score screen for triple negative breast cancer?
The Agkura™ Personal Score can be used to screen for all breast cancer sub-types including triple negative breast cancer.
 
7. Can the Agkura™ Personal Score be used to monitor for breast cancer recurrence?
Our studies have been focused on women at the first time diagnosis of breast cancer. Our data has shown that the Agkura™ Personal Score increases with each stage at diagnosis or the extent of disease progression. Given these results, we believe this test would be useful to monitor for recurrence in conjunction with current clinical practices. The best course of action is to talk to your physician to determine if this test should be part of your recurrence-monitoring plan. We will gladly speak to your physician and answer any questions he or she may have.
 
8. Do I need to complete a requisition form each time I test?
No. A completed requisition form signed by both you and your physician is required the first time you order the Agkura™ Personal Score blood test.  This form allows for ongoing monitoring.
 
9. Is the test covered by insurance?
Currently the Agkura™ Personal Score is not covered by insurance. Our goal is to have it included in private insurance coverage as soon as possible.
 
10. How will I get my results?
You can access your results by logging in to the Patient Portal that can be accessed from the navigation bar of our website. Your results will be posted within 7 business days of receiving your sample at the OncoTAb laboratory. Your test report will also be faxed to the ordering physician’s office.
 

Media Coverage
News of our revolutionary test has been appearing in news publications, such as these:

National Public Radio (NPR)
Charlotte Observer
Carolina Impact
UNC TV


Journalists, Bloggers, Media: Contact Us!
We would love the opportunity to talk about Agkura™ Personal Score and what it can do for early diagnosis of breast cancer – and of our ongoing, groundbreaking cancer research. Please contact us at https://www.oncotab.com/contact/

Learn More At
Use these social media links, along with Facebook like code, linking and embedding code:

https://www.facebook.com/oncotab/
https://twitter.com/OncoTAb

story:
Summary

Noah Johnson and Kit Nowlin are friends, business partners, and Type 1 Diabetics. Both spent years in retail and product industries looking to bring innovative solutions to customer experience and goods. After living with diabetes for years, we wanted to create products that make living a full life with diabetes easier.  While medical device technology and insulin delivery systems help make dosing easier. Transport of extra insulin vials hasn't really changed at all. Almost every diabetic has broken or overheated a valuable vial of insulin in their life, or felt out of place while carrying coolers and freezer packs while constantly looking for sources of refrigeration. Insusafe is a stainless steel, vacuum insulated container that protects insulin from breakage while controlling insulin temperature.

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for $50,000 to fund scale production, logistics, consumer certification and marketing efforts to bring the Patent Pending Insusafe to the online market and drug and store chains worldwide.

  • Backers will receive updates on new products, testing, improvements and logistics. While we want this business to grow, even getting a small number of these products on the market will be a success. Our prototypes have been well received by testing groups
  • Backers will also receive sample(s) of Insusafe to use or share with friends and family who can use them.

THE IMPACT

You will be a part of helping kids and adults dealing with the struggle of diabetes with a solution that protects their investment and reduces the risk of losing insulin.

We will bring awareness to the cost of insulin that is on the rise and actively campaign for solutions (with partnerships) that will reduce the effective cost of insulin per vial

We will develop a donation program for the products both in the US and abroad.

The team will expand product offerings to support cooling for other medications and devises, such as insulin pens, and commercial transport. 

Product Details

We discovered the solution that ultimately created Insusafe by looking at the effectiveness of vacuum sealed stainless steel technology.  Keeping insulin within temperature range is more important than keeping insulin "cold".  Our product has several advantages to other methods of storing and transporting insulin

  • Compact, pocket-sized design
  • Sleek, durable, food grade stainless steel casing
  • The smallest stainless steel vacuum sealed product that will still provide significant temperature control
  • No freezer packs or coolers needed
  • Foam insert to minimize breakage

Risks & Challenges

All new product companies have risk.  We know that we have the best in the field manufacturing and materials in a certified factory with proven logistics partners that service major product companies everyday.

  • Our team has deep experience in manufacturing, sourcing, and  supply chain for major retail and consumer packaged goods
  • Patent Pending product. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, but you are a part of a charitable organization, run a personal diabetic website, blog or social media site, we would love to have your help in getting the word out to diabetics around the world.

story:
We invite you to experience the power of energy work through our new e-learning platform and app. Learn to tap into your own inner wisdom, and transform all aspects of your life. We hope that here at Energy Therapy we can play a part in inspiring you to be the very best that you can be!

 

The world around us seems to be spiralling into chaos and dysfunction. We're hoping to make a difference by helping people on a very personal level.  

By having access to expert guidance, anytime, anywhere, it can help bring about a radical shift in our thinking and consciousness.  You will learn how to shift your frequency -- fast!

We started off from very humble beginnings, working out of one tiny room in Jaime’s London apartment to the massive online presence of 2 Million followers that we have today.

Our work is rooted in direct experience, helping others one to one and in groups, both in person and online. We've walked the path of fire too, using these powerful wisdom teachings to navigate major crises in our own lives. Our client and student testimonials below speak for themselves - we simply want to impact people on a larger scale now - and we need your help to do this!

The main hurdle of finding a quality technology company to create the e-platform and app, along with a film and editing crew that are experts in the their respective fields and worth the high price has already been overcome.  Developing the technology and the content will demand huge amounts of time, money and energy!

The tech company and film crew both understand that if we don't hit our goal, we'll have to make changes in the way we create this - however, we're fully committed to this project - and to you. There's no going back now!

We absolutely know in our hearts that this information needs to be out there - so many people have asked us how they can learn what we know, especially when they can't come to learn in person with us.

We really need YOU to make it really shine and to help us make the impact it deserves, and we're hugely grateful for your wonderful support!

Our new e-learning platform and app will enable you to have access to timeless, powerful teachings anywhere in the world!  Blending Energy Medicine with yoga, meditation/mindfulness, chakra work, breathwork, energy psychology, sound healing and more.  The dynamic interplay of these approaches to living an integrated life will create powerful changes in your mind and body, because your spirit will be involved all the way through.

We're excited to say we've already completed the first stage of building the e-learning platform from our own efforts and from our own pockets. 

Now we really need your support to make our vision a living, breathing reality! :)

As well as delivering the highest quality film and audio production in terms of content -- shooting the footage, editing, sound production etc - and getting it to you in good time. We need to invest substantially more to make the e-platform even more robust, and a breeze to use.  This includes building flexible layouts and search functionality in, tagging of keywords, saving content, sending out reminders, and so much more.

We also need to start building the mobile app to make these teachings even more accessible to everyone, everywhere.

Once this has been accomplished we are also looking to partner with an additional  tech company to measure the dynamic healing frequencies of the body-mind continuum, plus recording & charting heart and brain waves before and after doing each technique and process on the platform and app, so you can chart your own energy healing journey, and see just how far you’ve come.

So far, we've already put tens of thousands of dollars out of our own pocket into building the e-learning website/e-platform, so we're looking for a timely and much needed boost to help us go on further and finish what we've started... and maybe take us into uncharted territory - for the benefit of all!

Jaime and Jennifer Tanna are the founders of Energy Therapy, which began in 2005 not long after Jaime's father had a life threatening illness and fell into a coma. 

As his father struggled to recover using standard medical care, Jaime desperately sought out alternative ways that could make a difference, and Energy Therapy was born!

Jennifer’s connection to energy healing and spirituality began early on in life, with influences from many teachings, including the Baha’i Faith. Holistic approaches to health were a way of life since she was a young child, and she has continued to develop her knowledge and awareness of the mind-body-spirit continuum throughout her professional career and personal life.

Both Jaime and Jennifer love helping others awaken to their true healing potential, and live vibrant, meaningful lives by following the path of higher intuition, creativity and joy. Together this dynamic duo bring a diverse array of energy-based wisdom and skills to the healing table, serving clients and students in many different countries worldwide.

Jaime was first guided onto the path of Raja Yoga by his maternal grandmother from a young age, and his early life experiences showed him how body and mind were unquestionably and intricately linked – beyond the outer form was an extraordinary presence that could heal both.

By having the courage to leave his salaried job in his late twenties and pursue energy healing as his vocation, he was able to experience and verify, first-hand, the powerful effects of this healing, both distant and ‘hands-on’, and witness remarkable improvements in his own health and his father’s – additionally, his father as a pharmacist and ‘man of science’ did not believe in energy healing at all, so this helped him understand that belief is not a requirement!

Both Jaime and Jennifer teach from a wellspring of deep knowledge and wisdom, linking the ancient teachings of yoga with energy medicine and deep intuitive insight. Together, they are dedicated to spreading the message of how meditation/mindfulness, energy medicine, yoga, remote healing combine to help transform consciousness, and deeply heal the body, mind and spirit.

We invite you to experience the power of energy work through our new e-learning platform and app in order to tap into your own inner wisdom, and we hope that here at Energy Therapy we can play a part in inspiring you to be the very best that you can be!

These powerful testimonials show you why we are qualified to teach you all you need to know about the power of Energy Medicine to heal, transform and bless your life!

"My journey has certainly been an incredible one with Energy Therapy! Jaime and Jennifer make a super team, with their combined expertise. I have achieved amazing growth on all levels - mentally, emotionally, spiritually and, of course, physically! Can't wait to learn more!" Helena, Cyprus

"I loved working with you Jaime! Just want to report that when I measured my brain waves after every meditation I do, I got 94% congruency. The highest i have ever gotten was 72%! I feel like everything I have been working on with effort just started to flow." Elle, USA

"I was highly sceptical of the healing session with Jaime as I’m 8000 miles away in Singapore and was wondering how effective could a remote healing be? I had nothing to lose and decided to give it a shot. I was proven so completely wrong!! I’ve started having a craving for salad and ‘healthy foods’, which is quite unlike me and I’ve slept like a log the first 2 nights. I feel more emotionally balanced and my cough is a lot better already. My back pain has lessened a lot too. I went for a massage today (5 days later) & that didn’t leave me screeching in pain. My masseuse who massaged me a week back told me that my shoulders were not tight or blocked anymore." S Kaur, Singapore

"I had an Indian Head Massage from Jennifer about 3 years ago when I lived near her in London, and it was amazing. In three years since moving away from Dulwich to Putney I hadn't had a better massage, so I recently contacted Jennifer to book in another appointment. The Indian Head Massage was again incredible and really helped release the tension I had been feeling in my neck, shoulders and the back of my head. I can recommend Jennifer as the best masseuse and energy worker I've ever been to and also as a great person! Jennifer gave me some good tips on how to help prevent the tension build up in the first place. First class service!" Daniel, London, England 

"Thank you for the online session Jaime. I've experienced amazing and significant shifts in my energy in the past 36 hours." Susan, Wilmot, USA

"I recently had my second remote healing session with Jaime and had a tremendous experience. I had suffered night and day for 11 months from painful plantar fasciitis in both feet. I'm a massage therapist with a network of extraordinary colleagues, energy workers, and acupuncturists and no one had been able to help me. Jaime was extremely professional and friendly which immediately put me at ease. He is both grounded and intuitive n his approach. In short, my pain was 90% relieved that same day. It was truly astonishing. A week later it's about 99% gone with only occasional stiffness. In fact, my whole physical structure is being reorganized around this miraculous experience. Thank you Jaime!" Lisa, New York, USA

"I decided to try an energy healing session with Jennifer as I was feeling completely depleted, and pretty stressed. I felt Jennifer was extremely intuitive in her assessment of areas that I could improve, and the psychological exercises she suggested to me were extremely useful, and did indeed bring about positive results. I had been slightly sceptical about Reiki, but the healing session was effective, and I felt more relaxed and definitely energised after the session. So much so, that I had 2 further sessions with similar positive results. I would highly recommend Jennifer and Energy Therapy!" Martin, MD, Bournemouth, England

"Last year (2017) I was told I was in early menopause. I’d been struggling for over a year with hot sweats, migraines and out of control hormones. I just didn’t feel myself and the HRT therapies didn’t seem to help. So, I made a connection with Jaime because I needed to try something completely different. I’ll be honest, I was a little reticent to believe in the effectiveness of remote healing, but I am so pleased I opened my mind enough to try. The results were astonishing! In ONE session Jaime turned my early menopause quite literally on its head. After months of symptoms, everything suddenly settled. My cycles have never been so regular and I feel so much better balanced. It completely baffled my GP... " Jo, England

"Thank you for the remote healing session. My neck pain has disappeared and the pain in my feet has reduced significantly. I wasn't sure what I was expecting to happen but I was, and still am, really amazed that a lot of physical pain has disappeared" Uma, England 

"I just wanted to write to you to let you know of our good news. I am 6 months pregnant with a little girl on the way! Last year was a real struggle in terms of fertility. My husband and I made an appointment at the IVF clinic to get all the information once and for all so as to make an informed and final decision. And bang, the evening before that first IVF appointment we found out we were naturally pregnant after the healing sessions with you... What a wonderful, miraculous turn of events!  Your input, guidance and your amazing remote healing sessions have all truly contributed to a beautiful outcome for me and I wanted to pass on my sincere thanks for the wonderful work you do in making this world a better place!" Nicole, Lagos, Nigeria

"I went to Jennifer for a couple of energy healing sessions and I found her to be very warm, kind and compassionate. She explained everything with such amazing clarity which helped me progress in my healing journey. And she empowered me to seek clarity and answers within myself. I felt so much more grounded and emotionally balanced just after the first session. I would be very happy to recommend Jennifer to anyone seeking healing and balance." Anney, London, England

"Having had a persistent rash on my lower legs for 6 years which conventional medicine, reiki, acupuncture, homeopathy, reflexology, medical herbalism etc didn't shift, I booked a remote healing session with Jaime. To my delight and amazement the rash started fading immediately and now, 16 weeks later, it has gone. His charming professionalism inspired immediate confidence, but it is the success of the treatment which speaks for itself." Susan Lyall, London, England

"Jaime is a God send! I originally booked an energy session to help deal with insomnia and feelings of overwhelment. Just two days after the first session I felt much calmer - and to my amazement my insomnia had completely disappeared, enabling me to feel more refreshed, energised and able to deal with life! As these issues had been completely transformed with such success I wondered if Jaime could help with my back and neck pain, I had been working with a chiropractor for the last eight years. After the first session the symptoms were 50% better, on the second session they had completely disappeared. Jaime easily clears and heals physical aliments that have proved difficult to shift via the usual conventional means. Thank you Jaime!” Sarah, Senior Psychotherapist, London, England

"I  had an extraordinarily successful healing experience after an appointment with Jaime. Having broken my femur badly, and had a metal plate put in, the bone was still not mended after 9 months. I had had an X-ray and the Fracture Consultant at an Orthopaedic Hospital had told me there was a possibility of it never mending, what they call 'non-union', very worst case scenario could be amputation! Someone recommended I see Jaime. I honestly did not know what to expect, but came away with a strong feeling of well being. After a follow up session with Jaime, I returned to the hospital for my next appointment, had an X-ray, and the consultant simply said, "That looks good now, I think it's time to start weight bearing", and I have not looked back since! Sometimes we have to accept there are things we will never understand in a conventional way!" Caroline, London, England

"I received a reflexology session from Jennifer. It lasted for one hour but I was so relaxed and felt that the session had lasted for three hours. Whenever she found tension in parts of my foot, I felt her using energy to ease the stress - I felt a soothing warmth on my feet whenever she did it. When the treatment was finished I felt so relaxed and refreshed. Highly recommend!" Heidi, Surrey, England

"I saw Jaime in person and also remotely (via Skype) for chronic double disc prolapse and nerve root damage pain. After just one session, my pain was - and still is - greatly reduced and I have much more movement/flexibility in my body. I have been suffering from serious pain for over 4 years - with traditional methods of injections, medication and such, not making much difference! I advocate having healing with Jaime for anyone seeking relief from such physical ailments and pain. This isn't placebo in the medical, negative sense. This is truly a remarkable way of addressing the root energetic cause of pain1" Graeme, London, England

"I had back pain for some years and tried different approaches, medical and alternative alike, that did not work so well. After some healing sessions with Jaime and Jennifer I really felt a big difference. It's been a few months and I don't have any sort of excruciating and debilitating pain anymore. Additionally the allergies I used to have and that they did some treatment on totally disappeared! I felt very comfortable with both of them and I think it has been a very good experience for me and I will definitely come back again if I have any sort of pain/health problem.It really made a difference!" Joana, England

"I had severe pain in my spine and the doctor said that my spine was twisted from top to toe. Every vertebra was practically in a different position. So no wonder I could not stand on both feet happily at the same time! Then, after the remote energetic healing work that Jaime did, I felt an enormous heat in the middle of the night in my spine/body, and I slept amazingly deeply. My back felt good. And then, quite remarkably, two days later, all pain vanished. I am pain free for the first time for years and am able to balance much better than before as the vertebrae seem to be readjusting." Sabine, Austria

"It's been several days since my remote healing with Jaime, and I'm a little bit amazed at how much better I'm feeling. I didn't doubt that the therapy would help, but I was quite sceptical about the speed at which it's supposed to start working. After the energy session, I felt this odd sense of peace and wellness for a while and I was able to lie down with my eyes closed, without any anxiety or panic - this hasn't happened for years! Yesterday I woke up in a rush of anxiety but it didn't last long. And today I've woken up -for the first time in weeks- without any despair or anxiety. I'm feeling light and energised, and I actually feel able to tackle big and small chores without feeling overwhelmed. Here's something interesting also - for the last several months, I have been pretty much living on painkillers, thanks to an old shoulder injury that returned with a vengeance. I've been worried about the impact on my liver/kidneys, of so many meds, while I wait for a physiotherapy appointment. I just realised on Sunday that for the first time in about 6 months, I went for a whole 48 hours without any pain meds- and without any pain! It's quite amazing!" Simran, England 

 

PLEASE TAKE A MOMENT TO SHARE 'BREATHE' WITH FAMILY, FRIENDS & FOLLOWERS :)

Even if you can't help fund our campaign, if you believe in a world where people can have access to powerful tools for self-healing, and become less reliant on drugs and external methods of dealing with pain and suffering (which clearly don't work a lot of the time!) then please share this campaign with your friends, family and anyone else you think would be interested!

If you know anyone in the press who would be happy to share this campaign in a positive light, then please do pass it on!  We'd be thrilled to have that kind of support!

Thank you for reading this far! :)
