As well as delivering the highest quality film and audio production in terms of content -- shooting the footage, editing, sound production etc - and getting it to you in good time. We need to invest substantially more to make the e-platform even more robust, and a breeze to use.  This includes building flexible layouts and search functionality in, tagging of keywords, saving content, sending out reminders, and so much more. 
We also need to start building the mobile app to make these teachings even more accessible to everyone, everywhere. 
Once this has been accomplished we are also looking to partner with an additional  tech company to measure the dynamic healing frequencies of the body-mind continuum, plus recording & charting heart and brain waves before and after doing each technique and process on the platform and app, so you can chart your own energy healing journey, and see just how far you’ve come.
So far, we've already put tens of thousands of dollars out of our own pocket into building the e-learning website/e-platform, so we're looking for a timely and much needed boost to help us go on further and finish what we've started... and maybe take us into uncharted territory - for the benefit of all!





Jaime and Jennifer Tanna are the founders of Energy Therapy, which began in 2005 not long after Jaime's father had a life threatening illness and fell into a coma. 
As his father struggled to recover using standard medical care, Jaime desperately sought out alternative ways that could make a difference, and Energy Therapy was born!
Jennifer’s connection to energy healing and spirituality began early on in life, with influences from many teachings, including the Baha’i Faith. Holistic approaches to health were a way of life since she was a young child, and she has continued to develop her knowledge and awareness of the mind-body-spirit continuum throughout her professional career and personal life.
Both Jaime and Jennifer love helping others awaken to their true healing potential, and live vibrant, meaningful lives by following the path of higher intuition, creativity and joy. Together this dynamic duo bring a diverse array of energy-based wisdom and skills to the healing table, serving clients and students in many different countries worldwide.
Jaime was first guided onto the path of Raja Yoga by his maternal grandmother from a young age, and his early life experiences showed him how body and mind were unquestionably and intricately linked – beyond the outer form was an extraordinary presence that could heal both.
By having the courage to leave his salaried job in his late twenties and pursue energy healing as his vocation, he was able to experience and verify, first-hand, the powerful effects of this healing, both distant and ‘hands-on’, and witness remarkable improvements in his own health and his father’s – additionally, his father as a pharmacist and ‘man of science’ did not believe in energy healing at all, so this helped him understand that belief is not a requirement!
Both Jaime and Jennifer teach from a wellspring of deep knowledge and wisdom, linking the ancient teachings of yoga with energy medicine and deep intuitive insight. Together, they are dedicated to spreading the message of how meditation/mindfulness, energy medicine, yoga, remote healing combine to help transform consciousness, and deeply heal the body, mind and spirit.
We invite you to experience the power of energy work through our new e-learning platform and app in order to tap into your own inner wisdom, and we hope that here at Energy Therapy we can play a part in inspiring you to be the very best that you can be!

These powerful testimonials show you why we are qualified to teach you all you need to know about the power of Energy Medicine to heal, transform and bless your life!
"My journey has certainly been an incredible one with Energy Therapy! Jaime and Jennifer make a super team, with their combined expertise. I have achieved amazing growth on all levels - mentally, emotionally, spiritually and, of course, physically! Can't wait to learn more!" Helena, Cyprus
"I loved working with you Jaime! Just want to report that when I measured my brain waves after every meditation I do, I got 94% congruency. The highest i have ever gotten was 72%! I feel like everything I have been working on with effort just started to flow." Elle, USA
"I was highly sceptical of the healing session with Jaime as I’m 8000 miles away in Singapore and was wondering how effective could a remote healing be? I had nothing to lose and decided to give it a shot. I was proven so completely wrong!! I’ve started having a craving for salad and ‘healthy foods’, which is quite unlike me and I’ve slept like a log the first 2 nights. I feel more emotionally balanced and my cough is a lot better already. My back pain has lessened a lot too. I went for a massage today (5 days later) & that didn’t leave me screeching in pain. My masseuse who massaged me a week back told me that my shoulders were not tight or blocked anymore." S Kaur, Singapore
"I had an Indian Head Massage from Jennifer about 3 years ago when I lived near her in London, and it was amazing. In three years since moving away from Dulwich to Putney I hadn't had a better massage, so I recently contacted Jennifer to book in another appointment. The Indian Head Massage was again incredible and really helped release the tension I had been feeling in my neck, shoulders and the back of my head. I can recommend Jennifer as the best masseuse and energy worker I've ever been to and also as a great person! Jennifer gave me some good tips on how to help prevent the tension build up in the first place. First class service!" Daniel, London, England 
"Thank you for the online session Jaime. I've experienced amazing and significant shifts in my energy in the past 36 hours." Susan, Wilmot, USA
"I recently had my second remote healing session with Jaime and had a tremendous experience. I had suffered night and day for 11 months from painful plantar fasciitis in both feet. I'm a massage therapist with a network of extraordinary colleagues, energy workers, and acupuncturists and no one had been able to help me. Jaime was extremely professional and friendly which immediately put me at ease. He is both grounded and intuitive n his approach. In short, my pain was 90% relieved that same day. It was truly astonishing. A week later it's about 99% gone with only occasional stiffness. In fact, my whole physical structure is being reorganized around this miraculous experience. Thank you Jaime!" Lisa, New York, USA
"I decided to try an energy healing session with Jennifer as I was feeling completely depleted, and pretty stressed. I felt Jennifer was extremely intuitive in her assessment of areas that I could improve, and the psychological exercises she suggested to me were extremely useful, and did indeed bring about positive results. I had been slightly sceptical about Reiki, but the healing session was effective, and I felt more relaxed and definitely energised after the session. So much so, that I had 2 further sessions with similar positive results. I would highly recommend Jennifer and Energy Therapy!" Martin, MD, Bournemouth, England
"Last year (2017) I was told I was in early menopause. I’d been struggling for over a year with hot sweats, migraines and out of control hormones. I just didn’t feel myself and the HRT therapies didn’t seem to help. So, I made a connection with Jaime because I needed to try something completely different. I’ll be honest, I was a little reticent to believe in the effectiveness of remote healing, but I am so pleased I opened my mind enough to try. The results were astonishing! In ONE session Jaime turned my early menopause quite literally on its head. After months of symptoms, everything suddenly settled. My cycles have never been so regular and I feel so much better balanced. It completely baffled my GP... " Jo, England
"Thank you for the remote healing session. My neck pain has disappeared and the pain in my feet has reduced significantly. I wasn't sure what I was expecting to happen but I was, and still am, really amazed that a lot of physical pain has disappeared" Uma, England 
"I just wanted to write to you to let you know of our good news. I am 6 months pregnant with a little girl on the way! Last year was a real struggle in terms of fertility. My husband and I made an appointment at the IVF clinic to get all the information once and for all so as to make an informed and final decision. And bang, the evening before that first IVF appointment we found out we were naturally pregnant after the healing sessions with you... What a wonderful, miraculous turn of events!  Your input, guidance and your amazing remote healing sessions have all truly contributed to a beautiful outcome for me and I wanted to pass on my sincere thanks for the wonderful work you do in making this world a better place!" Nicole, Lagos, Nigeria
"I went to Jennifer for a couple of energy healing sessions and I found her to be very warm, kind and compassionate. She explained everything with such amazing clarity which helped me progress in my healing journey. And she empowered me to seek clarity and answers within myself. I felt so much more grounded and emotionally balanced just after the first session. I would be very happy to recommend Jennifer to anyone seeking healing and balance." Anney, London, England
"Having had a persistent rash on my lower legs for 6 years which conventional medicine, reiki, acupuncture, homeopathy, reflexology, medical herbalism etc didn't shift, I booked a remote healing session with Jaime. To my delight and amazement the rash started fading immediately and now, 16 weeks later, it has gone. His charming professionalism inspired immediate confidence, but it is the success of the treatment which speaks for itself." Susan Lyall, London, England
"Jaime is a God send! I originally booked an energy session to help deal with insomnia and feelings of overwhelment. Just two days after the first session I felt much calmer - and to my amazement my insomnia had completely disappeared, enabling me to feel more refreshed, energised and able to deal with life! As these issues had been completely transformed with such success I wondered if Jaime could help with my back and neck pain, I had been working with a chiropractor for the last eight years. After the first session the symptoms were 50% better, on the second session they had completely disappeared. Jaime easily clears and heals physical aliments that have proved difficult to shift via the usual conventional means. Thank you Jaime!” Sarah, Senior Psychotherapist, London, England
"I  had an extraordinarily successful healing experience after an appointment with Jaime. Having broken my femur badly, and had a metal plate put in, the bone was still not mended after 9 months. I had had an X-ray and the Fracture Consultant at an Orthopaedic Hospital had told me there was a possibility of it never mending, what they call 'non-union', very worst case scenario could be amputation! Someone recommended I see Jaime. I honestly did not know what to expect, but came away with a strong feeling of well being. After a follow up session with Jaime, I returned to the hospital for my next appointment, had an X-ray, and the consultant simply said, "That looks good now, I think it's time to start weight bearing", and I have not looked back since! Sometimes we have to accept there are things we will never understand in a conventional way!" Caroline, London, England
"I received a reflexology session from Jennifer. It lasted for one hour but I was so relaxed and felt that the session had lasted for three hours. Whenever she found tension in parts of my foot, I felt her using energy to ease the stress - I felt a soothing warmth on my feet whenever she did it. When the treatment was finished I felt so relaxed and refreshed. Highly recommend!" Heidi, Surrey, England
"I saw Jaime in person and also remotely (via Skype) for chronic double disc prolapse and nerve root damage pain. After just one session, my pain was - and still is - greatly reduced and I have much more movement/flexibility in my body. I have been suffering from serious pain for over 4 years - with traditional methods of injections, medication and such, not making much difference! I advocate having healing with Jaime for anyone seeking relief from such physical ailments and pain. This isn't placebo in the medical, negative sense. This is truly a remarkable way of addressing the root energetic cause of pain1" Graeme, London, England
"I had back pain for some years and tried different approaches, medical and alternative alike, that did not work so well. After some healing sessions with Jaime and Jennifer I really felt a big difference. It's been a few months and I don't have any sort of excruciating and debilitating pain anymore. Additionally the allergies I used to have and that they did some treatment on totally disappeared! I felt very comfortable with both of them and I think it has been a very good experience for me and I will definitely come back again if I have any sort of pain/health problem.It really made a difference!" Joana, England
"I had severe pain in my spine and the doctor said that my spine was twisted from top to toe. Every vertebra was practically in a different position. So no wonder I could not stand on both feet happily at the same time! Then, after the remote energetic healing work that Jaime did, I felt an enormous heat in the middle of the night in my spine/body, and I slept amazingly deeply. My back felt good. And then, quite remarkably, two days later, all pain vanished. I am pain free for the first time for years and am able to balance much better than before as the vertebrae seem to be readjusting." Sabine, Austria
"It's been several days since my remote healing with Jaime, and I'm a little bit amazed at how much better I'm feeling. I didn't doubt that the therapy would help, but I was quite sceptical about the speed at which it's supposed to start working. After the energy session, I felt this odd sense of peace and wellness for a while and I was able to lie down with my eyes closed, without any anxiety or panic - this hasn't happened for years! Yesterday I woke up in a rush of anxiety but it didn't last long. And today I've woken up -for the first time in weeks- without any despair or anxiety. I'm feeling light and energised, and I actually feel able to tackle big and small chores without feeling overwhelmed. Here's something interesting also - for the last several months, I have been pretty much living on painkillers, thanks to an old shoulder injury that returned with a vengeance. I've been worried about the impact on my liver/kidneys, of so many meds, while I wait for a physiotherapy appointment. I just realised on Sunday that for the first time in about 6 months, I went for a whole 48 hours without any pain meds- and without any pain! It's quite amazing!" Simran, England 

 
PLEASE TAKE A MOMENT TO SHARE 'BREATHE' WITH FAMILY, FRIENDS & FOLLOWERS :)





Even if you can't help fund our campaign, if you believe in a world where people can have access to powerful tools for self-healing, and become less reliant on drugs and external methods of dealing with pain and suffering (which clearly don't work a lot of the time!) then please share this campaign with your friends, family and anyone else you think would be interested!
If you know anyone in the press who would be happy to share this campaign in a positive light, then please do pass it on!  We'd be thrilled to have that kind of support!
Thank you for reading this far! :)

story:
Skintology Stockholm

Skintology Stockholm, Scandinavian beauty from Sweden at it's best, combining expert skincare knowledge with exceptional ingredients

Skintology Stockholm was founded by two women with different backgrounds in the skincare industry. One as a certified skin therapist and one with a  BSc in Cosmetic Science. We need YOUR help to expand our product range, strengthen our market positioning, increase our reach and show people our amazing products. 

 

 

How to Use

Our masks are super easy to use! Watch this video to see how it's done.

 

Reviews

We have had really amazing reviews of our masks, and some has even asked when we are launching more products! Here are some selected quotes of what has been said (we have taken the freedom to translate some of the quotes from Swedish to English):

"The mask itself enclosed the skin instantly did it's job and feels a bit like the future!" @myfabulousglow

"A really lovely sheet mask that felt hydrating and refreshing" @fnordstrom.se

"..Much better fit than many 'paper sheets', the mask fits a bit like a second skin, very tight and wonderful. To masks I've used and longing for a third." @saturdayshelfie

"..The skin felt great afterwards and I'm actually surprised it looks more fresh and glowy today than yesterday." @pilotemelie

"This definitely is my go to mask for skincare that does what it's actually meant to do." @ameliamaysun.skincare

 

Philosophy

We are all about skincare that gives visible results! We carefully choose our ingredients and all of our claims are substantiated and based on credible studies. At Skintology Stockholm you will always find high quality, easy to use products.

 

Let's talk about the base!

Skintology Stockholm is a brand new skincare brand that provides you with a new type of sheet mask. We have 2 masks in production and lots more products in development! 

For us, the actual sheet itself is just as important as the serum added to it! Our sheet acts as a delivery agent and with its magical adhesion capability, it increases transferability of serum into the skin giving superior results. 

 

 

The Mask

Our mask is thin, discreet to wear and has a cooling effect, even without keeping it in the fridge. So sit back, relax and enjoy all the added benefits of our lightweight mask as it sticks to your face like a soothing glove.  All of the goodness none of the stress.  

At Skintology we believe in transparency, we are proud of our products and ingredients and love to tell you about them!

We have carefully developed our sheet masks with the best results for single use formulas in mind. We ended up with amazing products getting the most out of the active ingredients at safe and effective levels.

We have created 2 masks, Thirst Quench Hydrating mask and Fresh Start Exfoliating mask.

 

Thirst Quench Hydrating Mask

Thirst Quench Hydrating mask is deeply hydrating and will help maintain the moisture balance in the skin. The mask is revitalizing and the skin will feel smoother and more radiant.

Key Ingredients:

Niacinamide: Niacinamide is an active form of Vitamin B3. Niacinamide forms the essential constituent of the oxidoreduction coenzymes NAD and NADP, which decline with age in our skin. NAD and NADP are essential in the metabolism of cells.  Niacinamide has shown great effect on enlarged pores, fine lines and uneven skin tones. It is anti-inflammatory, strengthens the elasticity of the skin and reduces skin sensitivity. Who wouldn’t want this?

Sodium Hyaluronate: Sodium Hyaluronate is the sodium salt of hyaluronic acid. It has the same benefits as hyaluronic acid but is more easily absorbed. Hyaluronic acid and sodium hyaluronate can attract and hold large amounts of moisture which makes it a powerful hydrating ingredient. It will plump the skin which will in turn diminish fine lines, even out skin tone and texture as well as increase skin radiance. Amazing!

Panthenol: Also known as Provitamin B5. Panthenol has the ability to bind water to the skin and is very hydrating. It also has anti-inflammatory properties and can help calm irritated and sensitive skin. Good for everyone!

Amino acid complex: Amino acids play a vital role in maintaining our health as well as the appearance of the skin. Amino acids are found naturally in the skin and works as natural moisturising factors (NMF’s). Their main benefit in skin is to maintain skins hydration and smoothness. In skincare, amino acids aid in strengthening our skin’s natural defence system and in turn help protect from environmental damage to the skin. Get strong!

 

 

Fresh Start Hydrating Mask

Fresh Start Exfoliating mask is exfoliating and deeply hydrating. The mask will make the skin feel brighter and more radiant as well as help even out the skin tone.

Key Ingredients:

Niacinamide: Niacinamide is an active form of Vitamin B3. Niacinamide forms the essential constituent of the oxidoreduction coenzymes NAD and NADP, which decline with age in our skin. NAD and NADP are essential in the metabolism of cells.  Niacinamide has shown great effect on enlarged pores, fine lines and uneven skin tones. It is anti-inflammatory, strengthens the elasticity of the skin and reduces skin sensitivity. Who wouldn’t want this?

Sodium Hyaluronate: Sodium Hyaluronate is the sodium salt of hyaluronic acid. It as the same benefits as hyaluronic acid but is more easily absorbed. Hyaluronic acid and sodium hyaluronate can attract and hold large amounts of moisture which makes it a powerful hydrating ingredient. It will plump the skin which will in turn diminish fine lines, even out skin tone and texture as well as increase skin radiance. Amazing!

AHA’s: Glycolic and lactic acid to gently exfoliate and hydrate the skin. We have used a low concentration of Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHA’s) in this mask for the purpose of a single use formula and using the full 30ml all at once. It provides a gentle exfoliation that suits even a more sensitive skin type. AHA is a chemical exfoliation, which means it loosens up the bonds between the skin cells in the upper layers. It also helps the skin retain moisture. The result is hydrated and smooth looking skin.  

Licorice root extract: One of the components in licorice, glabridin, is a powerful antioxidant as well as being skin-soothing. There is also evidence supporting licorice root extract improving an uneven skin tone. This s why we find it being the perfect complement to AHA, it helps to soothe any irritation that may arise from using AHA for the more sensitive skin, as well as work together with the AHA on making the skin tone more even. Simply the perfect combo!

 

Product Development

With your help we are adding more products to our range! We currently have two facial serums in development that matches the existing sheet masks.

 
A little sneak peak into what it looks like when our masks are filled.

 

The Campaign

Your contributions will help us launch the products that are in development, strengthen our market positioning and to increase our reach and show people our amazing products. With your help we will be able to reach our consumers and continue developing more products and expand our range. Regardless if we reach our goal or not, this is where the contributions will go. 

We have created discounted mask packages for you as a contributor. You can receive up to 35% discount through this campaign! You can choose between 3 different size packages, the smallest one being a pack of 2 hydrating masks and the largest one a pack 10 (!) masks, containing 5 hydrating masks and 5 exfoliating masks. Have a look in the Perk section to see which one fits you best!

 

Delivery time frame

We will deliver the sheet masks to all contributors during February 2019 when the campaign has ended. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate ALL the help we can get, in whatever way. Please share our campaign! Follow us on social media @skintologystockholm.

story:
Jock Itchy that bugs you big time

Studies show that many men suffer from jock itchy, tinea cruris, which is a fungal infection of the skin. Jock itch is caused by mold-like fungi, and they can multiply quickly and cause infections when they are allowed to thrive in warm, moist area where happens to be your groin.

Jock itch is most common in men and adolescent boys. The best way for the relief is simply going to see your doctor, and applying medications, and keeping your affected area clean and dry.

But why not we prevent these by cleansing your precious xx by My Precious XX?

My Precious XX is a new natural cleanser(150ml sized) made with 95% natural ingredients.

 

About Who We Are?

My Precious XX was founded by Onward & partners, a company who is specialized in cosmetic distribution, in South Korea. Distributing dozens of European & American cosmetics for years through Korea’s most prestigious department stores, TV shopping, duty free stores, Onward & partners have found a reason to create its own cosmetic and are ready to explore a new world.

Hyung-Nam LEE(Left: CEO of Onward & Partners) & Woo Sik Jeong(Right: Co-establisher of Onward & partners/Creative Director)  :

Our unique experiences and extensive backgrounds, combined with domestic/international business, network, knowledge, and market insights will, surely, lead us to implement what we've been carving long time out with the plan "My Precious XX"!

What does your contribution cover?​

 

Our goal will cover more new SKUs to be made, packaged, and shipped.

Our launching SKU will be My Precious XX, the men’s cleanser but even more awesome, we will expand our world to

My Precious XX 30ml for Bon Voyage,

My Precious XX 1,000 ml for Big Men

Also your contribution will cover our plan to participate in Cosmoprof Las Vegas 2019 to expand our products to the United States of America.

 

Risks and challenges

Onward & partners and My Precious XX are already a functioning, successful, actively growing company-we are focused, accountable. 

Onward & partners and My Precious XX are remained in debt-free for its entire existence since its establishment in late 2016. Distributing imported cosmetics through major retailers in Korea, we’ve have come to have our own business network, friends & professionals who will help us to way to the globe, market-insight, and knowledge to develop what the world is waiting for. 

We’ve already tested and proven our design & concept of My Precious XX, production, and distribution processes, and we’ve triple checked to make sure we have back-up plans in place.

 

Will My Precious XX be on the shelves of specialty stores, drugstores, retailers in the States? Absolutely. We experimented with several suppliers, and professionals in the U.S. 

 

We have made our products with EWG high-rated ingredients so that we will, safely, land in the States, and be proved by FDA. 

 

Shipping Notes:

Within the U.S. shipping is included in your chosen perk level.

Anywhere else will cost $20 in addition to your reward level.

 

Bottom Line:

This is not where you’re funding a “Maybe”.

It's almost like you are pre-ordering a jock-kicking product and supporting a small but big business with a proven track record, except we can’t do without you. 

If we are funded, this is happening. Our world is our bond

story_txt:
Jock Itchy that bugs you big time
Studies show that many men suffer from jock itchy, tinea cruris, which is a fungal infection of the skin. Jock itch is caused by mold-like fungi, and they can multiply quickly and cause infections when they are allowed to thrive in warm, moist area where happens to be your groin.

Jock itch is most common in men and adolescent boys. The best way for the relief is simply going to see your doctor, and applying medications, and keeping your affected area clean and dry.
But why not we prevent these by cleansing your precious xx by My Precious XX?


My Precious XX is a new natural cleanser(150ml sized) made with 95% natural ingredients.


 

About Who We Are?
My Precious XX was founded by Onward & partners, a company who is specialized in cosmetic distribution, in South Korea. Distributing dozens of European & American cosmetics for years through Korea’s most prestigious department stores, TV shopping, duty free stores, Onward & partners have found a reason to create its own cosmetic and are ready to explore a new world.



Hyung-Nam LEE(Left: CEO of Onward & Partners) & Woo Sik Jeong(Right: Co-establisher of Onward & partners/Creative Director)  :
Our unique experiences and extensive backgrounds, combined with domestic/international business, network, knowledge, and market insights will, surely, lead us to implement what we've been carving long time out with the plan "My Precious XX"!
What does your contribution cover?​
 
Our goal will cover more new SKUs to be made, packaged, and shipped.
Our launching SKU will be My Precious XX, the men’s cleanser but even more awesome, we will expand our world to
My Precious XX 30ml for Bon Voyage,
My Precious XX 1,000 ml for Big Men
Also your contribution will cover our plan to participate in Cosmoprof Las Vegas 2019 to expand our products to the United States of America.

 
Risks and challenges
Onward & partners and My Precious XX are already a functioning, successful, actively growing company-we are focused, accountable. 
Onward & partners and My Precious XX are remained in debt-free for its entire existence since its establishment in late 2016. Distributing imported cosmetics through major retailers in Korea, we’ve have come to have our own business network, friends & professionals who will help us to way to the globe, market-insight, and knowledge to develop what the world is waiting for. 
We’ve already tested and proven our design & concept of My Precious XX, production, and distribution processes, and we’ve triple checked to make sure we have back-up plans in place.
 
Will My Precious XX be on the shelves of specialty stores, drugstores, retailers in the States? Absolutely. We experimented with several suppliers, and professionals in the U.S. 
 
We have made our products with EWG high-rated ingredients so that we will, safely, land in the States, and be proved by FDA. 
 
Shipping Notes:
Within the U.S. shipping is included in your chosen perk level.
Anywhere else will cost $20 in addition to your reward level.
 
Bottom Line:
This is not where you’re funding a “Maybe”.
It's almost like you are pre-ordering a jock-kicking product and supporting a small but big business with a proven track record, except we can’t do without you. 
If we are funded, this is happening. Our world is our bond

story:
Painful periods? Millions of women have them, but that doesn’t mean you should have to. We’re here to try and help you and the millions of other women who have monthly period pain. If every woman with period pain donated $5, we could begin on this solution tomorrow.

 

When Sally started menstruating, her periods were painful – so her doctor told her to take Ibuprofen. Initially, it worked. Sally could return to class, sports, and hanging out with her friends, without pain. But Sally took a lot of Ibuprofen every month and more than the recommended amount, just like a lot of her friends. After years of taking Ibuprofen, she began having stomach pain. Her doctor recommended Sally stop taking Ibuprofen. Without the Ibuprofen, Sally’s period pain came back, and she found herself missing work.

This time, Sally’s doctor put her on birth control pills. The hope was that this would work, but it didn’t stop the pain like Ibuprofen had. And now Sally feels bloated constantly, feels sick to her stomach, and is having headaches. Besides the side effects, Sally wants to begin having children soon, but she’s worried that if she goes off the birth control, the pain will come back. Sally doesn't want to go back to taking Ibuprofen. But Sally doesn’t know of any other options. So now what should Sally do?

Sally’s case is so common and illustrates the limitation in current medical treatments for period pain. Ibuprofen and birth control work for a lot of women, but they don’t work for everyone. We believe women should have more options for such a common problem.


Why don’t we have more options?

* Sally is a fictitious character only meant to illustrate the problem. :)

 

We’re hoping the plant, Pau d’ Arco, may offer a solution. Many plants are used as medicine, and this plant has been used in South America for over 1,000 years, but hasn’t been used much in the U.S. There’s a lot of technical reasons that we want to use this particular plant. Mostly, because we think it decreases inflammation (inflammation is what causes period pain) and it's completely natural. Previous studies in people have shown this plant medicine to be generally safe for use in humans, and we need more research to determine the safety and usefulness of this plant for period pain.


To see if Pau d’ Arco works in the way we think it might, we need to do more research. Specifically, we need to start with a clinical trial. This first clinical trial will examine whether Pau d’ Arco is, or isn’t, as safe as we think it is. Why are we trying to fund the trial this way? We could try to get funding through more traditional sources, but this can take years and funding is very limited. This way, we’ll be able to get started and help women more quickly! Since this is a problem that affects so many women, this trial could be conducted much more quickly with grassroots fundraising.

 

  • We are looking to raise 35k for use in clinical trials to test Pau d’ Arco. These trials are critical to moving the process forward.
  • Your contribution will help push women's health forward and hopefully provide new options in a limited market that could impact women across the US and beyond.
  • We are in the process of collecting some unique perks for your contributions!

 

I want to help women be in control of their periods, instead of the other way around. So, I’m starting my career in helping women with things like period pain by dedicating my time in school to researching period pain. I’m doing this while obtaining my Doctorate in Naturopathic Medicine and my Master of Science in Integrative Medicine Research at the National University of Natural Medicine (NUNM). These degrees will allow me to dedicate my life to researching better solutions for period pain and women's health.

So help me help you – donate $5?

For more detailed information feel free to email me at fundpainfreeperiods@gmail.com with any additional questions.

Want to donate, but only to a 5013c nonprofit? No problem! Send donations to Helfgott Research Institute, part of the Natural University of Natural Medicine, earmarked for the "Fund Pain Free Periods study."

Checks can be made out to Helfgott Research Institute or Ryan Bradley and sent to Helfgott Research Institute at 2220 SW 1st Ave, Portland, OR 97201. Call (503) 552-1862 or email rbradley@nunm.edu with any questions.

story:
The first desk lamp to deliver natural light!

see better, feel better and sleep easier
experience light the way nature intended
[cheaper than a flight to Hawaii, and lasts longer too!]

mySun delivers healthy light

boost your energy and mood with extra sunlight during the day
relax and connect naturally with beautiful sunsets in the evening
prepare yourself for recovery and sleep with candle light at night

beautiful light = bright naturally balanced spectrum 
healthy light = color & intensity change with the time of day
a better lamp = built to last using glass, metal and wood 
 


Dr. Mendoza discusses the benefits of natural light for sleep, mood and overall wellness.

 

NEW light engine technology for emulating natural light!

Breakthrough LED light engine technology and custom algorithms actively mix six colors to create beautiful and healthy natural light.  We mix all of the colors of the rainbow to create beautiful balanced spectrum light - just like natural light.  We change the ratio and intensity of colors with the time of day to create healthy light - just like natural light.  Our products use newly developed LED light engine technology and complex algorithms to recreate the daily and seasonal cycles of natural light.  MySun is the ONLY lamp on the market with patented 6 color LED mixing technology to enable the most accurate reproduction of natural light.  Don't settle for artificial light - mySun delivers light the way nature intended!

 

Experience light the way nature intended!

ONLY Sunlight Inside lamps provide a naturally balanced spectrum, which automatically changes with the time of day - just like natural light!   Fluorescents make us look and feel green, while LED lamps make us look blue and keep us awake at night!
 

We are programmed to respond to the cycles of natural light

  • natural light changes color and intensity with the time of day (as well as with the weather, the time of year and place on earth)
  • cycles of natural light drive our daily hormones and circadian rhythms
    (our eyes sense of the time of day by measuring the color and intensity of light)
  • we require regular exposure to natural light to see, feel and sleep our best!

 

mySun automatically delivers cycles of natural light

  • mySun automatically changes color and intensity with the time of day
  • mySun helps synchronize our daily hormones and circadian rhythms
  • mySun supports our energy, mood, metabolism, sleep and general wellness!

 

Artificial light doesn't change with time of day

  • artificial light does not change color and intensity with the time of day
  • artificial light cannot support our daily hormones and circadian rhythms
  • artificial light interferes with our energy, mood, metabolism, and sleep!

 

the science linking light and health



We are programmed to respond to the daily variations of natural light.  Until 100 years ago our days were filled with bright sunlight, and our evenings were lit with the soft warm glow of a flame. We naturally feel bright and energized on a sunny day, and down on rainy days, during dark winter months or when we’ve been stuck inside for too long. Exposure to light is what drives our hormone cycles and synchronizes our circadian rhythms – profoundly impacting how we feel, work, play and rest. For more on how light impacts our health and wellness check out our science page.  Unfortunately, most of us don’t get enough natural light during the day and get too much artificial light at night. The science linking light and health is clear, and the technology to recreate natural light is now available. Feel better, be more productive, and rest easier with mySun!

 

experience the benefits of natural light!

 
read more about how light impacts health and wellness:
  • two-minute primer on light and circadian rhythms 
  • detailed overview of how light impacts human health
  • our science page, and our blog has more about light and health
  • use f.lux (for PC & Andriod) or Nightshift (for iOS) to mitigate the impact of your screens at night [and it's FREE]
 

First desk lamp to deliver natural light!

  • mySun delivers beautiful, healthy natural light 
  • natural light synchronizes and supports circadian rhythms
  • perfect daylight: sunlight during the day to naturally boost energy and mood
  • perfect nightlight: sunset in the evening to relax, candlelight to improve sleep
  • arrives set to user location, date and time - no smartphone or setup required!
  • built to last >10 years - hand made in NorCal, no need to ever change a bulb!

 


 

Natural light is special

(1) our eyes sense the intensity and color of light to signal the time of day

  • bright cool (high blue content) light signals it's time to be awake and alert
  • soft warm (and no blue content) light signals it's time to relax and sleep

(2) natural light contains a balanced mix of all the colors of the rainbow 

  • we are better able to see fine details and colors with natural light
  • objects and people look their best with a natural balance of colors


Natural light changes color and intensity with the time of day

    Artificial light does NOT change color and intensity with the time of day


    artificial lights are only 'right' twice a day 

    (1) artificial light doesn’t change color with the time of day 

    • insufficient light during the day = no 'awake and alert' signal
    • too much blue at night = blue light interferes with our sleep
    • artificial light disrupts our bio-rhythms (disrupts our circadian rhythms)!

    (2) artificial light doesn't contain a natural balance of colors

    • artificial light makes it difficult to see fine details and colors 
    • objects and people look green under fluorescent, and blue under LED light


     

     

    mySun delivers natural light

     

    please help us bring the benefits of natural light inside!

    We need your help to bring beautiful, healthy natural light to a desk, work space, or favorite reading chair near you.   We believe that natural light is the smartest light - so we have designed a custom controller which we preset to your address before it ships.  You get beautiful, healthy natural light right out of the box – just plug it in, there is nothing to install and nothing to set-up!   Our products come with a simple dimmer/slider, you don’t ever need to connect to a smartphone or wifi router.  Now if you want more control than Mother Nature provides, our products are Bluetooth enabled.  Our iOS Apps provide unlimited control, but remember they are entirely optional - our products deliver natural light right out of the box - just plug them in and enjoy the perfect light at every time of day! 


    testimonials from bottled sunshine users

    natural light enhances vision and aesthetics

    natural light improves sleep

    natural light boosts mood and energy

     



    mySun actively mixes all the colors of the rainbow to create natural light!

     

    We've been shipping natural light around the world since December 2016.  Do you know someone who works in a windowless cubicle, or spends their day under fluorescent lights?  Is there someone in your life who struggles with sleep, or has the winter blues?  Is your family blessed with a new baby or a moody teenager?  Is it difficult for you to get outside regularly, or do you live in a climate with limited sun?  To read more about how light can help support your mood, productivity and sleep check out our blog. Our mySun and bottled sunshine lamps automatically produce sunlight during the day (to boost your mood/energy) and then switch to candle light at night (to make it easier to unwind and sleep). Our lamps are hand-made in California from locally sourced materials, order now so you don't miss our limited 2018 vintage production!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
What is QueerWell?

QueerWell is the first-ever digital platform devoted to the health, happiness, and well-being of LGBTQIA+ people (and their allies). 

Whit will draw on their rich life experience as a neurodiverse, LGBTQIA+ womxn and non-binary human to create this platform.

We need your help getting QueerWell from an idea and a concept — into a reality. Because Queers deserve to be happy, too. 

Why QueerWell? 

According to research, LGBTQIA+ Americans report lower well-being than their non-queer counterparts, even after factoring in differences of race and socioeconomic status. The Atlantic has dubbed the well-being of Queer Women, in particular, a "Quiet Crisis."

The tech industry has responded to the unique needs of LGBTQ+ folks through the creation of apps devoted to sex and love. And while this is important, Queer mental health and happiness run deeper than our sex lives.

What if an app existed to respond to the unique emotional and psychological challenges of being Queer? 

Of the $1.3 billion dollar Mindfulness industry, there is a tremendous gap and lack of attention to the Queer Generation and their specific needs. Whit identifies with many letters of the Queer Alphabet (L, G, T, and of course, Q) and they’re passionate about bridging the gap. 

A trained therapist, former psychological well-being researcher, and mindfulness instructor, Whit spent nearly a decade working in academia, mental health, and wellness start-ups without ever hearing a conversation about the specific needs of Queer people. QueerWell seeks to change this.

In the midst of COVID-19, the need for a digital wellness space has never been greater.

Enter QueerWell, the first-ever app devoted to the health, happiness, and well-being of LGBTQIA+ people (and their allies). Whit is a fierce, resilient, business and tech-savvy leader who left behind their role on the therapist couch to reach a broader audience. They've devoted their entire career to serving under-resourced communities and believe QueerWell can reach Queer folks where they are: on their phones!

But, Whit also recognizes QueerWell-ness is about more than just meditations. And, they recognize the tremendous diversity of the Queer community in terms of race, language, ethnicity, immigration status, gender, geographic location, ability/disability, and more. 

They seek to develop an adaptive app with cutting edge technology. QueerWell will get to know the preferences of its user through a diverse content library of art, writing, music, and fitness videos that QueerWell subscribers can choose from to best suit their mental health needs and Queer happiness goals.

What We Need & What You Get

QueerWell is in the pre-concept stage, and needs your financial support to grow from an idea and into a reality.

Ideally, QueerWell will launch in time for Election Season 2020 — a very stressful time to be Queer. 

This initial round of funding for $15,000 will go towards: 

  1. TECHNOLOGY: Purchasing video and sound equipment for the creation of high-quality digital mindfulness and marketing content. Prototype development technology.
  2. MENTORSHIP: Consulting with tech and business experts to support, develop and refine the QueerWell business plan and financial strategy. 
  3. FEES: The fun part! All of the legal, accounting fees associated with QueerWell operating as a fully-functional business. This includes trademarking, incorporating as a business, and tax compliance. 
  4. MARKETING: Website design, marketing materials, branding, SEO, and securing domains.
  5. COMPENSATION: Hiring and paying a diverse team of content creators, operations support and tech whizzes for business development. 
  6. TEAM: Identification of tech geniuses to develop the app itself from Whit’s prototype. Whit wants the best technology for QueerWell, and that has a price tag beginning at $100K. Network at industry conferences such as Lesbians Who Tech (COVID-19 allowing). 
  7. RESEARCH: Focus groups with QueerWell’s target market to listen to and continue identifying needs of consumers within the platform.

QueerWell will run on a tiered subscription model, designed with different levels of access to content.

 In this spirit, those that donate to QueerWell’s current campaign will receive:

  • $1-99: For every $1 donated, 1-day of access to a QueerB (Queer Basic) subscription. 
  • $100-250: For every $1 donated, 1-day of access to a Queer+ (Queer Plus) subscription.
  • $251-1000: 1-year free subscription to Queer+, and the opportunity to gift a month free of QueerB to three people.
  • $1000 - 4999: 1-year free subscription to Queer+, infinitely good karma, as well as a 1:1 conversation with Whit (via Video) with their sincerest thanks and to hear your input on the direction of QueerWell. 
  • $5,000+ Beyond: Lifetime Subscription to QueerWell. Yep, you heard that right. QueerJoy to last a lifetime.

If you don't want access to QueerWell but still want to give to this campaign, you can gift your reward to a Queer person in need (or two or three).

The Impact

QueerWell believes all Queer folks deserve to "Live Well, Be Well, QueerWell” and is devoted to the improved accessibility of wellness content for Queer People.

QueerWell imagines a world where all Queers (and their family members and friends) can take out their phones and find holistic content relevant to their lives and happiness, at any time day or night.

A sampling of themes for the QueerWell app meditation series:

  • Living With Chronic Illness (Auto-Immune Conditions, Lyme Disease, HIV/AIDS)
  • Coming Out of the Closet
  • Supporting a Partner/Friend Through a Gender Transition
  • Supporting a Child as They Come Out of the Closet 
  • Questioning Your Sexuality or Gender Identity Series
  • Holistic content delivery with the inclusion of art, writing, fitness, and more.
  • "Queerspañol": bilingual Spanish + English wellness content, meditations, and more for the Latinx community and allies. 

Tech's Diversity Gaps & LGBTQIA Entrepreneurs

It’s common knowledge that the tech industry, as a whole, has a diversity problem. It’s estimated that 90% of venture capital funding goes to white men. 

Venture capitalists like Arlan Hamilton are making waves by funding underrepresented entrepreneurs, seeking to change the face of entrepreneurship in the U.S. 

Nonetheless, Whit recognizes this lack of diversity will be an obstacle facing them on the road ahead as they found a company run by Queer People (and allies) for Queer people.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that times are difficult for many amidst COVID-19. If you aren't able to give financially at this time, please consider supporting in one of the following ways: 

  • Spread the word far and wide with people who you think might be psyched to support a company like QueerWell! Share this to your social; text it to your friends! 
  • Sign up for updates to QueerWell's progress at QueerWell.co 
  • Consider mentoring Whit and investing in them as a human. Or, connect them to people you believe can help Whit move this dream into a concrete digital reality. Tech-savvy, queer geniuses (or allies), need apply! 

Lastly, this campaign is the launch of what will be a long road of development for QueerWell, but truly, any dollar donated today is fundamental and invaluable to our growth and development. 

My question to you is: What would QueerWell, a cutting-edge and unprecedented radical digital Queer wellness community, right in your pocket, be worth to you? 

May you "Live Well, Be Well, QueerWell," my friends. Your support means the world to me. 

With gratitude,

Whit, Founder of QueerWell (and our future Badass team of diverse humans)
story_txt:
What is QueerWell?
QueerWell is the first-ever digital platform devoted to the health, happiness, and well-being of LGBTQIA+ people (and their allies). 
Whit will draw on their rich life experience as a neurodiverse, LGBTQIA+ womxn and non-binary human to create this platform.
We need your help getting QueerWell from an idea and a concept — into a reality. Because Queers deserve to be happy, too. 
Why QueerWell? 
According to research, LGBTQIA+ Americans report lower well-being than their non-queer counterparts, even after factoring in differences of race and socioeconomic status. The Atlantic has dubbed the well-being of Queer Women, in particular, a "Quiet Crisis."
The tech industry has responded to the unique needs of LGBTQ+ folks through the creation of apps devoted to sex and love. And while this is important, Queer mental health and happiness run deeper than our sex lives.
What if an app existed to respond to the unique emotional and psychological challenges of being Queer? 
Of the $1.3 billion dollar Mindfulness industry, there is a tremendous gap and lack of attention to the Queer Generation and their specific needs. Whit identifies with many letters of the Queer Alphabet (L, G, T, and of course, Q) and they’re passionate about bridging the gap. 
A trained therapist, former psychological well-being researcher, and mindfulness instructor, Whit spent nearly a decade working in academia, mental health, and wellness start-ups without ever hearing a conversation about the specific needs of Queer people. QueerWell seeks to change this.
In the midst of COVID-19, the need for a digital wellness space has never been greater.
Enter QueerWell, the first-ever app devoted to the health, happiness, and well-being of LGBTQIA+ people (and their allies). Whit is a fierce, resilient, business and tech-savvy leader who left behind their role on the therapist couch to reach a broader audience. They've devoted their entire career to serving under-resourced communities and believe QueerWell can reach Queer folks where they are: on their phones!
But, Whit also recognizes QueerWell-ness is about more than just meditations. And, they recognize the tremendous diversity of the Queer community in terms of race, language, ethnicity, immigration status, gender, geographic location, ability/disability, and more. 
They seek to develop an adaptive app with cutting edge technology. QueerWell will get to know the preferences of its user through a diverse content library of art, writing, music, and fitness videos that QueerWell subscribers can choose from to best suit their mental health needs and Queer happiness goals.

What We Need & What You Get
QueerWell is in the pre-concept stage, and needs your financial support to grow from an idea and into a reality.
Ideally, QueerWell will launch in time for Election Season 2020 — a very stressful time to be Queer. 
This initial round of funding for $15,000 will go towards: 


TECHNOLOGY: Purchasing video and sound equipment for the creation of high-quality digital mindfulness and marketing content. Prototype development technology.

MENTORSHIP: Consulting with tech and business experts to support, develop and refine the QueerWell business plan and financial strategy. 

FEES: The fun part! All of the legal, accounting fees associated with QueerWell operating as a fully-functional business. This includes trademarking, incorporating as a business, and tax compliance. 

MARKETING: Website design, marketing materials, branding, SEO, and securing domains.

COMPENSATION: Hiring and paying a diverse team of content creators, operations support and tech whizzes for business development. 

TEAM: Identification of tech geniuses to develop the app itself from Whit’s prototype. Whit wants the best technology for QueerWell, and that has a price tag beginning at $100K. Network at industry conferences such as Lesbians Who Tech (COVID-19 allowing). 

RESEARCH: Focus groups with QueerWell’s target market to listen to and continue identifying needs of consumers within the platform.

QueerWell will run on a tiered subscription model, designed with different levels of access to content.
 In this spirit, those that donate to QueerWell’s current campaign will receive:


$1-99: For every $1 donated, 1-day of access to a QueerB (Queer Basic) subscription. 

$100-250: For every $1 donated, 1-day of access to a Queer+ (Queer Plus) subscription.

$251-1000: 1-year free subscription to Queer+, and the opportunity to gift a month free of QueerB to three people.

$1000 - 4999: 1-year free subscription to Queer+, infinitely good karma, as well as a 1:1 conversation with Whit (via Video) with their sincerest thanks and to hear your input on the direction of QueerWell. 

$5,000+ Beyond: Lifetime Subscription to QueerWell. Yep, you heard that right. QueerJoy to last a lifetime.

If you don't want access to QueerWell but still want to give to this campaign, you can gift your reward to a Queer person in need (or two or three).

QueerWell imagines a world where all Queers (and their family members and friends) can take out their phones and find holistic content relevant to their lives and happiness, at any time day or night.
A sampling of themes for the QueerWell app meditation series:

Venture capitalists like Arlan Hamilton are making waves by funding underrepresented entrepreneurs, seeking to change the face of entrepreneurship in the U.S.

story:
In this medical context it is really difficult for people suffering from this disease to use regular cutlery. To respond to this problem and to help all this people, we created ACT. 

ACT helps people with limited mobility of the hands to regain independence and reclaim the joy of eating.

There are 500 millions persons suffering of mobility problems all over the world.

 

ACT is a set of cutlery with variable geometry, dedicated to people suffering of arthritis or other diseases that affect mobility of the hands. The variable geometry of the handle allows the user to change its shape in order to fit their specific needs.

 

 

You can change the shape of the handle whenever needed (particularly when diseases evolve and needs change). This feature gives you or a loved one the ability to always have a handle with good ergonomics which doesn't cause pain.

The diameter and the material of the handle allow a gentle grip that doesn’t cause additional pain.

The pressure placed on the painful areas of the hand is insignificant.

 

•INDEPENDENCE :The users will be able to eat by themselves without help from others.

•JOY OF EATING: Eating is no longer a chore, this essential gesture becomes pleasurable again.

•INCLUSIVENESS: The product allows people to participate in social activities, and not feel isolated.

 

 

 

ACT is the result of two years of study of the disease, research with university teachers and mentors from the accelerator. We sketched, modeled and tested materials intensively.

Each prototype was tested by beneficiaries and constantly improved based on their direct feedback. The product you are seeing here is our 5th and final prototype.

story:
Diawater is the first permanent hexagonal deuterium reduced water.
 

 

 

 

 

 

Space missions were halted when cosmonauts didn't return alive.
Until Deuterium reduced water was introduced.

 

Due to the complicated process of deuterium reduction,

it costs upwards of $200 per liter.

 

Diawater has revolutionized this with its patented methods &

brought the price down by 20x.

 

 

 

Drinking Diawater

means a healthy life instead of swallowing pills for a lifetime
 

 

Diawater delivers an advanced type of hydration that protects your body from a host of metabolic disorders, numerous other diseases and can help to mitigate risk for:

  • Heart Disease
  • Cancer
  • Diabetes
  • High Cholesterol
  • High Blood Pressure
  • And More!

 

 

 

Clinical trials No.1 of light drinking water. i.e. Diawater in a single-blind study conducted by the Department of Endocrinology of the Russian Research Centre of Restorative Medicine and Balneology.


E.A. Turova, Head of Department, Doctor of Medical Sciences
A.V. Golovach, Associate Professor, Candidate of Medical Sciences

 

30 patients with type 2 diabetes took part in the study:

→66% of women and 34% of men
→Average age of the patients — 54
→Average duration of the disease — 8.5 years
→Obesity was diagnosed in all patients (abdominal diagnosed in 63%, gynoid in 37%)
→Hypertension was diagnosed in all examined patients
→Disorders of lipid metabolism were detected in 76% of patients
→Anthropometric indicators: average growth of 166.4 cm, average weight of 94.5 kg, BMI = 35.9

 

Study design


→Group I (study group) — 20 people — received basic hypoglycemic therapy and light water DiaWater.


→Group II — 10 people — control group — received basic hypoglycemic therapy and placebo water.


Water was administered for 4 weeks. Water was administered at a daily dose of 1 liter; first ingestion on an empty stomach in the morning, and then during the day 30 - 40 minutes before meals. Hypoglycemic drug therapy was not corrected during the study period.

After a 4-week course of light water ingestion, glycemic curve indicators in patients with type II diabetes mellitus were observed 2 hours after a glucose load and proved to be similar to those of a healthy person.

 

Light drinking water i.e. Diawater in the combination treatment of type 2 diabetes:


→  Has a pronounced hypoglycemic effect
→  Improves fat metabolism indicators and reduces fat mass
→  Has hypotensive effects
→  Improves blood rheology
→  Normalizes the elastase - inhibitor system
→  Improves general health

 

 

 

Research Progress of the Inhibitory Effect of Deuterium-Depleted Water on Cancers

https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23076183/

 

A Retrospective Evaluation of the Effects of Deuterium Depleted Water Consumption on 4 Patients With Brain Metastases From Lung Cancer

https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18815148/

 

Deuterium-Depleted Water Influence on the Isotope 2 H/ 1 H Regulation in Body and Individual Adaptation

https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31443167/

 

The biological effects of deuterium-depleted water, a possible new tool in cancer therapy

https://www.researchgate.net/publication/286997777_The_biological_effects_of_deuterium-depleted_water_a_possible_new_tool_in_cancer_therapy

 

Anticancer Effect of Deuterium Depleted Water - Redox Disbalance Leads to Oxidative Stress

https://www.mcponline.org/content/18/12/2373

 

Deuterium-Depleted Water as Adjuvant Therapeutic Agent for Treatment of Diet-Induced Obesity in Rats

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6982901/

 

In Vitro Study of Deuterium Effect on Biological Properties of Human Cultured Adipose-Derived Stem Cells

https://www.hindawi.com/journals/tswj/2018/5454367/

 

*These external studies refer to deuterium reduced water only, diawater is also permanently hexagonal and oxygen rich.

The health benefits after consumption of diawater are much higher than with deuterium reduced water alone.

 

 

 

Diawater can play a key role in preventing dehydration and its related adverse effects in people with certain diseases who are advised by their doctors to consume less water and children who just aren’t that fond of drinking water.

Being oxygen-rich, drinking Diawater results in more effective and efficient hydration of the body with relatively lesser amount of water consumed.

 

 

When it comes to your health, nothing can be more important than ensuring that your hydration process is safe, clean, and most importantly, effective.

 

 

When it comes to your health, oxygen-rich water that penetrates our cells more effectively and more efficiently serves to ward off bacteria, fungi, and other viruses that thrive in areas that lack oxygen. Instead, your body will be filled with the oxygen-rich hydration that it craves.

 

 

 

 

Hexagonal water in the body generates "Exclusion Zones“

 

Within the millions of layers of hexagonal water/exclusion zones no atom, no molecule and no virus can stay and will, therefore, be pressed to the surrounding bulk water from where it can be transported much easier out the cells/body.

 

 

  • These exclusion zones begin directly at the cell membranes and nucleus membranes and protect those areas in the meaning that they will be protected from being directly connected with the spikes of viruses, which tend to „hack“ the DNA of cells.
     
  • The hexagonal layers are always negatively loaded inside human bodies and neutralize positively charged hydronium ions; this leads to a beneficial regulation of the acidity level.
    In a better alkaline environment, all immune system responses to viruses are improved, including the intra-cellular functioning of the mitochondria as part of the immune system by producing more "NO (Nitric Oxide)” gas as an intra-cellular weapon against viruses.
     
  • Hexagonal water optimizes the overall energy level in all systems, including the immune system; furthermore, another natural weapon against viruses, H2O2 (hydrogen peroxide), can be easily produced.
    H2O2 is used by the body to neutralize all kinds of pathogenic agents. Moreover, it has signaling functions for the activation of specific additional immune responses. In deeper tissues, it will be split by the enzyme "catalase" into H2O and "O" pure oxygen and thereby improves the oxygen supply there.

 

Simply put, Diawater is permanent hexagonal deuterium reduced water with extra oxygen that penetrates our cells more effectively and more efficiently serves to ward off bacteria, fungi, and other viruses that thrive in areas that lack oxygen.

As a result, your body will be filled with the oxygen-rich hydration that it craves.

 

 

How Does Hexagonal Deuterium Reduced Water Support Health?

In addition to its contamination-free level of purity, hexagonal water molecules actually contain a higher rate of penetration into human cells, while being able to carry much more oxygen than your typical drinking water.

While we are unable to simply leverage nature’s own process, DiaWater has used technology to mimic the same effects. Our process works to effectively reduce deuterium water molecules in a way that it promotes the stability of these new hexagonal water structures, which positively impact our health in a variety of different ways.

 

With DiaWater, you’re not just drinking water – you’re drinking the purest water on the planet.

 

The Benefits of Hexagonal Water

 

  • Promotes A Longer Life
  • Prevents Chronic Dehydration
  • Helps To Efficiently Move Nutrients Around The Body
  • Improves Cell Absorption Rate
  • Detoxifies The Body
  • Supports The Immune System
  • Increases Energy
  • Improves Concentration
  • Aids In Sleeping
  • Promotes Weight Loss
  • Decreases Blood Glucose Levels
  • Supports Diabetes
  • Improves Blood Circulation
  • Aids In Digestion

 

 

 

DiaWater is considered hexagonal deuterium reduced water.

In other words:

DiaWater is structured, magnetized water.

This means that strong magnetic forces have impacted the molecules that make up each drop of water, consequently reducing their size and rearranging its structure into a hexagonal cluster.

 

Now, why is that important?

It’s important because hexagonal water molecules are virtually exact copies of water molecules that haven’t been contaminated with some sort of human process. And in today’s world, those molecules are quite difficult to come by.

Instead, what you’re left with is the purest man-made water available in the world today – nearly as pure as the water molecules that undergo magnetization right in the heart of Antarctica, just above the Earth’s natural pole.

 

 

Thanks to DiaWater, you can reap the benefits of advanced hydration designed to mimic the exact effects that nature’s most coldest environments have on water molecules to bring forth a new type of hydration that protects your body from diseases and other issues.

 

Here at DiaWater, our production process relies on the use of advanced magnetization technology designed to remove hydrogen and deuterium from the water molecules, and substituting these elements with rich and pure oxygen.

 

 

The Approach

We take pure, naturally structured living water and separate the deuterium rich and deuterium poor molecules from one other through an artificial process that mimics the natural processes of evaporation, condensation, and rain.

 

 

Under a scientific and precisely calculated process that takes into account time, temperature, pressure, humidity, and room specifications, we heat the contained water to produce water vapors that rise to the top of the space and rain down from above. This process is always ongoing and virtually permanent.

 

 

From there, we’re able to acquire an exchange of different water molecule isotopes, which allows us to physically extract the hydrogen atom from each isotope, effectively separating heavy (deuterium rich) and light (deuterium poor) water molecules. From there, we’re able to rearrange the deuterium poor water molecules to ensure that they remain separated from the heavy, hydrogen-rich molecules.

This technology is essentially used to imitate the exact same process of magnetization that occurs in places like Antarctica and high mountains where glacial water is found. Under tremendous pressure and unimaginable temperature conditions, this process occurs naturally in the world, leaving the purest, freshest, most oxygen-rich untouched water that the world has ever seen.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

At DiaWater, our mission is simple – we’re passionate about promoting the health of every single person who walks this Earth. We understand just how valuable clean, toxin-free, un-contaminated water can be, and how unlikely it is to be found in today’s world.

 

 

For that very reason, we continue to create, innovate, and advance our technologies to ensure that we can offer the most pure man-made hexagonal deuterium reduced water available specifically designed to provide each user with advanced hydration that promotes overall health.

 


 

 

 

 

For several decades, Arthur has worked, researched, and experimented with the different ways in which the frequencies, energies, and vibrations found in the world around us effect our human cells. His intense rigor has led him to further explore the areas of water revitalization and hydration, and ultimately, DiaWater.

Considered an expert on Tesla and Lakhovsky, Arthur continues to research the different components of water, including the concepts of absolute purity, hexagonality, and the production of deuterium poor water.

Understanding just how powerful water that contains a low content of heavy hydrogen is, Arthur continues to use advanced technologies to magnetize water and ensure that it remains oxygen-rich and deuterium poor.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

1 → What distinguishes DiaWater from other brands?

Other brands offer high-quality alkaline water. DiaWater provides permanent hexagonal deuterium reduced water with extra oxygen, which is a space industry technology. Since our production process is patented, we are also the only supplier of permanent hexagonal deuterium reduced water that can offer it for affordable prices. Without our process technology, it cost up to 200 USD to produced 1 Liter of deuterium reduced water.  There are two known locations where similar water can be found in nature: Lourdes in France and Hunza in Pakistan. But the hexagonal structure of this water disintegrates naturally after two days at room temperature. With the technology behind the Diawater production process, we are the first in the world who created the hexagonal structure that disintegrated after one year at room temperature. That's the reason why Diawater is the first permanent hexagonal deuterium reduced water with extra oxygen, which can be offered as bottled water on the market and this for affordable prices.   The Hunza people are internationally known for having survived for up to 120 years, mainly due to the quality of their water. The quality of the DiaWater surpasses that of the Hunza by reducing the deuterium content to 85 ppm, while the Hunza water is 120 ppm. This facilitates absorption into the cells, making them receptive to nutrients that help detoxify the system. For more information about the scientific differences of DiaWater, please see our White Paper here.

 

2 → How does DiaWater help my health?

Of the many benefits of drinking this amount of pure water, the most obvious one is increased vitality and life prolongation, more oxygenation, which can revitalize the blood. These benefits can produce associated positive effects such as increased concentration, reduced mood swings, increased digestion, reduced pain, normalization of high blood pressure, reduction of triglyceride, LDL and cholesterol levels, normalization of blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetic patients, reduced chances of cancer development, reduction of body fat and an abundance of general enjoyment of life.

 

3 → Does DiaWater cure any diseases?

According to current laws DiaWater may not be advertised as a remedy. The medication prescribed by the doctor should continue to be taken. Our medical study proves that the intake of diawater leads to a normalization of the values, especially in case of metabolic diseases. You can learn more here. Our philosophy is about health care and healing that is natural and begins with what we put into our body. Since water is essential for life, the consistent intake of DiaWater creates a healthy inner environment that is naturally strengthened against the most common diseases that modern people are confronted with every day. Our water is a breakthrough in the health industry, and we are very confident that if consumed consistently, it can protect you from disease. In this way, you will become strong enough to defend yourself against invaders such as fungi, bacteria and viruses that thrive in oxygen-deficient environments.

 

4 →​ Should I treat DiaWater as a supplement?

In accordance with our philosophy, we advocate that you change your way of thinking and stop thinking about healthy water intake as a supplement to your natural lifestyle. Just as healthy food should not be a supplement, drinking pure water should be a priority and part of your daily life.

 

5 → Can DiaWater replace other ways to more oxygen such as meditation?

No, we even recommend you to develop your lifestyle and include practices that help you to develop an oxygen-rich inner environment. Breathing techniques in meditation also increase and can purify your oxygen; if you use them in synthesis with DiaWater, your health will only become stronger.

 

6 → How can I know that DiaWater does what it says?

We have carried out a medical study to prove the effect of diawater, in addition hundreds of studies have been done on Hunza water over the last decades. The travel of humans into space safely was only made possible by deuterium reduced water. All astronauts (NASA, Roscosmos, etc.) must still drink deuterium reduced water for several months before they can travel into space. If you have been drinking normal water for some time, you will easily recognize the freshness and water density that DiaWater offers. With normal, polluted water, we tend to drink more bottles to feel hydrated. With the quality of DiaWater, you do not need to do much to make your cells feel nourished and you will feel holistically the benefits such as a sharpened state of mind, better sleep, radiant skin and less tiredness. You can read all about the scientific benefits in our white paper here or in our medical study here.

 

7 → How long should Diawater be drunk for metabolic diseases?

Our medical study showed a normalization of the values in the study participants after 4 weeks. However, we recommend a 90-day cure of 1L daily to achieve the best possible results.

There is much more information on this website. How can I learn more about what you do?

We recommend that you continue to visit our website blog here to stay up to date. You can also subscribe to our newsletter by signing up to receive information directly to your inbox.

 

8 → How fast can you deliver?

Production will start once the crowdfunding campaign is over and delivery to our backers will start at the end of August. The official market entry will be end of October. This means that our backers can purchase diawater at least 8 weeks before all other, in addition to discounts.

 

9 → Can I mix DiaWater with my favorite powders to make shakes?

Yes, but we recommend the use of DiaWater pure without mixing with external substances in order not to reduce the effect, as we have not conducted any studies on this.

 

10 → How often should I drink DiaWater?

Since DiaWater is not a drug, but pure hexagonal deuterium reduced water, you can drink it as often as you like, we recommend drinking one 1 liter per day!

For best results, we recommend the consumption of Diawater as follows:

250 ml on an empty stomach after getting up

250 ml 30 minutes before lunch

250 ml 30 minutes before dinner

250 ml before going to bed

You will find that you need less intake compared to your previous options, and that's fine; it's proof of how healthy hexagonal deuterium is reduced water and how the alkaline capacity of DiaWater hydrates your cells faster and at a higher level.

 

11 → How can I know if I am dehydrated?

The interesting thing about dehydration is that when it becomes a normal condition, it can actually be difficult to detect. Only when we experience a highly hydrated state can we really see that we might have been exhausted all along. Some signals may be: Brain mist or lack of concentration, general physical fatigue that lingers, shortness of breath, inconsistent digestion and bowel movements, deep coloration of urine, lack of mental strength, decreased motivation and emotional mood swings.

 

12 → Where can I buy DiaWater?

Right here on our campaigns page with up to 33 % discount and delivery at the end of August. Otherwise online from the end of October at our website.

 

13 → How can I contact you if I have a question?

Our team is ready and willing to contact you. Share your thoughts, feedback or questions on our contact page here.
