Diawater is the first permanent hexagonal deuterium reduced water. 

 

 

 
 


 
Space missions were halted when cosmonauts didn't return alive.Until Deuterium reduced water was introduced.
 
Due to the complicated process of deuterium reduction,
it costs upwards of $200 per liter.
 
Diawater has revolutionized this with its patented methods &
brought the price down by 20x.
 
 

 
Drinking Diawater
means a healthy life instead of swallowing pills for a lifetime 
 
Diawater delivers an advanced type of hydration that protects your body from a host of metabolic disorders, numerous other diseases and can help to mitigate risk for:

Heart Disease
Cancer
Diabetes
High Cholesterol
High Blood Pressure
And More!

 
  Clinical trials No.1 of light drinking water. i.e. Diawater in a single-blind study conducted by the Department of Endocrinology of the Russian Research Centre of Restorative Medicine and Balneology.E.A. Turova, Head of Department, Doctor of Medical SciencesA.V. Golovach, Associate Professor, Candidate of Medical Sciences 30 patients with type 2 diabetes took part in the study:→66% of women and 34% of men→Average age of the patients — 54→Average duration of the disease — 8.5 years→Obesity was diagnosed in all patients (abdominal diagnosed in 63%, gynoid in 37%)→Hypertension was diagnosed in all examined patients→Disorders of lipid metabolism were detected in 76% of patients→Anthropometric indicators: average growth of 166.4 cm, average weight of 94.5 kg, BMI = 35.9 Study design→Group I (study group) — 20 people — received basic hypoglycemic therapy and light water DiaWater.→Group II — 10 people — control group — received basic hypoglycemic therapy and placebo water.Water was administered for 4 weeks. Water was administered at a daily dose of 1 liter; first ingestion on an empty stomach in the morning, and then during the day 30 - 40 minutes before meals. Hypoglycemic drug therapy was not corrected during the study period.After a 4-week course of light water ingestion, glycemic curve indicators in patients with type II diabetes mellitus were observed 2 hours after a glucose load and proved to be similar to those of a healthy person. Light drinking water i.e. Diawater in the combination treatment of type 2 diabetes:
→  Has a pronounced hypoglycemic effect→  Improves fat metabolism indicators and reduces fat mass→  Has hypotensive effects→  Improves blood rheology→  Normalizes the elastase - inhibitor system→  Improves general health
   Research Progress of the Inhibitory Effect of Deuterium-Depleted Water on Cancershttps://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23076183/ A Retrospective Evaluation of the Effects of Deuterium Depleted Water Consumption on 4 Patients With Brain Metastases From Lung Cancerhttps://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18815148/ Deuterium-Depleted Water Influence on the Isotope 2 H/ 1 H Regulation in Body and Individual Adaptationhttps://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31443167/ The biological effects of deuterium-depleted water, a possible new tool in cancer therapyhttps://www.researchgate.net/publication/286997777_The_biological_effects_of_deuterium-depleted_water_a_possible_new_tool_in_cancer_therapy Anticancer Effect of Deuterium Depleted Water - Redox Disbalance Leads to Oxidative Stresshttps://www.mcponline.org/content/18/12/2373 Deuterium-Depleted Water as Adjuvant Therapeutic Agent for Treatment of Diet-Induced Obesity in Ratshttps://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6982901/ In Vitro Study of Deuterium Effect on Biological Properties of Human Cultured Adipose-Derived Stem Cellshttps://www.hindawi.com/journals/tswj/2018/5454367/ *These external studies refer to deuterium reduced water only, diawater is also permanently hexagonal and oxygen rich.The health benefits after consumption of diawater are much higher than with deuterium reduced water alone.   Diawater can play a key role in preventing dehydration and its related adverse effects in people with certain diseases who are advised by their doctors to consume less water and children who just aren’t that fond of drinking water.Being oxygen-rich, drinking Diawater results in more effective and efficient hydration of the body with relatively lesser amount of water consumed.  When it comes to your health, nothing can be more important than ensuring that your hydration process is safe, clean, and most importantly, effective.  When it comes to your health, oxygen-rich water that penetrates our cells more effectively and more efficiently serves to ward off bacteria, fungi, and other viruses that thrive in areas that lack oxygen. Instead, your body will be filled with the oxygen-rich hydration that it craves.    Hexagonal water in the body generates "Exclusion Zones“ Within the millions of layers of hexagonal water/exclusion zones no atom, no molecule and no virus can stay and will, therefore, be pressed to the surrounding bulk water from where it can be transported much easier out the cells/body.  
These exclusion zones begin directly at the cell membranes and nucleus membranes and protect those areas in the meaning that they will be protected from being directly connected with the spikes of viruses, which tend to „hack“ the DNA of cells. 
The hexagonal layers are always negatively loaded inside human bodies and neutralize positively charged hydronium ions; this leads to a beneficial regulation of the acidity level.In a better alkaline environment, all immune system responses to viruses are improved, including the intra-cellular functioning of the mitochondria as part of the immune system by producing more "NO (Nitric Oxide)” gas as an intra-cellular weapon against viruses. 
Hexagonal water optimizes the overall energy level in all systems, including the immune system; furthermore, another natural weapon against viruses, H2O2 (hydrogen peroxide), can be easily produced.H2O2 is used by the body to neutralize all kinds of pathogenic agents. Moreover, it has signaling functions for the activation of specific additional immune responses. In deeper tissues, it will be split by the enzyme "catalase" into H2O and "O" pure oxygen and thereby improves the oxygen supply there.
 Simply put, Diawater is permanent hexagonal deuterium reduced water with extra oxygen that penetrates our cells more effectively and more efficiently serves to ward off bacteria, fungi, and other viruses that thrive in areas that lack oxygen.As a result, your body will be filled with the oxygen-rich hydration that it craves.  How Does Hexagonal Deuterium Reduced Water Support Health?In addition to its contamination-free level of purity, hexagonal water molecules actually contain a higher rate of penetration into human cells, while being able to carry much more oxygen than your typical drinking water.
While we are unable to simply leverage nature’s own process, DiaWater has used technology to mimic the same effects. Our process works to effectively reduce deuterium water molecules in a way that it promotes the stability of these new hexagonal water structures, which positively impact our health in a variety of different ways.
 
With DiaWater, you’re not just drinking water – you’re drinking the purest water on the planet.
 
The Benefits of Hexagonal Water
 
Promotes A Longer Life
Prevents Chronic Dehydration
Helps To Efficiently Move Nutrients Around The Body
Improves Cell Absorption Rate
Detoxifies The Body
Supports The Immune System
Increases Energy
Improves Concentration
Aids In Sleeping
Promotes Weight Loss
Decreases Blood Glucose Levels
Supports Diabetes
Improves Blood Circulation
Aids In Digestion
   DiaWater is considered hexagonal deuterium reduced water.In other words:
DiaWater is structured, magnetized water.This means that strong magnetic forces have impacted the molecules that make up each drop of water, consequently reducing their size and rearranging its structure into a hexagonal cluster. Now, why is that important?It’s important because hexagonal water molecules are virtually exact copies of water molecules that haven’t been contaminated with some sort of human process. And in today’s world, those molecules are quite difficult to come by.Instead, what you’re left with is the purest man-made water available in the world today – nearly as pure as the water molecules that undergo magnetization right in the heart of Antarctica, just above the Earth’s natural pole.  Thanks to DiaWater, you can reap the benefits of advanced hydration designed to mimic the exact effects that nature’s most coldest environments have on water molecules to bring forth a new type of hydration that protects your body from diseases and other issues. Here at DiaWater, our production process relies on the use of advanced magnetization technology designed to remove hydrogen and deuterium from the water molecules, and substituting these elements with rich and pure oxygen.  The ApproachWe take pure, naturally structured living water and separate the deuterium rich and deuterium poor molecules from one other through an artificial process that mimics the natural processes of evaporation, condensation, and rain.  Under a scientific and precisely calculated process that takes into account time, temperature, pressure, humidity, and room specifications, we heat the contained water to produce water vapors that rise to the top of the space and rain down from above. This process is always ongoing and virtually permanent.  From there, we’re able to acquire an exchange of different water molecule isotopes, which allows us to physically extract the hydrogen atom from each isotope, effectively separating heavy (deuterium rich) and light (deuterium poor) water molecules. From there, we’re able to rearrange the deuterium poor water molecules to ensure that they remain separated from the heavy, hydrogen-rich molecules.This technology is essentially used to imitate the exact same process of magnetization that occurs in places like Antarctica and high mountains where glacial water is found. Under tremendous pressure and unimaginable temperature conditions, this process occurs naturally in the world, leaving the purest, freshest, most oxygen-rich untouched water that the world has ever seen.           At DiaWater, our mission is simple – we’re passionate about promoting the health of every single person who walks this Earth. We understand just how valuable clean, toxin-free, un-contaminated water can be, and how unlikely it is to be found in today’s world.  For that very reason, we continue to create, innovate, and advance our technologies to ensure that we can offer the most pure man-made hexagonal deuterium reduced water available specifically designed to provide each user with advanced hydration that promotes overall health.     For several decades, Arthur has worked, researched, and experimented with the different ways in which the frequencies, energies, and vibrations found in the world around us effect our human cells. His intense rigor has led him to further explore the areas of water revitalization and hydration, and ultimately, DiaWater.Considered an expert on Tesla and Lakhovsky, Arthur continues to research the different components of water, including the concepts of absolute purity, hexagonality, and the production of deuterium poor water.Understanding just how powerful water that contains a low content of heavy hydrogen is, Arthur continues to use advanced technologies to magnetize water and ensure that it remains oxygen-rich and deuterium poor.       1 → What distinguishes DiaWater from other brands?Other brands offer high-quality alkaline water. DiaWater provides permanent hexagonal deuterium reduced water with extra oxygen, which is a space industry technology. Since our production process is patented, we are also the only supplier of permanent hexagonal deuterium reduced water that can offer it for affordable prices. Without our process technology, it cost up to 200 USD to produced 1 Liter of deuterium reduced water.  There are two known locations where similar water can be found in nature: Lourdes in France and Hunza in Pakistan. But the hexagonal structure of this water disintegrates naturally after two days at room temperature. With the technology behind the Diawater production process, we are the first in the world who created the hexagonal structure that disintegrated after one year at room temperature. That's the reason why Diawater is the first permanent hexagonal deuterium reduced water with extra oxygen, which can be offered as bottled water on the market and this for affordable prices.   The Hunza people are internationally known for having survived for up to 120 years, mainly due to the quality of their water. The quality of the DiaWater surpasses that of the Hunza by reducing the deuterium content to 85 ppm, while the Hunza water is 120 ppm. This facilitates absorption into the cells, making them receptive to nutrients that help detoxify the system. For more information about the scientific differences of DiaWater, please see our White Paper here. 2 → How does DiaWater help my health?Of the many benefits of drinking this amount of pure water, the most obvious one is increased vitality and life prolongation, more oxygenation, which can revitalize the blood. These benefits can produce associated positive effects such as increased concentration, reduced mood swings, increased digestion, reduced pain, normalization of high blood pressure, reduction of triglyceride, LDL and cholesterol levels, normalization of blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetic patients, reduced chances of cancer development, reduction of body fat and an abundance of general enjoyment of life. 3 → Does DiaWater cure any diseases?According to current laws DiaWater may not be advertised as a remedy. The medication prescribed by the doctor should continue to be taken. Our medical study proves that the intake of diawater leads to a normalization of the values, especially in case of metabolic diseases. You can learn more here. Our philosophy is about health care and healing that is natural and begins with what we put into our body. Since water is essential for life, the consistent intake of DiaWater creates a healthy inner environment that is naturally strengthened against the most common diseases that modern people are confronted with every day. Our water is a breakthrough in the health industry, and we are very confident that if consumed consistently, it can protect you from disease. In this way, you will become strong enough to defend yourself against invaders such as fungi, bacteria and viruses that thrive in oxygen-deficient environments. 4 →​ Should I treat DiaWater as a supplement?In accordance with our philosophy, we advocate that you change your way of thinking and stop thinking about healthy water intake as a supplement to your natural lifestyle. Just as healthy food should not be a supplement, drinking pure water should be a priority and part of your daily life. 5 → Can DiaWater replace other ways to more oxygen such as meditation?No, we even recommend you to develop your lifestyle and include practices that help you to develop an oxygen-rich inner environment. Breathing techniques in meditation also increase and can purify your oxygen; if you use them in synthesis with DiaWater, your health will only become stronger. 6 → How can I know that DiaWater does what it says?We have carried out a medical study to prove the effect of diawater, in addition hundreds of studies have been done on Hunza water over the last decades. The travel of humans into space safely was only made possible by deuterium reduced water. All astronauts (NASA, Roscosmos, etc.) must still drink deuterium reduced water for several months before they can travel into space. If you have been drinking normal water for some time, you will easily recognize the freshness and water density that DiaWater offers. With normal, polluted water, we tend to drink more bottles to feel hydrated. With the quality of DiaWater, you do not need to do much to make your cells feel nourished and you will feel holistically the benefits such as a sharpened state of mind, better sleep, radiant skin and less tiredness. You can read all about the scientific benefits in our white paper here or in our medical study here. 7 → How long should Diawater be drunk for metabolic diseases?Our medical study showed a normalization of the values in the study participants after 4 weeks. However, we recommend a 90-day cure of 1L daily to achieve the best possible results.There is much more information on this website. How can I learn more about what you do?We recommend that you continue to visit our website blog here to stay up to date. You can also subscribe to our newsletter by signing up to receive information directly to your inbox. 8 → How fast can you deliver?Production will start once the crowdfunding campaign is over and delivery to our backers will start at the end of August. The official market entry will be end of October. This means that our backers can purchase diawater at least 8 weeks before all other, in addition to discounts. 9 → Can I mix DiaWater with my favorite powders to make shakes?Yes, but we recommend the use of DiaWater pure without mixing with external substances in order not to reduce the effect, as we have not conducted any studies on this. 10 → How often should I drink DiaWater?Since DiaWater is not a drug, but pure hexagonal deuterium reduced water, you can drink it as often as you like, we recommend drinking one 1 liter per day!For best results, we recommend the consumption of Diawater as follows:250 ml on an empty stomach after getting up250 ml 30 minutes before lunch250 ml 30 minutes before dinner250 ml before going to bedYou will find that you need less intake compared to your previous options, and that's fine; it's proof of how healthy hexagonal deuterium is reduced water and how the alkaline capacity of DiaWater hydrates your cells faster and at a higher level. 11 → How can I know if I am dehydrated?The interesting thing about dehydration is that when it becomes a normal condition, it can actually be difficult to detect. Only when we experience a highly hydrated state can we really see that we might have been exhausted all along. Some signals may be: Brain mist or lack of concentration, general physical fatigue that lingers, shortness of breath, inconsistent digestion and bowel movements, deep coloration of urine, lack of mental strength, decreased motivation and emotional mood swings. 12 → Where can I buy DiaWater?Right here on our campaigns page with up to 33 % discount and delivery at the end of August. Otherwise online from the end of October at our website. 13 → How can I contact you if I have a question?Our team is ready and willing to contact you. Share your thoughts, feedback or questions on our contact page here.

story:
Short Summary

Runatek an early-stage startup working on a tech solution to the opioid crisis. We're developing the Sotiras as a wearable device that can prevent opioid addiction. By actively monitoring opioid levels in patients and administering microdoses as needed, the Sotiras by Runatek will manage pain without an addictive high. The goals of this project are:

  • Prevent patients from developing an addiction to prescription opioid pain medication.
  • Help chronic pain patients to live normal lives.
  • End the opioid crisis 

With your help, we can build up our current prototypes and move toward FDA approval, so that this device can get to work saving thousands of lives per year and millions of lives from being toward apart because of an opioid addiction.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

To put it bluntly, we need help covering the cost of the next stage of prototyping, so that we can get the Sotiras into the hands of those that need it most.

  • We need funding for the next stage of prototyping.
  • For your support, we've got some great stickers, T-shirts, hoodies, and more, so that you can show everyone that you're helping to #EndTheOpioidCrisis!
  • After sending you your perks for backing this project, all funds will be used for developing the prototypes and getting ready for FDA approval.

 

 

The Impact

At the end of the day, our contributors aren’t going to get a board game that they’ll play once a year or pair of earbuds that’ll break after a few months, they’ll actually be a part of the solution to one of the biggest health emergencies in our nation’s history. They’ll get to change the world and save tens of thousands of lives from opioid addiction, and that’s something incredibly special.

  • Every contribution will go toward developing a tech solution to end the opioid crisis.
  • Revolutionizing pain treatment for millions of people.
  • Preventing opioid addiction in millions of patients.
  • Saving tens of thousands of lives per year.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, there are still some essential ways that you can help:

  • Share this campaign on social media and use the hashtag #EndTheOpioidCrisis.
  • Tell your friends and family about us and encourage them to contribute!
  • Submit a new tip to your local news media or favorite blog/podcast and ask them to cover our project and our mission!

Now, however, there is an interest in using the Deep UVC technology in places like schools, office buildings, restaurants, or even our homes to remove germs, mites and dust.Clean up everything you have touched and anything you might touch .

 

 

Riomee’s innovational Deep-UV Sterilizer is built in a modular manner, which means that it can be conveniently disassembled and assembled, and can serve a variety of purposes in different scenarios. Our product will become your number one mate in sterilizing everyday items wherever you are.

Whether you would like to disinfect your smartphone, newly purchased products or various segments of your home, the Riomee UVC-LED Deep-UV Sterilizer will help you accomplish all of these with ease. 

The Riomee UVC-LED Deep-Ultraviolet Sterilizer is designed in a way that serves your own protection. The devices automatically recognizes objects such as handhelds, furniture,clothing and bathroom accessories. It also comes with nifty extras such as the toothbrush disinfection box. This will help you feel safe in your own bathroom.

As for your protection, The device comes with a gravity sensor feature, which means that in case it is tilted, the UV light is turned off to protect your body. 

 

ID  Draft

 DEVELOPMENT 

 

SHIPPING

ABOUT US

RIOMEE is a healthy-life focused smart consumer product .The company is committed to providing users with smart products that promote and support convenient and healthy lives. The team founder and technical team members have worked at top domestic technology companies and have a great amount of experience in design and R&D. RIOMEE focuses on smart home consumer products that bring premium-level performance, adhering to the concept of the simple life, and dedicated to creating products with a sense of technology and convenience for users, letting the latest technology serve every family, and allowing users to experience the fun and convenience brought by modern technology.

story:
Meet LUMISTRAW | Instant Water Purification is now Simple as a Sip - and it's magically filterless

 

 

LUMISTRAW uses state of the art purify-as-you-drink technology to give you instantly clean water, all with the convenience of a reusable straw.

Instead of waiting for your water to boil, going through the hassle of changing filters, using water purifying tablets or dealing with outdated disinfection technology, LUMISTRAW taps on Champs Industrial’s LUMIFLO Technology (patent-pending), enabling you to quench your thirst and drink clean water wherever you want it, whenever you want it.

 

 

Water purification is long in need of an update. 

We at Champs Industrial have been designing consumer household water products for more than 20 years. In our years in the business, we have understood that water is the essence of life, yet getting clean water is riddled with inconveniences.

With current systems, we are constantly troubled with paying monthly subscriptions of time, effort and memory for the maintenance of our filter systems. 

 

Even with the latest light-based purification bottles, we are made to wait 60 seconds before we can even consider drinking.  

 

The Big Realisation

This is when we realised, 

Why should we purify large vessels of water just to wait endlessly for a sip of clean water? 

What if you could purify only what you want to drink as you’re drinking it?

Meet LUMISTRAW

 

LUMISTRAW uses state of the art purify-as-you-drink technology to give you instantly clean water, all with the convenience of a reusable straw.

 LUMISTRAW Features 

 

Instantly Purified Water

Utilising our patent-pending purify-as-you-drink technology, LUMISTRAW reinvents the way we use UV-C to bring down the time you wait for your water to virtually nothing.

Effortless Purification 

 

Just press and drink. No opening of bottles, no waiting, no nothing, just drink.

Replace Nothing, Ever Again

Never replace another filter, bottle or anything ever again. Just press and drink.

Purify Without Limits 

Based off medical grade UV-C Technology, LUMISTRAW allows you to purify water endlessly, and we mean ENDLESSLY.

Drink Anytime, Anywhere 

 

LUMISTRAW is made to be portable to carry along wherever you may go, making clean drinking water a convenience you never knew you missed.

Drink the Way You Like It

Drink from a cup, a bottle, a pool (ok maybe not the pool), whatever you like. LUMISTRAW isn't limited by a vessel.

Anti-Spill. Anti-Leak. Anti-Worry

 

With the inclusion of a one way valve, never worry about water messing with your life.

What's in the box

 

1 LUMISTRAW box
2 Main unit
3 PTFE Flow Tube
4 Mouth cap
5 500ml Tritan Bottle
6 Micro USB cable
7 User manual
8 Spare Accessories

 

 

How to clean LUMISTRAW

 

 Process 

 

LUMISTRAW's Purifying Capabilities

The LUMISTRAW Team 

Water safety has been our priority over the past 20 years. As water heater specialists, we now bring this experience to water purification. Blending the latest technological innovations with seamless user experience, we aim to provide safe drinking water to everyone.

We are committed to adhering to stringent quality control procedures and practices, as well as engagements with scientists in research collaborations, to provide customers product solutions with high standards of hygiene. 

 

To bring you a truly ergonomic product, we collaborated with award-winning agency STUCK to create a truly beautiful product that fits perfectly into your life.

LUMISTRAW isn't limited by a vessel.Anti-Spill. Anti-Leak. Anti-Worry With the inclusion of a one way valve, never worry about water messing with your life.What's in the box 1 LUMISTRAW box2 Main unit3 PTFE Flow Tube4 Mouth cap5 500ml Tritan Bottle6 Micro USB cable7 User manual8 Spare Accessories  How to clean LUMISTRAW  Process  LUMISTRAW's Purifying CapabilitiesThe LUMISTRAW Team Water safety has been our priority over the past 20 years. As water heater specialists, we now bring this experience to water purification. Blending the latest technological innovations with seamless user experience, we aim to provide safe drinking water to everyone.We are committed to adhering to stringent quality control procedures and practices, as well as engagements with scientists in research collaborations, to provide customers product solutions with high standards of hygiene.  To bring you a truly ergonomic product, we collaborated with award-winning agency STUCK to create a truly beautiful product that fits perfectly into your life.

story:
The team at Cooper Product have created a new Microfiber Air Freshener. The group at Cooper Product have a history of creating innovative products in the mobile accessories space such as the iSlip, iSlipTuFF and iSlip Lite tablet screen cleaners. Naming the products has always presented a challenge to our team. Our founder Christopher Cooper is reaching out to the creative minds of the Indiegogo community to ask for assistance with naming our latest innovation. The Microfiber Air Freshener really needs your ideas for a catchy name.

The Microfiber Air Freshener is an Eco-friendly way to keep the inside of your car smelling fresh and clean. The Microfiber creates a green approach to cleaning the glass screens of navigation systems and other smooth surfaces of your car that get messy a you cruise around. The Microfiber can also be used to remove fingerprints from many other electronic devices, such as your cell phone, tablet or laptop. Because the Microfiber Air Freshener will be rotated on a regular basis you will enjoy a fresh smelling and fingerprint free car, home or office. Of course we will stock all of your favorite tried and true colors and patterns.

Our new product line features:

  • a cool mini shirt air freshener constructed of Microfiber, 
  • a card style Microfiber air freshener, and 
  • a mini shoe air freshener with a Microfiber sole. 

Our products are patent pending but are in search of memorable names. We are asking for names like Google, Yahoo, Uber, the names that we all know but had no idea what they meant until their companies became household brands. In order to complete the product line we need short, poetic, memorable names for each of these great microfiber air fresheners, (Mini Shirt, Mini Shoe, Flat Card Style).


We are asking people to help Cooper Product select a short, poetic, memorable name for the new air fresheners by suggesting names and contributing to our $7500.00 campaign. Our naming campaign features four-contribution levels with great perks. With your help we can develop a solid pool of names.

When the campaign closes the naming pool will be reduced to 10 finalists. From those 10 we will select the names. All 10 finalists will receive a one-year enrollment in the Microfiber Air Freshener Club. So there are 2 ways to win with the Cooper Product campaign; 1) provide a name that is selected as one of the ten finalists and 2) of course be the final name selected. The finalist will also receive a really coo gift to be announced at the conclusion of our campaign.

We have confidence in the Indiegogo Community so when we reach our goal we we have decided to honor all who have recommended our campaign to a colleague, family member or friend with a one year Microfiber Air Freshener Club Membership. So help expand the pool by telling the world and help us meet our $7500.00 funding goal.

The funds will also be utilized to:
  • Develop and launch our website.
  • Develop the final product.
  • Finalize the artwork that will identify the product.
  • Earmark funds for the development of the Microfiber Air Freshener Club.
  • Introduce the product at Trade Shows.
Trade shows are where we intend to introduce the Microfiber Air Freshener to industry distributors and retailers. After the introduction to the supply chain you will be able to select the newly named product at auto dealerships, car washes, and general retail locations. Wouldn't it be cool to know you had a hand in naming the Microfiber Air Freshener?

In essence, the selected names will become household terms seen and used by millions of people on a daily basis. Cooper Product will fulfill the campaign orders from the USA. In addition, your contribution will help to create much needed employment. A California Non-Profit will fulfill orders for our Microfiber Air Fresheners.

Our campaign wants to raise $7500.00 dollars in 35 days. We anticipate reaching the goal but in the instance that we reach less than 100% of the goal we will use the funds raised to move forward with the naming process and further product development.

We will be sending the Limited Edition Indiegogo Microfiber Air Fresheners with their new Indiegogo selected name within 30 days following the close of our campaign. Contributors who support our campaign at the featured level will start receiving the club incentives in April of 2015. We believe we will exceed our goal so that everyone can enjoy the club level benefits.

A limited edition Indiegogo Microfiber Air Freshener is being designed as a perk for contributors of all levels in this campaign. The air freshener features our logo a great phrase and the Indiegogo icon.

The Microfiber Air Freshener Club uses input from the club members to choose the air freshener artwork, shapes and colors to be used for the upcoming release. Graphic choices will include images of dogs, cats, sports and other seasonal themes. The releases will be based on the times of the year. Such as in January and February the theme will be winter, Presidents Day or Valentines Day. May and June will be designated as spring themes. July and August will feature Independence Day and summer themes.

We have innovated, designed and patented, several other cleaning products for tablets and technology. We are really excited about including everyone in the naming process for the Microfiber Air Freshener. Your input as always is very important to our firm.

When we designed the Microfiber Air Freshener we were faced with many challenges. Overcoming the challenges has been the most inspirational part of the journey for the new product. With your help the Microfiber Air Freshener product line will be a household item with a short, and poetically memorable name.

Our company is very inclusive. Part of our plan for naming the air freshener includes gathering as much input for a name from customers, vendors, and Indiegogo contributors. Selecting the best name from the vast pool of creative Indiegogo minds can only lead to success with the product. We are interested in poetic names that may be humorous, serious, eco-friendly, patriotic, or whatever name comes to mind. So contribute names and stack the pool with as many names that come to your mind for a Microfiber Air Freshener.

Cooper Product appreciates you visiting our campaign. We want to encourage you, your friends, family, co-workers, and colleagues to get the word out about our Indiegogo campaign. We are on Facebook, Pinterest, Twitter, Instagram, Linkedin, and most social media cites. Use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word.

story:
Gymnast sisters want to conquer the world

                                   Carolina                                 and                              Beatriz

We are two  gymnast sisters. Our sport is acrobatic gymnastics. We intend to be present at the European Championship to be held in Germany in 2015 and in the World Championship to be held in China in 2016.

Every year we want to be in the biggest competitions.

 Beatriz Carneiro is 14 years. 

She was:

  • District Champion in 2013
  • Team Portugal National Champion in 2013.
  • 3th in National Championship in 2013 (WP).
  • Portugal National Champion in 2014 (WG).
  • District Champion in 2015.  
 

Carolina Carneiro is 10 years. 

She was:

  • District Champion in 2013
  • Team Portugal National Champion in 2013.
  • 3th in National Championship in 2013 (WP)
  • 3th in National Championship in 2014 (WP)
  • 3th in TJAM (2015)
  • Team District Champion in 2015.        Watch the video here!!!

Beatriz now competes in female trio (WG) and Carolina in female pair (WP).

To be top athletes we are training at least 5 hours a day.

But...

The Gymnastics Federation does not give us transportation, accommodation, food, tracksuits ... although we represent our country.

We need to help fund our dreams.

We have another sister and our parents make many sacrifices to help us grow. Not easy!

We need suport for:

- Tracksuits

- Medical care

- Sports clothes for competitions

- Internships

- Transport for competitions

- Hotel stays

- Food

This is all very expensive. Without help we can not go.
Our FACEBOOK

story:
ANGIE’S MEDICAL MISSION FUND

Angelina is a little five year old girl.

She is from “Crucecita” Oaxaca, México and she suffers from a heart condition called valvular stenosis.

Her condition is fatal. :(

Aortic valve stenosis means the valve opening in the heart is narrow so the valve does not open all the way, as a result the heart must work harder to pump blood to the body.

The heart must have surgery to avoid heart failure.

Angelina doesn’t know about her condition, she only knows she gets tired very easily.

Fortunately her condition is fully operable, the problem can be solved through an open heart surgery.

This funding is precisely for that surgery.

You can help this little girl, donating whatever your heart tells you.

If you donate you will be making many lives happy but mainly Angie´s

Please donate, and remember: All the help you can give comes directly

…From the heart. :)

Please share, with your family and friends.

story:
Optimize your health with this new one-of-a-kind tailored vegetable construction kit made by Fresh Food Paradise.

There is a problem which all of us know and which follows us our entire lives! We ask ourselves the same question 365 days a year:

What am I going to cook today?

One usually ends up going for dinner, grabbing some fast food or throwing something into the microwave. I know this from personal experience. Even though I am a good cook and I know what is healthy I always have the same problem. To go shopping daily is stressful, takes time and is usually expensive, because you usually end up buying stuff which you do not need or which is unhealthy.

Together we can solve this problem and change the world!

How would you like to have one healthy meal per day delivered to your doorstep or, just pick one up at one of our shops; the preparation of our meals takes less than 15 minutes. No work, no waste, and you don't even have to know how to cook; it is really that simple and healthy at same time, since only natural and fresh ingredients are used. The choice of meals is large enough to experience a different taste every day.


Your help can make our vision reality

It is possible. It just takes a little capital to finance this project, but it is really worth it. With your help, we will reinvent the market for ready meals. Our idea is unique, and has the potential to literally change the world, by ensuring that people become and stay fit and healthy again.
What use are the latest technological advances or the modern biotechnologies, if we literally eat ourselves to death?
Two out of three US citizens are already obese; this means over 200 million citizens alone in the USA, whose quality of life is becoming more and more desolate since today's ready meals not only make the consumer fat, but almost addicted to the chemical ingredients and flavor enhancers in these meals. Animal farms use this principle to feed the cattle. Sad but true.



With your help, we will be able to produce meals that are tasty, healthy, and will drastically change the eating habit of the population; without any chemical ingredients!

We use exclusively natural ingredients such as fresh vegetables, fresh fruit, fresh herbs and spices, as well as selected cereals and nuts as sides.

There are such a large variety of vegetables and spices available that we will be able to develop hundreds of large variety of dishes allowing for a different taste experience every day. 



With your support and our success we will create many attractive and lucrative new jobs in the US, while at the same time tackling the health issue number 1 without the need for extra diets or additional exercise. You help fund the project and in return you will receive our products and all of the above-mentioned advantages; you do not have to be vegan or vegetarian since every meal can be used as a healthy side dish for a nice steak as well.


The impossible is possible - together we can do it

In order to realize our idea, we need an excellent team,  modern production sites, our own stores, machines, software and of course advertising. According to our calculations, we will need a total of up to $10-20 million to set up this Corporation.



We hope that you are just as enthusiastic about our idea as we are and that it will be possible to launch such a campaign in the food market and make it a reality.


What is the collected capital used for?

Your financial assistance will be used to set up the production. We need an initial capital of $1-$3 million, in order to set up the management, to set up the first smaller production site an into the infrastructure.
As soon we need further capital, we will have a good basis to be a get more money for Venture Capitals.
Help us to make this dream a reality and enjoy healthy ready meals in return.


What do you get for your support?

The best we have to offer. Healthy and tasty ready meals that taste so good that you will definitely want more. We offer discounted packages as perks during this campaign with no additional shipping. But you will have to be patient. Realistically, the first meals will be shipped in the Begin of 2017; in case we make it earlier, we will inform you right away.

Please also note that the exact date of delivery will depend on our available locations. Our initial production site is planned around Ithaca, NY which will allow us to serve a 300 mile radius. If you are not within this, it may be longer.

IMPORTANT: Deliveries outside the USA are currently not possible.



Why is the regular price for a single menue $13.5?


High quality food, which is produced while taking into account social and environmental factors, is not cheap. For that reason, we will not explore the cheapest way to produce, but rather keep quality and nutritional value, as well as customer satisfaction, as our main objectives.

All Meals include at least 0.55 lb to 1 lb of vegetables, meaning that a single meal would satisfy the government's suggestion for a healthy diet. Regular 'ready-meals' are usually cereal based because this is cheap and fills the stomach. Real vegetables are very rare in these meals and thus the nutritional value is rather low.

All products are made from fresh ingredients and are either shipped directly to the customers house or can be purchased directly at one of our stores. All products are not precooked or frozen, nor do they contain any chemicals. Any parts of the meal that could oxidize will be specially packed in order to ensure that you receive only fresh food.

All ingredients are 100% vegan (with guarantee) and will be from organic and/or controlled production and will be checked regularly. No artificial ingredients will be included. You receive only those ingredients which you would use if you prepared the entire meal by yourself. All components of the meal will be packed individually. The vegetables will be washed, cleaned and prepared for cooking. The pre-cut vegetables will be vacuum packed and, depending on the menu, be packed into one or more separate containers. All spices will be packed into meal-specific mixtures and will be included with the meal. Salt will always be kept separate. Side orders like rice or noodles will also be packed separately and will be included in healthy quantities.
After opening the package you can prepare each meal within 15 minutes; even making a pizza takes much longer! All meals taste 100% homemade.


Why only vegan ingredients?

If you are vegan or vegetarian, you would not eat meat or fish products, if you are non-vegetarian, you will not have a problem eating a purely vegetarian meal.

Our products offer a healthy alternative for vegans, vegetarians and non-vegetarians  which have not been available on the market in this form before.

Our healthy, vegan food which can be prepared quickly, will assist obese people in losing weight. Offering solely vegan products is not a limitation but instead an option to really reach everyone. If you are jewish or islamic, you will be pleased to hear that our products will fall within the Kosher and Halal guidelines.


Fresh Food Paradise Corporation - experience just how good health can taste...



Fresh Food Paradise, Corporation
391 N.W. 179th Avenue
Beaverton, Oregon 97006
EIN 37-1606502
Registration Number 684875-95


Manfred F. Schreyer
CEO and Founder
39 Village Circle, Apartment 10
Ithaca 14850-8568, New York
Fax (607) 257-0963

story:
What is eTreatMD myHand?

AVAILABLE June 15th, 2015, eTreatMD’s myHand is an app that turns your phone into a medical device. Finally, you can identify and manage the factors that lead to painful flare ups. 

Simply take a photo of your hand using your smartphone. eTreatMD’s myHand uses our MeasureMe™ technology to measure and analyze the most important anatomical indicators of arthritic pain and correlate this to factors such as nutrition, treatments, medications and environmental conditions. The analyzed information is then presented to you in a meaningful way, allowing you to identify the most effective ways to relieve your pain over time.

How it Works:


Take a Picture of Your Hand


Put your hand against a plain sheet of letter-sized paper (or A4). Use the guidelines provided by the app. Take a picture.


Analysis of Hand Using eTreatMD's MeasureMe™ Technology


Your image is uploaded and analyzed by our scientifically validated MeasureMe™ technology with incredible accuracy.  It may save you from even needing an x-ray.

Your information is stored in a safe, secure database in a format that complies with government health privacy standards (HIPAA). 


Track the Effectiveness of Your Treatments


We make it easy to record your treatments — For example, diet, activities, medicines and other forms of therapy, like acupuncture or massage. Make selections by touching buttons and moving sliders. There’s no need to type your journal entries. And the app automatically tracks your local weather.

eTreatMD myHand tracks your treatments over time and shows you which ones work best to relieve your pain and discomfort.

Use Your Report to Understand Your Triggers

We send you a report that correlates and analyzes your data to determine how well your treatment is working.  It helps you figure out what might be triggering your flare ups and also what is working to reduce them. Your report provides a good basis for discussions with your doctor or caregiver.

Share Your Report with Your Doctor 

You have 15 minutes with your doctor, make it count! You can print out a copy of the report to take with you to your appointment, or share it electronically using our secure system. 

It makes it much easier to discuss your own findings and get an informed opinion about how to best proceed.

Share Your Experience With Our Online Community

     

Research demonstrates that community-based healthcare can be more beneficial for everyone involved. It's also more efficient and cost-effective for the healthcare system. That's why we're providing a space for patients, caregivers, family and loved ones to share experiences and explore solutions with one another.  

Did you find a treatment that worked for you? Or are you looking for new ideas and approaches to your own treatment? Engage with people who understand your condition and who want to help one another.

We'll also be hosting online chats with clinicians, researchers, caregivers and people who are struggling like you.

What Makes eTreatMD myHand Different?

This table highlights the critical features that set the eTreatMD app apart from other arthritis management apps: 


Who is eTreatMD?

We’re a startup based in beautiful Vancouver, BC, Canada. Our mission is to give people who struggle with arthritis and other chronic conditions the tools to measure, monitor and manage their own health and wellness.

eTreatMD myHand is our first app based on the MeasureMe™ technology, but we are developing apps to manage the treatment of a variety of chronic conditions (e.g., other forms of arthritis, skin conditions, muscular-skeletal problems, chronic wounds, injuries).

Where Will Your Money Go?

We don’t need your money for development — eTreatMD myHand will launch June 2015! 

But in order for any health app to be considered a medical device, it must meet FDA and Health Canada requirements. 

That’s where your contributions can help. By pledging to our campaign you're helping us to release the most advanced app for hand arthritis currently available. Help us help you or someone else you care about.

Specifically, the IndieGoGo pledge funds will be applied to the cost of FDA and Health Canada registration and clearance for use.

Total estimated cost: $30,000 

Timeline

Risk and Challenges

We believe that we’re creating something that will make a meaningful difference to people. But we still face some challenges. And we need your help. We have a major hurdle to cross with FDA and Health Canada clearance. 

Your pledge will go toward covering the cost of regulatory clearance. More importantly, we need your feedback to ensure that our design reflects your needs and delivers the information that makes a difference to you.

Why Give Arthritis the Finger?

Hand arthritis is one of those diseases that a lot of people do not see as serious. But if you or someone you love struggles with it, you know how hard it truly is to live with.

It can make the simple things we take for granted extremely difficult and painful to do — Simple everyday things like holding a cup, texting a message, or carrying a bag of groceries.   

When we get frustrated by people or situations that make things difficult for us, we can only take so much before we get fed up and say, Enough, I've had it! Admit it, we have all reached that stage when we feel like giving someone the finger. It's an act of defiance against a bully so we re-assert ourselves and take back control.

That's how we feel about hand arthritis. We want to say - Say, Hey Arthritis… and give it the finger! And we want you to be able to say it too! Our easy to use smartphone app – eTreatMD myHand is an incredibly powerful tool for doing just that. 

The Hey...Arthritis!! T-shirt

Here's what you get when you contribute $50 - your very own Hey...Arthritis!!           T-shirt to wear with pride. Once the campaign is complete we will send you an email requesting your size. See the perks list for more details. 

Image by Alejandro est* 

How to get involved

The more people we can help the better! If you have a friend or loved one struggling with hand arthritis, let them know there is a way to help!

Give us your feedback. Let us know about your experience and your ideas! Connect with us on Twitter or Facebook!

* "Que te den.jpg" by Alejandro est is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported licence / Changed the original text.

story:
Help us to give basic preventive health screening and consultations with General practitioners, Ayurveda doctors, Dietitians  and counselling services, open to public absolutely free of cost to promote preventive health.

This way we achieve our ultimate goal to save thousands of lives. And through more centres to reach millions. We are in this together. 

There is so much more we want to do. Not only do we have the clinical know how and scientific know how. But we have a drive to make sure that these people come here has a better life, a happy life away from diseases. But our work is far from finished. We can move faster and by moving faster, we can do things more quickly. 

Revolutionary lifestyle ecosystem. Redesigned preventive health care service. 

Thank you very much. You create a beautiful world. 

Road map to helloDOC - 

Dr Varun worked with international SOS in rural Madhya Pradesh and is a national award winner for outstanding performance in the year 2012.

Dr Jase believes in a doctor-patient relationship, worked extensively with the National Rural Health Mission in the most rural parts of Kerala.

It was during our stints with primary health care, we decided to stop curing diseases and start preventing diseases by coaching a good life style.

In the year 2013 May, we started our service by house visits, school visits and office visits. We got busy and happy. 

The overwhelming response made us to realise the need of redesigned preventive and holistic lifestyle ecosystem. This made us to think, dream and materialize an integrated holistic lifestyle ecosystem. 

 We started helloDOC ecosystem on January of 2015.

We want helloDOC to be used by all. We want to give a very high quality of service not just for rich, but for all. We wanted helloDOC to be a place where people love to come unlike hospitals. To do that, to meet the international standards we had to do a lot of investments. We had to hire the best professionals. We knew that a change won't happen overnight because the change we are talking about is lifestyle. But we are inching forward slowly. How ever, for this to stay afloat and to become sustainable. We need your help to back us up now. 

www.hellodocworld.com

www.facebook.com/hellodocworld

How funds will be used? 

- We aim to provide preventive health care services for individuals.

- Each individual to avail basic preventive health screening and free unlimited consultations with General practitioners, Ayurveda doctors, Dietitian and counselling services for a year.

- And for medical expenses, and operational expenses. 


Media about helloDOC

Manorama

http://english.manoramaonline.com/lifestyle/health/what-s-up-doc.html

The Hindu

http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-features/tp-metroplus/prevent-and-prevail/article6809469.ece

New Indian Express

http://www.newindianexpress.com/cities/kochi/HelloDoc-Launched-at-Panampilly-Nagar/2015/01/22/article2630458.ece

story:
Have you ever wanted to say something to someone but you just couldn't summon the courage to say it? or just didn't have the wording to say it at that time?

Maybe you are just a shy person like me. Who knows. A service I have devised that can solve all of our problems is here.

In under 20 words you can tell someone something you have always wanted to say. Let's not get to carried away though. No vulgar content allowed but if you want to get a few good insults in. I won't hold you back. This service will help you get across things to people you have always thought just never had the chance to say.

The plan:

First I will need you fellow individuals help with building a website for which we can hatch our thoughts. This will take a bit of time, but with financial backing it will get done. Along with a few employees to divulge your thought unto one another.

This is an original idea and I don't believe it has been thought of. Let's not keep it a secret. Share this with everyone and lets get it going.

With simple contact info and a small fee you can finally tell someone how much of a butt head they really are.

story:
Our Cause

Sickle Cell Disease (SCD) is a genetic condition, which affects about four (4) million Nigerians. A study by the World Health Organisation (WHO) revealed that about 150,000 new-borns in Nigeria are conceived yearly with SCD and 100,000 of them die before the age of five (5). 

The Sickle Cell Aid Foundation (SCAF) is a registered Non-Governmental Organisation in Nigeria which began operation in 2010. We are driven by two main objectives: 

  1. To create intense and exigent awareness to prevent new cases of Sickle Cell Disease (SCD). 
  2. To provide specialist healthcare and support for sickle cell patients and their families.

These aims are achieved by 

  1. Educating the populace on Sickle Cell Anemia,
  2. Improve the standard of healthcare available for sickle cell patients
  3. To advocate for the rights of people living with the condition
  4. To work with organisations who have similar aims and objectives

This campaign was born as a result of the dire needs of the organisation. Since inception the activities and advocacy programs have been managed and executed by solely volunteers. Funds have been raised by mostly the family and friends of the organizers. However the organisation has been able to achieve positive outcomes in increasing awareness levels of Sickle Cell Disease. 
Contributing to this cause will help prevent/reduce future occurrences of the disease and give assistance to persons living with it.   
PLEASE VISIT THE GALLERY FOR MORE PICTURES AND VIDEOS!!!


What We Need & What You Get

This campaign requires $38,000 in total. A full breakdown is as follows:-

- We need 10,000 Genotype test kits to perform 10,000 tests during the year. Each test kit costs $2.60 (medical gloves, 2ml syringe, Sample collection bottle, band aid, SMS result service) = $26,000 

- Hiring of 5 staffs at $100 (monthly; for 12 months) = $6,000 [Note these staffs would be hired using a Nigerian government initiative (SURE-P http://sure-p.gov.ng/gis/ ) which will also pay the staffs a stipend of $150]

****Note: The 5 staffs would include 

- 2 Project Co-ordinators

- Project Assistant

- Medical Counsellor

- Fundraiser/Publicity Manager***

 

- Annual newsletter - $2,500

- Publicity (T-shirts, Banners, Badges and Flyers) - $500

- Transportation - $960 ($20 per event x 4 events per month)

- Filling of company's annual Documents - $150 

- Miscellaneous - $2000 

Perks 

We would like to show our appreciation to potential donors by giving out the following perks.

- $20= SCAF branded Lapel

- $50= SCAF white branded T-Shirt

- $100= SCAF branded T-shirt and Lapel

- $200= SCAF branded Coffee Mug, T shirt and Lapel

- $2,000+= A special Humanitarian Award of Excellence which would be sent to you and you will  be given a special recognition at Sickle Cell Aid Foundation annual dinner. This package would include SCAF branded Coffee Mug, T shirt and Lapel.  

- $10,000= A special Philanthropic Award of Excellence which would be conferred on you at Sickle Cell Aid Foundation annual dinner (transportation and accommodation included). This package would include SCAF branded Coffee Mug, T shirt and Lapel. 

If we do not reach our goal, our priorities would go towards securing as much genotype tests kits as possible.  


The Impact

Your contribution would help us propel SCAF to the next level of awareness on Sickle Cell Disease. Our awareness programs are centered around fun activities which interact with the youth. The Know Your Genotype Campaign (KYGC) entails carrying out free genotype testing, awareness and counseling in the 6 area councils of the FCT. The Abuja Municipal Area Council KYGC activities were combined with a sporting activity, ‘SCAFLYMPICS’ to promote healthy living.

So far, Over 3,000 persons have been tested. Persons discovered to have Sickle Cell Trait are given counseling on the effects of passing it on to offspring. Persons who are found to have the disorder were placed on a drug delivery plan.

We work closely with the Nigerian Red Cross, Area Councils, Local Healthcare Centers and Community heads.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute to our campaign we appeal to you to help us spread the word about this campaign by using the share tools on Indiegogo (to all social media platforms). 

Furthermore, if you have access to some of the items we require above and wish to donate them or you are a health practitioner who is conversant with Sickle Cell Disease and wishes to volunteer please do not hesitate to contact us.    

Thank you!!

story:
SAVE MONEY AND THE ENVIRONMENT

  • Switches off your Air Con when nobody is there to use it
  • Saves you money by not using your power when you don’t need it
  • Helps the environment by using less electricity without compromising your quality of life.
  • Waltech has a "learn" function meaning it can learn the infrared Off signal from any infrared remote control.


How does the unit works and what are the modes?

  • The unit works with three modes and turns off the air conditioning system if there is no movement detected.  The 3 different modes have the following functions:
  • Mode 1 - 24 hour detection mode - Detects body movement at all times and emits the "OFF" command to turn off the A/C when no body up to pre-set time threshold is detected (timeframes 2, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100, 120 & 140mins).
  • M2 - Night Set Mode – Allows the A/C to stay on when the room is dark and there is no movement, i.e. when sleeping. In this mode Waltech uses light sensing technology to allow the A/C to stay on when the room is dark enough.  When the unit detects the room is bright again it will automatically work as M1 mode.
  • M3 – Comfort Timer Mode – Allows the air conditioner to be set between certain hours to keep it on or off no matter if there is movement detected. The unit will work as M1 mode out of pre-set time.

Setting up the unit is so easy and should only take 1 – 2 minutes.  The unit comes with an instructional booklet (which you shouldn’t even need) as well as a quick set-up page.  If you get stuck we even have an instructional You Tube Video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XP6usnB6INg

The Waltech unit is under 13 cm in length and can positioned on a wall out of reach (if necessary) as it is a “set and forget” device.The units sleek design will blend in with any décor.

WALTECH COMPONENTS AND  THE TECHNOLOGY INVOLVED

Waltech main PCB Board

Waltech PIR Unit - Motion Detection sensor

Infra red emitter - to send the off signal to the Airconditioner

All the components that make a Waltech

WHAT COMES IN THE BOX

1 x Waltech unit, 3 x AAA batteries, Mounting bracket with screws and a instruction book.  Please Note that if airfreight is required for delivery some carriers do not allow your box to include the batteries.

What We Have Done So Far

  • We have had 3 electrical engineers who have designed and developed the Waltech Unit, to our specifications over a 6 month period

  • We have tested the prototype and refined the functions over another 6 month period in real environments – including having it installed in homes and having Waltech installed in every room in several complexes of Holiday Apartments

  • We have competed 2 x production runs so far consisting of a 100 x prototype units that we used for testing in real life environments and a subsequent production run of 2,500 units to test/ensure the production processes and quality control.

  • Now we are happy with the Waltech Unit and are 100% satisfied that it will do the job it was designed for, we are ready to commercialise it.

What’s Next? / Timeframes

  • April – Build awareness of the product and its benefits in both cost and Environmental Savings.

  • April – Launch Indiegogo Campaign and commence International Press release

  • May – Continue Indiegogo campaign and gain interest from possible distributers and retailers of the product

  • June –Depending on product interest we would like to commence production of at least 5,000 Waltech Units in order to help bring down the cost of the product .

  • June – Distribute our Indiegogo “Early Backer” Waltech units

  • August 15 – Distribute the remaining Indiegogo Waltech Units

    Risks and challenges

    • Production of any product involving multiple components can always be delayed due to availability of parts etc. We have already completed a small run of production units and have been assured by suppliers that this will not cause any delays.

    • Making Sure the product meets our customer’s needs without becoming too complicated or not user friendly. We have done considerable assessment of this with field trials to minimise this risk and ensure that the product fully meets all customer expectations

    • Being able to forecast production requirements, which will in turn keep the overall price down. In this regard we are currently gauging interest in volume to be able to ensure continued product supply.

    • Make sure we have the Supply and Distribution capabilities to meet single large orders as well as multiple smaller orders. Some of our team members have had considerable experience in the area of distribution and we expect our skill set to be sufficient to cover this area of the products success

FAQ

  • What type of Air Conditioning Units can use the Waltech AC Saver Unit?

    Pretty much any wall mounted AC Unit and Reverse Cycle Unit that uses a remote control that has as individual off signal. Unfortunately it will not work for Ducted Air Con or the very old window mounted units that do not have a remote control.

  • How long do the Batteries Last in the unit

    The Batteries last approximately 12 months (We suggest when you change your smoke alarm batteries annually you change the batteries in the Waltech Unit). There is a low battery indicator on the unit for your convenience.

  • What is the Technical Data for the Unit? i.e. its positioning and range.

    o What is the max distance the unit can be from the a/c system – 7 meters
    o What is the motion detecting range – 10 meters
    o What is the Horizontal detection range – 90 degrees
    o What is the vertical detection range – 11 degrees

  • Can people tamper with the unit once it’s been installed and setup?

    No. Once the Waltech unit is set up, the function buttons will lock after 10 minutes without operation. In order to set adjust the unit settings the unit will need to be unlocked by pressing the unlock button found on the back under a secret cover.

  • What happens if the Unit is not compatible with my Air Con?

    If you are unlucky enough to own one of the 1% of remote controlled air conditioners that are not compatible you can send the unit back to us for a refund or alternatively gift it to a friend.  As the unit can “learn” the off function from any remote control it is unlikely that your remote controlled airconditioner does not have an individual/unique off signal.

    Unfortunately we will not be able to refund you the freight component or Indigogo fees deducted.  Also all returns must be complete in original packaging.

  • How long will it take for them to pay back?

    Really it depends on use but Waltech units are achieving great results in our trials with reports of payback periods of less than 6 months in some instances. 

  • How difficult is it to set up?

    Easy, Easy.  The unit comes with a quick set up guide as well as a link “if required” to an instructional You Tube video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XP6usnB6INg.  Really it should only take 1-2 minutes to do.

  • What if I receive the unit and it is faulty?

    All units are tested prior to leaving and you will not have an issue, however if you do have a problem with the unit it will come with a 12 months warranty against faulty workmanship/errors.  Of course the warranty will not cover damage from dropping (ie not being mounted properly) or damage from moisture.
story_txt:
SAVE MONEY AND THE ENVIRONMENT



Switches off your Air Con when nobody is there to use it
Saves you money by not using your power when you don’t need it
 Helps the environment by using less electricity without compromising your quality of life. 
Waltech has a "learn" function meaning it can learn the infrared Off signal from any infrared remote control.







How does the unit works and what are the modes? 

The unit works with three modes and turns off the air conditioning system if there is no movement detected.  The 3 different modes have the following functions:

Mode 1 - 24 hour detection mode - Detects body movement at all times and emits the "OFF" command to turn off the A/C when no body up to pre-set time threshold is detected (timeframes 2, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100, 120 & 140mins).

M2 - Night Set Mode – Allows the A/C to stay on when the room is dark and there is no movement, i.e. when sleeping. In this mode Waltech uses light sensing technology to allow the A/C to stay on when the room is dark enough.  When the unit detects the room is bright again it will automatically work as M1 mode.

M3 – Comfort Timer Mode – Allows the air conditioner to be set between certain hours to keep it on or off no matter if there is movement detected. The unit will work as M1 mode out of pre-set time.

Setting up the unit is so easy and should only take 1 – 2 minutes.  The unit comes with an instructional booklet
(which you shouldn’t even need) as well as a quick set-up page.  If you get stuck we even have an
instructional You Tube Video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XP6usnB6INg




The Waltech unit is under 13 cm in length and can positioned on a wall out of reach (if necessary) as it is a “set and forget” device.The units sleek design will blend in with any décor.


WALTECH COMPONENTS AND  THE TECHNOLOGY INVOLVED
Waltech main PCB Board


Waltech PIR Unit - Motion Detection sensor


Infra red emitter - to send the off signal to the Airconditioner

All the components that make a Waltech

story:
La libre información genera cambios

Free information generates changes

Actualmente existe un ejército de miles de bots que censuran a medios, atacan a periodistas y activistas y alteran tendencias en redes sociales en México.

There is an army of thousands of bots that censor articles and web sites, attack journalists and activists and alter trends in social networks

Desde hace 2 años venimos documentando esta red de bots desarrollando un método manual para localizarlos, denunciarlos y exponerlos. También desde hace 10 años venimos documentando cómo usamos la red para conectarnos y hacer cosas positivas en México y España principalmente a través de un blog loqusigue.net

Since 2006 we have been documenting everything that happens on the internet in Mexico and Spain; how we connect and use it to create cool stuff and also how some try to prevent our organizing efforts using bots to spy and censor. 

A quien usa esos bots no le gusta la libre información y el libre intercambio de ideas. Tampoco le gusta que el mundo sepa lo que ocurre en México.

Porque la verdad y la libre información genera cambios y nos hace libres y a quien usa los bots no le gusta que México evolucione y tenga libertad.

¿Y si todos pudiéramos hacer frente a los bots y a difundir lo que quieren censurar?

¿Qué pasaría si tuviéramos un software online gratuito donde automaticemos toda la tecnología y metodología que hemos desarrollado contra los bots para que ahora todos podamos usarla y cuando se den estos ataques actuemos en masa?

What if more of us denounced the censorship, the bot attacks and the attacks on freedom of expression on the net?

¿Qué pasaría si aparte de actuar en masa contra los bots pudiéramos difundir masivamente y en segundos todo aquello que pretenden censurar través de un super medio que conecte a todos los medios libres existentes y blogs?

What would happen if you help us to massively spread everything that they do not want you to know, creating a super communication medium? Free; without obeying interests, agendas or a few sole opinions?

Hoy  en día nos lleva varias horas detectar y documentar un ataque y no aprovechamos todo el potencial que tienen los softwares libres que utilizamos y que sirven también para unir a las personas, detectar cuando algo bueno pasa, ayudan a articular información muy rápido en caso de desastres naturales; y por ejemplo detectan el objetivo del ataque cibernético y ayudan a crear canales para enviarle todo el apoyo necesaria para hacerle frente.

The same technology we use to detect attacks from bots and techno censorship has other uses. It also serves to detect and know who is doing good things, it works for example to connect to each other and maintain trends as #YaMeCanse against the attacks.


Apóyanos ;)

Si nos aportas en esta colecta podremos crear un software unificado (ahora usamos 4 en distintos procesos) que sería libre y de libre acceso para que puedas ayudarnos y así siendo miles usándolo estas horas se convertirán en segundos.

Después, con toda la información procesada se puede utilizar para crear un gran medio de medios para difundir blogs, lo que publican activistas y periodistas que fueron objeto de ataques a través de una modificación al software libre de Wordpress  y Ushahidi de tal manera que uniendo en segundos a varios medios y blogs existentes y a través de una red podremos difundir en mas lo censurado. Les daríamos la vuelta los bots y a la censura y simplemente no podrían actuar.

So we're inviting you to believe and support a new phase of our project; with a small contribution you will help us to be more with this site in order to do more and better yet-to-be developed software because almost everything that we now do manually would be automated and once released, it can be used by thousands for free. So there will be more of us standing against the attacks.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Con lo que tenemos actualmente podemos procesar apenas una muestra de lo que ocurre en Twitter e internet con los blogs y portales, pero con tu apoyo podremos adquirir equipo más potente para procesar todo, sí, todo. Y con el tiempo obtenido con tu ayuda y recursos podremos desarrollar este software y supermedio. Al aportar recibes

  • El uso libre de este software y de acuerdo a tu donación podrás ser editor o bien analista dentro de la plataforma. Aparecerás en la lista de donadores de este proyecto.
  • Ayudarás a desarrollar tecnología única en su tipo y que puede ayudar a otros países porque lo que ocurre en México es el extremo y otros querrán imitarlo
  • Si no se consigue la totalidad de los fondos de acuerdo a lo recaudado nuestra prioridad será desarrollar lo más que se pueda del programa online contra bots y promoveremos la creación del medio de otras maneras.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Puedes ayudarnos

  • Difundiendo esta colecta y videos en tus medios, en tus redes
  • Denunciando y documentando ataques de bots a activistas, periodistas y medios

¿Puedes confiar en nosotros?

Esta es la tercer colecta que hacemos y en nuestra pagina web podrás encontrar los informes de transparencia y los resultados como el mapa de desapariciones en México: https://loquesigue.cartodb.com/viz/cc94ef3c-8a84-11e4-973d-0e018d66dc29/public_map

Acerca de nuestro trabajo contra los bots:

  • http://www.proceso.com.mx/?p=395143
  • http://pijamasurf.com/2014/06/este-ejercito-de-3477-bots-de-enrique-pena-nieto-te-censura-en-redes-sociales/
  • http://www.proceso.com.mx/?p=297541
  • http://www.unocero.com/2012/05/28/tag-030-280512-ponton-desde-corea-ultra-voice-changer-robos-de-identidad-y-bots/
  • https://loquesigue.cartodb.com/viz/cc94ef3c-8a84-11e4-973d-0e018d66dc29/public_map

story:
The What and The Why 

We're organizing four Fitness Fanatics workshops in Houston, New Orleans and Atlanta with your help to spread the positive, life-changing message of fitness and better nutrition in communities with incomes near the poverty line.

I'm the author of Back in the Saddle to Fit: 10 Steps to Reclaiming Athletic Fitness for the Busy Professional, as well as a marketing communications professional, half marathoner and fitness trainer certified by the American Council on Exercise since 2001. The five-hour workshops and training sessions will be based on the principles of the book. 

According to Centers for Disease Control, low-income communities are likely to have higher incidences of obesity, diabetes or undiagnosed diabetes. Unfortunately, accurate fitness and nutrition information often just doesn't trickle down. These communities are also likely to have poorer health outcomes overall, marked by increased stress, pain, worry, sadness and anger, according to information from Gallup and the Brookings Institute.

One hundred fitness enthusiasts – fitness fanatics or F2s – from community centers, churches and neighborhood associations in low-income areas will be invited to a free, five-hour "train the trainer" workshops. After the workshops, F2s will be able to share accurate health, fitness and nutrition information in their communities throughout the year at health fairs, church workshops and other community events. In short, they become the voices of information who help dispel fitness misinformation and nutrition myths.

Timing  


What We Need & What You Get: Budget & Perks

With your help, the 100 Fitness Fanatics will be able to attend these workshops FOR FREE. The communities targeted for F2 participants have an average annual income of just about $20,000 for a family of four. We want to provide our F2s with the fitness and nutrition they need to take back to community centers, churches and other settings to create a network of friendships that build fit communities. 

THE PERKS (See sidebar)

For your support, you'll receive some cool workout gear -- from sport waterbottles to backpacks based on your level of support. You'll be promoting the cause of fitness and nutrition while sporting your commitment to the cause.

The Budget 

The Impact

After the workshops, F2s will be able to help their communities in the following ways:   

  

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You can help us move closer to the goal by forwarding this page to at least five people who believe that access to fitness and nutrition information should trickle down to everyone. 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools for Facebook and Twitter to help create further awareness for the campaign. 
  • Send a word of encouragement whenever you can. :)

Our World’s Elements are out of Balance . . . Cosmic science effectively Harmonizes our Earth with Radiant Scalar-Waves neutralizing Radiation and EMF’s as transitions in the ongoing process of ‘Oi Ola Honua . . . life on Earth.



 


of Ancient Science in modern times . . .

 






Lt. Colonel(Rt.) Tom Bearden reveals how this technology has been around for decades and how the healing powers of longitudinal waves include time reversal of cells.

http://www.prahlad.org/pub/bearden/scalar_wars.htm

and 


U.S. Defense Secretary William Cohen 

Warns about eco-terrorism using scalar electromagnetic weapons
"Others [terrorists] are engaging even in an eco-type of terrorism whereby they can alter the climate, set off earthquakes, volcanoes remotely through the use of electromagnetic waves... So there are plenty of ingenious minds out there that are at work finding ways in which they can wreak terror upon other nations...It's real, and that's the reason why we have to intensify our [counter terrorism] efforts." - Defense Secretary William Cohen, 1997



Dr. Walter Russell scientifically recorded Nature’s Cosmological mechanics via Waves . . . and expressed that all elements are transmutating from one vibration to another . . . as wave geometries evolving . . . Gold was the frequency attuned by the Alchemist.   

 






The modern Science of Cymatics also reveals vibrational geometries as the core signature of atoms and molecules as the building blocks of Nature and matter. Essentially the vibrational-geometry as cause determines the outcome or effect in space and/or time.
