story:
Team "Flying Dutchess & Soaring Eagle", competing in the Air Race Classic 2015, all women air race.

We are two highly motivated aviatrixes, competing in the Air Race Classic 2015, June 22-25. The both of us are super excited to make this adventure happen. We have a whole lot of drive, motivation and determination. We're following the footsteps of women like Amelia Earhart and Pancho Barnes, who started women's air racing in the United States in 1929. We race in order to: 

  • Encourage future women pilots to take to the skies and get current, "grounded", women pilots back in the Pilot In Command Seat.
  • In fact, we'd like to inspire anyone to start flying, female or male!
  • Increase the public awareness of General Aviation and to help the female pilot community grow

We're hoping to accomplish this by filming our cross country flying adventure, and sharing our videos online. We'll make sure that everyone can follow us through the Blog, Facebook and Twitter. 

With your help, we hope to raise $2000 in order to cover part of the costs to race.

Meet the team:

                                                          

              J.J .Shapiro                                                                 Nancy Bradshaw

 J.J. Shapiro has been a private pilot since 2007. For eight years, J.J. has flown various aircraft and has accumulated over 800 hours. She has flown in Hawaii, soared over the Golden Gate Bridge, been a pilot for organ transport flights, and has experienced low altitude flying as a pipeline observer. Her latest flying adventure is being the proud owner of a 1941 Ercoupe. Her airplane has been restored to mint condition and is a rare beauty that still flies in the skies today. 

As for myself, Nancy Bradshaw, I earned my private pilot license in 2013. I'm now commercially and instrument rated with a total of over 300  flying hours. Just like J.J. I also have a tailwheel endorsement. Currently I am working on the Certified Flight Instructor rating and multi-engine rating. The cross country flight experience will be very valuable when I start instructing. When I'm not flying I work as a discipline engineer at Edwards Air Force Base. 

Together we form the team: "Flying Dutchess & Soaring Eagle". Our team name references to our backgrounds. I am Dutch, hence "Flying Dutchess". "Soaring Eagle" refers to J.J.'s native American heritage. We are both proud of our backgrounds and wanted the team name to reflect that. It just so happens that it makes for a really cool team name!

       


The Race

The Air Race Classic is the epicenter of women's air racing. Pilots range in age from 17 to 90 years and come from a wide variety of backgrounds. Race teams, consisting of at least two women pilots, must fly VFR (visual flight rules) during daylight hours only and are given four days to make flybys at each en route timing point and then land at the terminus. The race route is about 2,100 miles in length.

Air Race Classic Route 2015 

Each plane is flown in race configuration to determine it's handicap speed - and the challenge for each  race team is to achieve actual ground speeds as far over the handicap speed as possible. The pilots strategize to play the elements, holding out for better weather, winds, etc. it is all about flying the perfect cross country. The last arrival at the terminus could be the winner! 

To find more information on the race visit the website: http://airraceclassic.org

We both are based out off sunny Southern California. We will be flying cross country to the start line and back again from the finish line. We can't wait to start on this epic flying adventure!

Where we need your help: Please help us race!

We still need to gather part of the funds to race, and that's where we need your help! 

Our 4 major expenses are:

  • Aircraft rental (J.J.s Ercoupe doesn't qualify to race unfortunately, not enough horse power)
  • Fuel 
  • Hotel costs
  • Food
We've calculated that we'll need at least $13000 in total to make it all happen. With your donations we are hoping to raise $2000 that we will use for the fuel costs. In the event that we manage to raise more than $2000 we will use those funds for the emergency fuel fund. Also for additional race attributes such as an audio cable to be able to record ATC communications, a propeller filter for the camera,  extra batteries, tripod and extra media storage cards.

What you get for your support; awesome PERKS!
We greatly appreciate your support and this is what we have in store for you when you help us. For donations ranging from $1-$4 you will receive a heart felt, huge cyber thank you! Every dollar counts. 
$5-$10 donation you will receive a thank you through the wonders of postal pigeon (USPS). A real life thank you card in the mail.
For donations ranging from $10-$32 you'll receive an original, one of a kind, handmade sticker or magnet.

                                

                          

For $60 you will receive a print of an aviation related original design, the design will be a surprise!  And for $120 you will receive a laminated larger print, also originally designed just for you.

Thank you!!!! 

Thank you so much for your support. We are super grateful for your donations and appreciate you sharing our campaign with all your friends! With your help we will be able to embark on this amazing, epic flying adventure and we can't wait to share our adventures with all of you. Sharing our passion for flying and hopefully inspire many others to take to the skies!!

story:
Hello, my name is Cara, the mother of the most beautiful 18 month old boy! I don't want to post a big sob story, but I also want those to know why we are doing this and what it is for! Our son Connor was our miracle, after 6 miscarriages we were finally graced with this beautiful boy! Since the moment I was in labor there has been poor health care. Nearly almost loosing him at birth, as a result of a nurse. The medical issues followed, with doctors in Oklahoma just drugging him with medications causing major issues. One doctor prescribed him so much that it could of put him in a coma, or worse death. We have to travel to Dallas or elsewhere now for proper care for him and it's been hard on my boy! He was a happy go lucky boy, now seems broken and fights panic attacks & anxiety. He is fighting adverse effects from medications doctors placed him on. 

We moved here as my husband got offered a better job, his dream job. Moving to a state where we didn't know anyone and had no one. Well now his dream job just dropped his pay $20,000 a year making it nearly impossible to live off of and travel back & forth for Connors health care. 

Now as my husband looks for a new job most companies will not pay to relocate. He has been rejected by companies because he isn't living in that state. I waited so long to be a mom, and I will fight to get him the proper care he needs! We MUST get out of here ASAP. I have faith he will find work, but either way we must move. Our son is priority.

We need at least $7500 for moving expenses. Moving truck, flights, gas, moving of car, hotels, etc. We plan to use Upack which is much cheaper then movers. Cost is about $5400 just for that, then add in hotels, flight to fly in help and so forth. 

I would love to offer perks, gifts for giving but I am not sure what I could offer other then my sincere thank you. Once we reach our goal the funds will be placed into our moving account and the process will begin to move out of Oklahoma. Praying during this time my husband will find another job in a area that provides better health care.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know many people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Pass the word out and make some noise about our campaign, share. 
  • Donate anything we could auction off as perks. 
  • Any help with boxes, packing supplies, etc.
  • Know anyone at Upack that can offer a discount.
  • Help to get cheaper flights or free flights to get help out here to help move us. 
  • Any other ideas we are open to! 

Thank you and God Bless!!

story:
Short Summary

You can agree that we are witnessing a growth in the natural hair movement. Natural hair salons and trends have increased exponentially in the last 10 years. Like many women, my natural hair journey has been challenged by the lack of hair products on the market for grooming my locs.  I am Nandi Gilkey, and like Madam C J Walker, I created the natural hair invention of our time.  I am the patent holder of Wrap-A-Loc a hair styling tool -- and a technique that creates curls, spirals and waves on locked and natural hair.  This amazing tool can be worn undetectable in the hair as a style and when removed, curls blossom. Wrap-A-Loc uniquely satisfies the need for versatility, flexibility and long-lasting curls. If you are considering rendering your support for this campaign...you too are beautiful and open to finding more healthy ways to accent your natural beauty.   

My beloved husband and business partner, Glenn Gilkey, after working some 14 years in higher education, quit his job to support my vision.,,which is now our vision. Join us in the natural hair product revolution by supporting our campaign and sharing it with your family and friends.  


What We Need & What You Get

Our company is at an aggressive Growth Stage. The recent rapid growth and popularity of Wrap-A-Loc products nationally and internationally moves us to expand our operations.  Currently, there is nothing like the Wrap-A-Loc tool in the marketplace.  This miraculous tool has transformed the way locs and natural hair is styled. We have a contractual agreement that will assist in putting the face of our products in retail outlets with major distribution chains across North America.  We also submitted proposals to have our products marketed though large suppliers to the Caribbean and Central America.


The Impact

With your financial donations and support our goal is to raise $5000, over the next  50 days. Your benevolent contribution will allow us to:

·   Repackage the product, giving greater appeal to an ever changing and increasing customer base.

·  Re-branding of the website for a smoother and effective purchasing experience.

·  Satisfy increasing demands for access in local salons, beauty supply and department stores as well as ethnic shops.

·  Expand some administrative operations through partnership with a fulfillment center.

To thank you for your donation I've created perks that I hope will inspire you to give as much as you can. Peace & Blessings!

story:
The Dorset Destroyers are a Wheelchair Rugby Club based in Poole, Dorset. The other names known for our sport are Murderball or Killerball.

So what are we fundraising £1,500 for? Two reasons basically, the first being to give disabled people a chance to play this great sport. We offer free taster sessions to new players, but it costs the club between £32 and £64 a month depending on how many attend.

The other thing is that not all disabled people can afford to play, for whatever reason. When you play sport it gives you confidence, and our club also has a great social side to it. Many people have said that they love the idea that it's not just a case of play and go, but we like to chat, have a laugh, go out for our monthly social and after our Sunday session we sit down together, have a bite to eat, drinks and spend a couple of hours getting away from everyday life.

What with the confidence that this sport and club has given to players, several of them are being loaned out to other clubs for the league matches in 2015/2016. As we are a young club, we don't start in the league until late 2016, and we will have 2 teams. 1 in the traditional league and 1 in the new league currently being developed by our Head Coach.

The other reason is that, when we start in the league next year, there are enormous costs involved, such as insurance, league costs, travel expenses for 20 wheelchairs, 30 sets of wheels and all the equipment to fix it up, the cost of volunteers who take annual leave out of their own jobs so that they can be with us at the league matches doing all the essential support work. They don't get paid, but we have to be able to help them out in order for us to play.
 The difference that this club has made to many people's lives is enormous. For instance, before I started this all off in March 2014, I was a nervous wreck, had had 2 breakdowns and 40+ operations and was very shy of talking to strangers.

Now, I appear on videos etc doing interviews with strangers and so many other things. I am even working again and although it's very tiring I do thrive on it, and this is all because of this club.

Wheelchair Rugby gave me that confidence and I want to help many other disabled people to either try out the sport or for them to progress to the next stage. Who knows, in years to come you may well see some of these players at the Paralympics??

Each one of these wheelchairs cost just under £3,000 for the very basic model with spares. We have managed to fundraise for 20 so far, but the demand is great and we could do with 25/30, but that's another plan for another day. As you can see by the beginning of the video, they take quite an impact, but they create a bigger impact on our lives :)

We are also looking for a sponsor or several sponsors. As we speak we have no team kit, or training kit for either team so there are 4 sets of kits that need to be bought and to have your company name on it. Plus boards around the court when we play matches at Poole.

Our costs for the club to run are just shy of £9,000 a year, which includes hall hire costs, mechanical equipment to be fixed and tyres, tyres, tyres by the bucketload.

story:
Join us and be part of the solution

Trichotillomania Support are the only UK non profit working exclusively to help people with trichotillomania, BFRBs and OCD worldwide. 

You have heard all those people who tell you pull free is impossible or unsustainable, we are here to show you it is not only achievable, it CAN be easy.

Find us at our website

  • We are a small number of dedicated pull and pick free volunteers.
  • Each kit is lovingly put together by hand, but Michelle, one of only two full time volunteers, cannot any longer cut every card by hand.
  • Your donation will help us print more copies, filling the 200+ boxes piled up in our "office" which is actually one volunteer's dining room!

Save Michelle's poor fingers!!!


Michelle works tirelessly, full time and without pay, to make sure there is someone available to help trichsters 8 hours a day, 7 days a week, 360 days a year.  Our support goes out to those in the United States, Canada, all parts of the UK, New Zealand, Bahrain,

TJ, our volunteer negotiator, found us an awesome deal to print our techniques in the UK

We are embarrassed to admit, we don't have the money to pay the printer.

  • If you have ever called our helpline +447910 114739, you will know that we have trained, qualified people IN RECOVERY from BFRBs themselves, on hand to help and advise. 
  • We lose one volunteer for a whole day to chopping up bits of card and we don't want Michelle to lose her fingers!
  • If we can't raise the £550 needed for 200 boxes, we will use the funds for free coaching for a well deserving trichster teenager in foster care.

How we help

"Thank you so much for my beautiful pull free kit, I love it!  The designs are beautiful and they really make me aware of just how much joint enterprise there is among people with BFRBs.  If I pull I feel like I am letting the side down, but then I just pick out one of the encouraging setback cards or send you a text and I am fine to start another, longer pull free run."  BA, London

  • We all need a positive boost, and there are over a hundred in this box. 
  • Our success rate of thousands of pull free people worldwide has been proven for nearly 2 decades. 

You Can Help us in so many valuable ways

We know the culture of requesting donations can be overwhelming and nobody's pocket is a bottomless pit ... so if you can't help financially, take a look at our products and ...>

  • Volunteer

  • Please spread the word, raise awareness and make a song and dance about our plea.
  • Enjoy using the Indiegogo share tools!

We pledge that the more we raise, the more voluntary support work we will put in. Thank you so much for your time and contributions.
story_txt:
Join us and be part of the solution 
 Trichotillomania Support are the only UK non profit working exclusively to help people with trichotillomania, BFRBs and OCD worldwide.  
You have heard all those people who tell you pull free is impossible or

unsustainable, we are here to show you it is not only achievable, it CAN

be easy.
Find us at our website 
 We are a small number of dedicated pull and pick free volunteers.
 Each kit is lovingly put together by hand, but Michelle, one of only two full time volunteers, cannot any longer cut every card by hand. Your donation will help us print more copies, filling the 200+ boxes piled up in our "office" which is actually one volunteer's dining room!

story:
People are dying because ambulances need repairs!

If you have ever had to wait for an ambulance you will know  it's at times like this that minutes feel like hours, but imagine actually having to wait so long that it is too late when the ambulance arrives to save a life. People are dying waiting for an ambulance purely because there are not enough in working order.

Health spending in Greece has been slashed in half in the last five years. Many ambulances are off the road in desperate need of repairs. Consequently the remaining ambulances are taking too long to reach an emergency call out and people are dying waiting for them. Ambulance staff, who have seen more recent wage cuts, have just suspended a proposed strike as they do not want to endanger public health. These people despite not having a full wage or even the tools needed to do their job properly are dedicated to public healthcare and continue to strive to save lives. In my eyes they are heroes!

A couple of poignant articles:
http://www.euronews.com/2015/06/18/greece-s-ambulance-service-in-need-of-a-lifeline/
http://medicalxpress.com/news/2015-01-greek-health-life-death-samos.html

What we need and what you get:

I have set a target of 50,000 Euros which will go a long way to help save lives by putting ambulances back on the roads.

All profits from this campaign will go towards repairing ambulances even if the target isn’t reached. I will be starting with the ambulance service in Corfu and moving on to other islands and the mainland should the target be reached.

Please help by making a donation or choosing a perk. The perks include a couple of simple traditional Greek items and a couple of amazing holiday destinations (flights holiday insurance are NOT included but airport transfers and a welcome hamper are). Donations of any amount are received with thanks.

Why have I started this campaign?

I am lucky enough to be able to spend a lot of time in Greece. I have seen the effects of the Greek crisis first hand and wish to try to raise funds for specific causes that are in dire need of cash injections just to get them back to working order.

I recently made a donation to Thom Feeney's Greek Bailout Fund campaign on here. Sadly the campaign did not reach its goal. I did everything I could to spread the word and encourage donations. It was a tad ambitious but a great idea anyway. It did, however, get me thinking about the purpose and what the results would have actually been for the Greeks as individuals should it have reached its goal. It may well have covered the payment that Greece has just defaulted on but it would still mean that the Greek people must carry on living as they are and continue to work towards paying the next huge installment. I see Thom has now started another campaign to help fund education in Greece. Investing in the future of the Greek people is an awesome idea but there are some more pressing and immediate issues that with funding can be fixed sooner rather than later. People dying whilst waiting for an ambulance because there aren’t enough in service would be just one of them.

story:
Help TickEase Take the Bite Out of Ticks!

In an effort to get the power of tick prevention into the hands of the public, TickEase inventor and suburban deer and tick expert Dan Wolff is announcing an exciting new Indiegogo campaign. TickEase benefits not only consumers and their pets, but also the animal rescue organization of their choice.

TickEase is the revolutionary new tick removal tool invented by Wolff. “I designed TickEase with very fine-tipped tweezers at one end, that are perfect for removing even the smallest ticks from humans quickly and effectively,” says Wolff. “The other end of the tool features a slotted scoop that is perfect for removing those big, engorged ticks from pets and other animals.” There are a lot of old wives’ tales and misinformation about tick removal and disease prevention, and Wolff hopes to set the record straight through his products and his groundbreaking tick-prevention portal-www.tickease.com.

Today, I am here asking for your help. We need support to expand tooling and manufacturing capabilities to further drive costs down while, at the same time, increasing R & D on 3 additional tick related products.



“TickEase allows you to easily, safely and completely remove ticks from people and pets. Proper removal can reduce the risk of infectious diseases like Lyme disease. TickEase is the only dual-sided tick removal tool that lets you remove ticks with ease!”

Risks and challenges

Tick-borne diseases are becoming more prevalent year-round and world-wide, therefore, the biggest challenge we face is inventory management. When dealing with factories overseas, one must always be ready for delays in shipments. Holidays, natural disasters and union labor strikes are a source of concern and can cause delays in order fulfillment. One way to protect our orders is to have a back-up factory in another location that will manufacture and ship, should we face significant delays. This might be an added cost, but at least our customers will be able to get product. Other challenges we face deal with the prototyping of additional tick prevention products. We must be confident that our sourcing agents and designers are able to produce the finest samples and we must be able to fund the cost of expensive molds and tooling. This campaign will provide the support we need.

story:
Quest Fitness: A Grand Rapids, MI Gym Providing Personal Training from Beginner To Pro

Hi, my name is Ray and I used to have a brother, also named Ray.  It sounds like the punch line to a bad joke, but bear with me because this is the start of my passion for fitness.  

You see, my brother the other Ray was murdered in 2003. He left a hole in not only my heart, but the rest of my adoptive family's.  When I was still in diapers brother Ray saved me from abusive parents; by the time I was eight he was spending his spare time teaching me about healthy eating and martial arts.  He'd served in Thailand in the military, and learned about Muay Thai while he was there.  His dedication and time meant a lot to me, and so with his passing I took up practicing and teaching Martial Arts to honor him.  Granted, Muay Thai is not something I practice a lot of anymore. I moved to a style that best fit me, Taijiquan.

So what's all this paying for?  An add on to my existing space, gym equipment and new flooring.

Over the years I've gone from desk jockey to full time martial arts instructor, incorporating strength training to improve my practice; along the way I discovered that I share brother Ray's passion for helping people. (Did I mention he once made a meal plan for Muhammad Ali?  He really was my hero.)  

After a lot of soul searching I decided to follow his lead and open a private fitness studio in Grand Rapids, MI.  I will help people from all spectrums of fitness, while offering special packages for people in college, or with a military and service professional background.  I also plan to provide community outreach by offering special pricing for Tai Chi classes for the elderly and Multiple Sclerosis patients.

Personally:  I'm a father of two beautiful boys and husband to a romance writer.  

I'm also a huge video game and table top role play game nerd. I get how easy it is to lay back and veg instead of working out.

So, my name is Ray, I used to have a brother also named Ray, and in his memory I'd like to have your help opening a gym in West Michigan.


I also have some goals, so that you know where I'm going with this:

  • Year 1: Expand on my house, purchase gym equipment, and begin offering fitness classes and private training to the community
  • Year 2: Hire an additional personal trainer and start making training videos and online programs.
  • Year 3-5: Purchase a gym space, hire up to four employees, and expand to offer a variety of classes such as more Insanity, Yoga, Tai Chi, and various boot camps.
  • Year 5-10: Expand gym size to offer more space for additional members, continue to offer classes, and expand hours of operation. 

Want to help but low on cash?  Please consider a like and share on Social Media.

What Membership Gets You:
  • Access to the gym equipment
  • Discounted rates on training, 
  • Online help, 
  • Fitness newsletter 
  • Discount group classes
  • Hours are yet to be determined and by appointment

story:
Who Are We?

GO THE MANU was created four years ago as a dream to unite Manu Samoa fans from around the world in support of their team during the 2011 Rugby World Cup. Messages of encouragement and pictures poured in from all corners of the world, culminating in several videos being produced to boost the team morale which was shown on national television (and picked up by overseas media) to show support for their RWC 2011 efforts.

GO THE MANU brought the fans and the team closer together, sharing a love of God, country and rugby for the world to see. (You can watch an example above)

Often regarded as the "David" to the Goliath Unions and the original "Giant Killers", it has been well documented that Manu Samoa does not have the same deep pockets as the larger Unions around the world. The team struggles with things that other international teams take for granted. In an ideal world, we wish that all teams could compete on an even level playing field. But despite being one of the lowest paid teams at the World Cup--with some players taking big pay cuts from their overseas club commitments, Manu Samoa players wear that jersey proud and play for the people. You. Us. The masses that all bleed blue!

Your pledges of support and donations will go a long way towards helping Manu Samoa players perform at their full potential at this year's World Cup.

Manu Samoa players proudly wearing GO THE MANU t-shirts. (Kahn Fotuali'i, Sakaria Taulafo, Ken Pisi and Logovi'i Mulipola)


What We Need

We hope to raise together with other fundraising activities in Samoa, US$100,000 to help the team. We've set the goal amount for our Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign at US$50,000, if we surpass that then all the better. There are 31 players in the squad and we will divide the funds evenly amongst them. All donations will go directly to the players. It will be presented to the Manu Samoa captain in a transparent and open manner for all fans and supporters to see.

The Impact

What can we do as a global family of Manu Samoa fans and supporters? This fundraising campaign aims to demonstrate in a tangible way the support Manu Samoa have around the world and will act as the 16th player on the field, representing every Samoan supporter behind them.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, you can help in other ways by sharing the link to this campaign and using the hashtags #IBleedBlue #GoTheManu #ForTheBoys. If you live in Samoa you can donate instantly from your mobile phone by texting the phrase "Go The Manu" to Digicel shortcode 485 at a cost of only WST$1 and 100% of that will also go directly to the players. Visit www.gothemanu.com for updates. Please help make our support for the players viral. Fa'afetai le lotonu'u. We all bleed blue! Go the Manu!

story:
Small Business, Big Impact

My name is Norman Seavers III. I’m an entrepreneur and consultant focusing my efforts on the area where I’ve gained the most experience: the allograft and tissue implant industry. My experience working in R&D and with researchers across the country has helped me to develop a pipeline of product ideas based on tissue allografts, donated & processed human tissues of various kinds, that can bring innovation to the established allograft market. Our focus is Amnion: the inner lining of the placenta which has tremendous clinical capability! Organ & tissue donation is an extremely generous way that people can help to restore function and enhance the lives of thousands of patients in need. Our goal is to extend the gift of donation by increasing the available therapies derived from allografts, specifically amniotic grafts. Your contribution will help to establish and confirm our R&D efforts, introducing a new line of therapies and the potential for enhanced quality of life for patients with unmet or underserved needs.

Our Roadmap

We are currently focusing on a three-month R&D phase for testing and validation of our initial concept. Our current development plan includes the following:

1. Patent Development Processes

  • Provisional patent applications for initial R&D are already in place
  • Non-provisional (final) application filings with associated data
  • Manufacturing consultants to provide technical assistance/advice 

2. Research & development for evidence-based results & data

  • Initial project parameter validation (incl. >= ten (10) individual trials)
  • Revisions & adaptations
  • Validation of manufacturing process 

3. Operating Expenses

  • Stipend & salaries for initial R&D phase (3 months)
  • Research budget including laboratory facility usage fees, manufacturing costs, raw materials for initial R&D
  • R&D storage for future validation and archiving

Our request for funding is broken down as follows for the R&D phase (3 months):

Administrative expenses (Stipend, salaries, etc)            $7500.00

Patent development processes/Consulting fees           $3000.00

Manufacturing/Laboratory costs                                         $4000.00

Procurement/raw materials                                                   $5000.00

Storage costs                                                                               $   500.00 

Total R&D Phase Expenses                                                  $20,000.00

Administrative costs include the salaries/stipend for one
full time employee & two part-time employees during the 3-month R&D
phase. The manufacturing costs will cover fees for lab usage & contractors
to perform the R&D runs validating the concept & fine-tuning the
process. Procurement costs include the fees charged by accredited agencies
providing the tissues needed. We expect to have enough material for at least
ten (10) experiments/trials.

Monthly Progress Updates

Expect monthly progress updates on the project's current status and developing strategies. We'll keep you informed on any changes to our timelines and also let you know what the future holds for our product development process.

You'll also have the knowledge that you are making an impact in the medical community and benefiting patients on a global scale with your contribution. We are extremely grateful for your support and we're working on a few tangible items to say thank you as we move into phase 2.

If We Miss the Mark In Reaching our Entire Goal

Our focus will be to get as many trial runs completed as possible in order to validate our proposed concepts. We hope to carefully manage our funding resources allocating the bulk of our resources toward the key actions of laboratory testing in the event that we are unable to reach our entire goal. In this manner we would expect that R&D success will allow for additional follow up funding and phase two development (processing runs, product sizing, packaging requirements, etc).

The Impact

Imagine the possibility of taking something normally discarded and transforming it into a life-changing therapy that could benefit thousands. Millions of women have cesarean sections each year as they welcome their new additions to the family. In each case, after the baby is safely removed, the placenta, where the baby grows, develops and is nourished, is discarded by the surgical staff. The special inner lining of the placenta called amnion carries millions of life saving cells and healing factors within its innate function. Through medical advancements over the past several decades a number of companies are using the innate capabilities of amnion to bring cure diseases and ailments including eye diseases & injures, chronic & acute wounds, and improved healing of surgical incisions.

Here’s the short story: potential donor mothers are provided information during their local OB-GYN visits and given the option of donating their placenta if they are having a scheduled c-section. The placenta is removed by the doctor & surgical staff after the safe delivery of the baby. It is normally discarded as medical waste but in this case is able to be utilized to provide a valuable clinical therapy. Qualified & accredited procurement agencies receive the placenta from the surgical staff under sterile conditions and prepare, package and ship the placenta to be utilized in our proprietary process.

One of our initial targets is in Wound Care. The industry is estimated to reach nearly $19 billion in revenue by the year 2019. Our developing pipeline of applications provides allograft therapies (an already established technology) manufactured in unique delivery methods. Our first candidate has a provisional patent and aims to provide a more effective wound irrigation solution related to current  options while avoiding some of the contraindications of available alternatives (esp. toxicity from long-term use). Through our proprietary process, we'll provide a wound irrigation solution that is not only antibacterial but also introduces the wound healing attributes of amnion into negative pressure wound therapy applications. In addition, we are also working on the presentation of a new therapeutic delivery method (candidate #2) for an under-served segment of the industry: inflammatory skin disorders.

Amnion provides anti-inflammatory protection, angiogenesis, and has the potential for the introduction of multipotent cells- all-important characteristics that promote healing in the wound environment. Amnion is natural, readily available, and powerful in its clinical effect. Our plan is to provide documented evidence to demonstrate the success of our process and the value of the innovative therapy. We’ll work with established labs, accredited procurement agencies, and provide full disclosure of our work to all contributors as we make progress.

Risks & Challenges

Like all worthy ventures and causes, our campaign is not without challenges. Here are a few challenges that may arise in the process with our plans to address them.

  • Actual yield per donor: We understand that the placenta is a limited resource and will yield only a certain amount of viable testable material. We've planned with our sources to gain access to additional material as needed so we're able to continue to make progress in the event more initial material is required.  
  • Determining processing parameters: Our process is novel, meaning we may need to make adjustments quickly based on incoming results. We plan to establish a target range for initial testing parameters based advice from on industry experts and available literature reviews. In addition, we'll make definitive decisions on subsequent trials based on the differences between real data and our targeted outcome.
  • Chemical compound development: The novelty of one our product candidates is unchartered territory and with it comes the associated risk. We plan to consult chemical composition and pharmaceutical industry experts to determine the most strategic starting point to reach project success.

My career in R&D provided the experience necessary to make adjustments to project parameters in the most effective manner possible. I’ve had the opportunity to build project parameters with clients & researchers from scratch and worked closely with them to adjust as needed whether the required changes determined project success or failure or whether it simply enhanced the project’s efficacy. We will make a definitive roadmap to project success while also developing alternative plans to address risks and challenges to keep us making progress in the right direction.

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize everyone can't contribute financially, but we appreciate your support. Take the time to spread the word about our campaign and make sure you keep up with the status updates. Let us know how you think we're doing. We value your feedback.

And if anything is ever unclear related to our projects or processes, don't hesitate to reach out & ask for clarification. We want to keep you in the loop and educated about what we do. We love sharing our story & its impact on our communities. Use the Indiegogo share tools & let people know we're here!
story_txt:
Small Business, Big Impact
My name is Norman Seavers III. I’m an entrepreneur and consultant focusing my efforts on the area where I’ve gained the most experience: the allograft and tissue implant industry. My experience working in R&D and with researchers across the country has helped me to develop a pipeline of product ideas based on tissue allografts, donated & processed human tissues of various kinds, that can bring innovation to the established allograft market. Our focus is Amnion: the inner lining of the placenta which has tremendous clinical capability! Organ & tissue donation is an extremely generous way that people can help to restore function and enhance the lives of thousands of patients in need. Our goal is to extend the gift of donation by increasing the available therapies derived from allografts, specifically amniotic grafts. Your contribution will help to establish and confirm our R&D efforts, introducing a new line of therapies and the potential for enhanced quality of life for patients with unmet or underserved needs.
  Our RoadmapWe are currently focusing on a three-month R&D phase for testing and validation of our initial concept. Our current development plan includes the following:1. Patent Development Processes
Provisional patent applications for initial R&D are already in place
Non-provisional (final) application filings with associated data

Manufacturing consultants to provide technical assistance/advice 
2. Research & development for evidence-based results & data
Initial project parameter validation (incl. >= ten (10) individual trials)
Revisions & adaptations
Validation of manufacturing process 
3. Operating Expenses
Stipend & salaries for initial R&D phase (3 months)
Research budget including laboratory facility usage fees, manufacturing costs, raw materials for initial R&D
R&D storage for future validation and archiving
Our request for funding is broken down as follows for the R&D phase (3 months):Administrative expenses (Stipend, salaries, etc)            $7500.00Patent development processes/Consulting fees           $3000.00Manufacturing/Laboratory costs                                         $4000.00Procurement/raw materials                                                   $5000.00Storage costs                                                                               $   500.00  Total R&D Phase Expenses                                                  $20,000.00Administrative costs include the salaries/stipend for onefull time employee & two part-time employees during the 3-month R&Dphase. The manufacturing costs will cover fees for lab usage & contractorsto perform the R&D runs validating the concept & fine-tuning theprocess. Procurement costs include the fees charged by accredited agenciesproviding the tissues needed. We expect to have enough material for at leastten (10) experiments/trials.Monthly Progress UpdatesExpect monthly progress updates on the project's current status and developing strategies. We'll keep you informed on any changes to our timelines and also let you know what the future holds for our product development process.You'll also have the knowledge that you are making an impact in the medical community and benefiting patients on a global scale with your contribution. We are extremely grateful for your support and we're working on a few tangible items to say thank you as we move into phase 2. If We Miss the Mark In Reaching our Entire GoalOur focus will be to get as many trial runs completed as possible in order to validate our proposed concepts. We hope to carefully manage our funding resources allocating the bulk of our resources toward the key actions of laboratory testing in the event that we are unable to reach our entire goal. In this manner we would expect that R&D success will allow for additional follow up funding and phase two development (processing runs, product sizing, packaging requirements, etc).  The Impact
Imagine the possibility of taking something normally discarded and transforming it into a life-changing therapy that could benefit thousands. Millions of women have cesarean sections each year as they welcome their new additions to the family. In each case, after the baby is safely removed, the placenta, where the baby grows, develops and is nourished, is discarded by the surgical staff. The special inner lining of the placenta called amnion carries millions of life saving cells and healing factors within its innate function. Through medical advancements over the past several decades a number of companies are using the innate capabilities of amnion to bring cure diseases and ailments including eye diseases & injures, chronic & acute wounds, and improved healing of surgical incisions. 
Here’s the short story: potential donor mothers are provided information during their local OB-GYN visits and given the option of donating their placenta if they are having a scheduled c-section. The placenta is removed by the doctor & surgical staff after the safe delivery of the baby. It is normally discarded as medical waste but in this case is able to be utilized to provide a valuable clinical therapy. Qualified & accredited procurement agencies receive the placenta from the surgical staff under sterile conditions and prepare, package and ship the placenta to be utilized in our proprietary process.
One of our initial targets is in Wound Care. The industry is estimated to reach nearly $19 billion in revenue by the year 2019. Our developing pipeline of applications provides allograft therapies (an already established technology) manufactured in unique delivery methods. Our first candidate has a provisional patent and aims to provide a more effective wound irrigation solution related to current  options while avoiding some of the contraindications of available alternatives (esp. toxicity from long-term use). Through our proprietary process, we'll provide a wound irrigation solution that is not only antibacterial but also introduces the wound healing attributes of amnion into negative pressure wound therapy applications. In addition, we are also working on the presentation of a new therapeutic delivery method (candidate #2) for an under-served segment of the industry: inflammatory skin disorders. 
Amnion provides anti-inflammatory protection, angiogenesis, and has the potential for the introduction of multipotent cells- all-important characteristics that promote healing in the wound environment. Amnion is natural, readily available, and powerful in its clinical effect. Our plan is to provide documented evidence to demonstrate the success of our process and the value of the innovative therapy. We’ll work with established labs, accredited procurement agencies, and provide full disclosure of our work to all contributors as we make progress.
  Risks & ChallengesLike all worthy ventures and causes, our campaign is not without challenges. Here are a few challenges that may arise in the process with our plans to address them. 
Actual yield per donor: We understand that the placenta is a limited resource and will yield only a certain amount of viable testable material. We've planned with our sources to gain access to additional material as needed so we're able to continue to make progress in the event more initial material is required.  
Determining processing parameters: Our process is novel, meaning we may need to make adjustments quickly based on incoming results. We plan to establish a target range for initial testing parameters based advice from on industry experts and available literature reviews. In addition, we'll make definitive decisions on subsequent trials based on the differences between real data and our targeted outcome.
Chemical compound development: The novelty of one our product candidates is unchartered territory and with it comes the associated risk. We plan to consult chemical composition and pharmaceutical industry experts to determine the most strategic starting point to reach project success.
My career in R&D provided the experience necessary to make adjustments to project parameters in the most effective manner possible. I’ve had the opportunity to build project parameters with clients & researchers from scratch and worked closely with them to adjust as needed whether the required changes determined project success or failure or whether it simply enhanced the project’s efficacy. We will make a definitive roadmap to project success while also developing alternative plans to address risks and challenges to keep us making progress in the right direction.   Other Ways You Can HelpWe realize everyone can't contribute financially, but we appreciate your support. Take the time to spread the word about our campaign and make sure you keep up with the status updates. Let us know how you think we're doing. We value your feedback.And if anything is ever unclear related to our projects or processes, don't hesitate to reach out & ask for clarification. We want to keep you in the loop and educated about what we do. We love sharing our story & its impact on our communities. Use the Indiegogo share tools & let people know we're here!

story:
During the course of 5 years, Sean has been medicating with cannabis for pain in his jaw, depression, and PTSD, and has struggled to find a doctor in Canada who would look at his case, and prescribe him cannabis for his ailments. It wasn't until just recently, when it took an inappropriate arrest to happen by the Saskatchewan police, derived from a neighbour complaint based on the smell of "weed" coming from his residence, that a doctor decided to help him. It took his arrest to get him a prescription he needed years ago, in Canada.

 On July 22, Sean's roommate at the time, was home when the police (not RCMP), showed up, and called Sean as he was out running errands. 6 police officers with NO signed warrant, arrested Sean and his roommate outside of their house and invaded their home regardless of having any paperwork in place. They didn't see the warrant until after they were released, and they remained in jail over a period of five days, separated. Upon the search of the residence, the police only discovered cannabis residual items, along with items Sean used to medicate daily. His roommate did not have anything to do with Sean's case, so we built a separate account here to help fund Sean's lawyer. We need to raise $12,000.00 CAD and we need your help! Cannabis prohibition still doesn't work, and patients should not be victims to the law! Please help Sean today!

story:
SECRET NUMBER 2 OF REBOOT REVEALED

It appears that the big question everyone is asking is - Can you use the phone/tablet whilst they are in their Reboot case and charging?

So here as promised is SECRET 2.

Yes you can. We just could not reveal to much information so close to our target launch date.

You will also see from this image (deliberately low resolution) we are showing the sim card slot.

So how? well the leather is of course pliable and as you would expect it simply flabs around to the back of the case.

The front Stainless Steel cover is hinged, come on we've all bought into the current trend in laptops, haven't we?

So I guess this might not have been to unexpected, it can be utilised as a stand or totally folded back behind the Reboot device, the leather - which you should now contains small magnets folds over the flap and will keep both of the flaps firmly tucked away; your phone or tablet is still of course secured by the sides of the Reboot case, and it is still docked and still charging whilst you have full access to your devices screen and speakers.

ANOTHER SECRET is revealed tomorrow evening. Regards Mike

Traffic visiting Reboot on Indiegogo; Last updated about 2 hours ago. 17.51 30th December - 18,844 Visits - 17,317  Referrals: with a very small number of pledges; so clearly something is wrong.

I have not shown you the prototypes (pre-production models will be with me on 16th January, so stay tuned).

Plus I have not fully shared the secrets of these first 3 Reboot products.

Why, well there are some trade secrets, and this industry is very prone to copycat products. Even though our products and the Brand is a Trade Mark and the products are protected by Design Rights in the UK, well that does not offer a great feeling of security.

But - here goes - it seems that to get investors "in", I need to reveal more about the products features.

So here is SECRET NUMBER 1.

Each device contains a removable memory storage capacity of 16GB. How, well that is a secret I can not reveal at this time. Simply be assured that you can back up your phone or tablet on the move, remove the storage to somewhere safe, just in case your phone or tablet is damaged or stolen; your precious memories are back in the safe in your hotel.

I will revel SECRET NUMBER 2 on 31st December at 17.00hrs.

Please pledge and help me get these Reboot Devices to market on 1st March 2016 as targeted.

WE NEED your support now.

Regards Mike - mikec@rebootdt.com if you have any questions.

                            

Last updated about 2 hours ago

Campaign Activity

Dated 13.12.2015 - In The last 4 days we have had another

7,000+ visitors to our Indiegogo site; you not many who have a made a pledge and with a total 18,450 visitors and virtually no contributions - that really means that I need to REBOOT my Indiegogo campaign so here we go -

Recharge your device - Reboot your life INEVEST NOW.

  • From 12.12.15 until the campaign ends - As the founder and inventor of these devices I am releasing 15,000 shares of £10 per share of the 100,000 shares established in REBOOT. Or a total of 15% of the business and brand. The minimum share purchase is 1,000 shares at £10,000.

Reboot Digital Technologies is not just these 3 devices which are for Apple devices.

Most of us carry both Apple and Android devices - correct?

So each of the first 3 devices includes called "Accelerate" the connection to charge any other device as well as the Apple device. This female connector allows ALL of the Accelerator products to charge any other device.

Compact torch, E-cigarette, tablet or phone. Never be stuck without power for any device.


The business is forecast to turnover £340,000,000 by 30th December 2020. Net profitability is forecast at 20% PBT. Is this an investment serious investors can afford to miss?

Those with serious intent need to call me or mail ne urgently to register their interest - mikec@rebootdt.com - 07889 362922

Regards

Mike

This is the business card holder in glorious HD images.

The thickness of the device 13mm - the charge of the device - 3,800mAh.

  • The picture on the left below was taken on an I Phone 6
  • The picture on the right below was taken on an I Phone 6 just 5 minutes later; unfortunately the hapless photographer had forgotten to recharge his device.

Recharge your device - Reboot your life

  1.            
For INVESTORS

Reboot is ready for packing and delivery to market on March 1st 2016. On schedule; however, we still need investors.

Nov 29, 2015

Contact me quickly - we need to raise £150,000 to get to market. The first 3 executive flight cases/battery pack products are ready to go. Right now I need serious investors. I am releasing 30% of shares in this global brand opportunity.

Each share of 5% of this UK Trade Mark Brand is available at £25,000 for 5% of this business prior to launch.

INVESTOR - Frequently asked questions.

Is Reboot Digital Technologies Ltd a registered business in the UK?

Yes - Reboot Digital Technologies is a registered business at Companies House UK - registration number - 9840383

Is there a web site?

Yes we own the domains - www.rebootdt.com   & www.rebootdt.co.uk

Is Reboot Digital Technologies a registered trade mark?

Yes - Trade Mark Registration Number - RB Reboot - UK00003123470

Is reboot covered by any patents/design rights?

Yes we are covered by several certificates of registration of design - Design Rights.

Charger holder/case and charger for charging an electronic communication device

  1. Number of Registration - 4042792.
  2. Number of Registration - 4042794
  3. Number of Registration - 4042796

Is an investor investing in owner ship of products or a brand?

Both, the Reboot RB brand is the worldwide vehicle for all reboot products and designs produced by Reboot Digital Technologies.

Is Reboot just a business that manufacturers device cases and battery packs?

No, these are just our launch products. Generations 2 and 3 of the flight/cases/chargers are already designed and ready to keep us well ahead of the inevitable imitators. we will immediately following launch of these products be going to market with high level/quality earphones, blue tooth portable speakers, tablet stands and many other unique devices, designed by our founder - Mike Campbell.

How can we make a small contribution to making this UK Brand GREAT?

Simple - go to Indiegogo and search Reboot, make a pledge, as little of £5, gets you an exclusive Reboot Perk.

How can I become a shareholder in Reboot?

Contact me personally - www.rebootdt.com and register your interest, or go to Venture Giant www.venturegiant.com and register to become an investor in Reboot Digital Technologies; this site is subject to eligibility to become an investor and will also be subject to any potential investor being vetted for credibility.

Anymore questions please contact me - mikec@rebootdt.com

Regards Mike - founder and CEO - Reboot Digital Technologies

PRODUCT Frequently asked questions


CEO Comments -

Apple compatible at launch date - this device is suitable for all Apple Devices. 2 months from launch date we will be launching visions suitable for all major brands such as Samsung, Lenovo and most other Android powered brands.

Can you describe the business card holder/flight case/battery pack simply as a power bank with a case for business cards or is it made for any special type of electronic business card?
    • The case is made to hold all sorts of cards, also electronic ones. They will thus be shielded from your phone, so that your credit or even hotel key cards cannot be disabled by coming too close to your phone in your pocket or bag. This would normally cause damage to the magnet strip in your card due to the phone’s radiation.

What capacity does the battery have (in mAh) that is contained inside these three devices?

    • The business card holder has 3500 mAh, the phone case has 4400 mAh and the tablet case has 15,000 mAh

How many input/output connectors do they have?

    • The phone and tablet case have an output connector on the inside at the bottom of the case where you can plug the device in by sliding it into the case. All three devices have an external USB slider. There are no other connectors.

How efficient are they?

    • The devices have an efficiency of 80%

If I have a tablet holder/flight case/battery pack, can I charge my tablet and my phone at the same time by connecting my phone to the tablet case?

    • No, because the USB plug is not made to fit your phone’s charge connector. But you can recharge your device whilst your battery pack is recharging. Simply insert the device and plug your battery pack into any USB outlet.

Are the cases shockproof?

    • Yes, they are made from stainless steel and are supposed to protect your phone from damage when dropped, so this material was selected to guarantee long durability of the case despite occasional dropping.

What accessories are included in the package? Does it come with an electric plug?

    • Thanks to this product you don’t need any wires or plugs anymore. The business card holder will come with a short cable connector with a length of only a few inches. This is essential in order to use the card holder to recharge your phone. One end goes into the USB outlet of the card holder, the other into your phone’s charge connector. There will be no other accessories.

Reboot Your World

"Life in general and life in business is a game", and the best games are always played to win; but having fun at the same time - 'well that does help'!

As a very seasoned global traveller that spends a lot of time in hotels, airport lounges - & trains, planes and automobiles, I need to stay connected. My mobile needs to be available - all of the time, and my biggest issue is not WiFi connectivity - NO, its having the power to keep me and my devices connected. I am about to provide you dear reader with my solution - the ultimate solution!!

Who am I? My name is Michael Campbell and I am a 53 year old geek, with a real penchant for GADGETS.

My business, AET Global Group www.aetglobalgroup.com is a 24 hour business, we work in every time zone across the globe; and digital communications are what makes my business work. AS CEO with offices working globally to keep our customers and our manufacturers right up to speed; every hour of everyday -  there are no holidays when you are operating globally - welcome to my world.

Or realistically - WELCOME TO THE MODERN DAY WORLD. Communications rule in this world. And staying connected is now NOT AN OPTION, whether we like it or not.

My Indiegogo campaign is to provide you with the devices that I have designed to keep your mobile devices safe from accidental damage, always charged and ready for that next photo opportunity, or to answer that very important phone call from...well from anyone. To travel, always CHARGED and READY for any and every opportunity.

So why am I asking for pledges on Indiegogo? because I want you to be the first customers to own an executive range of battery pack/flight cases to keep you charged and on the ball at every opportunity.

I need to go from this design into production, and that will happen on the first of March 2016. Built, finished and ready to deliver to your home.

Cant you buy these in the market already? - A resounding NO. These are the very first hybrid devices anywhere in the world, and I designed them to suit my needs, and most likely - YOUR NEEDS.

I will deliver to you very shortly after this first production date either 1, 2 or 3 of these devices, as there are 3 devices in the first collection, I feel sure everyone will want all three, but of course that is your choice. These will be a special "Indiegogo pledgers" "SPECIAL EDITION" presented in Black Leather, Chrome Plated Case, with JAGUAR Racing Green Leather Interior (these will be a one-off SPECIAL LIMITED EDITION, and will never be again be released in this colour match, so a real collectors item from day one).

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise £150,000, this is going into producing the first working prototypes, which I will share images of on the Reboot Digital Technologies web site - www.rebootdt.com. Then ultimately the money raised is to complete the tooling and initial product runs.

None of the money raised is going into design of product or packaging as this is already done, The website will show you these designs and packaging designs in greater detail.

The perks - a small investment is your choice, you can pledge for just one device, 2 devices or all three devices, even pledging for all three devices is affordable; Perhaps most importantly they will certainly cost a lot less than you will pay to a retailer after we have launched.

What about your pledges and the funds raised if we don't reach our target? The funds raised will all contribute to the manufacturing costs, and every contribution will go into the tooling and production, there will be NO wasted contributions - and we will still hit our deadline for production. March 1st 2016. Go to the website regularly and watch the production clock counting down.

The Impact

Reboot Digital Technologies is a game changing business with game changing products designed to take the pain out of staying connected and staying in touch - and staying SAFE. I never want my daughter out at night without her phone fully charged so she can call a cab, or call her mum, or call the emergency services if her car breaks down - I think everyone sympathises with my message here.

how do I prove my credentials? You wont know this - however! when you are next taking a shower that is thermostatically controlled for safe scald-free showering; look closer, YES, I designed it. And one of my factories/partners likely sold it to the home builder or the hotel where you are about to take that shower.

Risks & Challenges

 

There are no risks investing with Reboot devices. We will deliver the products. They will make your life easier and safer by keeping you connected - ALWAYS.

There have been some design challenges, we have incorporated cable and plug free recharging and that's new technology! But the risks are already designed out - so we know our devices work, and that's a great start. We just want our customers to experience a great product that is easy to use and a joy to engage with - think Apple!!

Other Ways You Can Help

What do we want - we want you - yes you - Indiegogo supporters, to be the first to RECHARGE YOUR DEVICES - TO RECHARGE YOUR WORLD. If you can’t invest - then just tag all your contacts - tell them and excite them - that's all we ask

Reboot Digital Technologies

The details -

Flight cases and Battery packs combined-

Patented and Design Right protected. Reboot is a globally registered trade mark.

Keep your device safe in damp conditions and protected to drop or crush damages.

Avoid screen scratches and accidental calls made unknowingly, could be expensive "in more ways than one".

Store your devices inside your luggage, your car or handbags without fear of accidental damage.

Available for all Apple phones and tablets at launch.

Available for many other Android devices from July 2016. Make and model compatibility to be developed according to market demand.

Stainless Steel case and Leather outer in many colour options.

Graphite case and Leather outer in many colour options.

Luxury platinum case and Snake or Crocodile leather options.

Luxury 22 carat white or rose gold plated case with calf leather options. 

Charges you device with no need for power cables.

Charge you Reboot case and device simultaneously from any USB connection, including your lap top or desk top.

Instantly download device data to you lap top or desktop, without a need for cables. 

Free APP download, enable your device, disable you device, mute your device when motion is detected (like in the car) - don't be TEMPTED to answer call or texts whilst driving.

Unique design and fluxionality, design right protected.

The first generation Reboot Devices with generation 2 and 3 featuring many new additional features to come on stream during 2016/17.

www.facebook.com/rebootdt

https://youtu.be/DfBnBLjKcjM

questions.
Is Reboot Digital Technologies
Ltd a registered business in the UK?
Yes - Reboot Digital Technologies
is a registered business at Companies House UK - registration number - 9840383
Is there a web site?
Yes we own the domains - www.rebootdt.com   & www.rebootdt.co.uk
Is Reboot Digital Technologies a
registered trade mark?
Yes - Trade Mark Registration
Number - RB Reboot - UK00003123470
Is reboot covered by any
patents/design rights?
Yes we are covered by several
certificates of registration of design - Design Rights.
Charger holder/case and charger
for charging an electronic communication device 

Number of Registration -
     4042792.
Number of Registration -
     4042794
Number of Registration -
     4042796

Is an investor investing in owner
ship of products or a brand?
Both, the Reboot RB brand is the
worldwide vehicle for all reboot products and designs produced by Reboot
Digital Technologies.
Is Reboot just a business that
manufacturers device cases and battery packs?
No, these are just our launch
products. Generations 2 and 3 of the flight/cases/chargers are already designed
and ready to keep us well ahead of the inevitable imitators. we will
immediately following launch of these products be going to market with high
level/quality earphones, blue tooth portable speakers, tablet stands and many
other unique devices, designed by our founder - Mike Campbell.

How can we make a small
contribution to making this UK Brand GREAT?
Simple - go to Indiegogo and
search Reboot, make a pledge, as little of £5, gets you an exclusive Reboot
Perk.
How can I become a shareholder in
Reboot?
Contact me personally - www.rebootdt.com
and register your interest, or go to Venture Giant www.venturegiant.com
and register to become an investor in Reboot Digital Technologies; this site is
subject to eligibility to become an investor and will also be subject to any
potential investor being vetted for credibility.
Anymore questions please contact
me - mikec@rebootdt.com
Regards Mike - founder and CEO
- Reboot Digital Technologies
PRODUCT Frequently asked
questions


CEO Comments -
Apple compatible at launch date - this device is suitable for all Apple Devices. 2 months from launch date we will be launching visions suitable for all major brands such as Samsung, Lenovo and most other Android powered brands.

Can you describe the business
card holder/flight case/battery pack simply as a power bank with a case for
business cards or is it made for any special type of electronic business card?



The
      case is made to hold all sorts of cards, also electronic ones. They will
      thus be shielded from your phone, so that your credit or even hotel key
      cards cannot be disabled by coming too close to your phone in your pocket
      or bag. This would normally cause damage to the magnet strip in your card
      due to the phone’s radiation.


What capacity does the battery
have (in mAh) that is contained inside these three devices?


The
      business card holder has 3500 mAh, the phone case has 4400 mAh and the
      tablet case has 15,000 mAh


How many input/output connectors
do they have?


The
      phone and tablet case have an output connector on the inside at the
      bottom of the case where you can plug the device in by sliding it into
      the case. All three devices have an external USB slider. There are no
      other connectors.


How efficient are they?


The
      devices have an efficiency of 80%


If I have a tablet holder/flight
case/battery pack, can I charge my tablet and my phone at the same time by
connecting my phone to the tablet case?


No,
      because the USB plug is not made to fit your phone’s charge connector.
      But you can recharge your device whilst your battery pack is recharging.
      Simply insert the device and plug your battery pack into any USB outlet.


Are the cases shockproof?


Yes,
      they are made from stainless steel and are supposed to protect your phone
      from damage when dropped, so this material was selected to guarantee long
      durability of the case despite occasional dropping.


What accessories are included in
the package? Does it come with an electric plug?


Thanks
      to this product you don’t need any wires or plugs anymore. The business
      card holder will come with a short cable connector with a length of only
      a few inches. This is essential in order to use the card holder to
      recharge your phone. One end goes into the USB outlet of the card holder,
      the other into your phone’s charge connector. There will be no other
      accessories.


Reboot Your World

"Life in general and life in
business is a game", and the best games are always played to win; but
having fun at the same time - 'well that does help'!
As a very seasoned global
traveller that spends a lot of time in hotels, airport lounges - &
trains, planes and automobiles, I need to stay connected. My mobile needs to be
available - all of the time, and my biggest issue is not WiFi connectivity -
NO, its having the power to keep me and my devices connected. I am about to
provide you dear reader with my solution - the ultimate solution!!
Who am I? My name is Michael
Campbell and I am a 53 year old geek, with a real penchant for GADGETS. 



My business, AET Global
Group www.aetglobalgroup.com
is a 24 hour business, we work in every time zone across the globe; and digital
communications are what makes my business work. AS CEO with offices
working globally to keep our customers and our manufacturers right up
to speed; every hour of everyday -  there are no holidays when you are
operating globally - welcome to my world. 

Or realistically - WELCOME TO THE
MODERN DAY WORLD. Communications rule in this world. And staying connected is
now NOT AN OPTION, whether we like it or not.


My Indiegogo
campaign is to provide you with the devices that I have designed to keep your
mobile devices safe from accidental damage, always charged and ready for that
next photo opportunity, or to answer that very important phone call from...well
from anyone. To travel, always CHARGED and READY for any and every opportunity.



So why am I asking for pledges on
Indiegogo? because I want you to be the first customers to own an executive
range of battery pack/flight cases to keep you charged and on the ball at every
opportunity.

I need to go from this design
into production, and that will happen on the first of March 2016. Built,
finished and ready to deliver to your home.
Cant you buy these in the market
already? - A resounding NO. These are the very first hybrid devices anywhere in
the world, and I designed them to suit my needs, and most likely - YOUR NEEDS.
I will deliver to you very
shortly after this first production date either 1, 2 or 3 of these devices, as
there are 3 devices in the first collection, I feel sure everyone will
want all three, but of course that is your choice. These will be a special
"Indiegogo pledgers" "SPECIAL EDITION" presented in Black
Leather, Chrome Plated Case, with JAGUAR Racing Green Leather Interior (these
will be a one-off SPECIAL LIMITED EDITION, and will never be again be released
in this colour match, so a real collectors item from day one).



What We Need & What You Get
We need to raise £150,000, this
is going into producing the first working prototypes, which I will share images
of on the Reboot Digital Technologies web site - www.rebootdt.com.
Then ultimately the money raised is to complete the tooling and initial product
runs. 
None of the money raised is going
into design of product or packaging as this is already done, The website will
show you these designs and packaging designs in greater detail.


The perks - a small investment is
your choice, you can pledge for just one device, 2 devices or all three devices,
even pledging for all three devices is affordable; Perhaps most
importantly they will certainly cost a lot less than you will pay to a retailer
after we have launched.
What about your pledges and the
funds raised if we don't reach our target? The funds raised will all contribute
to the manufacturing costs, and every contribution will go into the tooling and
production, there will be NO wasted contributions - and we will still hit our
deadline for production. March 1st 2016. Go to the website regularly and watch
the production clock counting down.


The Impact

Reboot Digital Technologies is a
game changing business with game changing products designed to take the pain
out of staying connected and staying in touch - and staying SAFE. I never want my
daughter out at night without her phone fully charged so she can call a cab, or
call her mum, or call the emergency services if her car breaks down - I think
everyone sympathises with my message here.

how do I prove my credentials?
You wont know this - however! when you are next taking a shower that is
thermostatically controlled for safe scald-free showering; look closer, YES, I
designed it. And one of my factories/partners likely sold it to the home
builder or the hotel where you are about to take that shower.


Risks & Challenges
 
There are no risks
investing with Reboot devices. We will deliver the products. They will make
your life easier and safer by keeping you connected - ALWAYS.

There have been some design
challenges, we have incorporated cable and plug free recharging and that's new
technology! But the risks are already designed out - so we know our devices
work, and that's a great start. We just want our customers to experience a
great product that is easy to use and a joy to engage with - think
Apple!!


Other Ways You Can Help
What do we want - we want you -
yes you - Indiegogo supporters, to be the first to RECHARGE YOUR DEVICES - TO
RECHARGE YOUR WORLD. If you can’t invest - then just tag all your contacts -
tell them and excite them - that's all we ask


Reboot Digital Technologies
The details -
Flight cases and Battery packs
combined-
Patented and Design Right
protected. Reboot is a globally registered trade mark.
Keep your device safe in damp
conditions and protected to drop or crush damages.
Avoid screen scratches and
accidental calls made unknowingly, could be expensive "in more ways than
one".
Store your devices inside your
luggage, your car or handbags without fear of accidental damage.
Available for all Apple phones
and tablets at launch.
Available for many other Android
devices from July 2016. Make and model compatibility to be developed
according to market demand.
Stainless Steel case and
Leather outer in many colour options.
Graphite case and Leather outer
in many colour options.
Luxury platinum case and Snake or
Crocodile leather options.
Luxury 22
carat white or rose gold plated case with calf leather options. 
Charges you device with no need
for power cables.
Charge you Reboot case and device
simultaneously from any USB connection, including your lap top or desk top.
Instantly download device data to
you lap top or desktop, without a need for cables. 
Free APP download, enable your
device, disable you device, mute your device when motion is detected (like in
the car) - don't be TEMPTED to answer call or texts whilst driving.
Unique design and fluxionality,
design right protected.
The first generation Reboot Devices
with generation 2 and 3 featuring many new additional features to come on
stream during 2016/17.
www.facebook.com/rebootdt
https://youtu.be/DfBnBLjKcjM

story:
Pathways in the brain

There are five pathways in the brain that take daily stress and process it in a highly effective way.  EBT has discovered simple tools that enable you to find those pathways and spiral out of stress to a state of connection and well-being.

Donate to our campaign and choose perks (AT HUGE SAVINGS!) so that you learn simple tools to get from stress to feeling good. Learning these tools can be life changing!


Learn the tools

The just released book on EBT is Spiral Up!  Discover the power of simple tools to relieve stress and feel good now.  Read the book and use your online membership for tools and support to use the tools more easily and more quickly.

Two for one

Each time you use the tools to spiral up, you feel better and your brain's emotional set point improves. Essentially, the tools strengthen the pathways of resilience and weaken and break the pathways that promote triggered and stuck states. Life becomes easier and health, happiness, relationships and productivity naturally begin to improve.

Who uses EBT?

We believe EBT should be core to emotional literacy, helping people emotionally connect with themselves and others and move forward in life. People who join our community (www.ebt.org) to use the tools to achieve lasting improvements in their lives include: 1) People who are already healthy and happy and want that state of connection to be even stronger; 2) people who have had recent losses or health issues and want to clear away the stress involved and feel better fasters; and 3) people who want to take fewer medications, people who have had great stresses in their lives, early on or later, use EBT to recover from this stress and claim a new way of experiencing life. 

Bring the EBT tools to more people!

In this crowdfund, we want to fund technology to make EBT available to more people, including developing 4 mobile apps (“EBT in your pocket”). More people can be present now, and not be controlled by the circuits encoded early in life or during stress.

Together we can learn EBT and help more people access these tools to take charge of their stress and their lives. Support the EBT Indiegogo crowdfund.


Your perk? Access the tools yourself to ease stress or share them with someone close to you. EBT membership is at a significant discount!
