story:
Our Story

This story is not a story about OncoStem Biotherapeutics. Ultimately, It is about those who have had to contend with this dreadful disease.

Let me paraphrase Kubler Ross: The most precious people I have known are those who have known defeat from this disease, who have known struggle, who have known loss, and yet still somehow found their way out of the devastating cost we pay when dealing with cancer.

Like many of us, you have already shown your concern about this dreadful disease. OncoStem Biotherapeutics has launched its crowdfunding campaign for the development of a potentially revolutionary cancer treatment taken by mouth. 

     OncoStem Biotherapeutics, a novel, small startup, cancer drug development Biotech Company, needs your help. It is reaching out to the public to seek the initial funding needed to change, the way we treat cancer. OncoStem Biotherapeutics is not part of the bureaucratic, high-priced, pharmaceutical giants that continue to produce expensive, toxic drugs that have not produced any significant cure for cancer. If there is any David among the giants, it is us.

     OncoStem has proposed a whole new approach to cancer treatment. Because paradigm-changing ideas are rarely accepted, OncoStem Biotherapeutics has decided to seek the initial financial support it needs from those who know this disease far too well. Help us let the world know that there is a better way to treat, and potentially cure, this horrendous disease. OncoStem will have a memorable gift for you for your support. Even if you decide to not join us in this important effort, please tell as many as you can about OncoStem and what it is trying to achieve. Let's continue the effort to finally cure cancer.

It is time to take a more logical, rational, but scientific approach in the treatment of cancer. We cannot cure a disease that we have not understood - until now. OncoStem Biotherapeutics has applied Bioinformatics to Systems Biology, Genomics, and Network Theory to identify a group of unique genetic biomarkers critical to cancer growth and metastasis, and specific for any individual’s unique cancer. It possesses a proprietary database of such markers. The protein products of these cancer biomarkers are already commercially available for the establishment of inhibitory assays for the immediate identification of drug Hits and subsequent drug Hit Leads for the development of a whole new class of oral, targeted anti-cancer drugs.

You may visit us at www.oncostembio.com

What We Need 

The cost of current cancer drugs is astronomical and untenable. This is not a reflection of the true costs to make such drugs, but a result of the massive, and expensive support systems big pharmaceutical companies have in place to achieve their goals. Remarkable, more effective, cancer drugs are more efficiently developed by small drug development companies, like OncoStem Biotherapeutics. We are seeking funding support for the cost of access to the chemical libraries to screen the pre-drug candidates that will turn off the master cancer genes that caused your specific cancer. If we reach at least 50% of our goal, we will still be able to identify at least one potential cancer drug during the screening process. The number of potential cancer drugs isolated will increase as we approach our goal and exceed it.

 

The Impact

President Nixon's war on cancer effort has been a failure. Part of the problem has been the “lemming” effect in the discovery of new biomarkers, and drugs, as a result of Pharmaceutical companies' leeriness to pursue more effective drug targets. Large pharmaceutical companies continue to produce copies of the same kinds of drugs. Few of these expensive, toxic drugs are curable. We are in dire need of the right biomarkers useful for the development of specific targeted anti-cancer drugs that inhibit the master cancer genes that your cancer is dependent upon for its survival and growth. We believe we have identified those kind of master cancer genes.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word about this campaign even if you are not able to make a contribution.

story:
Short Summary

Steven and Jessica's active lifestyles and passion for adventure gave birth to their business Roll and Go. Together, they're setting out to make the world a better place by encouraging people to loosen their muscles, go for walks, enjoy the outdoors, and stay healthy.

When they make their rollers, they like to keep a few things in mind:

Usability - they want to make sure that their devices can be used to massage as much of the body as possible; and if one type of roller can't reach, then another will.

Portability - This is second only to customer satisfaction, and is the company namesake. The rollers are specifically designed to be moved around with ease, as opposed to traditional massage roller sticks which are difficult to stick in a bag or backpack. Future models will include larger foam rollers and other designs for effective massaging.

Modularity - The rollers are designed to be completely customizable. Everything between color, size, and strength is meant to be curated just for you.

Cost Effectiveness - Steven and Jessica are truly passionate about seeing the world improve, so they wish to keep their products as inexpensive as possible, especially under $20 if possible.

Environmental Impact - Their rollers use PLA plastic, common for 3D printers. This plastic is derived from corn rather than oil, so the rollers are low carbon footprint. Future designs may incorporate up-cycling and wood.

Durability - The rollers are designed to be strong against any impact, especially since they are meant to live in an athlete's bag!

Customer Satisfaction - Still not enough? Steven and Jessica are only a click away if you have any comments, questions, or suggestions. They want to be involved so that you can be as pleased as possible with your roller, your body, and thus your life.

 

None of this will be possible, however, without your generous support. Unfortunately, plastic injection is expensive, and without you, we won't have anything to achieve these goals with.

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to fund the production of our rollers. This is a one-time thing where the creation of the molds happens (which is the super expensive part). All of your funds will be going to that and becoming an effective member of the masseuse community, this will be just under $15000.

Items for you:

Funds of at least $30 will get you 2 massage rollers, fully customizable as shown in the video.

Funds of at least $60 will get you codes for 2 free rollers of any model, available any time in the future.

Just want to donate? That's fine too!

If our goal isn't met, we're going to give everything we have to the mold making, and once it's completed, you will still receive what you bargained for.

The Impact

With our rollers and involvement in the athletic community, we hope to bring cost-effective environmentally friendly massage therapy items that anyone can use. Because of this mantra, we believe that we can help improve the global, body, and mental health everywhere.

Since we started this business in November 2016, we have found few obstacles that we could not overcome. While this is our first business venture, we're very apt at learning so no matter the challenges that come our way, we can adapt and use them to our advantage; everything is a learning experience.

We exist to help people, so we keep that in the forefront of our minds when conducting all of our business.

Risks & Challenges

As mentioned above, we face very few challenges due to the fact that this market is fairly untapped; this of course means that there will be more risk because it is also an untested market. However, after some preliminary research, there seems to be a fairly high demand for our products, so even that risk is mitigated.

Risks from the product are small because it has been tested quite thoroughly for months before arriving at the current design. The product in question, known as the Flex Roller, is also patented, thus securing our spot in the industry.

The only foreseeable challenges that remain are marketing and packaging the products, as well as designing and testing different types. We are easily able to overcome these because we know where we stand as a company, and we have the creativity to improve that standing. We will do as we always do to persevere: research the problem, create a number of solutions, pick the best one, make it better, and move on.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help spread the word! We believe in the power of the people, so by letting your friends and family know, we can help the world get healthier one person at a time.

story:
Hello IndieGogo!

What is Raw Strength Nutrition?

What you consume becomes who you are. This fundamental truth, is our foundation at Raw Strength Nutrition. You try your hardest to eat healthy. You give 100% in the gym. Heck, you even go and do YOGA! But when it comes to Supplements, there is really no good option. You either have to choose between some flashy labeled supplement, with chemicals in it you cant even pronounce. Or you jump over to the discount isle and where you chose the cheapest one possible. 

We believe at Raw Strength Nutrition that supplementing your diet is a crucial aspect in becoming the best possible version of yourself. Which is why we set out on a mission to find and bring you the best possible Supplement Brand. One without artificial colors, and flavors. Without fillers and additives. Not put into Containers riddled with BPA's and other Plastic Bi-products. One that was Organic and that you could trace back to the Source. 

Out of that Journey, Raw strength Nutrition was born. We don't hide behind flashy labels. We don't mark our products up simply because they are Healthy.

We sell supplements that are, what they say they are. 

  • USDA Certified Organic
  • 100% All-Natural
  • BPA-Free
  • No Artificial colors or Flavors
  • No Artitficial Fillers or Additives
  • Gluten-Free
  • r-BGH Free
  • Non-GMO
  • Straight from Mother Nature!

Meet The Raw Strength Nutrition Team

    

Pictured Above(Left to Right):Jeremy Seibert, Dubem Mbeledogu, Mitch Palmer, Not Pictured Above: Alex Tullar

Jeremy Seibert: CEO (Chief Executive Officer), Founder 

Jeremy Seibert is the CEO and Founder of Raw Strength Nutrition, one of the fastest growing Organic Supplement Companies. Seibert oversees all Marketing, Operational, and Financial aspects of the company. In addition, he leads the retail department, and seeks out and develops new revenue streams. 

Seibert is a visionary in the Nutritional market. He knows that what you consume, becomes who you are, and by consuming the best possible foods and supplements, you can ascend and become the best possible version of yourself. With his unique approach Seibert is leading the movement to make supplementing you diet, with Organic and Natural options, the usual.

Dubem Mbeledogu: CTO (Chief Technology Officer)

Dubem Mbeledogu is the CTO of Raw Strength Nutrition, one of the fastest growing Organic Supplement Companies. Dubem oversees desktop/mobile web design and is tasked with constantly updating the website with new features to meet the ever changing terrain of consumer demand.

Dubem is a chemical engineer by trade but he is a polymath, constantly trying to learn new things and further his knowledge. He began coding to challenge himself and found a passion that has blossomed into fruition. Furthermore, Dubem wears many hats other than CTO. Dubem has his hands in marketing as well, to fully optimize his design.

Mitch Palmer: CSO (Chief Scientific Officer), Research & Development

Mitch is in charge of our company’s research and development, as well as public outreach and relations. Mitch is constantly referring to the latest literature on how to optimize nutrition and performance. Mitch identifies the best ways to optimize supplement formulation and supplement stacking.

Mitch is very passionate about Raw Strength, due to its honest approach. So many supplements in the world today have added chemicals and preservatives that do nothing but harm the body. Mitch is passionate about humans eating what they’re supposed to eat, REAL FOOD! 

Alex Tullar: COO (Chief Operations Officer)

Alex Tullar is the COO of Raw Strength Nutrition, one of the fastest growing organic supplement companies. Alex oversees all sales, marketing, and financial aspects of the company.  As well as his position as COO, Tullar helps to evolve the company culture with a unique outlook on the company’s vision for future.

With years of mechanical engineering under his belt, Tullar knows how to create a plan and progressively move it forward. He is well poised as a visionary himself in helping bring new ideas and concepts to Raw Strength Nutrition.

Where do the Funds Go?

The funding will allow us to finally get an official warehouse and office space. We have been currently in a very small office, in our Alma mater. With your help we will move to an official office/warehouse and be able to operate more freely. 


Your funding will also help us expand out to other types of organic products. One of our sticking points is that we never want to have anything on credit. Call us old school, but all of the business expenses have been completely funded by us.  At Raw Strength Nutrition we understand that even though this forces the company to start off small, it gives us the freedom to not have to worry about making and pushing customers to purchase products.

 We know the products that we offer are the top of the line, and we  believes that you the customer should be allowed the decision to purchase our product. With your decisions to fund and purchase our products, we can offer you the customer, an ever growing variety of different organic supplements. 


Our Current Products and Perks


RSN Organic Whey Protein

                          

Our Organic Whey Protein comes from the milk of cows living on Small Family-Owned dairy farms in the U.S.A. The cows graze in the pasture throughout the summer and eat preserved grasses as silage or haylage in the winter.

Because the product is USDA certified Organic , it is also non-GMO and certified to be free of r-BGH (recombinant bovine growth hormone).

Our whey protein concentrate is created by a gentle Ultra-filtration of liquid Whey from organic cheese manufacturing. RSN Organic Whey Protein is designed to maximize your body's ability to maintain and increase your muscle mass.

Serving Size: 21g
Amount of Protein Per Scoop: 17g
Ingredients: Organic Whey Protein Concentrate
Health Certifications:
1. USDA (United States Dept. of Agriculture) Organic
2. QAI (Quality Assurance International) Organic
3. Double Verified Gluten-Free


RSN Organic Vegan Protein

                   


Our Organic Vegan Protein powder is a high quality protein supplement that is manufactured to be an efficient, pure, and rich source of protein. It has 4x Phyto-Protein Power! Rice, Hemp, Chia, Mushroom. 

Plant-based proteins are readily incorporated in our bodies to nourish the innate strength that drives us forward.

These ancient and excellent sources of complete proteins will repair and develop your body, to improve performance and recovery times.

With RSN Organic Vegan Protein you will have the opportunity to make a long term choice to support a better planet with certified organic materials, and better health by utilizing non-animal sourced products. We are all part of mother earth and we commend you for trying to stay in balance with her.

(Comes in Chocolate or Sweetened)


Serving Size: 21g
Amount of Protein Per Scoop: 13g
Ingredients: Organic Rice Protein, Organic Hemp Protein, Organic Chia Protein, Organic Mushroom Protein, Stevia
Health Certifications:
1. USDA (United States Dept. of Agriculture) Organic
2. QAI (Quality Assurance International) Organic
3. Double Verified Gluten-Free

Our New Pre-Order Products 

These are the 3 New Products that we are Launching during this campaign! We are super excited to be able to bring them to you guys Exclusively on Indiegogo!

RSN Organic Greens Powder

              

Our Organic Greens Powder is designed to maximize your health and performance, using the power of organic, sustainable foods.It is easy to lose balance in modern times.

With our world changing at ever increasing speeds we must remember that maintaining health using traditional, natural nutrition can help restore our peace of body and mind.

Organic fruits, vegetables, and super foods can now be placed in a concentrated powder form, providing modern convenience to ancient health promoting foods.

This product is a Soy-Free garden explosion of organic greens, fruits, vegetables, fiber , and flax. It is full of free radical quenching, cleansing, and detoxifying foods.

Its like having an Organic Garden in your glass! The essential vitamins and minerals are in concentrations and ratios that nature created along with the protective factors for living cells.

Adding a scoop of RSN Organic Greens Powder to your daily routine will refresh your inner health and keep you looking forward to the days ahead.

Serving Size: 5.5g                                                                                               Ingredients:Organic Flax Seed, Organic Barley Grass, Organic Wheat Grass, Organic Strawberries, Organic Blueberries, Organic Apples, Organic Stevia, Organic Raspberries, Organic Tomatoes, Organic Carrots, Organic Beets, Organic Kale, Organic Spirulina, Organic Spinach                                                                         Health Certifications:                                                                                                                      1. USDA (United States Dept. of Agriculture) Organic                                                           2. QAI (Quality Assurance International) Organic                                                                   3. Double Verified Gluten-Free


RSN Organic Psyllium Husk

Our Organic Psyllium Husk is rich in dietary fiber, has been traditionally used to help support a healthy digestive tract.

Fiber is deficient in the diets of most Americans due to frequent consumption of over-processed foods that are stripped of their natural fiber content. Short-term inadequate fiber intake can cause stomach discomfort related to constipation, and over time this can lead to more serious complications in the intestine like diverticulosis & diverticulitis, causing unwanted pain and discomfort.

The recommended fiber intake for the general population is 25-35 grams per day for optimal intestinal health. 
Psyllium husk provides an excellent source of both soluble and insoluble fiber, which can help promote proper digestion as well as support healthy cholesterol levels in the body.

Serving Size: 4.6g
Amount of Fiber Per Scoop: 4g
Ingredients: Organic Whole Psyllium Husk
Health Certifications:
1. USDA (United States Dept. of Agriculture) Organic
2. QAI (Quality Assurance International) Organic
3. Double Verified Gluten-Free

Organic Flaxseed Oil

                  

As one of Natures richest sources of vegetarian Omega-3s, Our Organic Flax Oil naturally contains compounds that support cardiovascular and skin health.

Our superior product is cold-pressed, hexane-free and comes fresh to you in our heat, light, and oxygen protected bottles to ensure the best quality product.

RSN's Organic Flax oil is grown right here in the U.S.A. We are proud to say that our Organic Flax Oil is 100% homegrown!

Serving Size: 1 tablespoon (15ml)

Amount of EFA Per Serving: Omega-3 (7650mg) Omega-6 (2410mg) Omega-9 (2120mg)
Ingredients: Organic Flax Oil, antioxidant Blend (Organic Rosemary, citric acid)
Health Certifications:
1. USDA (United States Dept. of Agriculture) Organic
2. QAI (Quality Assurance International) Organic
3. Double Verified Gluten-Free


Shipping and Production Time

Since our expansion is so new, this pre-order campaign is helping us gauge how much inventory we will need. We will be putting in our order for production as soon as we can determine the amount of units to order based on the IndieGogo sales (we're aiming to do this halfway through the campaign to get a head start).

Once our order is in, production takes 8-10 weeks. As soon as everything is ready, your items will be shipped out to you via Priority Mail.

I will be posting updates on our progress through the 'Updates' section on this campaign as we go along. You'll be getting those updates straight to your e-mail so that you're always in the loop! We promise that we will work hard to get this done as quickly as we can.


Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Do you have other products that aren't Certified Organic?                                       A: Yes, we sell All-Natural products along side our Organic

Q: Are your Products Safe for Kids?                                                                                      A: Our Products are meant for those 18 years and older

Q: Is there anyone who shouldn't use your products?
A: If you have a pre-existing condition or are taking any prescription medication, always consult with your doctor before starting a new regimen.

Q: Do you have vegan/vegetarian products?
A: Yes. We carry a wide variety of products that are vegan and vegetarian friendly.

Q: When will the products ship?
A: Please see the section above titled "Shipping + Production Time."
Since our expansion is so new, this pre-order campaign is helping us gauge how much inventory we'll need. We will be putting in our order for production as soon as we can determine the amount of units to order based on the IndieGogo sales (we're aiming to do this halfway through the campaign to get a head start).

Once our order is in, production takes 8-10 weeks. As soon as everything is ready, your items will be shipped out to you via Priority Mail.

I will be posting updates on our progress through the 'Updates' section on this campaign as we go along. You'll be getting those updates straight to your e-mail so that you're always in the loop! We promise that we will work hard to get this done as quickly as we can.

Q: Are shipping charges included?
A: A flat shipping rate of $7 USD is included in the price of each perk. This flat rate is for domestic shipping only. For International Shipping see below

Q: Do you ship internationally?
A; Yes. Here's what we'll do: Order whatever you'd like, and once we figure out shipping costs (based on your country), we will send you a message with how much the difference is. Then, you can just make a contribution for the remaining few dollars difference

Q: Who can I e-mail for customer service and questions?
A: Please e-mail: Jaseibert@oneup-labs,com


Thank You IndieGoGo!

If you feel so compelled to help us out we would love to send you an awesome perk that will help you in your Journey to becoming the best possible version of yourself! 
Even if you can't contribute Thank you so much for taking the time looking over our campaign, and we wish you the best in this awesome thing called life!

story:
Anxiety is everywhere, stress levels are Keeping going up! If you suffer from Stress and Anxiety .Weighted blankets are the answer for You and Many people like you!

10%~15% of body weight blanket can Reduce pressure,Relax the nervous system by putting gentle pressure on the nerve system.

Panda dady is professional Manufacturer to make premium-grade Weighted blanket for special needs kids(Autism, Asperger, SPD and ADHD)  for years.And start to offer this Great Stress-Reducing Blanket to More people with struggling with Anxiety and Stress,INSOMIA

                                                    inner core(Navy Blue)

 
charu
 

 

Weighted blankets have been used for years with people who have Autism,helpful  in calming children with Autism, Asperger, SPD and ADHD，The extra 10% of body weight triggers the brain to release neurotransmitters such as dopamine and serotonin,melotonin. which are responsible for Increasing relaxation as well as inducing a calming effect.

 It can be used while you’re Sleeping or have a nap time,Reading or just relax in bed and on couch, or while you meditate.

 

 

Inner core is made of  premium-grade 100% cotton fabric,it is cool for hot summer.

 

 

Smooth,Plush,with Funny Minky fabric and Special Print Design outer cover,Which is suit for cold day,And removeable Cover is easy to wash. 

 

 

 

We have Not Only Blanket,More choice here.

                                   Weighted Shoulder Wraps(1 shape&U Shape)

                                                              Weighted pad

You can clam yourself down while you are reading or Meditation.Help you focus.

 

                                                 (this photo is taken at night)

We have product the first batch of Weighted blanket inner core."They" can't weight to be shipped to your hands.

We have a great team working to make Panda Dady Weighted Blanket the best it can be, but we need your help. With your support we’ll be able to bring Panda Dady to Larger market and make it available for everyone. Help more people like me suffering from INSOMNIA.

We are raising $20,000 to meet volume in order to mass produce Panda Dady weighted blanket and make it more affordable. all we need is you.

Together, we can make Panda dady be part of our life. With your support, we truly believe we can achieve our goal, to relax you, sleep well again.

 

Share this to your Friend!!!

                                             

 

As a token of our gratitude, any backer that shares this campaign on social media will receive a fidget spinner,which is good for Anxiety too. Please share by clicking the social media links on this page or in any way you can. Send us a message and we'll include this spinner with your Weighted blanket. 

Shell Design you can choose from:

Remark:

Color of inner cotton fabric:Navy blue,Beige

Any question about the store pack,Distributor pack.we can offer you custom print shell if you want more than 100.

Please contact this email: Business@pandadady.com

May~June: Run Indiegogo and Producing

June: Indiegogo complete- Sending out first shipment-production going on

            The early lucky guy get our weighted blanket.

July:Shipping out rest of Blanket.More of you get Panda Dady.

August:All rewards will be delivered to your hands

 

We are professional manufacturer of Weighted blanket.We offer only great product to one who need this and we've done it for years.

We anticipate being able to fulfill orders within 2 months, but we should note that forecasting demand is an inexact science. If order volumes exceed our expectations, it might take slightly longer to fulfill orders.​

We invite you  to get the work out and make some noise about this campaign.we want 

to help more people who are suffering from INSOMNIA,Stress.

Please Share this to your friends on Social Media.

Thank you !

Smooth,Plush,with Funny Minky fabric and Special Print Design outer cover,Which is suit for cold day,And removeable Cover is easy to wash. 
 

 
 
We have Not Only Blanket,More choice here.

                                   Weighted Shoulder Wraps(1 shape&U Shape)

                                                              Weighted pad
You can clam yourself down while you are reading or Meditation.Help you focus.
 


                                                 (this photo is taken at night)
We have product the first batch of Weighted blanket inner core."They" can't weight to be shipped to your hands.

We have a great team working to make Panda Dady Weighted Blanket the best it can be, but we need your help. With your support we’ll be able to bring Panda Dady to Larger market and make it available for everyone. Help more people like me suffering from INSOMNIA.
We are raising $20,000 to meet volume in order to mass produce Panda Dady weighted blanket and make it more affordable. all we need is you.
Together, we can make Panda dady be part of our life. With your support, we truly believe we can achieve our goal, to relax you, sleep well again.
 
Share this to your Friend!!!
                                             

 
As a token of our gratitude, any backer that shares this campaign on social media will receive a fidget spinner,which is good for Anxiety too. Please share by clicking the social media links on this page or in any way you can. Send us a message and we'll include this spinner with your Weighted blanket. 

Shell Design you can choose from:

Remark:
Color of inner cotton fabric:Navy blue,Beige

Any question about the store pack,Distributor pack.we can offer you custom print shell if you want more than 100.
Please contact this email: Business@pandadady.com

May~June: Run Indiegogo and Producing
June: Indiegogo complete- Sending out first shipment-production going on
            The early lucky guy get our weighted blanket.
July:Shipping out rest of Blanket.More of you get Panda Dady.
August:All rewards will be delivered to your hands



 
We are professional manufacturer of Weighted blanket.We offer only great product to one who need this and we've done it for years.
We anticipate being able to fulfill orders within 2 months, but we should note that forecasting demand is an inexact science. If order volumes exceed our expectations, it might take slightly longer to fulfill orders.​


We invite you  to get the work out and make some noise about this campaign.we want 
to help more people who are suffering from INSOMNIA,Stress.
Please Share this to your friends on Social Media.
Thank you !

story:
Hair sheen spray that is specially formulated to add a brilliant sheen/shine to all types of hair. Seeking to raise capital to fund our initial bulk production cost of our "Patent Pending" formula for hair spray. All contributions over $10 will receive a bottle of the hair sheen product.


SHORT TERM GOALS:  Once we are able to secure the funds sufficient to commercially produce our product, we plan to use a contract manufacturer to produce and package our product. Our initial plan is to take our product to market by way of online retailers such as Amazon. We will also conduct sales via our website and use targeted marketing campaigns to salons and barber shops. Thereafter, we plan to secure a distributor wherein we can further reach retailers, salons, and barber shops. Once a market is developed , we plan to introduce other fragrance versions of our product.  Currently, we have a "Patent Pending" on several different fragrance versions of our product. By offering different fragrance versions, we will be able to appeal to many different customer preferences 


LONG RANGE GOALS:  It is our hopes to be able to eventually construct a small factory wherein we will be able to manufacture, package and distribute our products to the markets we developed. This will include the purchase of mixing tanks, filling equipment, label printing machines and packaging supplies. We will hire skillful employees to perform the necessary tasks and functions of the manufacturing processes. We will also hire sales and marketing staff to continue to promote our products to the markets that we developed and to other markets abroad. Further, we plan to introduce other product items such as style gels, hair/holding sprays etc. We will do this in an effort to cater to the entire hair care industry by offering a full line of hair care products.


We thank you for your time and interest as a backer/contributor and we hope that you will help us to fulfill our dreams/goals. We have no minimum donation requirements; therefore, if you donate as little as $1.00, it will be greatly appreciated and it will put us one more step closer to reaching our goals. Thanks again for your consideration.

story:
Introducing Curi™

Everyone has family. Whether they are blood relatives, life partners, or close friends, you have their back and they have yours. Families care for each other...that's what they do.

Why you care is simple. Caregiving—for a chronically ill child, a disabled friend, an elderly parent—often isn't. When you have to juggle caring for multiple people, sharing care responsibilities, and caring for yourself...and you still have to work for a living...life can be complicated and hectic.

 At Semafores we understand the challenges today’s family caregivers face because we’re caregivers ourselves. Our founder, Julie Tittler, had the idea for Curi™, our mobile social family caregivers’ assistant, when she was faced with her own caregiving challenges. Julie tells her story in our video above.

Curi™ simplifies family caregiving and gives caregivers peace of mind. Curi™ helps caregivers:

●     refocus caregiving into clear concrete goals for each family member

●     hand care off between caregivers effortlessly, so the right
        person is notified to do the right thing at the right time

●     back each other up when things don’t or can’t happen

●     know everyone’s status at a glance, up-to-the-minute,
        even when you are miles away

●     pull together their collective caregiving know-how into a
        shared multimedia library

●     keep everyone encouraged and engaged with their care

●     foster and maintain independence in the young and the
       old while maintaining discreet caregiver supervision

 

Why We Need Your Help

Creating the tools to make complicated family caregiving simple is a labor of love. It has taken much time and a lot of our own money. It’s also taken a lot of team work with families like yours. We are almost there, almost ready to put it into families’ hands. We just need to cover a few more things before we can do that: insurance, devices for testing, and tools to get our customer support in place. Join our tribe. Become part of the Semafores team and help us cross the finish line.

How You Can Help

You can contribute as much, or as little, as you like. Crowdfunding is a grassroots effort to get us off the ground. In return, we can send you some nice perks—subscriptions to Curi™, an invitation to a private beta test, some promotional merchandise. Even if you don’t need Curi™ yourself, you probably know someone who could really use it. You are free to give any license you may receive to someone you know. If you want, we’ll donate it to a family in need--just let us know. Or, if you like, you can make a donation without accepting any perks. Spread the word about Curi™. Tweet it. Share it. Text it. Email it. Talk it up. The excitement you help create by sharing will get us to the finish line.

We’d love to hear from you. Tell us about your caregiving challenges. The more we know about what family caregivers need, the more we can make Curi™ the best tool for family caregiving. It’s your stories, your ideas, your feedback, your enthusiasm which will make Curi™ a success.

story:
Meet iCare

 iCare is a high quality sleep monitoring solution that uses Artificial Intelligence to work as an alert system for epileptic seizures. It offers long-term sleep monitoring that does not require the patient to wear a device or have a wearable, thus limiting them physically. The patient/caregiver simply has to install the device on the wall, and a continuous stream of data is transmitted to a smartphone. Our solution’s primary market advantage is that adopting it requires zero change in consumer behavior.

 

Our Story

 One of our co-founders, has a cousin who was diagnosed with epilepsy a year ago. This cousin's aunt, her primary caregiver, had no way of figuring out when she was having a seizure in her sleep without popping in to inspect the sleeping girl every now and then to ensure that all was well. This is a huge cause for concern considering the fact that sudden unexpected death of someone with epilepsy or SUDEP occurs most often when the patient has a seizure while he or she is sleeping.That's when we came up with the idea of creating an alert system that can notify caregivers in case of emergency while the patient is sleeping, and an assurance that their loved one is safe.

                      

The Problem

According to the Epilepsy Foundation, epilepsy is the fourth most common neurological disorder. It is estimated that 3 - 5% of the population have a seizure sometime in their life and 0.5 -1% have ‘active epilepsy’. More people die from epileptic seizures every year than in a house fire. SUDEP in particular is a cause for serious concern.

  • 1,00,000 people die annually due to SUDEP

  • More than 1 in 1000 people worldwide suffering from epilepsy die in their sleep every year

  • SUDEP accounts for 34% of all sudden deaths in children

Why we are the best solution 

 

Epilepsy has no known cure. Several forms of medication exist that allow the patient to control the symptoms and live with the condition. However, there are some for whom anti-epileptic drugs(AEDs) do not necessarily work and may have to resort to other methods such as ketogenic diets, VNS therapy, DBS therapy, and even brain surgery if it is found that the cause for epilepsy can be found in one specific part of the brain. So the fact remains that no matter what the mitigating treatment being used is, some form of monitoring is necessary to ensure safety of the patient.Several seizure alert devices are already on the market today. However, the non-invasive ones primarily use abnormal movement as the criteria to detect seizures. Breathing and heart rate are important markers when it comes to SUDEP. What we aim to do is to provide an effective, non-invasive solution that will come at a very affordable pric             

Where we are now

The non-invasive monitoring of respiration patterns of one of our engineers, shown through graphs here
The evolution from paper design to prototype.
The hardware development making incremental development in one of our offices.                      

How Does It Work

This is markedly important for patients diagnosed with epilepsy as there is no additional reminder that they have a condition that requires monitoring, considering the stigma that the disease carries. Our solution measures respiration rates and motion patterns from a distance to detect seizures through irregularities in vital statistics. Once detected, caregivers are notified via an app on their smartphones so that they can take immediate mitigating action. This also allows patient data such as the severity and frequency of the attacks to be collected since this information is necessary for the consulting neurologists/doctors to devise appropriate treatment.  iCare does all this at a very affordable price.

Our wall monitor has five major components:

  • Presence Detection: Detects a person’s presence in the room

  • Respiration Profile: Continuous streaming and analysis of respiration rate

  • Motion Profile: Continuous streaming and analysis of motion profile

  • Artificial Intelligence Component: Analyse, process, and assimilate data to create an early stage alert mechanism

  • Mobile application: Using wi-fi/bluetooth/mobile network, the data is continuously streamed to the caregiver’s smartphone. When there is any change in the respiration rate or the motion profile, an alert is sent to the caregiver.
           

 Why We Need You

We have a great product and we know it. What we need now is the money to get this product from the prototype stage to the market. Help us reach our goal and bring us one step closer to making the lives of millions of people worldwide safer.

                             

 FAQ

What happens when there is more than one person in the room?

The system collects data from both people and develops a respiration profile over time.  The AI algorithm will pick this up and send out alerts when there is a disruption in either one of them.

What happens if the system fails?

In the exceptional case that the system experiences software and/or mechanical failure, an alert goes out to the primary caregiver who can then get in touch with our customer care to solve the issue in a timely fashion.

Will  iCare be available internationally?

Yes,  iCare will be available to international customers.

What happens if there’s an electrical failure?

The device has  built-in battery backup that will last for about 4 hours.

How do you deal with the issue of data privacy?

We understand how important data privacy is to our users. Our system is built on a secure platform and encrypted with up-to-date tools to ensure that the information stored therein is not misused.

 

 

Risk And Challenges

We have a long road ahead of us and the challenges will be plenty. From manufacturing schedules or clinical trials, we’re bound to face hurdles we’re prepared for and ones we aren’t. In terms of limitations the the  iCare solution is not built to be used to collect data for more than three persons in the same room.  While this is out of our current scope, it is definitely something we need to look into in the future.

 

                    

Spread The Word

We understand that not everyone can help us with funding. However, we would really appreciate it if you could spread our message by clicking on the buttons below.  That’s not to say that we don’t want contributors not to share. We would greatly appreciate both!

 

 

The #DareTo Say SUDEP infographic encourages people with epilepsy and their caregivers to Know SUDEP facts.

 

   

 

About #DareTo

 

The Epilepsy Foundation is here to help people living with seizures #DareTo to live to their fullest potential. 

 

Support the SUDEP Institute

 

 

Make a donation to the SUDEP Institute to help support our programs and services.
This infographic was shared from the SUDEP Research Initiatives, Brought to you by the Epilepsy Foundation and the SUDEP Institute.

story:
Help us to build a ceremony house and communal space in the rain- forest to enhance our healing work!

Our Story

Dr.Sanango was established by Shaman Don Eluco Navarro and his English apprentice Emily Sinclair in May 2015. Our vision was to create a centre of positive cross-cultural exchange, providing authentic shamanic healing with Master Plants Ayahuasca and Sanango. We aim to preserve, share, and develop shamanic knowledge through our interaction with the international community, whilst working with and serving the local community. For the last year we have been growing organically without outside investment. In order to realise our vision of moving further in to the rain-forest this coming year, the time has come to seek the help of the wider 'familia de la medicina'... 

We currently facilitate ayahuasca healing retreats and shamanic dietas at Chinchelejo Lodge (Dragonfly Lodge), the family home of indigenous Ayahuascero Don Eluco Navarro, in his Amazonian village of Jenaro Herrera. Chinchelejo Lodge was first established as a healing centre in 2008 by Eluco and his partner at the time, Meghan Shannon. They lived and worked together until 2011 after which Eluco worked in other centres near Iquitos. It was at one of these centres that he met Emily, an English Anthropologist and travelling volunteer at the time and together they re-opened Chinchelejo Lodge for healing retreats. 


This Campaign

Dr.Sanango has enjoyed a wonderful first year in which we have helped many amazing people from around the world, welcoming them in to our 'familia de la medicina'. In order to better serve them and future visitors we would like to move deeper in to the rain-forest away from the sounds of the village, which are sometimes distracting for our guests. Chinchelejo Lodge has served Don Eluco and the medicine community connected to him well for many years, but over this time the village has expanded moving closer to the lodge, whilst electricity has made outside noise louder. Chinchelejo Lodge will continue to be a big part of Dr. Sanango giving guests a taste of Amazonian village life. However, we will gradually grow out in the forest where our visitors can experience greater tranquility in nature. A friend of the centre who first visited last year has generously bought and donated land for this purpose. 

First, we want to build a maloca (ceremony house) , which we are hoping to fund with this campaign. This will enable our guests to enjoy ayahuasca ceremonies in the forest in the safety and beauty of this traditional sacred structure. We estimate it will cost $2000, including labour, to build. 

Alongside the maloca we need to construct a simple communal house, which can be used for meditation and relaxation before and during the day after ceremonies. We estimate this will cost $1000. 

To improve accommodation and provide more space for guests at the camp, we would like to renovate a large guest house that was gifted to us by Don Alberto. The house needs a new roof, work inside and decoration. We estimate this will cost $1000. 

Thus, with your help we are campaigning to raise $4000 for this project. 

Future Plans

Later, we  plan to build tambos (individual wooden huts) for plant dietas, to provide a quiet haven for people undergoing this deep personal healing experience. 

In time, we will build retreat guest houses and a kitchen space in the forest. 

We have begun planting ayahuasca vine on the land in order to provide a sustainable source for the centre, and will plant chakruna and other medicinal plants as we continue, creating an abundant medicinal garden in the centre grounds. We also envisage a vegetable patch and eco toilets so the space will gradually grow in to a sustainable medicinal community. 

How You Can Help

Please help us to begin making this dream a reality! You will be helping Don Eluco and his apprentices to heal many people from around the world, whilst also supporting a sustainable community project.  All contributions great and small are very much appreciated and can go a long way here. If we do not reach our target, we will still be able to keep the money raised to start construction out in the forest beginning with the maloca, and if we manage to raise more, the extra money will go towards furthering the project. Please give whatever you can and as generously as you like! 

Even if you can only give a little yourself, or none at all, you can still contribute to our campaign! Help us to reach our goal by spreading the word and sharing this with as many people as possible using Indiegogo share tools.

First, we want to build a maloca (ceremony house) , which we are hoping to fund with this campaign. This will enable our guests to enjoy ayahuasca ceremonies in the forest in the safety and beauty of this traditional sacred structure. We estimate it will cost $2000, including labour, to build. 
Alongside the maloca we need to construct a simple communal house, which can be used for meditation and relaxation before and during the day after ceremonies. We estimate this will cost $1000. 
To improve accommodation and provide more space for guests at the camp, we would like to renovate a large guest house that was gifted to us by Don Alberto. The house needs a new roof, work inside and decoration. We estimate this will cost $1000. 
Thus, with your help we are campaigning to raise $4000 for this project. 

Future Plans

Later, we  plan to build tambos (individual wooden huts) for plant dietas, to provide a quiet haven for people undergoing this deep personal healing experience. 
In time, we will build retreat guest houses and a kitchen space in the forest. 
We have begun planting ayahuasca vine on the land in order to provide a sustainable source for the centre, and will plant chakruna and other medicinal plants as we continue, creating an abundant medicinal garden in the centre grounds. We also envisage a vegetable patch and eco toilets so the space will gradually grow in to a sustainable medicinal community. 

How You Can Help
Please help us to begin making this dream a reality! You will be helping Don Eluco and his apprentices to heal many people from around the world, whilst also supporting a sustainable community project.  All contributions great and small are very much appreciated and can go a long way here. If we do not reach our target, we will still be able to keep the money raised to start construction out in the forest beginning with the maloca, and if we manage to raise more, the extra money will go towards furthering the project. Please give whatever you can and as generously as you like! 
Even if you can only give a little yourself, or none at all, you can still contribute to our campaign! Help us to reach our goal by spreading the word and sharing this with as many people as possible using Indiegogo share tools.

story:
A Yoga Garden in Marrakech

Imagine a green oasis right in the middle of the famous Medina of Marrakech. Imagine practicing yoga in the open air, being immersed in a enchanting garden. A green haven you can stop by on your trip or day-to-day to calm down, to enjoy yourself while joining a fantastic yoga class in an artful and highly inspiring surrounding.

Does this imagination sound fabulous to you?
Then let's create this unique to the world yoga project together!

Support us and get great, exclusive rewards!

The NOSADE Yoga Garden

  • With the NOSADE yoga garden we aim to create a yoga space as a green garden haven right in the middle of the historical medina - for both locals and travelers.

  • We want to create a place to get inspired by, a place to cool and calm down, a place to get fascinated by. 
  • We wish to create a space for people getting together: an artful surrounding for yoga classes, but also special events, (yoga) workshops, yoga teacher trainings, special exhibitions.
  • We want to create a place to educate and empower both the locals and the travelers by teaching conscious and healthy movement and lifestyle. 
  • We aim to create a sustainable working environment for the locals working with us.

The garden opening is scheduled for Autumn 2017.


NOSADE - Yoga in Morocco

NOSADE was founded in 2014 by Anica Herrmann to share very authentic, high-quality and familiar travel experiences with like-minded, nomad-hearted people in beautiful, ever fascinating Morocco.

NOSADE is successfully running group yoga retreats as well as individual yoga trips in Marrakech, the Sahara Desert and at Morocco's coastlines - currently three varying retreats per month.
The most retreats we are running in our beloved home base Marrakech that has developed more and more to a hot spot for a variety of travelers. Here we are starting all our trips from and welcome our guests from all over the world.


Green fascinating Marrakech
Ever since Anica started NOSADE, she was driven and always highly inspired by Morocco's cultural variety and its natural diversity. By its hospitality and the surprises it holds on a day-to-day basis in a most positive and challenging way. 
Marrakech stands for exactly these fascinating characteristics. And Marrakech stands for its green havens: its gardens.

"Ever since I m living Morocco these gardens fascinated, inspired, calmed me within the hustle and bustle of the city. Ever since I dreamed about a garden in Marrakech! As a haven in the middle of the city! A garden as a space and meeting place for fellow yogis living or traveling here", Anica says.


Anica's motivation 

One of her concerns heading the company is creating both, a sustainable, valuable and yet preserving environment for the locals working with NOSADE,
and highly individual, unique, memorable experiences for our fellow-travelers.


Support us!

  • Support this unique to the world yoga project!
  • Support us to create more green spaces, more inspiring meaningful spaces in the world!
  • Support us to create an educational and empowering space!
  • Support us to create jobs and to facilitate education here in Morocco – where both is needed so much!
  • Support us to increase numbers of Morocco visitors, the biggest source of income and employment for the locals, by creating worth visiting sights!


In total the project has a financing requirement of EUR 95,000.

Being able to create this space, NOSADE needs support with a sum of EUR 75,000 for 
  • Property purchase (EUR 50,000)
  • Property restructuring & development (EUR 10,000)
  • Plant cultivation (EUR 15,000)
  • Yoga equipment & furnishing (EUR 15,000)
  • Advertisement & promotion (EUR 5,000)
Should the funding goal not be achieved, we will still start the project - with a more reduced set-up (lease-purchase, slower property development).
Should the funding goal be over achieved, we will additionally build an area to get provided with massages & yoga therapy treatments right from the beginning, which is planned to set up for later.

Help us to create a unique space and the first yoga garden project in the world! Get great rewards for your support:
  • Be the first to safe your ticket for great yoga classes in NOSADE Yoga Garden Marrakech, taught by various great teachers
  • Benefit from private sessions in the garden in Marrakech - or even before - according to your individual needs
  • Join us for one of our great upcoming retreats for special conditions
  • Or be one of just a very few and safe your Yoga Garden lifetime VIP membership

You love the idea and want to support us JUST BECAUSE of that: we love you for supporting us & hope to welcome you one day at the Yoga Garden in Marrakech!
Check out the perks for the concrete description & package!

If you love the idea but cannot support the project financially, please help us by spreading the idea!
Support us on facebook or twitter, share the idea with your friends and influencers and we are ever grateful for that!

story:
Oliber

Oliber is an easy to use, inexpensive magnetic mitten that allows people with atrophied hands to pick up objects via magnets and metal plates, enabling users to eat by themselves, brush their teeth, write with precision, draw, hold up their phone, and many other tasks. The magnets allow users to hold up to 2.2 pounds. It comes with 4 metal plates that can be stuck to whatever object the user wants. For a demonstration of how it works and looks, please visit our website: www.myoliber.com
Customers can also choose among various colors. Oliber is only US$52. It can be bought directly from our website. We are also looking for new partnerships with health and veteran organizations, and foundations.


 

 


The Impact of Oliber
Current solutions for people with atrophied hands are very basic, because prosthesis are for those who lack a hand from the wrist up. There aren't many solutions for this kind of patients so orthesis that allow functionality in atrophied hands are few and the world needs more of them at a lower cost.
The product has been tested and validated with users and experts such as dermatologists, physiatrists and nurses. It also has been tested with users with Epidermolysis bullosa, demonstrating the functionality, ergonomics and freedom.
The idea started for those with Epidermolysis bullosa, but it has grown its impact to other diseases, like Arthritis, Arthrosis, Multiple Sclerosis, burned hands, and any person with difficulties in their hands to manipulate objects.


Challenges
The biggest challenge will be to reach our target audience, everywhere. This will be done through foundations, the government and web pages. We will start this project in Chile, but we will sell it internationally in the future. This way we will cover as many affected as possible. 


Other Ways You Can Help
You can help many ways, with money, sharing, telling friends and don´t forget to use the share tool of indigogo.

story:
When you print with a Fused Filament 3D printer, either DIY or Professional grade, all plastic material flows through a nozzle that usually is made of metal. However, plastic materials contain colorant and fillers such as carbon, mineral, metal, ceramic, glass and so on, that quickly erode outlet orifice and reduce print quality. Our anti-wear nozzles are made of brass that is a good heat conducting, while the tips of sapphire, one of the most hard material on the Earth. Thanks to excellent anti wear properties, the rounded nozzle tip, improve print quality, surface definition and reduces the likelihood of clogging. If you start a print that requires expensive materials and a long time, you don't want to throw time and money, save your works and choose our anti wear nozzles.

Compatibility List

MK8      

Makerbot Replicator 1

Makerbot Replicator 2 / 2X

Makerbot Replicator 5th gen

Makerbot Replicator mini

Makerbot Replicator Z18

Reprap clones

M6 thread  1.75 mm filament

MK10    

Wanhao Duplicator 4 series

 Flashforge (newer models) 

Creator Pro 

M7 thread 1.75mm filament  

Zortrax M200 

Afinia H479 

Afinia H480-01 

UP Plus 

UP Plus 2 ​

UP mini 

M6 thread 1.75mm filament

E3D 59 

J-Head 

Olsson Style

Sapphire anti wear nozzle makes your print stable to many and many kilos of material, without slicer setting adjustments, to prevent headache and a lot of trial to fine tuning. Anti wear orifice is easy to clean with solvent, but also by drill bit without risk of damage, since sapphire is a grade of magnitude harder than steel


MK8 and E3D style are already in production

story:
Project: 'StokesFit'




    Gyms don't make women a priority! 
    Gyms are built for men. There is no gym that caters to women... NONE! Big gyms run a few group/bootcamp classes, maybe a few spin classes, a few times a week. They offer just enough to appease the women, who make up HALF of their  memberships!!  

We use the same training principles whether you want to lose 10 lbs or 100 lbs... whether you want to lose your baby weight or go into competition. You can achieve whatever you want as long as you follow the proper principles.

We Want to Help More Women

It's time to turn the page on BuffCamp and build something bigger that allows us to help more women... many more women! Both locally and worldwide!
  Programs For Everyone:  We want to build a bigger gym. The goal is to serve every segment of the female population - from the young female athlete to the grandmother looking to improve her balance. The additional space takes the restrictions off what we can do. It will allow us to help many more groups of women and hold multiple classes at one time. It will also make filming the workouts for online access much easier.
  Fat Loss:  In  a small space we can't show the many different exercise combinations, or the different types of equipment that can be used to achieve fat loss. This is very important because we want to show women that they can achieve results regardless of the equipment they have access to ...or their limitations (Ex. someone who can't run because of ankle pain). Too many women think they "must run", "lift heavy" or  do a lot of cardio to lose body fat... this is simply not true! We will blow this myth out of the water!
  Online Access:  The Fat Loss workouts will be available online so that any woman with access to a computer or cell phone can follow along.


As you can see this is a gym designed for every segment of the female population - But Make No Mistake About It our Fat Loss Programs are going to change the way the fitness industry trains women! Let me explain why it's so different (keep in mind I've trained thousands of women all over the world using these methods).



  • These are two programs that we are very excited about, our Senior Fit program and our Excell program. These are two groups of women who are largely neglected in gyms everywhere. Unless you belong to a YMCA, you've probably never seen a class for seniors that focus on their needs specifically... Actually you've probably never seen any sort of class for seniors! Seniors realize how important Balance, Functional/Life Movements and Bone - Strengthening activities are... and that's what we will focus on.
  • The Excell program is so badly needed. many more young female athletes are participating in sports than ever before. many of these athletes have a chance to get College scholarships. We have coaches that work specifically with theses athletes. Being involved with boys athletics (I have two sons), I realize that there is a huge void in programs that are geared toward helping female athletes improve in their particular sport, eat correctly and maintain a positive self-image.


ReSpin is one of several several programs that use the AfterBurn 50 program to burn fat faster and in a shorter amount of time: Resistance exercises are used to increase your heart rate... the cardio exercises/machines are used to maintain a lower heart rate in between the resistance cycles. This combination gives you faster fat loss and it preserves muscle so that your body looks fit and tone as you lose weight.

  • Anyone Can Take The Fat Loss classes. Don't think you have to be some super athlete or in great shape to participate in the Fat Loss classes. Anyone can get the same results as long as you follow the correct format. Maybe you can't run on a treadmill because of a nagging injury, or maybe you just don't like running. No problem, you can use a spin bike or an elliptical to achieve the same results.These fat loss workouts allow you to do that. It doesn't matter because there are many ways to achieve your goals as long as you follow the core principles.....
  • Don't Live Near The Gym? No Problem! Not only will this gym be able to help many more women In the Buffalo area achieve results, but it  also gives women all over the world online access to the workouts we do in the gym. Online Access is perfect for  women who workout alone or for the Personal Trainer or Group Instructor who struggles with clients who can't lose weight.



  • Police and Firefighter Training: Training for female Police and Firefighter recruits who have to take the physical fitness exam: I often get women come to me very late in the process with only a week or two remaining before their exam. This is not enough time and has led to many failures. I'm going to set up a program to identify these women early and get them in so they can ace their exams.

  • Speaker Series: Our goal is to bring in influential women from the community to talk about issues pertaining to women. Whether it's a discussion about health issues, demonstrating the new exercise craze (we have a bunch of ideas for unique classes), self-defense demonstrations, money matters or anything of interest to women - we will have a platform for it.

  • Domestic Violence 5K Run: My proudest moment last year was putting on this awesome run to support Haven House and victims of domestic violence. Every year we fund raise for a different women's cause. We've decided to make domestic violence our focus from now on. Being raised by a single mom I've always been an advocate of women. Seeing abuse growing up (fortunately not in my family) changed me and molded me into a person who has a need to celebrate and protect women... which is why I opened an all women's gym that was a safe and non-judgemental place for women to come and workout.


    Women make up 1/2 of the 50 million gym memberships in the United States

    Don't get me wrong there is a place for this type of training... but the fact is that most women want to lose some body fat and keep their existing muscle so that they look leaner and more toned... Therefore if these are the results you want then you must train specifically for them.

    Women must train differently than men to achieve results. Women's workouts must be based in real science because it's so much harder for women to lose weight and get in shape.  I know, because I've trained women exclusively for many years! You can't just slap some exercises together, throw in a class or two and hope to get results. 90% of women who join a gym will quit due to lack of results. If they would have had workouts based on maximum calorie expenditure and proper exercise sequence - they could have gotten results in half the time.


    FRUSTRATION:

    About 10 years ago, While working in big box gyms as an independent trainer. I became frustrated for two reasons.

    1. Women, who were starting to come to gyms much more than ever before, were often not taken serious by trainers. The were often given programs designed for men. Very few got results and many times, women who came to the gym to lose weight were getting bigger!
    2. The fat loss industry started to explode with bogus weight loss cures such as "miracle" diet pills, or exercise machines that could "melt" fat. These were all 100% ineffective solutions designed to take money from women who were desperate to get results
    • fat loss body wraps
    • shake and juice diets
    • lasers that burn fat
    • cleanses
    • Infomercials: exercise machines making unbelievable claims
    • "miracle" fat loss pills
    • infomercials: workout programs that only required 10-15 min a day to "melt fat away"
    • every week there was a new "secret" "rare" or "miracle" Berry or Fruit from some far off country that "holds the secret to fat loss"
    This is Basically How It WAS and STILL Is Today: Like buying a car from a slimy used car salesman

     

    What We Need

    The Goal is $20,000. This is the minimum that will allow us to set the gym up with the proper equipment. It's really important to understand that maximum results CAN be achieved with "regular" equipment that's found in any gym. We need a few specialized pieces of equipment (balance training, core training, sports training) - but we will never use 'gimmicky' or 'fad' equipment.

    What If I Don't Have A Gym Membership? Doesn't matter, we will show you how to perform these workouts at home with just some dumbbells (online access).


    • A gym like this need a variety of exercise machines. Rowers, ellipticals, treadmills, sleds, spin bikes, punching bags. Variety is a major component in women's fat loss. Another key component is resistance equipment: dumbbells, barbells and specialized/functional machines. Specialized equipment is important, for example, a hex bar allows women to train their legs with squats without having to put a heavy bar on their back. The goal is to have equipment that is adaptable to EVERYONE.
    • Video camera: to film workouts for online viewing
    • Polar Heart Rate System: http://www.polar.com/us-en/club
    • Large Display Screen (above): allows everyone to see their heart rates
    • Video Camera: record workouts for online access
    • Dumbbells & Barbells
    • Boxing Gloves




    The Team

    One person could not possibly make this work. It takes a team of dedicated instructors and leaders, committed to making this happen.




    Perks: There are 2 Kinds of Perks for this project
    1. Gym Membership: Perks for women who live in the area and want to become gym members or just support this project in some way
    2. Online Access Passes To Video Workouts from the Gym: Perks for those women who don't live in the area or who are not interested in joining, but are interested in (a) viewing the fat loss workouts from the gym online (or on your phone), (b) receiving fat loss diet plans, (c) receiving additional workout plans and (d) access to specialized workout programs (ex. my best-selling glute building program).

    $5

    You Think This Is A GREAT Idea?

    • If you think this is a great idea and you want to support it in some way. Hopefully this idea for a truly All-Women's gym will be a model for other gyms around the country. Your name will go on a special sponsor page on the website.


    $25

    I Will Send You 25 Fat Loss Workouts

    • Having trouble losing body fat? I will send you 25 Fat Loss Workout including Video of the Exercises. These workouts are a combination of Resistance and Cardio in the same workout! These are full-body Bootcamp type workouts designed to burn calories and maintain muscle. All you need are some dumbbells.
    • All the workouts come with Downloadable Workout Sheets so you can print them out and take them to the gym or follow them on your phone.


    $45
    Lifetime Access Pass to Online Video Workouts from the Gym

     Lifetime Access Pass to Online Video Workouts.
    • If you don't live in the area or not interested in joining, but want to view the workouts from the gym online then this is perfect for you.
    • Get access to any workout I ever put up from the gym. You can view the workouts on a computer, smart phone etc.
    • Along with the video you get Downloadable Workout Sheets of all the workouts. The workouts are written out for you so that you can pull up the workout sheets on your phone while at the gym or you can print them out and take them with you to the gym.

    Note: This Offer will ONLY be available on this Indiegogo campaign.


    $99

    Lifetime Access Pass To Online Video Workouts... PLUS 3 More Complete Programs (190 Additional Workouts)

    You won't need another workout program... EVER! This will keep you busy for a long time!

    • 1 - Lifetimes Pass to all online workouts
    • My database of 100 Fat Loss Workouts w/videos. You can view the workouts online or use the Downloadable Workout Sheets that come with each workout, print them and take them to the gym)
    • Free Diets (tells you what and how much to eat)
    • My Glute Building Program (UltimateBikiniButt.com)
    • 50 Resistance Training Workouts - utilizing advanced techniques such a SuperSets, Drop sets, Pre-exhaust. These are not your regular resistance workouts... these workouts will push you hard and get you out of the gym faster.
    • All workouts have a downloadable workout sheet.


    $349
    1 Year Unlimited Bootcamp Membership
    The Most Effective way for women to train to lose body fat and retain muscle.   --- You can go at your own pace and modify any workout to fit you (ex. if you have a sore knee, bad back... that's no problem - Every workout can be modified easily).

    Get a 1 Year Unlimited Bootcamp Membership at a very low price
    • You will NEVER see this price again - This is a special price just for this promotion.
    • Unlimited Bootcamp Classes (15-18 per week) - come to as many bootcamp classes as you like (twice a day if you like).
    • Classes are different everyday - a variety of exercises and machines will be used (Dumbbells, Bodyweight, Spin bikes, Treadmills, Rowers etc.).
    • Bootcamps are a combination of Resistance and Cardio in the same workout.
    • There are only a Limited Number Available!

     

    $499
    Train With A Friend For 1 Year
    One of the best ways to get and stay motivated is working out with a friend. This makes it super easy to do so! --- You can go at your own pace and modify any workout to fit you (ex. if you have a sore knee, bad back... that's no problem - Every workout can be modified easily).

    Get 2 - 1 Year Bootcamp Memberships!
    • Perfect for training with a friend (you don't have to come together)
    • Unlimited Bootcamp Classes (15-18 per week) - come to as many bootcamp classes as you like (twice a day if you like).
    • Classes are different everyday - a variety of exercises and machines will be used (Dumbbells, Bodyweight, Spin bikes, Treadmills, Rowers etc.).
    • Bootcamps are a combination of Resistance and Cardio in the same workout. This is the most effective way for women to train who want to burn calories and maintain muscle.

    Note: This Offer will ONLY be available on this Indiegogo campaign.


    $699

    Train With TWO Friends For 1 Year

    Get 3 - 1 Year Unlimited Bootcamp Memberships!

    • Perfect for training with a friend (you don't have to come together)
    • Unlimited Bootcamp Classes (15-18 per week) - come to as many bootcamp classes as you like (twice a day if you like).
    • Classes are different everyday - a variety of exercises and machines will be used (Dumbbells, Bodyweight, Spin bikes, Treadmills, Rowers etc.).
    • Bootcamps are a combination of Resistance and Cardio in the same workout. This is the most effective way for women to train who want to burn calories and maintain muscle.

    Note: This Offer will ONLY be available on this Indiegogo campaign. There is only a Limited Number Available.


    $1799
    Lifetime Unlimited Bootcamp Membership Pass

    • Become a lifetime member to our Bootcamp Classes (15-18 classes per week).
    • We use everything in our classes: Dumbbells, Cardio machines, Spin bike, Rower, Body-weight exercises, Rowers etc.
    • All bootcamp members get Free Diets.
    • Bootcamp classes combine Resistance and Cardio in the same workout.

    Note: This Offer will ONLY be available on this Indiegogo campaign. The regular access pass will be limited to 1 year.


    $2499
    Lifetime Bootcamp Member... PLUS More Classes!
    More classes than you can ever take. Get into Incredible shape with a wide variety of classes. Come to any of the classes below:

    INCLUDES:
    • All Bootcamp Classes
    • Kickboxing Classes
    • Advanced Fat Loss Classes
    • Barbell Classes
    • Re-Spin Classes (HIIT Classes utilizing Spin Bikes and Resistance circuits). See detailed explanation of this of this class above.
    • Free Diets

    Note: This Offer will ONLY be available on this Indiegogo campaign. The regular access pass will be limited to 1 year.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Even if you don't or can't contribute, you can help by spreading the word about what we are trying to do because we think this can be the beginning of trend that could spread all across the United States and beyond:

    Please help spread the word through: Facebook  Instagram  Twitter  LinkedIn
    You can also check out the Website and Facebook page:
