story_txt:
Project: 'StokesFit'













Gyms don't make women a priority! Gyms are built for men. There is 
no gym that caters to women... NONE! Big gyms run a few group/bootcamp 
classes, maybe a few spin classes, a few times a week.
 They offer just enough to appease the women, who make up HALF of their 
 memberships!!   












We use the same training principles whether you want to lose 10 lbs or 100 lbs... whether you want to lose your baby weight or go into competition. You can achieve whatever you want as long as you follow the proper principles.



We Want to Help More Women
It's time to turn the page on BuffCamp and build something bigger that allows us to help more women... many more women! Both locally and worldwide!  Programs For Everyone:  We want to build a bigger gym. The goal is to serve every segment of the female population - from the young female athlete to the grandmother looking to improve her balance. The additional space takes the restrictions off what we can do. It will allow us to help many more groups of women and hold multiple classes at one time. It will also make filming the workouts for online access much easier.  Fat Loss:  In  a small space we can't show the many different exercise combinations, or the different types of equipment that can be used to achieve fat loss. This is very important because we want to show women that they can achieve results regardless of the equipment they have access to ...or their limitations (Ex. someone who can't run because of ankle pain). Too many women think they "must run", "lift heavy" or  do a lot of cardio to lose body fat... this is simply not true! We will blow this myth out of the water!  Online Access:  The Fat Loss workouts will be available online so that any woman with access to a computer or cell phone can follow along.









As you can see this is a gym designed for every segment of the female population - But Make No Mistake About It our Fat Loss Programs are going to change the way the fitness industry trains women! Let me explain why it's so different (keep in mind I've trained thousands of women all over the world using these methods).












These are two programs that we are very excited about, our Senior Fit program and our Excell program. These are two groups of women who are largely neglected in gyms everywhere. Unless you belong to a YMCA, you've probably never seen a class for seniors that focus on their needs specifically... Actually you've probably never seen any sort of class for seniors! Seniors realize how important Balance, Functional/Life Movements and Bone - Strengthening activities are... and that's what we will focus on.
The Excell program is so badly needed. many more young female athletes are participating in sports than ever before. many of these athletes have a chance to get College scholarships. We have coaches that work specifically with theses athletes. Being 
involved with boys athletics (I have two sons), I realize that there is a
 huge void in programs that are geared toward helping female athletes 
improve in their particular sport, eat correctly and maintain a positive
 self-image. 





ReSpin is one of several several programs that use the AfterBurn 50 program to burn fat faster and in a shorter amount of time: Resistance exercises are used to increase your heart rate... the cardio exercises/machines are used to maintain a lower heart rate in between the resistance cycles. This combination gives you faster fat loss and it preserves muscle so that your body looks fit and tone as you lose weight.


Anyone Can Take The Fat Loss classes. Don't think you 
have to be some super athlete or in great shape to participate in the 
Fat Loss classes. Anyone can get the same results as long as you follow 
the correct format. Maybe you can't run on a 
treadmill because of a nagging injury, or maybe you just don't like 
running. No problem, you can use a spin bike or an elliptical to achieve
 the same results.These fat loss workouts allow you to do that. It doesn't matter
 because there are many ways to achieve your goals as long as you follow the core principles..... 



Don't Live Near The Gym? No Problem! Not only will this gym be 
able to help many more women In the Buffalo area achieve results, but it 
also gives women all over the world online access to the workouts we do 
in the gym.
 Online Access is perfect for  women who workout alone or for the 
Personal Trainer or Group Instructor who struggles with clients who 
can't lose weight.










Police and Firefighter Training: Training for female Police and 
Firefighter recruits who have to take the physical fitness exam: I often
 get women come to me very late in the process with only a week or two 
remaining before their exam. This is not enough time and has led to many
 failures. I'm going to set up a program to identify these women early 
and get them in so they can ace their exams.








Speaker Series: Our goal is to bring in influential women from the community to talk about issues pertaining to women. Whether it's a discussion about health issues, demonstrating the new exercise craze (we have a bunch of ideas for unique classes), self-defense demonstrations, money matters or anything of interest to women - we will have a platform for it.

Domestic Violence 5K Run: My proudest moment last year was putting on this awesome run to support Haven House and victims of domestic violence. Every year we fund raise for a different women's cause. We've decided to make domestic violence our focus from now on. Being raised by a single mom I've always been an advocate of women. Seeing abuse growing up (fortunately not in my family) changed me and molded me into a person who has a need to celebrate and protect women... which is why I opened an all women's gym that was a safe and non-judgemental place for women to come and workout.








Women make up 1/2 of the 50 million gym memberships in the United States


Don't get me wrong there is a place for this type of training... but the fact is that most women want to lose some body fat and keep their existing muscle so that they look leaner and more toned... Therefore if these are the results you want then you must train specifically for them.
Women must train differently than men to achieve results. Women's workouts must be based in real science because it's so much harder for women to lose weight and get in shape.  I know, because I've trained women exclusively for many years! You can't just slap some exercises together, throw in a class or two and hope to get results. 90% of women who join a gym will quit due to lack of results. If they would have had workouts based on maximum calorie expenditure and proper exercise sequence - they could have gotten results in half the time.


FRUSTRATION:
About 10 years ago, While working in big box gyms as an independent trainer. I became frustrated for two reasons. 



Women, who were starting to come to gyms much more than ever before, were often not taken serious by trainers. The were often given programs designed for men. Very few got results and many times, women who came to the gym to lose weight were getting bigger!
The fat loss industry started to explode with bogus weight loss cures such as "miracle" diet pills, or exercise machines that could "melt" fat. These were all 100% ineffective solutions designed to take money from women who were desperate to get results 


fat loss body wraps
shake and juice diets

lasers that burn fat
cleanses
Infomercials: exercise machines making unbelievable claims
"miracle" fat loss pills
infomercials: workout programs that only required 10-15 min a day to "melt fat away"
every week there was a new "secret" "rare" or "miracle" Berry or Fruit from some far off country that "holds the secret to fat loss"


This is Basically How It WAS and STILL Is Today: Like buying a car from a slimy used car salesman
    What We Need 
 The Goal is $20,000. This is the minimum that will allow us to set the gym up with the proper equipment. It's really important to understand that maximum results CAN be achieved with "regular" equipment that's found in any gym. We need a few specialized pieces of equipment (balance training, core training, sports training) - but we will never use 'gimmicky' or 'fad' equipment. 
What If I Don't Have A Gym Membership? Doesn't matter, we will show you how to perform these workouts at home with just some dumbbells (online access).


 
A gym like this need a variety of exercise machines. Rowers, ellipticals, treadmills, sleds, spin bikes, punching bags. Variety is a major component in women's fat loss. Another key component is resistance equipment: dumbbells, barbells and specialized/functional machines. Specialized equipment is important, for example, a hex bar allows women to train their legs with squats without having to put a heavy bar on their back. The goal is to have equipment that is adaptable to EVERYONE.

Video camera: to film workouts for online viewing

Polar Heart Rate System: http://www.polar.com/us-en/club
   



Large Display Screen (above): allows everyone to see their heart rates

Video Camera: record workouts for online access
Dumbbells & Barbells
Boxing Gloves





The Team
 One person could not possibly make this work. It takes a team of dedicated instructors and leaders, committed to making this happen.




 





Perks: There are 2 Kinds of Perks for this project


Gym Membership: Perks for women who live in the area and want to become gym members or just support this project in some way


Online Access Passes To Video Workouts from the Gym: Perks for those women who don't live in the area or who are not interested in joining, but are interested in (a) viewing the fat loss workouts from the gym online (or on your phone), (b) receiving fat loss diet plans, (c) receiving additional workout plans and (d) access to specialized workout programs (ex. my best-selling glute building program). 








$5
You Think This Is A GREAT Idea?
If you think this is a great idea and you want to support it in some way. Hopefully this idea for a truly All-Women's gym will be a model for other gyms around the country. Your name will go on a special sponsor page on the website.






$25I Will Send You 25 Fat Loss Workouts

Having trouble losing body fat? I will send you 25 Fat Loss Workout including Video of the Exercises. These workouts are a combination of Resistance and Cardio in the same workout! These are full-body Bootcamp type workouts designed to burn calories and maintain muscle. All you need are some dumbbells.
All the workouts come with Downloadable Workout Sheets so you can print them out and take them to the gym or follow them on your phone.





$45Lifetime Access Pass to Online Video Workouts from the Gym Lifetime Access Pass to Online Video Workouts.
If you don't live in the area or not interested in joining, but want to view the workouts from the gym online then this is perfect for you. 
Get access to any workout I ever put up from the gym. You can view the workouts on a computer, smart phone etc. 
Along with the video you get Downloadable Workout Sheets of all the workouts. The workouts are written out for you so that you can pull up the workout sheets on your phone while at the gym or you can print them out and take them with you to the gym.


Note: This Offer will ONLY be available on this Indiegogo campaign. 





$99
Lifetime Access Pass To Online Video Workouts... PLUS 3 More Complete Programs (190 Additional Workouts)
You won't need another workout program... EVER! This will keep you busy for a long time!


1 - Lifetimes Pass to all online workouts
My database of 100 Fat Loss Workouts w/videos. You can view the workouts online or use the Downloadable Workout Sheets that come with each workout, print them and take them to the gym)


Free Diets (tells you what and how much to eat)
My Glute Building Program (UltimateBikiniButt.com)

50 Resistance Training Workouts - utilizing advanced techniques such a SuperSets, Drop sets, Pre-exhaust. These are not your regular resistance workouts... these workouts will push you hard and get you out of the gym faster.
All workouts have a downloadable workout sheet.







$3491 Year Unlimited Bootcamp MembershipThe Most Effective way for women to train to lose body fat and retain muscle.   --- You can go at your own pace and modify any workout to fit you (ex. if you have a sore knee, bad back... that's no problem - Every workout can be modified easily).Get a 1 Year Unlimited Bootcamp Membership at a very low price

story:
My name is Ismael, i´m a dietitian from Spain, CEO of CINUSA Group (www.cinusagroup.com), me and my team are working from more than 7 years in nutrition and health. Enrolled my work, I can appreciate how people choose bad unhealthy food everyday (snacks, sugar’s products, chocolate´s bars, fast food, beverages, etc), and they remove from the traditional food pattern products as fish, vegetables, fruits, legumes, water, etc. When you ask to the people why the take those products, they say that are in all commercials, markets, are cheap and delicious.

In other hand we had consciences about 2 problems in our society. 1) The increasing number of chronic disease (diabetes, obesity, cardiovascular, cancer, allergy and intolerances…) and how this pattern of consume is not help to much, and intake less vegetables foods (whole grains, fruit, vegetables and legumes) is part of the problem. 2) How this kind of consume is worst and dangerous for our planet. That´s mean for example for 300 grams of meat we spend 4500 liters of water, and just 900 liters for legumes.

2 basic problems:

  1. Bad habits of food intake and unhealthy food options
  2. Big problem of production, environmental impact and water footprint.

So, that´s why, 1 year ago, we focus in start a line of work to help people to offer new products, based in these 2 basic ideas to give and respect the option of snack and nowadays´ pattern: healthy and respectful with the environment.

LegumSnack, is a Healthy Nachos of legumes. It´s a natural ingredients snack, completely vegan, gluten free, soy free, GMOs free, baked-not fried-, high quality of vegan protein thank to the combined legumes with cereals and superfoods. It´s free of common allergies (seafood and shellfish, fish, nuts, cereal containing gluten, egg, milk and dairy, sulphur dioxide, soya, nuts, peanuts, lupin, mustard, celery, sesame seeds), low salt, low saturated fat and trans fat, high fiber, high minerals, high quality of protein (the quality of protein is about the component which build the protein, amino acids, and whether the number of essential amino acids has, that protein is better for humans. Legumes hasn´t methionine, but cereals are high on it, so, combined both we have a good quality of protein, that´s why traditionally different gastronomy cultures mix in meals, as cuscus with chickpea, lentils with rice, etc). We were looking for create a healthy and taste, delicious, crunch snack, for children, adolescent and adults. 


The environmental impact is a problem, so, we research about slow-food and KM 0 movement, one interesting way to don´t increase the environmental impact. Eat high quality vegan proteins is more efficient than animal protein, plus if that protein come from proximity crops: every time that you choose eat a save food for intolerance-allergies-diseases, you will contribute to the environment. That´s the way to protect our planet from fast destruction
 
 

 

Why we can´t take a snack if this is healthy one? It could be a funny and optimums way to intake a ration of legumes! Help us to get it reality soon!

We need the help to industrialized the process and go to the market. First of all passing from pilot proof to final presentation. We already test the project from farm to the lab, and now we are willing to produce from farms to market and consumers. Our goal in Indiegogo is 5.970 €. The help is for lab characterization, taxes, logistic, consumer lab-testers, etc. Your help will be the different to get this amazing opportunity to help people with special needs and our planet, and bring people a new concept of healthy and sustainability snacks. 

 

we have to dares:

1) About don't use preservatives, using just natural ingredients.

2) Not frying the product as the classic, just baked.

we must try all options in the laboratory and is why we need the help of Kickstarter.

We have experience in R&Dfor  food inc products and a technician team to get it!

story:
Your Dirty Laundry May Actually be even Dirtier after You Wash it.

Washing machines are teeming with bacteria that find their way onto your clothes, and then onto you.

Our smallest items, our undergarments, are the biggest culprits because of the presence of fecal matter and the different types of bacteria it can carry.

Your Old Way to Wash Panties Can Cause Serious Problems

Don't throw your unwashed panties into the laundry basket with all other clothes, and wait until the weekend to do the laundry together. It could bring yeast and bacteria. As a result, it can irritate your skin, cause itchiness, develop sores or rashes, cause a yeast infection and even cause a urinary tract infection (UTI).

LaughingU boils water to disinfect your panties.

The White-ish and Goopy Stuff on your Panties is Annoying

It is normal to have such stuff on your panties, but we know it is annoying.

LaughingU features its Vacuum-Suspension washing technology to clean up the white discharge and menstrual blood from your panties. 

 

Our Story

LaughingU has been launched in Mainland China (laughingface.cn). We find that a lot of girls in North America do have the need to wash their panties by hand. We know it is painful. Therefore we would like to produce North American Model to serve the market in the US and Canada. 

We are a start-up company with several patents and core technologies. It is risky and inefficient for us to add another production line without testing the market first. Therefore we decide to bring LaughingU to the North America Market by Crowdfunding and Pre-Orders.  

The Pre-Order price is $139 USD. The price will be $179 USD after the crowdfunding period.

(Chinese Model on the Production Line)

How do we come up with the 30,000 orders' estimate?

The first condition for our estimate is to achieve the 1,000 pre-orders target. We have run several surveys across the US and Canada.

The machine is initially designed to fulfill the need of Asian women.

For the first year of sales, our main clienteles are female Asian students in North America and office ladies with intensive workload. With surveys from a sample size of 5,000, the data provided by Google Ads and Facebook Ads, and our budget for marketing, we have run a rigorous regression analysis to get an estimate sales of 60,000 for the first calendar year in North America. 

A more straight forward way to estimate is that, through our survey, 10% female Asian students in North America eagerly want the machine and accept the price of $199 CAD or $149 USD. After the official launch of the product in North America, our marketing team will reach out the top 50 universities in the US and top 10 universities in Canada. On average, each of these universities have 5,000 female Asian students, so that about 500 people would want to buy the machine in one school. The total adds up to 30,000 sales.

story:
>> Deutsche Version siehe am Ende der englischen Version <<

 

Who are we?

In cooperation with the University of Basel (https://dsbg.unibas.ch) we founded the company "youdowell.com", an online health coaching platform. Based on this experience we are now developing an online coaching platform focusing exclusively on diabetes , called db.coach.

Why are we doing this?

  • Every 6 seconds somebody dies of diabetes
  • 1 out of 11 adults have diabetes
  • Half of adults with diabetes are not aware of it (sleeping disease)

Those quite shocking facts motivated us to develop db.coach, to help people to change their lives, before Diabetes does it for them.

 

What’s the problem?

Diabetes gets treated as a progressive, chronic disease and unfortunately the today’s standard therapy is mostly based on:

  • A progressive consumption of medication lifelong
  • With devastating potential side effects
  • Not tackling root cause, but primarily treating symptoms

That doesn’t sound very promising, doesn’t it?

 

What’s the solution?

Diabetes does not have to be chronic and progressive at all!

Studies clearly show that diabetes can be reversed by incorporating well designed nutrition and motion concepts.

 

How does db.coach work?

  • Registration & Data Import: Patient registers and enters profile information into the system
  • Analysis & Plan Generation: We analyze the information and provide an individualized nutrition & motion plan, which can be changed at any time and is adapting automatically
  • Data Tracking: We track, process and consolidate data such as glucose values, food intake, sleep, stress, etc. to enable user to always have the overview about the progress
  • Patient – Expert Connection: We bring user and doctor together through an integrated expert connection tool to optimize treatment effectiveness by sharing data and allowing direct communication

 

What's the benefit of db.coach?

To help reversing diabetes!

  • improving diabetic specific health markers
  • adapting medication usage
  • connecting patient with doctor (expert) to optimize treatment
  • improving patient's overall life quality 
  • saving costs

 

How do we differentiate from competitors?

Unlike the most simply tracking apps we deliver these more advanced methods to help fighting diabetes:

  • Design of diabetes-specific, individualized diet, workout and fitness programs, based on latest nutrition and sports science, integrated in a flexible and adaptive plan tool
  • Integrative expert tool, enabling patient to share personal data with his doctor to eventually improve overall treatment effectiveness

 

What is the game plan of db.coach?

  • 1 month to release prototype version of a mobile friendly web application
  • 2 months to release a full version with integrated expert tool
  • If we collect min. 40'000$ we can additionally develop a mobile app version (iPhone, Android)

 

To achieve that we need your support

Based on our experience, conviction and passion we invested our own money in db.coach and actively started app development. To finalize and market it, we now need your help. 

Make our mission YOUR mission to help diabetes patients successfully combat their disease. 

Help us spreading the word about the db.coach project and join the program for yourself or donate subscription for people you care.

We thank you and appreciate your support to help diabetes patients overcoming their disease. 

Your db.coach Team

 

--- Deutsche Version ---

 

Wer sind wir?

Zusammen mit der Universität Basel (https://dsbg.unibas.ch) entwickeln wir eine  Diabetes-Coaching-Plattform, namens db.coach.

Überlegen Sie sich einmal:

  • Alle 6 Sekunden stirbt ein Mensch an Diabetes
  • 1 von 11 Erwachsenen hat Diabetes
  • Fast 50% der Diabetes-Fälle sind nicht diagnostiziert

Diese ziemlich schockierenden Fakten motivierten uns db.coach zu entwickeln um Menschen zu helfen ihren Lifestyle zu ändern, bevor dies Diabetes für sie tut.

 

Was ist eigentlich das Problem der heutigen Diabetes-Behandlung?

Diabetes wird grundsätzlich als eine chronisch, progressive verlaufende Krankheit behandelt.

Leider sieht der standardisierte Therapieansatz meistens so aus:

  • Lebenslange Einnahme von Medikamenten
  • Steigende Dosierung der Medikamente
  • Entsprechende Nebeneffekte
  • Behandlung von Symptomen ohne die Ursache zu heilen

Tönt nicht gerade vielversprechend, oder?

 

Was kann die Lösung sein?

Diabetes muss nicht chronisch und progressiv verlaufen im Gegenteil, sie kann rückgängig gemacht werden!

Die Studienlagen zeigt deutlich, dass mit angepassten und individualisierten Ernährungs- und Bewegungskonzepten die Krankheit Diabetes rückgängig gemacht werden kann.

 

Wie funktioniert db.coach?

  1. Registration und Daten-Input: Patient trägt seine Persönlichkeits-Merkale und Zielsetzung ein
  2. Analyse & Planerstellung: Patient erhält – basierende auf seinen Eintragungen – seinen individualisierten Ernährungs- und Bewegungsplan, der jederzeit geändert werden kann und automatisch neu berechnet wird
  3. Daten-Tracking: Daten werden laufend gesammelt und übersichtlich dargestellt, damit der Patient  über seine Fortschritte laufend informiert wird
  4. Patient-Arzt Verbindung: Über die integrierte Experten-Support Applikation hat der behandelnde Arzt immer eine konsolidierte Übersicht über den Zustand des Patienten und kann so die Therapie optimieren

Was ist der Nutzen von db.coach?

db.coach hilft Diabetes rückgängig zu machen.

 

Wie unterscheiden wir uns von Mitbewerbern?

Die meisten Diabetes Apps sind reine Tracking Apps. Die db.coach App offeriert aber zwei entscheidende Zusatzleistungen:

  1. Erarbeitung von Diabetes-spezifischen, individualisierten Ernährungs-und Bewegungsprogramme, basierend auf dem aktuellsten Stand der  Sports- und Ernährungswissenschaft
  2. Integrierte Austausch- und Rückmeldung Applikation zwischen Patient und Arzt, über die der Patient seine Daten mit dem Arzt austauschen kann und dieser bei Bedarf intervenieren kann, um so die Therapiequalität zu optimieren

 

Wie sieht der Entwicklungsplan von db.coach aus?

  • 1 Monat um die Betaversion einer Mobile-freundlichen Web-Applikation zu lancieren
  • 2 Monate um die Vollversion mit integrierter Experten-Verbindung zu lancieren
  • Sollten wir 40’000 $ erreichen, werden wir zusätzlich noch eine Mobile App (iPhone, Android) entwickeln

 

Um dies zu erreichen, brauchen wir deine Unterstützung

Unsere Erfahrung, Passion und Überzeugung motivierten uns selber Geld in die Entwicklung eines Prototypen zu investieren. Für die finale Version und Vermarktung von db.coach brauchen wir aber zusätzliche finanzielle Unterstützung.

Mach unsere Mission zu deiner eigenen Mission und helfe Diabetes-Patienten ihre Krankheit erfolgreich zu bekämpfen.

Hilf uns die Idee zu verbreiten, werde selber Mitglied bei db.coach,  oder ermögliche die Mitgliedschaft jemandem, der Dir nahe steht. Auf der rechten Seite der Website findest du verschiedene Sponsor-Levels mit den entsprechenden Belohnungen (Leider nur in Englisch).

Helft mit Diabetes rückgängig zu machen.

Dein db.coach Team

Every 6 seconds somebody dies of diabetes
1 out of 11 adults have diabetes
Half of adults with diabetes are not aware of it (sleeping disease)
Those quite shocking facts motivated us to develop db.coach, to help people to change their lives, before Diabetes does it for them. What’s the problem?Diabetes gets treated as a progressive, chronic disease and unfortunately the today’s standard therapy is mostly based on:
A progressive consumption of medication lifelong
With devastating potential side effects
Not tackling root cause, but primarily treating symptoms

story:
OUR VISION:

EVERYBODY SHOULD HAVE THE OPPORTUITY TO HARVEST THEIR OWN VEGETABLES AND SALADS IN A NATURAL WAY!

+ even without having a garden of their own
+ even if there is not much space
+ even in a small apartment
+ even on a balcony or terrace
+ natural soil substrate without nutrient solutions and pumps

For three years, we have been working on an innovative, vertical and mobile garden system using soil substrate with minim space requirements, an automatic watering system and involving very little work.

 

Update 23.12.2016: We deliver in time .....

Die ersten 3 "i3-Benjamin" sind rechtzeitig für Weihnachten angekommen!

 

Wir meinen, dass jeder die Möglichkeit haben sollte, frisches Gemüse und Salate selbst zu ernten! 
Auch wenn man keine eigene Gartenfläche hat.
 

Wir sind ein Team aus Gartenfans, Idealisten, Visionären und Erfindern. Gemeinsam mit vielen  freiwilligen Helferinnen und Helfern, die mit Ideen und Ratschlägen bei der Entwicklung unseres vertikalen Gartensystems zur Seite standen, wurde an einem ganz neuen, innovativen Gartensystem gearbeitet, das für jede Wohnsituation und für jeden Haushalt adaptierbar ist. Jäten und gebücktes Arbeiten gehört der Vergangenheit an.

We believe that everybody should have the opportunity to harvest their own fresh vegetables and salads! 
Even if you don't have your own garden area.

We are a team of garden fans, idealists, visionaries and inventors. Together with numerous voluntary helpers supporting us with ideas and tips during the development our vertical garden, we have been working on an entirely new, innovative garden system, which can be adapted to every housing and household situation. Clearing weeds and having to bend over are things of the past.

Garten neu gedacht = i3-garden

Das erste funktionsfähige Modell haben wir im Rahmen des adventure x Gründerwettbewerb entwickelt.

Die Rückmeldungen der Jury und Tester waren äußerst positiv und vielversprechend.
Dieses geniale System haben wir zum Patent angemeldet.
 

Re-thinking the garden = i3-garden

We developed the first functional model as part of the adventure X start-up contest.
The feedback from the jury and testers was extremely positive and promising.
As a consequence, we filed a patent application for our ingenious system.
 

Ein ganzer Garten auf 0,25 m²

Mit unserem ersten Modell "i3-Benjamin" ist unsere Vision nun wahr geworden, getestet und voll funktionsfähig - ganz nach dem Motto: Es wächst alles! Und das können wir euch jetzt bereits als Dankeschön für eure Unterstützung anbieten.

Den i3-Benjamin bieten wir Euch dzt. in 2 Varianten als Perks an:
1. Starter-Kit: Das Starterkit ist geeignet zur Wandmontage (Montagematerial nicht inkludiert), zum Hinstellen auf einen Schrank, Sessel usw. Es besteht aus: 1x i3-Korpus, 1x i3-Deckel, 1x i3-Pflanzplatte, 6x i3-Docks, 6x i3-Deckel, 1x Flachgarten, 1x Leersack für das Erdsubstrat, 4x Montagestifte, 1x i3-Stickersatz.

Das Starter-Kit kann jederzeit über das Zubehörprogramm zum Pro-Kit nachgerüstet werden.
2. Pro-Kit: Alle Teile des Starter-Kits und zusätzlich 1x i3-Sockel mit 4x Kugelrollen, zusätzlich 6x i3-Docks und 6x i3-Deckel. Mit den 4 Rädern ist das Pro-Kit mobil (auf hartem Untergrund), die 10° Neigung nach hinten aus dem i-Sockel sorgt für eine optimierte Sonneneinstrahlung. 

Der i3-Benjamin  kann ohne Werkzeug in 20 Minuten aufgebaut werden.
Für all jene, die im Gießen keine Befriedigung finden bzw. auch mal spontan und unbeschwert in den Urlaub fahren wollen, bieten wir als Zubehör das integrierte automatische Bewässerungssystem (Tensionsprinzip) an.

Sämtliche verwendete System-Materialien verfügen über das Zertifikat „Lebensmittelecht" gemäß „EU-Richtlinie 1935/200 4/EC", sind auf nachhaltige Langlebigkeit ausgerichtet und halten allen Witterungen stand.

i3-garden - GEHT AUCH OHNE GRÜNEN DAUMEN / WORKS EVEN WITHOUT A GREEN THUMB
 

A whole garden on 0.25 m²

With our first model, the "i3-Benjamin", our vision has now come true. It has been tested and is fully functional – in line with our motto: Everything grows! And this is what we can already offer you as a thank you for your support.

Here, we offer you the i3-Benjamin  in two models as an incentive:
1) Starter Kit: The starter kit can be used for wall mounting (mounting material is not included) or for placing on cabinets, chairs, etc. It consists of: 1 body, 1 lid, 1 planting board, 6 i3-Docks, 6 i3-Lids, 1 Flachgarten / flat bed, 1 empty bag for the soil substrate, 4x assembly pins, 1x set of stickers.

At any time, the Starter Kit can be upgraded with our accessory programme and then becomes a Pro Kit.
2) Pro Kit: All elements of the Starter Kit plus 1 i3-Base with 4 ball rollers, additional 6 i3-Docks und 6 i3-Lids. With its 4 wheels, the Pro Kit is mobile (on hard surfaces); the 10° backward inclination relative to the i3-Base ensures optimum exposure to the sun. 

The i3 Benjamin  can be assembled without tools in 20 minutes.
For all those who don't enjoy watering their plants or spontaneously want to go on a holiday, we offer the integrated, automatic watering system (vapour pressure principle) as an accessory.

All system materials used are certified as "food-safe" according to "EU Regulation 1935/200 4/EC", have been chosen for their sustainable and long service life and are resistant to all weather conditions.

 

i3-garden - Das vertikale System

Wofür steht eigentlich i3?
i=intelligent, innovativ, zeigt nach oben
3= ist die logisch 3. Entwicklungsstufe im Gartenbau
-1=Flachbeet
-2=Hügelbeet/Hochbeet
-3=i3-vertikales Gartensystem
 

i3-Garden – the Vertical System

What does i3 stand for?
i=intelligent, innovative, pointing upwards
3= is logical – the 3rd development stage in gardening
-1=flat bed
-2=raised bed
-3=i3 vertical garden system

 

Aufbau  & Funktionsweise des i3-Benjamin / Structure  & function of the i3-Benjamin
    

verschiedene Bepflanzungsmöglichkeiten / Different planting possibilities

automatische Bewässerung / Automatic watering system

Materialtest  / Material test ​

Einblick in die i3-Dock Produktion / A look at the i3-dock production

 

i3-garden Weiterentwicklung,

dafür brauchen wir Eure Unterstützung!

Wir stehen erst am Anfang. i3-garden versteht sich als ein flexibles und modulares Gartensystem, das für jeden Haushalt und für jede Wohnsituation adaptierbar ist bzw. sein wird. Es wird in naher Zukunft weitere verschiedene Ausführungsmodelle geben -Benjamin möchte auch Geschwister!
Bei uns steht der Anwender/Kunde mit seinen Bedürfnissen im Fokus. So entwickeln wir gleichzeitig in mehrere Richtungen - für den Gartenprofi, der sich sein Erdsubstrat selber mischt und jede Pflanze einzeln gießt bis hin zum bequemen Laien, der  mit dem Plug&Play Prinzip einfach seine frischen Lebensmittel mit "sauberen Fingern" ernten möchte, ohne viel Zeit- und Arbeitsaufwand.
Wir wollen unserem Kunden nichts verkaufen bzw. aufzwingen, was er nicht braucht und will, so gestalten wir unsere Systeme von Grund auf modular, d.h. mit dem Zubehörprogramm ist alles den Bedürfnissen entsprechend jederzeit nachrüstbar (z.B. autom. Bewässerung, Kälteschutz, elektrischer Schneckenschutz usw.). Wir haben bereits für die nächsten 3 Jahre ausgearbeitete und getestete Konzepte, Ideen für mindestens weitere 5+ Jahre!

Derzeit arbeiten wir hart an der Weiterentwicklung:

  • Kälteschutz für die Übergangszeit
  • Pflanzen-Ranksystem
  • i3-Sockel für lndoor-Einsatz
  • Online Konfigurator =Erleichterung für "Neu-Gärtner"
  • i3-Erdsubstrat als Einsatz für den i3-Benjamin
  • elektrischer  Schneckenschutz
  • Optimierung der Produktion und Kostenreduzierung
  • Glashaus mit Beheizung für den Winterbetrieb
  • wir wollen in naher Zukunft auch Jungpflanzen bereits im i3-Dock anbieten- kein Umpflanzen mehr notwendig

 

i3-garden – further developments –

and this is why we need your support!

This is only the beginning. i3-garden is a flexible and modular garden system which (soon) can be adapted for each household and housing situation. In the future, there will be different design models - Benjamin wants brothers and sisters!
We focus on users/customers and their needs. Therefore, we have been developing the system in several directions – for gardening professionals who mix their own soil substrate and individually water every one of their plants to more laid-back amateurs who simply want to use the plug&play principle to harvest their own fresh produce while keeping their hands clean and minimising their time and work expenditure.
We don't want to sell our customers anything that they don't need and want. Therefore, we use a modular system design on all levels. In other words, our accessories programme ensures that all systems can always be upgraded depending on one's needs (e.g. automatic watering system, protection against the cold, electrical slug and snail protection, etc.). We already have worked out and tested concepts for the next three years and have collected ideas to last an additional 5+ years!

Currently, we are working hard on the following developments:

  • temperature-protection during spring / autumn
  • climbing system for plants
  • ​i3-Base for indoor use
  • online configurator = the easy way for newcomers to gardening
  • i3-Soil substrate to be used with the i3-Benjamin
  • electrical slug and snail protection
  • optimising production and reducing costs
  • heated greenhouse for winter gardening
  • In the near future, we also want to offer young plants already in the i3-Dock, thus eliminating the need for re-planting


Willkommen in der i3-Community

"Die Summe des geteilten Wissens ist immer höher als das Wissen eines einzelnen Genies!

Wir nehmen euch und eure Ideen ernst! 
All unsere Konzepte und Ideen sind nichts wert, wenn diese dem Anwender/Kunden keinen Nutzen bringen - hier benötigen wir EUCH, die Community, die uns mit konstruktiver Kritik, Ratschlägen, Erfahrungen, Tipps bei der Weiterentwicklung unterstützen!
Als Dankeschön für unsere Unterstützerinnen und Unterstützer wollen wir Euch hier interessante und attraktive Perks anbieten.
 

Welcome to the i3-Community

"The sum of all knowledge shared is always more than the entire knowledge of an individual genius!

We take you and your ideas seriously! 
All of our concepts and ideas are worth nothing, unless they create benefits for users/customers – and this is where we need YOU, the community supporting our development with constructive criticism, tips and experiences!
To thank you, our supporters, we would like to offer interesting and attractive incentives here.

 

  Worüber wir nachdenken  

"Wir wollen verantwortungsvoll mit Ressourcen und Energie umgehen"  - deshalb legen wir bei der Konstruktion und Materialauswahl größten Wert auf "lebensmittelecht", lange Haltbarkeit und Einfachheit. Dabei sind alle Materialien zu 100% recyclebar. 

"Upcycling" - Wir wollen hier keine Dinge produzieren und teuer verkaufen, die jeder selbst mit einfachen Mitteln herstellen kann! Wir geben gerne Anleitungen und bieten entsprechende Kleinteile an, um aus "Abfall-Produkten" neue Verwendungsmöglichkeiten zu schaffen. So kann man sich ganz einfach aus Flaschen, Einmal-Gebinden oder Kanister einen "Hochtank" für das Bewässerungssystem bauen. So spart ihr Geld und schont die Umwelt!

"Wo wir verkaufen wollen, müssen wir auch etwas zurückgeben" - der i3-Benjamin wird mit größter Sorgfalt zu 100% in der EU erzeugt.

 

           What we are thinking about

"We want to use material and energy resources responsibly". Therefore, in our construction and material selection we strongly focus on food-save materials, a long service life and simplicity. All materials can be recycled to 100%. 

"Upcycling" – We don't want to produce and sell things that all people can produce themselves with simple means! We are happy to offer instruction and small components that will allow you to put waste products to new use. For example, one can simply use disposable bottles or containers to build a "high-level tank" for the watering system. This way, you can save money and help the environment!

"We want to give something back to the region where we sell our products" - the i3-Benjamin  is produced with the greatest care to 100% in the EU.

 

Andere Wege, wie du helfen kannst

Auch wenn du keine unserer Perks kaufen kannst, so kannst du uns ganz stark unterstützen, indem du unsere Kampagne teilst, darüber postest - einfach bekannt machst.

 

Another Ways to help

If you can not support us directly with a donation, you are welcome to recommend us to Facebook, email, Twitter, or through word-of-mouth propaganda and other social networks.

Thank you so much for your time!

 

Danke an alle Unterstützer / thanks to all supporters
das i3-garden Team

Die Rückmeldungen der Jury und Tester waren äußerst positiv und vielversprechend.Dieses geniale System haben wir zum Patent angemeldet. 
Re-thinking the garden = i3-garden
We developed the first functional model as part of the adventure X start-up contest.The feedback from the jury and testers was extremely positive and promising.As a consequence, we filed a patent application for our ingenious system. 
Ein ganzer Garten auf 0,25 m²
Mit unserem ersten Modell "i3-Benjamin" ist unsere Vision nun wahr geworden, getestet und voll funktionsfähig - ganz nach dem Motto: Es wächst alles! Und das können wir euch jetzt bereits als Dankeschön für eure Unterstützung anbieten.Den i3-Benjamin bieten wir Euch dzt. in 2 Varianten als Perks an:1. Starter-Kit: Das Starterkit ist geeignet zur Wandmontage (Montagematerial nicht inkludiert), zum Hinstellen auf einen Schrank, Sessel usw. Es besteht aus: 1x i3-Korpus, 1x i3-Deckel, 1x i3-Pflanzplatte, 6x i3-Docks, 6x i3-Deckel, 1x Flachgarten, 1x Leersack für das Erdsubstrat, 4x Montagestifte, 1x i3-Stickersatz.
Das Starter-Kit kann jederzeit über das Zubehörprogramm zum Pro-Kit nachgerüstet werden.2. Pro-Kit: Alle Teile des Starter-Kits und zusätzlich 1x i3-Sockel mit 4x Kugelrollen, zusätzlich 6x i3-Docks und 6x i3-Deckel. Mit den 4 Rädern ist das Pro-Kit mobil (auf hartem Untergrund), die 10° Neigung nach hinten aus dem i-Sockel sorgt für eine optimierte Sonneneinstrahlung. 
Der i3-Benjamin  kann ohne Werkzeug in 20 Minuten aufgebaut werden.Für all jene, die im Gießen keine Befriedigung finden bzw. auch mal spontan und unbeschwert in den Urlaub fahren wollen, bieten wir als Zubehör das integrierte automatische Bewässerungssystem (Tensionsprinzip) an.
Sämtliche verwendete System-Materialien verfügen über das Zertifikat „Lebensmittelecht" gemäß „EU-Richtlinie 1935/200 4/EC", sind auf nachhaltige Langlebigkeit ausgerichtet und halten allen Witterungen stand.

i3-garden - GEHT AUCH OHNE GRÜNEN DAUMEN / WORKS EVEN WITHOUT A GREEN THUMB 
A whole garden on 0.25 m²With our first model, the "i3-Benjamin", our vision has now come true. It has been tested and is fully functional – in line with our motto: Everything grows! And this is what we can already offer you as a thank you for your support.Here, we offer you the i3-Benjamin  in two models as an incentive:1) Starter Kit: The starter kit can be used for wall mounting (mounting material is not included) or for placing on cabinets, chairs, etc. It consists of: 1 body, 1 lid, 1 planting board, 6 i3-Docks, 6 i3-Lids, 1 Flachgarten / flat bed, 1 empty bag for the soil substrate, 4x assembly pins, 1x set of stickers.At any time, the Starter Kit can be upgraded with our accessory programme and then becomes a Pro Kit.2) Pro Kit: All elements of the Starter Kit plus 1 i3-Base with 4 ball rollers, additional 6 i3-Docks und 6 i3-Lids. With its 4 wheels, the Pro Kit is mobile (on hard surfaces); the 10° backward inclination relative to the i3-Base ensures optimum exposure to the sun. The i3 Benjamin  can be assembled without tools in 20 minutes.For all those who don't enjoy watering their plants or spontaneously want to go on a holiday, we offer the integrated, automatic watering system (vapour pressure principle) as an accessory.All system materials used are certified as "food-safe" according to "EU Regulation 1935/200 4/EC", have been chosen for their sustainable and long service life and are resistant to all weather conditions. i3-garden - Das vertikale SystemWofür steht eigentlich i3?i=intelligent, innovativ, zeigt nach oben3= ist die logisch 3. Entwicklungsstufe im Gartenbau-1=Flachbeet-2=Hügelbeet/Hochbeet-3=i3-vertikales Gartensystem i3-Garden – the Vertical SystemWhat does i3 stand for?i=intelligent, innovative, pointing upwards3= is logical – the 3rd development stage in gardening-1=flat bed-2=raised bed-3=i3 vertical garden system 
Aufbau  & Funktionsweise des i3-Benjamin / Structure  & function of the i3-Benjamin    
verschiedene Bepflanzungsmöglichkeiten / Different planting possibilities
automatische Bewässerung / Automatic watering system
Materialtest  / Material test ​

Einblick in die i3-Dock Produktion / A look at the i3-dock production
 

i3-garden Weiterentwicklung,
dafür brauchen wir Eure Unterstützung!
Wir stehen erst am Anfang. i3-garden versteht sich als ein flexibles und modulares Gartensystem, das für jeden Haushalt und für jede Wohnsituation adaptierbar ist bzw. sein wird. Es wird in naher Zukunft weitere verschiedene Ausführungsmodelle geben -Benjamin möchte auch Geschwister!Bei uns steht der Anwender/Kunde mit seinen Bedürfnissen im Fokus. So entwickeln wir gleichzeitig in mehrere Richtungen - für den Gartenprofi, der sich sein Erdsubstrat selber mischt und jede Pflanze einzeln gießt bis hin zum bequemen Laien, der  mit dem Plug&Play Prinzip einfach seine frischen Lebensmittel mit "sauberen Fingern" ernten möchte, ohne viel Zeit- und Arbeitsaufwand.Wir wollen unserem Kunden nichts verkaufen bzw. aufzwingen, was er nicht braucht und will, so gestalten wir unsere Systeme von Grund auf modular, d.h. mit dem Zubehörprogramm ist alles den Bedürfnissen entsprechend jederzeit nachrüstbar (z.B. autom. Bewässerung, Kälteschutz, elektrischer Schneckenschutz usw.). Wir haben bereits für die nächsten 3 Jahre ausgearbeitete und getestete Konzepte, Ideen für mindestens weitere 5+ Jahre!
Derzeit arbeiten wir hart an der Weiterentwicklung:

Kälteschutz für die Übergangszeit
Pflanzen-Ranksystem
i3-Sockel für lndoor-Einsatz
Online Konfigurator =Erleichterung für "Neu-Gärtner"
i3-Erdsubstrat als Einsatz für den i3-Benjamin

elektrischer  Schneckenschutz
Optimierung der Produktion und Kostenreduzierung
Glashaus mit Beheizung für den Winterbetrieb
wir wollen in naher Zukunft auch Jungpflanzen bereits im i3-Dock anbieten- kein Umpflanzen mehr notwendig

 
i3-garden – further developments –
and this is why we need your support!
This is only the beginning. i3-garden is a flexible and modular garden system which (soon) can be adapted for each household and housing situation. In the future, there will be different design models - Benjamin wants brothers and sisters!We focus on users/customers and their needs. Therefore, we have been developing the system in several directions – for gardening professionals who mix their own soil substrate and individually water every one of their plants to more laid-back amateurs who simply want to use the plug&play principle to harvest their own fresh produce while keeping their hands clean and minimising their time and work expenditure.We don't want to sell our customers anything that they don't need and want. Therefore, we use a modular system design on all levels. In other words, our accessories programme ensures that all systems can always be upgraded depending on one's needs (e.g. automatic watering system, protection against the cold, electrical slug and snail protection, etc.). We already have worked out and tested concepts for the next three years and have collected ideas to last an additional 5+ years!
Currently, we are working hard on the following developments:

temperature-protection during spring / autumn
climbing system for plants
​i3-Base for indoor use
online configurator = the easy way for newcomers to gardening
i3-Soil substrate to be used with the i3-Benjamin

electrical slug and snail protection
optimising production and reducing costs
heated greenhouse for winter gardening
In the near future, we also want to offer young plants already in the i3-Dock, thus eliminating the need for re-planting


Willkommen in der i3-Community


"Die Summe des geteilten Wissens ist immer höher als das Wissen eines einzelnen Genies! 
Wir nehmen euch und eure Ideen ernst! All unsere Konzepte und Ideen sind nichts wert, wenn diese dem Anwender/Kunden keinen Nutzen bringen - hier benötigen wir EUCH, die Community, die uns mit konstruktiver Kritik, Ratschlägen, Erfahrungen, Tipps bei der Weiterentwicklung unterstützen!Als Dankeschön für unsere Unterstützerinnen und Unterstützer wollen wir Euch hier interessante und attraktive Perks anbieten. 
Welcome to the i3-Community
"The sum of all knowledge shared is always more than the entire knowledge of an individual genius!
We take you and your ideas seriously! All of our concepts and ideas are worth nothing, unless they create benefits for users/customers – and this is where we need YOU, the community supporting our development with constructive criticism, tips and experiences!To thank you, our supporters, we would like to offer interesting and attractive incentives here.
 
  Worüber wir nachdenken  

"Wir wollen verantwortungsvoll mit Ressourcen und Energie umgehen"  - deshalb legen wir bei der Konstruktion und Materialauswahl größten Wert auf "lebensmittelecht", lange Haltbarkeit und Einfachheit. Dabei sind alle Materialien zu 100% recyclebar. 
"Upcycling" - Wir wollen hier keine Dinge produzieren und teuer verkaufen, die jeder selbst mit einfachen Mitteln herstellen kann! Wir geben gerne Anleitungen und bieten entsprechende Kleinteile an, um aus "Abfall-Produkten" neue Verwendungsmöglichkeiten zu schaffen. So kann man sich ganz einfach aus Flaschen, Einmal-Gebinden oder Kanister einen "Hochtank" für das Bewässerungssystem bauen. So spart ihr Geld und schont die Umwelt!
"Wo wir verkaufen wollen, müssen wir auch etwas zurückgeben" - der i3-Benjamin wird mit größter Sorgfalt zu 100% in der EU erzeugt.
 
           What we are thinking about
"We want to use material and energy resources responsibly". Therefore, in our construction and material selection we strongly focus on food-save materials, a long service life and simplicity. All materials can be recycled to 100%. 
"Upcycling" – We don't want to produce and sell things that all people can produce themselves with simple means! We are happy to offer instruction and small components that will allow you to put waste products to new use. For example, one can simply use disposable bottles or containers to build a "high-level tank" for the watering system. This way, you can save money and help the environment!
"We want to give something back to the region where we sell our products" - the i3-Benjamin  is produced with the greatest care to 100% in the EU.
 
Andere Wege, wie du helfen kannst
Auch wenn du keine unserer Perks kaufen kannst, so kannst du uns ganz stark unterstützen, indem du unsere Kampagne teilst, darüber postest - einfach bekannt machst.
 
Another Ways to help
If you can not support us directly with a donation, you are welcome to recommend us to Facebook, email, Twitter, or through word-of-mouth propaganda and other social networks.
Thank you so much for your time!
 
Danke an alle Unterstützer / thanks to all supportersdas i3-garden Team

story:
Help those you care about survive their Cancer Journey

My name is Peter Green, Founder of Workout Through Cancer (WOTC). 

13 years ago, when I heard the words "We found something", my world imploded. I was told I had brain cancer. 

After my diagnosis, I went through a clinical trial that required 6 months of chemotherapy and 25 days of full brain radiation. I was a single Dad with a 10-year-old son. In addition to the great care I received from my doctors, I attribute my ability to survive my treatment - now 13 years in remission - to the adaptive exercise program I developed.

I launched my company Workout Through Cancer in 2017. Our mission is to provide hope, inspiration, guidance and tools specifically designed for those going through, and coming out of, cancer treatment. In the U.S. that's over 3 million people every year. 

As a survivor, I know the fear and challenges that each of these 3 million people going into, and coming out of treatment, feel. And the questions: "What comes next for me?"  "What comes next for my family?" Cancer is a brutal disease. It rips apart the fabric of peoples lives. It doesn't care about your life before cancer. When you're diagnosed, you still have responsibilities, a family, a career, friends. I know because I've been there and I am committed -  compelled - to help those going through cancer treatment to win their cancer battle. 

What We Need & What You Get

The funding from this $75,000 campaign will allow all of us at Workout Through Cancer to continue to build our cancer community and to provide our Fitness Packs to cancer patients in need. Using our Fitness Pack and adaptive Oncologist approved exercise program is a step that helps those that have been touched by cancer - you, a family member or a friend - to take action and begin to fight!

Your investment helps those going through cancer treatment in a number of ways, from hands-on services that include direct coaching for individuals and cancer support groups to items that help patients feel more comfortable as they go through treatment.  

The Medical Community recognizes the benefits of what we're doing.

Dr. Neal Fischbach (Dr. of Oncology, Smilow Cancer Hospital, Yale Medical)

 

The Workout Through Cancer program is the only exercise program specifically designed for cancer patients. Today the medical community - some 13 years after I was first diagnosed - is now embracing exercise while in treatment because of all the benefits exercise provides.

If you're the one going through treatment, or coming out of treatment, the benefits of exercise can make a huge difference. Exercise helps:

 - Raise your level of cancer-fighting antioxidants

 - Improve the body's ability to fight inflammation

 - Stimulate healthy cell metabolism

- Reduce anxiety and depression 

 - Aid recovery from the fatigue that is associated with chemotherapy and radiation treatment

WOTC's exercise program - integrating exercise with meditative breathing - is adapted to the specific needs of patients who are going through cancer treatment because during treatment, nothing is the same as before. Metabolism rates change, energy levels change, the immune system is challenged. Patients can get the benefits of our exercise program whether they're standing up, lying down or sitting in a chair. Importantly, our exercise program is designed to be done at home which is really important because many cancer patients' immune systems are compromised and they can't expose themselves to a lot of people. 

The WOTC exercise program and the Fitness Pack

The adaptive exercises using the WOTC Fitness Pack gives patients the tools to fight.  At the core of Workout Through Cancer is our Fitness Pack and our guided exercise program.  If you're going through treatment, our 14 core movements can be done in the comfort and safety of your home and at your own pace. Our guided program is available on the DVD/USB drive in every Fitness Pack and through the Workout Through Cancer site www.workoutthroughcancer.com  

WOTC's exercise program is Oncologist approved and is built around the unique requirements of cancer patients. It is specifically designed to help those going through, and coming out of, cancer treatment to stay strong both physically and mentally and to help sustain them for the years living beyond cancer.

 

The Impact

The $75,000 that we're seeking to raise can serve those going through cancer treatment in  multiple ways:

1. Provide you, a loved one, a friend or a colleague with the exercise program and apparel needed by anyone going through chemotherapy, radiation and surgery. You choose where you want our Fitness Packs and curated apparel to go.

2. Make available coaching and training sessions directly with Peter. Cancer patients want to talk with others who are living with, and beyond, cancer treatment. Peter is an active "cancer coach" and a number of our Perks enable individuals and Support groups to work directly with him. 

3.  Help us build our on-line cancer support community. All the content on the WOTC web site is free and we're adding to it constantly. Our content is focused on one thing: bringing guidance, support, inspiration and the tools to fight for anyone who is going through their cancer journey.  

Most people, when they hear that someone close to them has been diagnosed, ask "How can I help?" Many send flowers, fruit baskets, candy or offer to make meals. This is all really kind as I know people want to help. However, the reality is that when someone is going through cancer treatment, even many of the foods and beverages we were able to enjoy pre-treatment s might be more harmful than helpful.

Many of our Perks are designed to directly help individuals and groups by making Fitness Packs available. All of our Perks support the development of the WOTC community we are building. A community where cancer patients and their families can share their stories and connect with others who are also going through, or have gone through, this life-changing moment.

FAQ

Why is Workout Through Cancer both a for-profit and nonprofit business?

WOTC believes a company can do well by doing good. We also believe that a for-profit business can, in some cases, be more agile and move more quickly than a nonprofit business when the need arises. That being said, we also appreciate the unique strengths a nonprofit organization can bring to our mission. WOTC will have both a for-profit and a nonprofit arm: the WOTC Foundation.  10% of WOTC's for-profit net income will go into the WOTC Foundation. Our Foundation will provide Fitness Packs to those that can't afford them and also support other organizations focused on helping cancer patients - both survivors and co survivors - learn to navigate life with cancer.

If I am a patient, a cancer survivor or a cancer co-survivor, why should I sign up to become part of the WOTC community?  

The one thing I am positive about! People going through cancer feel most comfortable with others going through the same experience. By becoming part of the WOTC community just your presence - whether you are actively participating or just taking in all the content provided - will be invaluable. My hope is that a large percentage of our content will be created  by those sharing their current, or past, experience. The site has been designed just for that purpose. It provides easy-to-use applications for sharing stories, insights or messages of support. By joining the WOTC community you become part of a very special group of people that can make a difference for so many in need.

Risks & Challenges

If anyone says there are no risk in starting a business there would be tens of million entrepreneurs. The word entrepreneur in itself represents risk, but it also represents passion. Workout Through Cancer is my passion. This passion doesn't blind me - or the rest of the WOTC team - to the challenges faced by all young ventures. But as we launch our Indiegogo campaign, we've already laid a solid foundation for the journey ahead of us and have already generated exciting momentum and awareness of our mission and of WOTC.  

Press & Media 

 

Medical Advisory Team

 

 

Dr. Neal Fischbach

Dr. of Oncology, Smilow Cancer Hospital, Yale Medical. He attended the University of Pennsylvania and Harvard University Medical School.

 

 

 

Dr. Marni Amsellem

Clinical Psychologist, Consultant, and Writer. Leads cancer support groups at Yale Medical.

 

 

 

 

 

Dr. Josh Lander

Chiropractic, Board Certified Physiotherapy Neurology Board Master of Exercise Science & Nutrition.

 

 

 

 

 

Vicki Kobliner

15 year private practitioner  - MS Registered Dietician and Nutritionist. - Academy of Nutrition

story:
As a rapid developing country, the food awareness and habits are unfortunately going the wrong direction in Laos, Texas grill chickens are spreading like a wild fire, Pizza companies, Coca cola, chips and more processed foods than ever, are what local people turn too, coming from  an amazing rich food culture.
 

More overweight kids
I have been a therapist in Laos 4 years. Today I see approximately 40%  more overweight people coming to me for help, than when I arrived. Also their kids who are now often on some prescribed medicine, are tending to over weight. Diet had been exchanged to fast food, but still, Laotians eat meals 6 times daily as a standard.


High cost for Organic farmers

The sad trend also comes with a high cost for Organic farming and the farmers,  which is declining with a lack of support from the local stakeholder.  These people are the decade of 40+ and they have no option of career change. they are often pressured to use fertilizer and pesticide to meet the artificial super market standards, and last years there have been cases of infertility directly linked to unsafe working environments with both. I guess you all can see the picture of what is  going on!

Plant Based Organic café

The Plant based organic café will offer food programs to our therapy clients, an of-course
serve inspiring foods by our nutritionist chef in a beautiful cool setting, but also school workshops and school nutrition plans, as well as supporting 2 local organic farmers amd their families.

We will work directly with 2 selected organic farmers near Vientiane, to provide us the daily greens and fruits, and furthermore provide them support to run a balanced business with demand shifts and crops planning.

The funds will be used for:
the café installment   basic equipment
1 local employees training and salary
workshops and info videos
marketing campaigns
Quarterly crops planning as well as transports for the farmers.

The funds will be enough to support 6 months startup period. The project is further to this funded by the sister company Nomad Yoga.

High cost for Organic farmers
The sad trend also comes with a high cost for Organic farming and the farmers,  which is declining with a lack of support from the local stakeholder.  These people are the decade of 40+ and they have no option of career change. they are often pressured to use fertilizer and pesticide to meet the artificial super market standards, and last years there have been cases of infertility directly linked to unsafe working environments with both. I guess you all can see the picture of what is  going on!Plant Based Organic café
The Plant based organic café will offer food programs to our therapy clients, an of-courseserve inspiring foods by our nutritionist chef in a beautiful cool setting, but also school workshops and school nutrition plans, as well as supporting 2 local organic farmers amd their families.We will work directly with 2 selected organic farmers near Vientiane, to provide us the daily greens and fruits, and furthermore provide them support to run a balanced business with demand shifts and crops planning.The funds will be used for:the café installment   basic equipment1 local employees training and salaryworkshops and info videosmarketing campaignsQuarterly crops planning as well as transports for the farmers. 
The funds will be enough to support 6 months startup period. The project is further to this funded by the sister company Nomad Yoga.

story:
Freya supports healthy follicles and optimal ovulation to protect fertility and make it easier to get pregnant when the time is right. Freya also helps those who have difficult menstruation, it eases PMS and make cycles more regular and predictable.  

Ancient Medicine for the Modern Woman

Co-founder Marco Lam (director of one of the largest Chinese Medicine clinics in Boulder, CO), has helped hundreds of woman recover from stressful burnout, reduce painful menstrual cycles, and improve their fertility. He has been using these herbs for over a decade to help with with challenging cycles and to enhance their fertility when the timing was right.  Freya was created to bring the very best of powerful, adaptogenic herbal teas into a more convenient daily formula for easier prevention against those issues he saw occurring time and again.

Freya makes cycles smoother, decreases PMS symptoms, and aids in creating and maintaining a healthy reproductive system.

3 Unique Formulas to Support You Throughout Your Cycle

Each box of Freya contains 3 unique formulas, each designed to support a different phase of a woman’s menstrual cycle.

Freya Menstrual Formula gently invigorates blood and helps alleviate pain. It relaxes uterine muscle tension and benefits healthy menstruation. This formula can be especially supportive if your cycles have become absent or irregular due to intense stress, high level physical training, IUDs, or hormonal birth control. It supports your uterus in letting go of the old layers built up and lays the foundation for a healthy uterus to begin your next cycle.

Freya Daily Formula (Strengthen and Nourish) is designed to support the development of healthy follicles and to regulate optimal ovulation, and help delay the onset of perimenopause and menopause. This formula nourishes the blood and the kidney. Often the kidney can become depleted through over work and excessive stress in our fast paced culture. If you feel like you have overdone it or are fatigued after your cycle, this formula can be a a game changer!

Freya Luteal Formula is designed to be taken the week before your menstrual cycle. You may be happily surprised with a much smoother week before your cycle comes and a gradual diminishing of menstrual cramps. This formula has been a godsend for many women and this basic formula has been used for thousands of years to regulate the hormones in menstruating women and to support reproductive health. The Luteal Blend eases tension and has deeply relaxing effect on the mind, body and spirit, and invigorates and nourishes the blood to have a smoother and less painful menstrual cycle.

Co-founder Violet Lange shares:

“From my work with women on love and relationships, I know how many women delay having children so they can pursue their dreams. But it comes at a cost, especially if you’re been on birth control a long time. Freya is like an insurance policy for getting pregnant. Not only that, but it decreased my moodiness and cramps and made my cycle smooth.”

Praise from Beta Testers

87% of beta testers rated Freya as good or very good in terms of convenience.

82% of beta testers rated Freya as good or very good in terms of taste.

"Freya is comforting and easy to drink. It suits my taste just right!!!"

"I’m finding it easier to eat healthier and I’m feeling less bloated."

"My energy levels seem to be improving."

"Didn't notice any symptoms today, felt good in relation to my cycle even during a really big day. Very light flow."

"I’m not noticing any PMS symptoms!"

"My period is over, it was pleasant. My energy level is starting to come back."

"I'm getting my energy back and have less back pain...my body doesn't feel as heavy."

"My period was shorter than usual."

As Seen On

Freya is Community & Ritual

Freya is more than just a personal supplement for your fertility and health. Freya is about connecting women around the world to tell a new story in female wellness. Our vision is to have a daily ritual for Freya -- where each Freya Woman can connect to her body, her heart, and her tribe. These daily rituals will follow the cycles of the moon and the wisdom of the seasons and will include short meditations, mantras, yoga postures or questions for reflection. Freya Women post about their daily ritual in our Facebook group and get support from their sisters.

Who We Are

Freya is a collaborative creation of Marco Lam & Violet Lange.

Marco Chung-Shu Lam has practiced Chinese Medicine and Acupuncture for over twenty years and is lauded to have a unique style of practice combining a deeply compassionate presence with a natural gift with plant medicines. He is well known in the Boulder community for his expertise in treating infertility and helping women regulate their menstrual cycles. 

 Marco earned his B.A. in Interdisciplinary Studies at the University of California, Santa Barbara with a thesis on the holistic treatment of immune disorders. His education includes graduate work in both Taoist and Buddhist Studies and time spent practicing Qigong and Chinese Medicine in a Taoist Monastery. Marco was an instructor at the Connecting Point Massage School in Telluride, Colorado where he taught the famed Shiatsu and whole food nutrition program in the early 90s. He studied Chinese Medicine at both the Tai Hsuan Monastery and at the Hawaii College of Traditional Oriental Medicine. He received his Master of Science in Oriental Medicine from the Southwest Acupuncture College, a nationally accredited school in 2001. Marco is committed to constantly improving the craft and art of Chinese Medicine. He finished a two-year course of study with Lonny Jarrett, author of Nourishing Destiny: The Inner Tradition of Chinese Medicine, and an authority on integrating Traditional Chinese Medicine and Five Element Acupuncture into a cohesive practice style. He is committed to an integral medicine that incorporates traditional wisdom with the best of the evolving perspectives of our present time. 

Marco draws from his Chinese heritage an affinity for both traditional Chinese medicine and the Taoist world view. The ancient sages believed that health and peace came from being in harmony with the deeper currents of nature. He practices a living system of herbalism and integrates the traditional Chinese herbology with the use of many local medicinal herbs that he harvests himself. He invites you to the path of Chinese Medicine and to the fullness of health that you can experience.

Violet Lange is the Founder of The Pleasure Path, and is an expert on love, dating, and relationships. She helps women reclaim their feminine essence, feel amazing in their bodies, and become empowered in love to get everything they want.  She teaches women how to attract and keep an incredible partner through my signature program Queens of Pleasure, which gives women everything they need to win in love and to create a fulfilling relationship.

Violet has an MBA from Harvard, is a 500-hour registered yoga teacher, and has been coaching women for the last 7 years. 

Where Your Support Will Go

All three formulations of Freya have been developed, beta tested, and are ready to go.  Our crowdfunding campaign will allow us to source our ingredients at the lowest possible cost so we can get Freya out to as many women as possible.  Achieving our campaign goal will let us immediately move to manufacturing to get Freya into your hands as fast as possible. 

Risks and challenges

Freya's three unique formulations are ready to manufacture and have already been beta tested by a number of women that are finding great results.

Sourcing quality herbs can be very expensive in small quantities, launching Freya at a large enough scale to reach as many women as possible is a priority for us.

Big budget pharmaceutical companies often try to overshadow the more time tested and natural herbs used by traditional Chinese medicine and work hard to cast skepticism on more organic and natural approaches.

story:
WHAT IS A MENSTRUAL CUP?

A menstrual cup a feminine hygiene product. It is worn inside during menstruation to catch not absorb menstrual blood. They are ideal for physically active women.

We are excited to spread awareness and introduce the WonderCup to women worldwide. The WonderCup offers the perfect solution for women wishing to save money, be healthier, reduce her carbon footprint or be free from the hassles of pads and tampons. We know this product has the potential to change hundreds of millions of women’s lives for the better. The time has come to break the stigma and taboos surrounding menstruation and we are on the frontlines. For every WonderCup or Miracle Cup we sell online we will donate ten to one of our partner organizations in developing nations.

-Volker Bassen, CEO WonderCup

 

 

 

CHANGING LIVES 

If you have heard your friends on social media raving about the menstrual cup revolution well here is your chance to try it out and give back at the same time.For each 1 you buy we give 10 to one of our partner organizations in Kenya, Colombia, and Ghana.

The World Bank estimates 20% the education of a girl living in the developing world is missed because of their periods. In Kenya alone, annually about 100 million working days are lost due to women staying at home during their period.

In many of the communities in which partners operate families are living on US$1-2 per day, yet each month girls and women need to find a solution. While conducting pilot workshops we’ve been confronted with cringe worthy accounts of what they resorted to during their periods.

  • Girls would stay home from school to sit in a corner and bleed
  • Teenagers often engaged in transactional sex with older men to get the money they needed to purchase pads
  • Grown women would skip work for fear of an accident
  • Others would find use whatever they could find, mattress filling, leaves, tissue, old cloth, pretty much anything that could absorb the flow

Our goal is not only to provide each country with at least 4,000 donated WonderCups but also to create a WonderCup salesforce of women who will sell the cups at a fair market rate ~$4.00 and earn a commission for their efforts. With your support we can scale the pilot programs, work with additional organizations and reach more women. Moreover, in each country we are supporting women’s entrepreneurship locally packaging and manufacturing the reusable bags.

Please visit our site for more information about WonderCup

 

BREAKING THE MOLD

We've already changed the normal donation model, but giving away WonderCups is not a solution in itself. There is a lack of reproductive health education in the communities in which we are working. We help our partners conduct workshops with school girls and women's groups (both formal and informal). During these session our expert trainers explain how the female reproductive system works, what it means to be a virgin, how STIs are transmitted, and of course how to properly use, store, sterilize a WonderCup cup.

By March of 2017 we will begin selling our cups in select North American, European, Australian, and South American markets with the same Buy 1 Donate 10 model.

 

PILOT PROGAMS

While the company is based in Kenya, we partnered with organizations in Ghana and Colombia focused on female justice issues. With their support we launch this fundraising campaign to bring WonderCups to as many girls and women as possible.

We know WonderCups can't change every girl's life but we want to reach as many as possible with this affordable healthy technology.

In Ghana we work with The Sangy Foundation- Guided by purpose and passion to help young people live healthier lives, The Sangy Foundation seeks to provide quality health prevention information and education of the youth that will lead to better health outcomes and healthier young people. The Foundation was registered in Ghana in 2014. They are conducting workshops in schools about reproductive health and the benefits of the WonderCup.

In Kenya we are working with The Cup and Maasai women's groups. They believe Investing in girls can unleash their potential and make an impact on the whole society. Many girls in poverty are being left behind, simply because they don’t have the resources or information to handle their periods. Our project in Kenya fights taboos associated with menstruation and raises awareness about the benefits of using a menstrual cup. They conduct workshops with doctors, rural health organizations and in the largest slum in East Africa.

In Colombia we are working with FICA Mujeres, who started an independent self-funded program to spread their belief in menstrual cups to women in low income areas and Mini Ku Suto. Working  in at risk communities across the country, they  conduct intimate workshops where women can safely discuss reproductive health issues.

 

ECO-FRIENDLY

Now you understand the social impact, think of the environmental impact. Every year, approximately 20 billion pads, tampons, and applicators find their way into North American landfills. To put it another way, the average woman bleeds for a total of 6 years over the course of her life. Do you know how many disposable products it takes to absorb that much blood? It’s about half a truck’s worth and not a pick-up truck we're talking a long haul rig. So even if the plight of young women in the developing world doesn’t urge you to click the contribute button think about the carbon emissions and the refuse that lands in the ocean.

OUR PRODUCTS

WonderCup is an environmentally friendly affordable alternative to tampons and pads. The menstrual cup is made of soft 100% medical grade silicone. Unlike tampons, the WonderCup is inserted into the body to collect menstrual blood not absorb it, so it may be worn for extended periods of time. Between uses keep it in the reusable sack in a dry place. WonderCup is easily cleaned with soapy water and before each use your WonderCup should be sterilized by placing it in boiling water for 5 minutes. Your WonderCup can last for up to ten years.

The MiracleCup is called so because like the WonderCup it is reusable, and made of 100% medical grade silicone but it has an extra feature. An innovative valve at the bottom which allows the wearer to keep the MiracleCup in throughout her period. She can drain the build through the valve as often as she likes.

We created four sizes to suit the different sizes of women's bodies. The largest WonderCup holds three times as much fluid as a super-max tampon. Depending on your flow, you may only need to change it two times a day, and because menstrual blood only smells when in comes into contact with air, i.e. the smell associated with pads, you don’t have to worry about any odor since the WonderCup sits inside your body.

 

SIZE 1

Recommend for young girls & virgins; small/light tampon users; women with a light flow; women who have not given vaginal birth to children; and women who have given birth but use small/light tampons.

WonderCups Size 1 are not recommended for women: with fibroids; who can't use small/light tampons; who are age 40+ with several vaginal births; and who have a cervical spine injury.

SIZE 2

Recommend for: women of all ages; regular tampon users; women with a light-medium flow; women who have not given vaginal birth; and women who don't use large tampons.

WonderCups Size 2 are not recommended for women: with fibroids; who only use large tampons; and who have a cervical spine injury.

SIZE 3

Recommend for: women age 30+; super tampon users; women with a medium-heavy flow; women who have given vaginal birth; women who frequently need to be change super tampons; women with weak pelvic floor muscles.

WonderCups Size 3 are not recommended for women: who are virgins; with fibroids; with a low cervix during her cycle; who only use small/light tampons; and who have a cervical spine injury.

SIZE 4

Recommend for: women age 30+; super plus tampon users; women with a extra heavy flow; women who have given vaginal birth; women who frequently need to be change super plus tampons; women who wear both pads and tampons to sleep; and women with weak pelvic floor muscles.

WonderCup size 4 is not recommended for women: who are still a virgin; whose cervixes are low during her cycle; who only use small/light tampons and who have a cervical spine injury.
